longBusinessDescription: shopvibes is an AI-powered PIM and Feed Management platform for eCommerce brands, manufacturers, and retailers. With shopvibes, teams save up to 90% of listing time while reducing errors and ensuring compliance with retailer requirements. The built-in AI Content Studio generates and translates product descriptions, while analytics and price tracking deliver real-time insights to boost sales. Trusted by leading Home & Living brands, shopvibes simplifies expansion into new markets, maintains a consistent brand presence across channels, and provides a single source of truth for product data—making eCommerce operations faster, smarter, and more scalable.

name: Find-Your-Software
businessDescription: Find-Your-Software revolutionizes digital decision-making by enabling companies to select tailored software solutions independently. Powered by advanced AI and a broad database across ERP, HR & ESG, it replaces consultancy dependence with fast, transparent recommendations. The MVP proves feasibility; its broad application supports sustainable business transformation. By democratizing access to technology and reducing barriers to digitalization, it accelerates innovation and competitiveness across industries.
longBusinessDescription:
Find-Your-Software – the intelligent platform for software selection
Find-Your-Software is an AI-powered platform that enables companies to make informed software decisions in just a few minutes – tailored, transparent, and without requiring in-depth expertise. The solution analyzes a company’s specific requirements and delivers a customized shortlist of suitable providers. Instead of months of manual research, users receive a qualified selection of relevant software solutions – including data on functionalities, implementation experience, and future viability.
By combining AI technology, market data, and best practices, automated, individualized preselection of enterprise software becomes possible for the first time. Within just six minutes, users receive a reliable decision-making foundation. The platform spans a wide range of software markets and creates genuine market transparency – from comprehensive ERP systems to specialized applications.
Find-Your-Software serves both companies and consultancies: companies benefit from rapid orientation in a complex market, while consultancies use the Selection Portal to support full software selection projects in a methodically structured way – from requirements gathering to contract analysis.
Find-Your-Software fundamentally transforms the software selection process: for the first time, strategic, data-driven preselection is possible – automated, transparent, and clearly structured. The platform was developed by Sectorlens GmbH, a university spin-off based in Potsdam specializing in AI-driven data analysis and digital decision support.

name: RechnungsAPI
businessDescription: API-Compliant German E-Invoices: Save Development Time and Legal Effort. Generate all German business documents (incl. XRechnung and ZUGFeRD) with a single integration.
longBusinessDescription:
What the SaaS Does
RechnungsAPI is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solution that lets businesses create legally compliant German e-invoices and other important business documents via a single, user-friendly API. This significantly cuts down on development time and reduces legal effort.
With RechnungsAPI, you can generate not only invoices but also credit notes, quotes, orders, purchase orders, and delivery notes. The platform supports common formats like XRechnung and ZUGFeRD and offers customizable designs for your PDF documents, allowing for easy integration into existing systems.

name: Memtime GmbH
businessDescription: Memtime is an automatic time tracking software that records digital activity in a private timeline - helping users log hours accurately without manual effort. Its ability to integrate with 100+ tools and keep all data private combined with the ease of usage makes it ideal for professionals who want to boost productivity and eliminate time leaks.
tags: automatic time tracking, billable hours tracking, offline time tracker
longBusinessDescription:
Memtime is a German software company specializing in automatic time tracking solutions for professionals and teams. Its product, also called Memtime, helps users effortlessly capture their work activity and accurately allocate time to clients and projects, without any manual time entry. This software runs in the background, recording every digital action in a visual timeline called the ‘Memory Aid™️’, ensuring nothing gets lost, even during multitasking. Memtime is committed to data privacy, with all activity data stored locally on the user’s device. The platform supports integration with leading project management tools (100+ integrations), helping teams eliminate time leaks, improve billing accuracy, and make smarter decisions based on real data.
Memtime serves consultants, agencies, developers, and knowledge workers across Europe and beyond, offering versions for Windows, Mac, and Linux. Free trial is offered to present how users can increase productivity - without changing how they work.

name: Monee
businessDescription: Budget & Expense Tracker
longBusinessDescription:
Monee is a simple yet powerful app that helps you track and manage your personal and group finances effortlessly. Just enter the amount, choose a category, and optionally add a note - that’s it. Monee presents your income and expenses in a clear, organized way, helping you understand where your money goes each month. No registration, no ads, and no tracking required.
Key Features
- Quick Entry: Add expenses and income by simply entering the amount, selecting a category, and optionally adding a note.
- Multiple Accounts: Create unlimited accounts for families, shared flats, or groups and invite others to collaborate.
- Recurring Transactions: Easily track repeating income and expenses to avoid re-entering the same data.
- Custom Categories: Organize your finances using categories you define.
- Detailed Filters & Analysis: Filter by type, frequency, participants, and more for deeper insight.
- Seamless Across Devices: Use Monee on your iPhone, iPad, and Mac — with your data synced smoothly across all devices.
- Worldwide Currencies: Manage finances in any currency around the globe.
- Export & Backup: Export your financial data whenever needed.
Benefits
- Streamlined Experience: No registration, no ads, and no tracking make Monee distraction-free and easy to use.
- Collaborative Budgeting: Perfect for couples, roommates, or teams managing shared budgets together.
- Always Free: Enjoy all features without subscriptions or hidden costs.
- Secure Access: Use Face ID, Touch ID, or a code to protect access to your data.
- Highly Customizable: Countless options for individualization let you tailor the app to your personal finance needs.

name: Fybu
businessDescription: fybu automates 95% of your accounting - from invoice and transaction matching to handing over your e-commerce accounting to your tax advisor.
tags: Accounting, Tax, Fybu, E-commerce, Tax advisor
longBusinessDescription:
FYBU is a next-generation accounting automation platform built specifically for e-commerce businesses, their in-house teams, and tax advisors. With a mission to eliminate the burden of manual bookkeeping, FYBU automates up to 95% of accounting processes — from invoice and payment reconciliation to transaction categorization and seamless handover of financial data to your Steuerberater (tax advisor).
E-commerce founders, managers, and online retailers handle thousands of transactions across marketplaces, payment providers, and banks every month. FYBU integrates effortlessly with all major e-commerce platforms, payment gateways, and accounting tools to streamline every step of the financial workflow. Its smart matching algorithms automatically reconcile invoices with bank transactions, detect duplicates or missing entries, and ensure tax-compliant documentation — all with minimal manual effort.
FYBU simplifies traditionally complex accounting tasks and delivers clear, structured outputs that tax advisors can work with directly. This leads to faster, smoother collaboration between Steuerberaters and e-commerce teams — saving time, reducing errors, and ensuring full compliance with German tax regulations.

name: GetDot.Ai
businessDescription: Dot is an AI Data Analysis Agent that lives in Slack or Microsoft Teams and plugs into data warehouses (Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, Postgres, etc.) so business users can ask questions in natural language and get instant, accurate answers.

name: Careertrainer.ai
businessDescription: AI-powered leadership training platform with realistic role-playing scenarios. Practice difficult conversations, get instant feedback, and develop communication skills through immersive AI dialogues. Perfect for managers and HR teams.
longBusinessDescription:
CareerTrainer.ai transforms leadership development through cutting-edge AI technology that creates realistic, immersive training experiences for managers and executives. Our platform addresses the critical challenge every leader faces: mastering the difficult conversations that determine leadership success.
Traditional leadership training often falls short because it lacks real-world application and immediate feedback. CareerTrainer.ai solves this by providing AI-powered role-playing scenarios where leaders can practice challenging workplace situations in a completely safe, private environment. Our intelligent AI characters simulate real employee personalities, emotions, and reactions, creating authentic learning experiences that translate directly to workplace success.
The platform covers comprehensive leadership scenarios including performance reviews, conflict resolution, feedback delivery, annual evaluations, motivation conversations, and crisis management. Each AI character is uniquely designed with distinct personalities and communication styles, ensuring leaders experience the full spectrum of workplace interactions they'll encounter.
What sets CareerTrainer.ai apart is our real-time analysis and feedback system. After each conversation, leaders receive detailed insights into their communication effectiveness, emotional intelligence application, and areas for improvement. The platform tracks progress over time, helping users identify patterns and measure their leadership development journey.
Flexibility is core to our design. Leaders can access training anytime, anywhere, fitting seamlessly into demanding schedules. There's no need for scheduling trainers or dealing with the pressure of performing in front of others. This privacy allows for genuine learning and experimentation with different approaches.
For organizations, CareerTrainer.ai offers enterprise solutions including team analytics, custom scenario development, and integration with existing HR systems. Companies can upload their specific leadership guidelines, ensuring training aligns with organizational standards. Our comprehensive reporting provides HR departments with measurable insights into leadership development progress across teams.
The platform serves individual leaders seeking personal growth, companies wanting scalable training solutions, and HR departments aiming to standardize leadership communication. Whether you're a new manager or experienced executive, CareerTrainer.ai provides the tools needed to excel in challenging leadership situations.
Built with privacy and security as priorities, our GDPR-compliant platform ensures all training remains confidential. Leaders can practice sensitive scenarios without concern about data exposure or professional reputation.
CareerTrainer.ai represents the future of leadership development, combining digital accessibility with personalized coaching and realistic human interaction, all powered by advanced AI technology.

name: Modifly
businessDescription:

By filling the ancillary gap in indirect channels, Modifly converts previously untapped demand into high margin sales that reward agents and recapture revenue for the airlines.

name: OnlineLebensaluf
businessDescription: Onlinelebenslauf.com ist eine benutzerfreundliche Plattform, mit der du schnell und professionell deinen Lebenslauf online erstellen kannst. Wähle aus modernen Vorlagen, passe dein Design individuell an und lade deinen Lebenslauf in wenigen Minuten als PDF herunter – ideal für Bewerbungen in Deutschland und international.
tags: Lebenslauf, ATS-optimierter, CV, Bewerbungsvorlage, Anschreiben verfassen
longBusinessDescription:
Onlinelebenslauf.com – Dein Partner für professionelle Lebensläufe
Onlinelebenslauf.com ist eine moderne und intuitive Online-Plattform, mit der du in wenigen Schritten einen ansprechenden und professionellen Lebenslauf erstellen kannst – ganz ohne Designkenntnisse. Unser Ziel ist es, dir den Bewerbungsprozess so einfach und effizient wie möglich zu machen, damit du dich auf das konzentrieren kannst, was wirklich zählt: deinen nächsten Karriereschritt.
Wähle aus einer Vielzahl von eleganten und zeitgemäßen Lebenslauf-Vorlagen, die speziell für den deutschen und internationalen Arbeitsmarkt entwickelt wurden. Unsere Vorlagen sind vollständig anpassbar – du kannst Farben, Schriftarten, Layouts und Inhalte flexibel ändern, um deinen persönlichen Stil und deine beruflichen Erfahrungen optimal zu präsentieren.
Egal ob Berufseinsteiger, Fachkraft, Quereinsteiger oder Führungskraft – mit Onlinelebenslauf.com findest du das passende Design und die passenden Tools, um deinen Lebenslauf hervorzuheben. Alle Lebensläufe lassen sich ganz einfach als PDF exportieren – bereit für deine Bewerbung per E-Mail oder Online-Portal.
Deine Vorteile auf einen Blick:
Benutzerfreundlicher Lebenslauf-Editor
Professionelle Vorlagen nach deutschen Standards
Intelligente Tipps zur Optimierung deines CVs
Export als PDF mit einem Klick
Datenschutz und Sicherheit deiner Daten
Starte jetzt auf Onlinelebenslauf.com und bring deine Karriere auf das nächste Level – schnell, professionell und überzeugend.

name: DKSR GmbH
businessDescription: DKSR empowers cities and utilities with CIVORA, an open-source data platform that transforms urban data into actionable insights. From sustainability and mobility to energy and governance, our interoperable infrastructure enables scalable digital services across Europe. Backed by Fraunhofer and trusted by 50+ municipalities, DKSR is driving the future of sovereign, data-driven urban transformation.
longBusinessDescription:
DKSR (Data Competence Center for Cities and Regions) is a Berlin-based GovTech scale-up enabling cities, regions, and utilities to harness the full value of their urban data. With our open-source platform CIVORA, we provide a modular and interoperable infrastructure that transforms fragmented data into actionable intelligence—empowering smarter decisions in areas like mobility, sustainability, energy, and urban governance.
Our vision is a future where public data serves the public good—where every city can become smart, sovereign, and sustainable by design.
Our mission is to enable municipalities to scale their digital capabilities through open standards, shared infrastructure, and strong public value orientation.
Backed by Fraunhofer and other leading institutional investors, DKSR already supports over 50 cities and public utilities across Europe. We combine deep domain expertise with an innovative dual-licensing model:
Free and open-source access to CIVORA for public sector collaboration and innovation
Paid managed services and SaaS features for scalability, security, and enterprise-grade support
DKSR is currently scaling across Europe and North America, driving systemic change in how cities manage, govern, and activate their data. We’re building the backbone for the digital public infrastructure of the 21st century—and we’re looking for visionary partners who want to shape it with us.

name: Higo Local Meet Global
businessDescription: Higo is the first travel companion and dating app designed for travelers who want to meet real locals for friendship, cultural exchange, or romance. Unlike traditional dating apps, Higo matches users based on trip timing, destination, and intent—ensuring meaningful connections before they even land.
longBusinessDescription:
Higo: Where Locals & Global Travelers Connect
Higo is a travel buddy app that brings together local girls, guys, and global explorers looking for more than just sightseeing. It’s about real moments, shared laughs, spontaneous meetups, and the kind of friendships (or more?) that make travel unforgettable.
Meet Thai Girls Who Love Meeting New People
From Bangkok to Chiang Mai to the beaches of Phuket—there are amazing Thai locals using Higo who are open to chats, new friendships, cultural exchanges, and even travel buddying. Whether they’re showing you a hidden local café or just chatting about life in Thailand, they make the journey richer.
International Friends Welcome – Feel at Home, Even When You’re Far Away
For foreigners in a new country, it’s easy to feel lost in translation. Higo helps you connect with locals who are excited to meet people from around the world. Ask questions, learn about theirl culture, or just find someone to explore the night market with.
Join Plans, Start Chats, Build Stories
Create your own travel plan or jump into one that sounds fun. Invite people to group chats or start a 1-on-1. It’s casual, open, and designed to help people meet naturally.
Language Isn’t a Barrier—It’s an Invitation
Many users are practicing English or Thai, and open to language exchange. It’s a fun and meaningful way to bond, even if you don’t speak the same language fluently.
Whether you're Thai or a traveler, whether you're here for a week or a year—Higo helps you turn “stranger” into “someone special.”
So next time you find yourself in a new city or craving new connections, remember: you’re never really alone with Higo in your pocket.

name: Alsona
businessDescription: Alsona is a lightweight outreach automation platform that helps sales teams, marketers, recruiters, and solopreneurs create personalized, AI-powered campaigns across LinkedIn and email. With 120+ proven templates and support for 50+ languages, it enables users to launch targeted outreach campaigns in under 20 minutes while focusing on starting real conversations rather than just driving clicks.
longBusinessDescription:
Alsona is a US-based, remote-first startup founded in 2024 that's revolutionizing outreach automation by making it smarter, more personal, and more effective. Built specifically for early- to scale-stage teams and agencies, the platform offers a lightweight yet highly customizable alternative to complex enterprise tools.
The company was founded by former engineers, product managers, and go-to-market leaders from major sales automation platforms who recognized the limitations of legacy tools and wanted to build something that reflects how people actually want to communicate in 2025 and beyond. Alsona serves sales teams, marketers, recruiters, job seekers, and solopreneurs who need powerful outreach capabilities without unnecessary complexity.
The platform currently supports LinkedIn and email outreach, with WhatsApp, SMS, and Slack functionality in development. What makes Alsona unique is its focus on simplicity without sacrificing power - users can launch their first campaign in under 20 minutes using over 120 proven campaign templates designed for real-world use cases, from finding investors and podcast guests to connecting job seekers with recruiters or building communities.
Built for global use from day one, Alsona supports outreach in over 50 languages, making it ideal for international teams and white-label agency partners serving clients across Europe, Asia, Latin America, and beyond. The platform includes real-time analytics, sentiment tracking, and extensive integrations, giving users the data they need to continuously refine their approach while operating seamlessly within their existing tech stack.

name: Mailcracker PRO
businessDescription:
If you're running a SaaS product or doing outreach at scale, chances are you're bleeding users because your emails never reach the inbox. You write the perfect copy, set up your automation, hit "send"—and then… silence. Why? Because your emails are landing in spam folders or being blocked before they're even seen.

That’s why we built MailCracker.Pro — a free email deliverability checker designed specifically for marketers, founders, and technical teams who care about making sure their messages land where they’re supposed to: in the inbox.

Our platform analyzes your email for spam triggers, misconfigured DNS records (SPF, DKIM, DMARC), and technical red flags that hurt your sender reputation. You also get detailed insights into why your emails might be flagged — from copy-based filters to IP blacklists — and how to fix them.

name: Partbase
businessDescription: Partbase is a next-gen B2B e-commerce platform for industrial spare parts, built with a relentless focus on speed, usability, and automation. We combine real-time supplier integrations with a seamless UX to simplify MRO procurement across Europe. From intuitive search to ERP-ready checkout, Partbase makes industrial buying fast, modern, and effortless.
tags: MRO, Hydraulics, Purchasing, Industry, Spare Parts
longBusinessDescription:
Partbase GmbH is redefining how industrial spare parts are bought and sold across Europe. Headquartered in Barleben, Germany, we’re building a new digital standard for the MRO (Maintenance, Repair, and Operations) sector—a €100B+ market still dominated by outdated systems, legacy distributors, and fragmented supplier networks.
Our platform is B2B-first but B2C-smooth. We deliver a lightning-fast, frictionless procurement experience that feels more like a consumer app than an old-school industrial catalog. From intuitive navigation and real-time availability to seamless checkout and quote handling, every touchpoint is optimized for usability and speed.
Behind the scenes, we operate a hybrid inventory model that pairs smart, curated in-house stock with direct, live integrations into major supplier systems. This allows us to offer unmatched assortment breadth—think 500,000+ industrial SKUs—with full transparency on availability, lead times, and logistics.
For larger customers, we offer deep technical integrations: PunchOut, OCI, and real-time ERP syncing enable automated workflows from requisition to delivery. Whether you're a small plant maintenance team or a multinational manufacturer, Partbase is designed to plug directly into your procurement stack with minimal friction.
But we’re not stopping there. Our vision is to become the infrastructure layer for industrial e-commerce in Europe. We're investing heavily in UX, automation, and AI-assisted tooling—from personalized part recommendations to predictive availability alerts and smart reorder workflows.
At Partbase, we believe that industrial buyers deserve software that’s as robust and elegant as the systems they keep running. We’re here to build it.

name: Webmetic
businessDescription: Webmetic is a Munich-based B2B SaaS company that provides cookie-free visitor identification and website personalization technology. The platform enables B2B companies to discover which businesses visit their websites in real-time and automatically personalize content to increase conversion rates, all while maintaining 100% GDPR compliance. Webmetic serves clients like Messe München, Condor, and freelance.de with a transparent pay-per-lead pricing model ranging from €0.40-€0.95 per identified company.
tags: B2B Analytics, Visitor Identification, Website Personalization, Privacy Compliance
longBusinessDescription:
# Webmetic Business Description
## Webmetic: Transforming B2B Marketing in the Post-Cookie Era
**Webmetic** is a Munich-based technology company that has solved the biggest challenge facing B2B marketing today: identifying and personalizing for anonymous website visitors without compromising privacy. As traditional tracking methods crumble under browser restrictions and GDPR enforcement, Webmetic provides the privacy-first alternative that actually works better.
### The Problem We Solve
**95% of B2B website visitors remain anonymous.** Companies like BMW, Siemens, and Mercedes-Benz visit your website, research your products, and leave without a trace. Sales teams miss massive opportunities because they don't know who showed interest. Marketing budgets get wasted on broad campaigns when specific companies are already engaged.
Traditional solutions are broken. Cookie-based tracking is blocked by modern browsers. Privacy regulations make fingerprinting illegal. Consent banners kill conversion rates. The old playbook doesn't work in 2025.
### Our Revolutionary Solution
Webmetic identifies **which companies** visit your website in real-time, then automatically personalizes their experience – all without cookies, consent banners, or privacy violations.
**Real-Time Company Intelligence**: Instantly discover when BMW visits your automation solutions page or when Volkswagen downloads your manufacturing whitepaper. Get company name, industry, size, location, and engagement insights the moment they arrive.
**Smart Website Personalization**: Your website automatically adapts content for each visiting company. Automotive manufacturers see industry-specific case studies. Healthcare companies see compliance-focused messaging. Every visitor encounters content that speaks directly to their business needs.
**100% Privacy Compliant**: Operates under GDPR without consent requirements. All processing happens in German data centers. External legal validation confirms complete compliance. No cookies, no tracking, no privacy violations.
### Proven Results That Matter
**30-80% conversion rate improvements** through personalized experiences. **50% better lead quality** because prospects already understand your relevance. **Reduced acquisition costs** through precise targeting. **Enhanced sales efficiency** with qualified prospect intelligence before they even inquire.
Current clients include **Messe München**, **Condor**, **freelance.de**, and major European trade shows like ISPO and IAA Mobility. The platform identifies over **47,000 active companies monthly** across customer websites.
### Why Webmetic Wins
**Technology Leadership**: Only provider with completely cookie-free architecture immune to browser changes and privacy regulations.
**Superior Data Quality**: Advanced AI algorithms deliver higher accuracy than cookie-based competitors, with comprehensive company profiles including industry classifications and digital presence data.
**Effortless Implementation**: Works with any website technology. Integration takes days, not months. No technical expertise required.
**Transparent Pricing**: Pay only for identified companies (€0.40-€0.95 each). No setup fees, no data limits, no hidden costs. ROI is immediate and measurable.
### Market Opportunity
The **€3.2 billion global B2B visitor identification market** is in complete upheaval. Chrome eliminates cookies in 2025. GDPR enforcement intensifies. Traditional providers are scrambling to adapt broken technologies while Webmetic leads with purpose-built solutions.
Companies that move first gain decisive advantages. While competitors struggle with consent rates and tracking failures, early adopters deliver personalized experiences that convert at dramatically higher rates.
### The Webmetic Advantage
Founded by **Yannik Süß**, a technology entrepreneur with 15+ years in web analytics and a track record of successful implementations at major companies like E.ON, ING, and Condor. The team combines deep technical expertise with proven business experience across B2B marketing, enterprise sales, and regulatory compliance.
**This isn't incremental improvement – it's the future of B2B marketing.** Webmetic enables the transition from privacy-invasive tracking to sophisticated, compliant intelligence that delivers superior results while respecting user privacy.
The post-cookie web is here. The question isn't whether to adapt – it's whether you'll lead the transition or follow behind. Webmetic provides the technology to lead.
**Transform anonymous traffic into qualified opportunities. Personalize without privacy violations. Convert visitors who would otherwise disappear forever.**
*Ready to see which companies are visiting your website?*
---
**Contact**: www.webmetic.de | [email protected]
**Founded**: 2025 | **Location**: Munich, Germany
**Clients**: Messe München, Condor, freelance.de, ISPO, IAA Mobility

name: Invoice AI
businessDescription:
Invoice AI is an intelligent invoice automation platform designed for governments, enterprises, and SMEs across Europe and the GCC. It uses multi-agent AI to extract data from invoices, detect fraud and duplication, streamline approval workflows, and ensure full tax compliance with local regulations such as ZATCA (Saudi Arabia) and FTA (UAE).

The platform supports ERP integration (SAP, Oracle, QuickBooks), mobile approvals, real-time cost insights, and optional ESG emissions tracking. With a multilingual interface (English/Arabic), Invoice AI empowers finance teams to reduce costs, increase transparency, and automate financial control — all from a single smart platform.
tags: invoice automation, AI finance platform, govtech compliance, ESG analytics
longBusinessDescription:
Invoice AI is a next-generation, AI-powered invoice automation platform that enables organizations across the public and private sectors to streamline financial operations, detect anomalies, and ensure tax and ESG compliance — all through a multilingual, enterprise-ready system.
Built with a modular, multi-agent AI architecture, Invoice AI automates the full lifecycle of invoice management: from data extraction using OCR + NLP, to fraud detection, approval workflows, tax categorization, and real-time spend analysis. The platform integrates seamlessly with major ERP systems like SAP, Oracle, QuickBooks, and Microsoft Dynamics.
Invoice AI is specifically designed to meet the regulatory and operational needs of governments, enterprises, and SMEs in regions such as the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) and Europe. It is fully compliant with ZATCA (Saudi Arabia), FTA (UAE), and EU VAT frameworks, supporting automated generation of localized tax reports and VAT summaries.
The platform also offers an optional ESG module, which maps invoice data to Scope 1–3 emissions categories, helping organizations align their procurement spend with sustainability goals.
Key features include:
	•	Intelligent invoice data extraction (PDF, email, image, etc.)
	•	Fraud & duplicate detection via AI agents
	•	Customizable approval workflows and mobile-first interfaces
	•	Multilingual support
	•	Public procurement compliance engine
	•	API marketplace for third-party integrations
	•	WhatsApp invoice alerts and user notifications (in beta)
Invoice AI serves finance departments, government agencies, and growing businesses that require a secure, scalable, and intelligent solution to automate invoice processing while maintaining audit-readiness and compliance across multiple regions.
Whether you’re a public entity managing thousands of transactions or a private enterprise seeking to reduce costs and increase efficiency, Invoice AI is your financial command center powered by real-time intelligence.

businessDescription: Wells & Willow ist ein nachhaltiges deutsches E-Commerce-Startup aus Koblenz, das luxuriöse, hypoallergene Bambus-Bettwaren und Accessoires anbietet – weich, atmungsaktiv, hautfreundlich.
tags: Sustainable living, Bamboo bedding, Eco textiles, Wellness
longBusinessDescription:
Wells & Willow ist ein nachhaltiges E-Commerce-Startup aus Deutschland mit Sitz in Koblenz, das moderne Wohntextilien neu denkt – natürlich, hochwertig und verantwortungsvoll. Unsere Marke steht für stilvolles Wohlfühlen mit gutem Gewissen: Wir bieten hochwertige Bambus-Lyocell Bettwäsche, Handtücher und Accessoires, die Haut, Umwelt und Lebensstil in Einklang bringen.
Inspiriert von der Stärke des Weidenbaums und dem Wunsch nach echter Nachhaltigkeit setzen wir auf Bambus-Lyocell – eine innovative Faser, die außergewöhnlich weich, hypoallergen, atmungsaktiv und umweltschonend ist. Unsere Produkte sind OEKO-TEX® zertifiziert, werden plastikfrei verpackt und in wiederverwendbaren Bambus-Stoffbeuteln sowie recycelten Versandkartons im Rahmen der DHL GoGreen-Initiative versendet.
Wells & Willow verfolgt die Vision, nachhaltigen Luxus alltagstauglich zu machen. Mit jedem Kauf unterstützen unsere Kund:innen nicht nur einen bewussteren Lebensstil, sondern auch soziale Projekte wie die Förderung der Frauenbildung in Indien sowie faire Produktion in Asien durch langjährige Partnerschaften mit erfahrenen Herstellern.
Unsere Produkte sind ausschließlich online erhältlich – so ermöglichen wir deutschland- und europaweite Lieferungen mit reduziertem CO₂-Fußabdruck. Ob hautfreundliche Bettwäsche, saugstarke Handtücher oder plastikfreie Geschenkideen: Wells & Willow steht für natürliche Geborgenheit mit Sinn und Stil.

name: Puraite
businessDescription: AI-powered Evidence synthesis for pharmaceutical R&D teams
longBusinessDescription:
Puraite is a spin-off from Paderborn University that develops AI-powered solutions to transform how systematic literature reviews (SLRs), meta-analyses, and broader evidence synthesis are conducted in the pharmaceutical and life sciences industries. Our mission is to enable faster, more transparent, and more scalable generation of medical evidence to support everything from early R&D to market access and health technology assessments (HTA).
Built by a team of machine learning researchers and supported by over €1.1 million in non-dilutive public funding (EXIST Forschungstransfer & StartupTransfer.NRW), Puraite automates critical components of the evidence pipeline: title and abstract screening, full-text review, and structured data extraction. Unlike black-box models, Puraite’s explainable AI engine offers full traceability and confidence scores, making it suitable for regulatory-grade use cases.
Pharmaceutical companies and CROs use Puraite to drastically reduce the time and cost of generating robust, reproducible evidence for drug development, global value dossiers (GVDs), and real-world evidence (RWE) submissions. Our hybrid human-in-the-loop workflow ensures scientific rigor while freeing up expert resources to focus on high-value tasks.
Puraite is currently preparing its market launch and has initiated pilot collaborations with pharma and academic institutions across Europe and North America. Our long-term vision is to become the evidence infrastructure layer for the pharmaceutical industry to offer living reviews, network meta-analyses, and protocol automation as standard.

longBusinessDescription: PALPRINT supports businesses in the industrial logistics sector to navigate the challenges of packaging process disruptions, skilled labor shortages, high costs of manual processes, and stringent regulatory compliance requirements.  Our solution comprises a system of 3D printers and software for automated packaging design, enabling the production of custom-fit packaging solutions directly at B2B customer sites based on 3D models of the components to be packaged. The packaging materials are made from recycled content, which, after use and reprocessing, can be almost fully reused in the same process. PALPRINT's core competency lies in developing software solutions for automated packaging design and patentable modifications of FDM and FGF printing technologies for processing recycled materials, along with integrating individual components into a reliable, modular system solution. Our offering provides significant benefits to customers, including cost-effective automation of custom packaging, a closed-loop material cycle, functional packaging integration (lightweight, labeling, sealing), and savings in CO2 emissions, transportation, and storage costs. Additionally, it enhances supply chain resilience through local availability. PALPRINT's value proposition to its customers is the automated production of tailor-made, sustainable reusable packaging solutions that ensure optimal product protection in industrial logistics while saving costs, labor, and resources and ensuring compliance with legal standards.

flow-lyne.com

longBusinessDescription:
Lexemo is a Germany-based LegalTech company redefining how legal professionals work through intelligent automation. Its flagship platform, e!, is a no-code, AI-powered solution designed to help law firms, in-house legal teams, and tax or compliance departments digitize and automate routine legal workflows with unmatched speed, security, and flexibility.
Built to remove the traditional barriers to legal automation—such as technical complexity, time-consuming setup, and lack of IT resources—e! enables users to create powerful end-to-end workflows without writing a single line of code. Whether it’s automating NDA reviews, conducting structured risk assessments, managing compliance processes, or standardizing contract clauses, e! allows legal professionals to focus on high-value work.
One of e!’s standout features is AutoMate—a breakthrough module that lets users build complete legal automations by simply describing their processes in plain language. This prompt-to-workflow functionality dramatically accelerates adoption, particularly for busy teams with limited time or technical expertise.
Key features of e! include:
- Visual No-Code Workflow Builder – for intuitive and accessible process creation
- AutoMate – instantly converts natural language descriptions into working legal automations
- AI-Powered Workflow Automation – automates tasks like data extraction, clause checks, and document assembly
- Smart Clause Manager – for consistent contract drafting and clause reuse
- AI Agents for Email and Data Handling – to triage, monitor, and automate communication flows
- Deep System Connectivity – including integrations with Microsoft 365, HighQ, SharePoint, and external APIs
- Unlimited User Policy – enabling organization-wide collaboration without additional licensing costs
- GDPR Compliance – with EU hosting and full data sovereignty
Lexemo operates on a flexible SaaS model, with pricing based on functionality rather than user count—making it scalable from boutique law firms to large enterprise legal departments. Custom onboarding, AI model integration, and modular feature development ensure that each client’s unique needs are met.
With e!, legal automation becomes not only possible but practical—empowering teams to deploy AI in their workflows in minutes, not months.

tags: European Financial Data, Financial Reports, Investment Tools, Real-Time Financial Filings, AI for Finance, Company Filings, Insider Trades, API Access, Financial Intelligence, FinancialReports.eu
longBusinessDescription:
Europe's financial data is complex. It spreads across many national registries. Language differences and inconsistent formats mix it up. FinancialReports.eu, launched in 2022, solves this problem. It collects millions of financial filings from thousands of listed companies in 44 European markets. All this information is available on one easy-to-use platform. Picture a tool that not only gathers data but turns it into an asset, whether you’re an individual investor or a global firm.
The goal is clear and grounded: make financial intelligence available to everyone. The free Basic plan offers unlimited access to filings, company details, insider trades, and some AI-driven queries. This allows anyone to explore Europe’s markets for free. For those needing more, the Analyst plan offers watchlists and more AI queries, ideal for solo investors. The Professional tier includes API access, webhook alerts, and faster support. It's ideal for advanced users. The Business plan scales up with extensive API capabilities and dedicated support for teams. Enterprise options provide custom integrations and priority service for large operations. Annual subscriptions offer notable savings, and plans can adapt as your needs change.
What sets it apart? Real-time updates help you stay up to date. AI lets you explore filings as if you were an expert. This platform works well for both newcomers and experienced professionals. Trusted by top industry players, it’s not just a database but a tool for sharper decisions. Starting in Europe, FinancialReports.eu plans to go global by 2025. Their goal is to change how people access financial data around the world. For investors, it’s a dependable ally in a market where clear information drives success

name: SCDA Facility Allocator
businessDescription: SCDA Facility Allocator is an analytics tool that allows supply chain planners and service network designers to allocate sales stores, warehouses, and service facilities at profit maximizing locations.
longBusinessDescription:
The SCDA Facility Allocator is an prescriptive analytics tool that fosters artificial intelligence and allows supply chain managers, service facilitiy planners, distribution chains, supermarkets, franchise business, and others to plan and optimize profit maximizing allocation of thei stores, warehouses, and service facilities. 
Using a computerized optimization model and mathematical problem solvers the SCDA Facility Allocator:
1) captures spatial distribution of market demand
2) considers all potential facility allocations
3) considers CAPEX for each candidate facility
4) considers operative expenses for each candidate facility
Based on this, the SCDA Facility Allocator visualizes spatial distribution of customer demand, decides on the optimal amount of facilities, and selects the most promising service facility locations.
The tool has been applied to e.g. Barber Shop Franchises. In a more recent use case application the SCDA Facility Allocator helped a Barber Shop Franchise operation to decide on service facility investments in several major cities in Brazil, including Rio de Janeiro.

tags: SportsTech innovation, AI-driven football, Digital twin technology, Player transfer platform, Sports performance analytics, Football data insights, Athlete career management, Smart scouting solutions
longBusinessDescription:
Minutes 90 UG is a forward-thinking sports-tech startup based in Buchloe, Germany, dedicated to transforming the global football industry through digital innovation, data analytics, and AI-driven solutions. The company’s core mission is to create a seamless, transparent, and data-driven ecosystem that empowers football players, clubs, and agents to make smarter decisions in player transfers, marketing, and career development.
Our Vision
At Minutes 90 UG, we envision a football industry where talent discovery, transfers, and career growth are streamlined by technology and data-driven insights. We believe in breaking traditional barriers by providing intelligent digital solutions that optimize player performance, marketability, and business operations within the sports industry.
Core Services & Solutions
1. Digital Player Transfer Platform
	•	A state-of-the-art online marketplace connecting clubs, agents, and players to facilitate transparent and efficient player transfers.
	•	AI-powered analytics to assess player potential, market value, and fit for clubs.
	•	Real-time scouting tools to discover rising talents and make data-backed recruitment decisions.
2. AI & Data-Driven Sports Performance Analytics
	•	Advanced machine learning algorithms for player performance tracking and injury prediction.
	•	AI-powered match analysis to help clubs and coaches make strategic decisions.
	•	Comprehensive data-driven reports to assess market trends and transfer opportunities.
3. Sports Marketing & Brand Management
	•	Digital marketing strategies tailored to increase player visibility and enhance their personal brand value.
	•	Sponsorship matchmaking to connect players with brands and endorsements.
	•	Social media optimization, PR campaigns, and media training for players and clubs.
4. Sports Consulting & Career Development
	•	Professional advisory services for clubs, agents, and players on contract negotiations, sponsorships, and career growth.
	•	Workshops on sports business, media management, and AI applications in football.
	•	Support in FIFA regulations compliance, transfer strategies, and long-term player career planning.
5. Organization of Training Camps, Friendly Matches & Sports Events
	•	High-performance training camps for player development and skill enhancement.
	•	International friendly matches to foster cross-club collaborations and talent exposure.
	•	Tech-driven sports exhibitions and networking events to connect stakeholders from the football industry.
6. Global Networking & International Transfer Support
	•	A trusted ecosystem for clubs, players, and agents worldwide to connect and collaborate.
	•	Cross-border transfer support, considering legal, cultural, and regulatory factors.
	•	Strategic alliances with football academies, scouting agencies, and professional leagues.
Why Choose Minutes 90 UG?
	•	AI-Driven Decision Making: We integrate artificial intelligence and big data to optimize every aspect of football management.
	•	Transparency & Efficiency: Our secure and reliable platform ensures fair player transfers and contract negotiations.
	•	Innovative Approach: We leverage the latest in sports technology, marketing, and analytics to drive value for our clients.
	•	Global Reach: Our international connections open doors to worldwide football opportunities.
Join the Future of Football with Minutes 90 UG!
Whether you are a player seeking career growth, a club looking for top talent, or an agent navigating the transfer market, Minutes 90 UG is your trusted digital partner in football’s next era.

name: Bonscore
businessDescription: Credite reports and company data on German companies
tags: finance, data, credit reports, bonitätsauskünfte, data broker, industry analysis
longBusinessDescription: The creditworthiness of a company and the factors that influence it should be transparent and comprehensible. We analyse publicly available data, for example from the company register, and create solid credit ratings based on this. Our innovative models use advanced algorithms to reliably distinguish solvent companies from insolvent ones. Thanks to the high quality and availability of the data, we are able to precisely calculate the probability of default of companies on a monthly basis. We are constantly evolving and now also see ourselves as a data broker. We can carry out customised analyses on our data and thus offer great added value for the German financial industry. Daily data updates allow us to keep a close eye on the German market and make company and sector-specific forecasts about future developments.

name: JustCMS
businessDescription: JustCMS is an innovative, AI-driven headless content management system designed for developers and content creators. It harnesses advanced AI tools to generate complete, well-structured pages in minutes—from ideation and SEO optimization to auto-generating metadata and custom images. With features like reusable blocks, smart editing tools, and seamless API integration with popular frameworks, JustCMS ensures every piece of content is consistent, brand-aligned, and delivered at lightning speed. Secure API key management and a fully distributed architecture make it a cost-effective, scalable solution that simplifies your workflow and reduces development time.
longBusinessDescription:
JustCMS is a cutting-edge, AI-driven content management system tailored for busy developers and content creators looking to streamline their workflow. As an AI-first, cost-effective headless CMS, it leverages advanced artificial intelligence tools to transform the way content is created and managed. With JustCMS, you can generate well-structured, complete pages in a matter of minutes, from initial ideation and SEO optimization to auto-generating metadata and custom images that align with your content's context.
The platform's standout features include the Composer tool, which simplifies the process of content generation by allowing users to input a simple topic and receive a complete page draft in moments. JustCMS also offers flexible content blocks, including standard, custom, and reusable options, ensuring dynamic and consistent content across multiple pages. These reusable blocks enable centralized editing, so updates made to one block are automatically reflected on all pages where it appears, saving time and ensuring uniformity.
Customization is at the heart of JustCMS, with project-wide writing and image style settings that ensure all AI-generated outputs match your brand's unique voice and visual identity. The platform's AI-powered editing tools allow for easy refinement of content, maintaining consistency in tone and style, while the AI image generation feature provides fast, unique visuals, eliminating the need for costly stock images.
JustCMS’s seamless API integration with modern frameworks such as Next.js, Nuxt, Angular, and Flutter, ensures easy incorporation into existing technology stacks. Its fully distributed architecture guarantees lightning-fast content delivery and scalability, making it suitable for websites with varying traffic volumes.
Security is a priority, with advanced API key management that includes immediate encryption, split storage, and on-demand decryption, safeguarding sensitive information. JustCMS is not just about efficiency; it’s about transforming your content management approach, offering a future-ready solution that combines AI innovation with practical, user-friendly tools, ensuring a consistent, high-quality digital presence.

name: agriBIOME
businessDescription:
agriBIOME improves the resilience and yield of crops in agriculture through specific, natural, microbial and GMO-free solutions and can thus reduce the use of fertilizers and pesticides. This promotes more sustainable and at the same time more efficient agriculture and supports security of supply. 
Microbiomes are microorganisms such as bacteria and fungi. These microorganisms play a crucial role in nature for plant and animal health and growth.
tags: agriculture, food security, crop resilience, animal health
longBusinessDescription:
The use of chemical fertilizers, pesticides, and herbicides is often neccessary to maintain the farm's yield to guarantee food security and thus make ends meet financially but it disrupts the natural soil microbiome, reducing the diversity and abundance of beneficial microbes, which leads to poor quality and health issues such as increased cancer risks - at the same time the high usage of antibiotics in livestock, which leads to lower (animal) health and welfare and increased antibiotic resistance is a huge issue in terms of food security and growing population. 
agriBIOME improves the resilience and yield of crops in agriculture and animal health and welfare through specific, natural, microbial and GMO-free solutions and can thus reduce the use of fertilizers and pesticides but also the usage of antibiotics in livestock.
With our solution we naturally fill the gap of missing microbiomes in plants by growin special live worms carrying specific microbiomes adapted to the corresponding grain variety: When the vermicompost is liquidized and administered to plants studies have shown a significantly better nutrient supply, strong growth promotion, better disease defense and improved stress resistance, while worms can be fed once per fattening cycle to young animals right at the beginning of the rearing period to transfer complex microbiota to support their eubiosis.
In contrast to other solutions, we pursue a scalable and natural approach, scientifically proven with a circularity and a zero waste approach based on microbiological solutions protected by patents.

name: Framebird

businessDescription: FireChatbot is an AI-powered digital assistant designed to enhance customer service on your website. longBusinessDescription: FireChatbot is a comprehensive AI-driven customer assistant tailored for website integration. The setup is straightforward: input your URL, and FireChatbot scrapes all pages to build a knowledge base, enabling it to answer a wide array of customer questions accurately. It supports multiple languages and can process text, audio, and images, facilitating real-time, empathetic interactions without latency. The chatbot's knowledge base updates automatically every 48 hours, ensuring it remains current with any website modifications. Integration is simple, requiring only a single line of code. FireChatbot also offers a robust dashboard that provides quantitative insights—such as page views, chatbot activations, and interaction times—and qualitative analyses, including summaries, sentiment analysis, and user chat recommendations. Committed to data privacy, FireChatbot is fully compliant with EU GDPR standards, with all data stored in Europe and personal information like contact details or images deleted using AI.

name: CIRQUEL
businessDescription: At CI|RQUEL we are redefining the future of fashion reverse logistics by combining cutting-edge AI-powered SaaS technology with hands-on management at strategically localized warehouses and end-to-end orchestration of unwanted items including returns, dead-stock, overstock and samples.
tags: fashion returns, repurposing unwanted garment, SaaS and local orchestration of returns
longBusinessDescription: We specialize in managing the lifecycle of fashion returns. Once an item is returned by the end-consumer, we ensure a seamless process from start to finish. Our end-to-end solution gives brands peace of mind and the ability to focus on their core business. 1. Our AI-powered computer vision technology streamlines the return process by quickly evaluating each item’s condition and grade. This accelerates sorting, improves accuracy, and reduces errors, enabling faster decisions on restocking or repurposing items. 2. Through our trusted partner network, after precise quality check we take care of cleaning, and repairing each garment as needed. This ensures high standards and fast turnaround, allowing for ultra-fast restocking or repurposing of returned garment. 3. Our precise quality checks and rapid cleaning and repairs, ensuring quick restocking or repurposing through partner rental and resale platform as well as our own one - CIRQUEL. This efficiency minimizes storage costs and allows us to monetize brands’ returned items swiftly, maximizing their value with minimal delay. 4. We provide eco-friendly recycling for garments at the end of their lifecycle, ensuring responsible disposal to minimize environmental impact. Our service includes precise CO2 calculations and adherence to EU legislation, guaranteeing sustainability in every process. To sum up: CIRQUEL aims to simplify and accelerate the processing of returns, deadstock, and prototypes for brands, transforming potential losses into new revenue streams. We leverage AI-powered inspection technology and local partnerships to ensure fast, efficient, and sustainable handling. In the long term, our vision is to revolutionize the fashion industry by promoting circularity, reducing waste, and creating a global impact through localized, eco-friendly solutions.

Unsere Leistungen decken ein umfassendes Spektrum ab:
Webdesign und Website-Entwicklung – Wir gestalten ansprechende und funktionale Websites, die nicht nur optisch überzeugen, sondern auch benutzerfreundlich und leistungsorientiert sind. Online-Shop-Entwicklung – Wir kreieren Online-Shops, die Ihre Produkte perfekt in Szene setzen und ein nahtloses Einkaufserlebnis für Ihre Kunden bieten, ganz auf Ihre individuellen Anforderungen angepasst.
Grafikdesign für Social Media und Print – Von professionellen Logos bis hin zu kreativen Beiträgen für Social Media und Printmaterialien – unsere Designs sind auf Ihre Marke und Zielgruppe abgestimmt und helfen dabei, Ihre Unternehmensidentität visuell zu stärken.

Wir bei ARENJA IT-Solutions glauben daran, dass jedes Unternehmen das Potenzial hat, online erfolgreich zu sein. Mit unserer Expertise und unserem Engagement für exzellenten Service helfen wir Ihnen, Ihre digitalen Ziele zu erreichen und nachhaltig zu wachsen. name: DmarcDkim.com UG
businessDescription: DmarcDkim.com is a comprehensive DMARC (Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting, and Conformance) solution designed to enhance email infrastructure analytics and security. Our platform offers a user-friendly approach to implementing and managing DMARC, which is crucial for improving email delivery rates and combating email impersonation scams.
tags: DMARC Analytics, DMARC Check, B2B, SaaS
longBusinessDescription:
DmarcDkim.com helps elevate your email campaigns by increasing the likelihood of bypassing spam filters and improving overall email deliverability. This ensures your messages reach their intended recipients effectively. Our system also safeguards your domain reputation against spoofing attacks and implements a compliant email authentication setup to maintain brand integrity.
Users gain access to intuitive dashboards that provide comprehensive insights into email delivery performance. These tools make it easy to identify and address misconfigured email sources, optimizing your email infrastructure. We provide actionable insights through easy-to-handle action plans to fix email delivery issues, along with guided assistance through the process of becoming DMARC compliant.
Our platform is designed for universal accessibility, catering to a wide range of users including CEOs, marketers, product managers, and developers. No expert knowledge is required to start securing your email domain, making it an ideal solution for businesses of all sizes and technical expertise levels.
How It Works
The process begins with a domain check, where we perform an instant analysis of your domain to identify potential threats and weak spots in your email security and deliverability. Next, you'll connect your domain to DmarcDkim.com to start receiving and analyzing DMARC reports. This monitoring setup allows you to gain valuable insights into your email authentication performance.
Once connected, you'll have access to our comprehensive dashboard. This gives you a clear overview of your email sources and helps identify areas for improvement in your email delivery strategy. Throughout the process, we provide step-by-step guidance to achieve full DMARC compliance and maximize your email security.
Why Choose DmarcDkim.com?
DmarcDkim.com stands out for its simplicity. We handle the complex challenges of email security and deliverability, allowing you to focus on your core business activities. Our solution has proven effectiveness, with users reporting increases in email delivery rates of up to 25%.
We offer comprehensive protection against various email-based threats, including Business Email Compromise (BEC) attacks, which have cost businesses billions of dollars. Our platform is specifically designed to backtrace DMARC verification failures and provide actionable solutions, leveraging our expertise in email authentication.
With DmarcDkim.com, you receive continuous support through ongoing monitoring and analysis to ensure your email infrastructure remains secure and efficient. By choosing our service, you're not just implementing a security measure; you're investing in the trust and reliability of every message you send.
Join us in our mission to accelerate worldwide DMARC adoption and create a safer digital communication environment for businesses and individuals alike. With DmarcDkim.com, you can trust that your email communications are protected, compliant, and optimized for delivery.

longBusinessDescription:
# What is Chatwith?
Chatwith is a customizable ChatGPT AI chatbot. It can be trained using your website content and files. The design enables it to instantly answer questions and resolve customer support queries using AI. Moreover, it integrates with over 6000 apps, with no coding required.
# Key Features
- Custom GPT trained on your data: Chatwith trains on website, knowledge base, and resources like PDF files or YouTube videos.
- Custom GPT Actions: Connects to 5000+ apps or to your API for dynamic data access and task execution.
- Easy Installation and Integrations: Single line of code installation; integrates with tools, messaging platforms or can be shared with a link.
- Multilingual Support: Speaks over 95 languages to serve a wide range of customers.
- Analytics: Provides insights through analytics, notifications, and charts on all interactions.
# Who Can Benefit from Chatwith
Businesses and website owners aiming to enhance customer support, e-commerce sites, real estate agencies, and any entity in need of a knowledgeable assistant available 24/7 can benefit from this tool. It's also advantageous for those seeking to leverage AI without coding expertise.
# What Makes Chatwith Unique
Its ability to be customized extensively: from training on specific datasets, integrating with a vast array of apps to matching brand aesthetics. Plus, the capability to speak over 95 languages makes it uniquely positioned to support global businesses.
# Summary
Chatwith presents a robust, customizable AI chatbot solution. It's designed to integrate effortlessly with any website and other digital platforms without requiring any coding experience. By utilizing data from your website and files, it can offer immediate, round-the-clock support in over 95 languages. This makes it an invaluable asset for businesses and individuals alike.

name: ReductStore
businessDescription: ReductStore is the fastest time-series object store for edge AI, providing unmatched performance and easy integration for managing large volumes of time-stamped, unstructured data.
longBusinessDescription: ReductStore is a high-performance time-series object store tailored for edge AI applications. It combines blob and time-series data storage to manage large volumes of data with low latency. Key features include unlimited blob size, retention policies based on data volume, efficient data batching, label-based replication and filtering, and iterative data queries. It outperforms other time-series databases for unstructured data such as images, vibration data, and text, and integrates with multiple programming languages.

name: rhinopaq GmbH
businessDescription: rhinopaq helps companies to tackle packaging waste and reduce packing times and costs by establishing reusable packaging for B2B-shipping.
tags: packaging, logistics, reusable packaging, transport packaging
longBusinessDescription:
Humanity already uses 66% more wood at present than can be sustainably regrown in nature. A quarter of industrial wood consumption is due to cardboard packaging (study by WWF & University of Kassel). With our reusable packaging, we are already better off than disposable packaging after the third use; after 10 cycles, we have saved 50% CO2 and reduced the corresponding amount of cardboard waste. Our packaging is designed for up to 20 cycles, after which it is fully returned to the recycling process. The packaging itself currently consists of 60% recyclate. We work together with a workshop for people with disabilities to process the packaging between cycles. We combine the conservation of resources with the inclusion of people with disabilities.
We currently offer:
- Reusable transport packaging produced within the EU
- Broad range of experience through integration in the e-bike sector
- We offer reusable packaging in a pay-per-use model, where we take care of the return and refurbishment
- Full data transparency in the number of uses and the resulting resource savings, e.g. for sustainability reporting
Our advantages at a glance:
- Efficient use of resources & 60% recycled material
- Production & recycling in the EU
- Refurbishment & processing in Germany
- 51% CO2 saved after just 10 cycles
- Huge reduction in the amount of waste
- Improved customer perception due to increased sustainability
- No disposal costs according to the packaging law
- Fast assembly of the packaging without tape
- Improved work safety as no knife is required for unpacking
- 6 of the 17 SDGs of the United Nations are addressed

name: Versicherungsriese
businessDescription: Ein Versicherungsmakler ist ein unverzichtbarer Begleiter für alle, die sich im komplexen Feld der Versicherungen zurechtfinden wollen. Angesichts der Vielzahl von Versicherungsangeboten ist es entscheidend, einen verlässlichen und erfahrenen Experten an seiner Seite zu haben. Wir bieten Ihnen umfassende und detaillierte Informationen, um sicherzustellen, dass Sie bestens informiert die besten Versicherungsentscheidungen treffen können.
longBusinessDescription:
Versicherungsmakler: Ihr kompetenter Partner in Versicherungsfragen
Ein Versicherungsmakler ist ein unverzichtbarer Begleiter für alle, die sich im komplexen Feld der Versicherungen zurechtfinden wollen. Angesichts der Vielzahl von Versicherungsangeboten ist es entscheidend, einen verlässlichen und erfahrenen Experten an seiner Seite zu haben. Wir bieten Ihnen umfassende und detaillierte Informationen, um sicherzustellen, dass Sie bestens informiert die besten Versicherungsentscheidungen treffen können.
Die Rolle eines Versicherungsmaklers
Ein Versicherungsmakler agiert als unabhängiger Berater zwischen dem Versicherungsnehmer und den Versicherungsgesellschaften. Er vertritt die Interessen seiner Kunden und bietet eine objektive und maßgeschneiderte Beratung. Im Gegensatz zu Versicherungsvertretern, die an eine bestimmte Gesellschaft gebunden sind, kann ein Makler aus einer Vielzahl von Anbietern wählen und so die besten Optionen für seine Kunden finden. Unser Ziel ist es, Ihnen durch fundierte Beratung und individuelle Lösungen den optimalen Versicherungsschutz zu bieten.
Umfassende Beratung zu verschiedenen Versicherungstypen
Wir bieten Ihnen detaillierte Informationen und kompetente Beratung zu unterschiedlichen Versicherungstypen. Egal ob Krankenversicherung, Kfz-Versicherung, Haftpflichtversicherung oder Hausratversicherung – wir decken alle relevanten Bereiche ab. Jeder Versicherungsbereich wird ausführlich erläutert, inklusive der spezifischen Leistungen, Kosten und der führenden Anbieter auf dem Markt.
Krankenversicherung
Die Krankenversicherung ist in Deutschland obligatorisch und ein wesentlicher Bestandteil des sozialen Sicherungssystems. Unser Versicherungsmakler erklärt Ihnen die Unterschiede zwischen der gesetzlichen und der privaten Krankenversicherung, deren Vorteile und Nachteile sowie die Voraussetzungen für einen Wechsel. Wir helfen Ihnen, die richtige Entscheidung zu treffen und den optimalen Versicherungsschutz zu finden.
Kfz-Versicherung
Für alle Fahrzeughalter in Deutschland ist eine Kfz-Versicherung verpflichtend. Sie umfasst die Haftpflichtversicherung sowie optional die Teilkasko- und Vollkaskoversicherung. Wir bieten Ihnen ausführliche Informationen zu den Deckungsumfängen, Kosten und Zusatzleistungen verschiedener Anbieter. Mit unserem umfassenden Vergleichsrechner finden Sie die für Sie beste Kfz-Versicherung schnell und einfach.
Haftpflichtversicherung
Eine private Haftpflichtversicherung schützt Sie vor den finanziellen Folgen, wenn Sie Dritten einen Schaden zufügen. Unser Versicherungsmakler informiert Sie über die verschiedenen Arten der Haftpflichtversicherung, die Deckungssummen und die besten Anbieter. Wir erläutern auch, welche Schadensfälle typischerweise abgedeckt sind und worauf Sie bei der Auswahl Ihrer Haftpflichtversicherung achten sollten.
Hausratversicherung
Die Hausratversicherung sichert Ihr Eigentum gegen Schäden durch Feuer, Leitungswasser, Sturm, Hagel, Einbruchdiebstahl und Vandalismus ab. Wir informieren Sie über die Leistungen einer Hausratversicherung, wie Sie den Wert Ihres Hausrats ermitteln und welche Anbieter die besten Konditionen bieten. Zudem geben wir Ihnen Tipps, wie Sie im Schadensfall richtig vorgehen und eine schnelle Regulierung erreichen.
Vergleichsrechner und individuelle Angebotsanfragen
Ein wesentlicher Bestandteil unseres Services ist der Vergleichsrechner, der es Ihnen ermöglicht, verschiedene Versicherungsangebote schnell und unkompliziert zu vergleichen. Sie geben Ihre individuellen Daten und Anforderungen ein, und unser Rechner liefert Ihnen eine übersichtliche Liste der besten Angebote. Über unser Portal können Sie direkt unverbindliche Angebotsanfragen an die Versicherer stellen und so die besten Konditionen aushandeln.
Ratgeber und hilfreiche Tipps
Neben den Vergleichsrechnern und den umfassenden Informationen zu den verschiedenen Versicherungstypen bieten wir eine Vielzahl von Ratgebern und Tipps. Diese helfen Ihnen, komplexe Versicherungsthemen besser zu verstehen und fundierte Entscheidungen zu treffen. Egal, ob es um die Auswahl der richtigen Versicherung, die Interpretation von Versicherungsbedingungen oder Tipps zur Schadensmeldung geht – unser Versicherungsmakler steht Ihnen mit Rat und Tat zur Seite.
Aktuelle Entwicklungen und Neuigkeiten
Wir informieren Sie regelmäßig über aktuelle Entwicklungen und Nachrichten aus der Versicherungsbranche. Auf unserem Portal finden Sie ständig aktualisierte Informationen zu Gesetzesänderungen, neuen Produkten und Trends auf dem Versicherungsmarkt. So sind Sie stets auf dem neuesten Stand und können schnell auf Änderungen reagieren.
Unser Serviceversprechen
Wir legen großen Wert auf die Qualität und Aktualität unserer Informationen und arbeiten kontinuierlich daran, unser Angebot zu erweitern und zu verbessern. Unser Ziel ist es, Ihnen einen umfassenden und verlässlichen Service zu bieten. Sollten Sie dennoch Fragen oder Anregungen haben, steht Ihnen unser Kundenservice jederzeit zur Verfügung.
Fazit
Ein Versicherungsmakler ist ein unverzichtbarer Partner für alle, die sich umfassend und kompetent über Versicherungen informieren möchten. Durch detaillierte Informationen, Vergleichsrechner, Ratgeber und aktuelle Nachrichten unterstützen wir Sie dabei, die besten Entscheidungen für Ihren individuellen Versicherungsschutz zu treffen. Vertrauen Sie auf unsere Expertise und nutzen Sie unsere Dienstleistungen, um sich optimal abzusichern.

name: Flexa GmbH
businessDescription: Flexa is an AI company on a mission to build Europe's largest and most comprehensive virtual power plant.
tags: Virtual Power Plant, Artificial Intelligence, Energy
longBusinessDescription:
Flexa is on a mission to build Europe's largest virtual power plant (VPP). That includes developing AI-based solutions for energy flexibility optimization and trading through its VPP.
Energy production is shifting towards an increased share of renewable energy sources. The challenge is that solar panels and wind turbines do not constantly produce the same amount of energy. Much renewable energy is produced when the sun is shining, and the wind is blowing, but only a bit when there is no sun shining and no wind blowing. This leads to an increasing mismatch of supply and demand in the energy market. Our AI-based solutions will help alleviate this mismatch and make energy affordable for millions of households.
As we focus on the residential energy sector, we manage energy-producing devices like solar panels, energy-consuming devices like heat pumps and electric vehicle chargers, and storage devices like batteries. We pool together these decentralized devices and manage them intelligently to serve the electricity grid and enable the transition towards renewable energies.
We are rapidly growing our team and are hiring experienced tech professionals interested in revolutionizing the energy sector. We are looking forward to receiving your application!

longBusinessDescription:
WHAT IS HYPERAKTIV:
Hyperaktiv is a SaaS growth copilot that helps companies activate, convert and retain more users. 
WHY HYPERAKTIV WAS CREATED:
Many SaaS companies struggle to extract actionable insights from their user data due to the complexity of existing analytics tools. These tools often require specialized knowledge, making it difficult for teams to interpret and leverage their data effectively.
HOW CAN YOU BENEFIT BY USING IT:
1. We'll start by analyzing your data.
2. Next, we'll segment your users based on your Ideal Customer Profile, product engagement, and lifecycle stage.
3. We'll develop and provide you with targeted, personalized marketing recommendations.
4. You'll then be equipped to effectively activate new users, convert free users to paid, and improve customer retention.

Esfaras is committed to fostering a vibrant community where creativity and collaboration thrive. By reducing the barriers to entry for both providers and clients, Esfaras aims to encourage more people to explore and engage with the world of music and audio services, ultimately contributing to a more dynamic and innovative industry.

name: Integrated MLM Software
businessDescription: Integrated MLM Software and Super App offers the world's first MLM super app solution along with MLM Software, providing a single, seamless experience across iOS, Android, web, and admin platforms.  This software ensures ease of use and affordability for your network marketing business. The Integrated MLM Software and Super App, developed by  expert team, are ideal for managing all aspects of your MLM operations. It offers Binary, Unilevel, and Matrix compensation plans, along with custom solutions. With features like lead generation, networking, and profit optimization, this software allows you to manage your business effortlessly from any device.
tags: software, mobile app, direct sales , network marketing
longBusinessDescription:
Integrated MLM software revolutionizes the way network marketing businesses operate by providing a comprehensive, all-in-one solution. This software brings together the critical aspects of multi-level marketing management into a single, seamless platform, accessible across iOS, Android, web, and admin interfaces. Here’s how integrated MLM software helps businesses:
1. **Streamlined Operations**: With all necessary tools and features in one place, businesses can manage their operations more efficiently. This reduces the need for multiple software solutions, thereby cutting down costs and simplifying the user experience.
2. **Increased Accessibility**: The software is available on multiple platforms (iOS, Android, web, and admin), ensuring that users can access their MLM business anytime, anywhere. This flexibility is crucial for maintaining constant communication and management on the go.
3. **Enhanced User Experience**: Designed with ease of use in mind, the software ensures that even those with limited technical skills can navigate and use the platform effectively. This lowers the learning curve and improves overall productivity.
4. **Affordability**: By offering a wide range of features in one package, the integrated MLM software provides cost-effective solutions for businesses. This affordability makes it accessible to both small and large MLM enterprises.
5. **Expert Development**: Created by a team of experts, the software is built to meet the specific needs of MLM businesses, ensuring reliability, security, and scalability.
### Key Features of Integrated MLM Software
The Integrated MLM Software and Super App are packed with features designed to cover every aspect of MLM operations. Here are some of the standout features:
1. **Compensation Plans**:
   - **Binary Plan**: Supports binary MLM structures, allowing businesses to manage two-leg compensation systems effectively.
   - **Unilevel Plan**: Facilitates a unilevel MLM structure where affiliates are placed directly under the sponsoring distributor.
   - **Matrix Plan**: Manages matrix MLM structures, which are fixed-width and fixed-depth plans, suitable for creating a manageable network size.
   - **Custom Solutions**: Offers tailored compensation plans to fit unique business needs.
2. **Lead Generation**: Tools to generate and capture leads efficiently, helping businesses grow their network and convert potential leads into active participants.
3. **Networking**: Features to enhance communication and collaboration within the network, promoting stronger relationships and better teamwork.
4. **Profit Optimization**: Advanced analytics and reporting tools to track performance, sales, and commissions, helping businesses optimize their profit margins.
5. **Multi-Device Access**: Seamless integration across iOS, Android, web, and admin platforms, ensuring that the business is always within reach.
6. **User-Friendly Interface**: Intuitive design and navigation make it easy for users to manage their MLM activities without technical difficulties.
7. **Security**: Robust security measures to protect sensitive business data and ensure compliance with industry standards.
8. **Customization**: Options to customize the software according to specific business requirements, making it a versatile tool for various MLM models.

longBusinessDescription:

It automatically combs through all tasks, presentations, documents, links, meetings, people, public discussions, and personnel interactions, compiling them into Self-organised Spaces.
With Sense AI, relationships between every piece of data—from emails to presentations—are identified and maintained. You’ll never have to work with isolated documents or links again, as Sense provides comprehensive background information, related resources, previous versions, and discussions.
Sense is designed to ensure your team can focus on creating amazing work without wasting time on maintaining, searching, and gathering knowledge. Trust Sense to handle these tasks, so you can stay focused on what truly matters.

The platform's versatility allows for customization to match your brand’s look and feel, providing a cohesive experience for your audience. The powerful API and webhook functionalities also make it extendable by connecting it to many other systems and services.
It is all designed to boost engagement and streamline event management, making it easy for users to remember and attend your events. From small meetups to large-scale conferences, Add to Calendar PRO is your go-to solution for efficient event promotion and management.
Make your events more accessible and ensure higher attendance and participation now.

longBusinessDescription: Cyclize offers an innovative plasma-based process that uses mixed plastic waste and CO2 as resources to produce syngas (a gas mixture consisting of carbon monoxide and hydrogen). This serves as the basic building block of the chemical industry and is used to produce plastics, methanol, hydrogen and also e-fuels. In industry, this syngas is currently still obtained from fossil feedstocks such as natural gas. We replace this with our process to enable a carbon circular economy and cut enormous amounts of CO2 emissions.

name: arttrade
