✅  Kuratierte Kunst zu exzellenten Preisen

arttrade bietet Zugang zu Blue Chip Kunst – den Werken der renommiertesten Künstler weltweit. Diese Anlageklasse bietet außergewöhnliche Renditen, hohe Krisenresistenz und Unabhängigkeit von traditionellen Finanzmärkten. 

Mit arttrade kannst du anteilig in diese exklusive Assets investieren. Dabei profitierst du nicht nur von der niedrigen finanziellen Einstiegsbarriere, sondern auch von unserer Marktexpertise und unserem Netzwerk. Wir finden die attraktivsten Werke – und das zu den besten Preisen. 


✅  Investment in Einzelwerke und Kunstportfolios

Als einziges Unternehmen bietet arttrade anteilige Investments in ausgewählte Einzelwerke und breit aufgestellte Kunstportfolios. Vergleichbar mit einem Fonds partizipierst du dabei an der Wertentwicklung aller enthaltenen Werke. So erzielst du maximale Diversifikation bei minimalen Kosten.


✅  Reguliert und transparent

Deine Investition sichert dir ein vollständig reguliertes Wertpapier nach dem elektronischen Wertpapiergesetz (eWpG) zu, welches über eine ISIN verfügt. Das sorgt für einen kosteneffizienten, voll digitalen und transparenten Investitionsprozess.

businessDescription: rhome simplifies cross-border work for everyone involved. tags: Computer Programming, Software, Professional Services, B2B, B2C, SAAS
longBusinessDescription:
rhome is enabling a new era of effortless cross-border work where legal and administrative obstacles are a thing of the past. Our all-in-one global mobility platform is bridging the gap between personal local expertise and AI-enabled global ambition. Let your employees work compliantly from everywhere.
Everyone wants to work globally, but no one wants tedious applications, endless risk analyses, bureaucratic hurdles and manual applications for certificates and documents. rhome finally puts an end to this and offers a solution for all types of business travel. name: Savvi Learning
businessDescription: Savvi empowers organizations to make more out of their trainings: create lasting habits with transparent training progress. The Savvi App supports your employees to transfer corporate trainings into their daily work with interactive exercises and individual behavior goals.
tags: Human Resources, Consulting, Agency, B2B, SAAS
longBusinessDescription:
"Savvi is a learning app for future skills that brings the gamification, playfulness and activation of apps like Duolingo into the world of corporate learning. 
It addresses 3 fundamental issues of learning:
(1) trainings are done “one-off” and content does not stick,
(2) E-Learning platforms are not engaging enough to keep users motivated (only 13% completion rate) and
(3) tools provide no data-based benchmarks to guide HR decision makers.
Savvi’s mobile-first learning app connects hands-on training content with a gamified and engaging learning experience. Each user gets an individual learning journey – based on skill-based measurement of their progress our AI curates the right learning nuggets from our standard content library."

name: ChipCart GMBH
businessDescription:
As a young Germany startup, ChipCart has rapidly become a key player in electronic component sales. We've merged IT innovation with extensive market experience, creating a platform that simplifies procurement by consolidating different supplier sources into one efficient delivery system. 

This approach significantly optimizes time and financial expenses for our clients. Additionally, we offer a unique solution for managing excess inventory, allowing companies to post and sell surplus stock, freeing up resources for further development. 

Operating globally, with a strong European presence and expanding to the US, we provide unmatched access and convenience in the electronic components market. Our commitment to transparency, security, and customer satisfaction sets us apart, making ChipCart an essential partner in the electronics sector.
longBusinessDescription:
ChipCart is a young startup in the field of electronic component sales, launched in September 2023.
Our startup is the result of a merger between an IT development team and experienced professionals in the electronic components market.
The project was developed by an international team with extensive experience in developing ERP systems for trade and warehouse business. These are high-class professionals with experience in launching E-commerce projects worldwide. Currently, our team includes 35 developers.
The most challenging part of working in the electronic components market is correctly combining modern technologies with the traditions and experience of classic distribution. Only professionals with vast experience in this market can handle such a task. They have become the connecting link that created ChipCart, led by our CEO, who has over 35 years of experience in the electronic components sales industry.
Uniting modern technical solutions with extensive market experience was achieved by professionals experienced in working with electronic components, led by our CEO with over 30 years of experience in the industry.
Advantages of Our Project
Wide Supplier Base
Typically, each manufacturer works with 5-6 component suppliers. This limitation is due to significant time and financial burdens. The more suppliers there are, the more time is needed to obtain data - prices, availability, delivery terms, special conditions, etc.
Our platform consolidates data from more than 250 suppliers, including official distributors, catalogs, and partners, including connected partner warehouses, OEM, and EMS.
We operate transparently and convey the sources of components. Thus, every buyer can visit the original site and ensure that the displayed price of components matches the source's price.
For our clients, this optimizes time and financial expenses on purchases, plus budget savings due to choosing the optimal price.
In layman's terms, we are a platform that in real-time displays offers from the largest marketplaces and online stores, allowing you to choose the best conditions in terms of price and delivery time, and receive all orders in one delivery, instead of 5-10 different deliveries. All this at the same price as if you were buying directly from each separate site.
Convenience
This approach allows all work to be done in one window. Even if you purchase 50 different components from 15 suppliers, you only sign one contract with us and receive everything in one free delivery.
Our platform is absolutely free. We do not set markups or hidden commissions. You can buy from your usual suppliers on the terms you are accustomed to.
Additionally, you receive online analytics of the purchase price from all suppliers, including your "neighbors" who have excess electronic components.
Working with Excess Inventory
One of our key advantages is working with excess inventory. Currently, many companies are concerned about the situation with excess inventory of electronic components in their warehouses. This is frozen money and occupied space.
Our platform works not only with catalogs but also allows any company, after data verification, to post and sell their excess inventory. This enables businesses to free up financial flows and warehouse space and redirect these resources to development.
Our platform provides access to the global market and operates 24/7. Starting work is very simple – just send a list of items and provide data on the originality of components. After agreeing on all details, the goods appear on the platform.
For the convenience and safety of our clients, we thoroughly check the source of components and datacode to ensure the originality of goods. We also have high requirements for updating data through API, giving us an up-to-date picture of component availability in the warehouse.
Confidentiality and security are very important to us. We do not disclose companies that sell their goods through the excess inventory program.
Unlike traditional brokers, we use all the possibilities of modern IT for automation and simplification of processes. The client sees the price and quantity in real-time. There is no need to send a request. Just click the "buy" button, and all components (even from different sources) will arrive in one free delivery.
We believe that our platform will help the market achieve balance and relieve European manufacturers from the burden of excess inventory.
Geography as an Advantage
We are a European company that takes advantage of global work with all markets. Currently, our office is located in Germany. We also have representations in Hong Kong, Singapore, and plan to open an office in the USA mid-year.
At the moment, the European market knows little about Chinese distributors of electronic components. On our platform, you can see warehouses and prices for components on these platforms.
This gives the customer an incredible level of freedom in choosing a source for purchasing electronic components.

name: meetergo
businessDescription: meetergo is an online scheduling and calendar management tool that eliminates back-and-forth emails to find the perfect meeting time. It connects multiple calendars, allows customizing availability, provides booking links, automates communications, and integrates with popular apps.
longBusinessDescription:
meetergo is the ultimate scheduling powerhouse designed to streamline your meetings and save you time. Say goodbye to endless back-and-forth emails trying to find a suitable time – meetergo takes care of it all with ease.
At its core, meetergo allows you to connect up to six different calendars, ensuring you never double-book yourself again. But it goes far beyond basic calendar syncing. With meetergo, you have complete control over your availability, letting you set detailed scheduling rules, buffers between meetings, and more.
One of meetergo's standout features is the ability to share a unique booking link that can be embedded anywhere – your website, email signatures, even social media bios. Your clients or colleagues can then view your real-time availability and book a time slot that works for both parties, without any hassle.
But meetergo doesn't stop at booking. It also automates routine communications before and after meetings, sending reminders, follow-ups, and other messages to keep everyone in the loop. You can even qualify leads, route them to the right person or resource, and kick off your entire sales funnel – all from within meetergo.
Integrating seamlessly with a vast array of popular tools like Make, Zapier, Google Calendar, Outlook, Office 365, HubSpot, Webflow, Slack, and more, meetergo turbocharged your entire tech stack and workflow. It's the comprehensive scheduling solution for teams across sales, marketing, customer success, recruiting, and education.
With its unbeatable price-performance ratio, GDPR compliance, cookie-free operation, and hosting in Germany for maximum data security, meetergo isn't just a scheduling tool – it's a productivity gamechanger for modern teams. Streamline your meetings today with meetergo.

This cell line in combination with our proprietary, scalable, GMP-compliant differentiation platform as well as proprietary gene editing designs will enable us to generate never-done-before types of cell drug products. Moreover, using iPSCs as an initial cell source will allow to dramatically simplify manufacturing and significantly reduce therapy costs. Consequently, lower prices will enable treatment of previously overlooked indications, such as (rare) autoimmune disorders and less frequent cancers (e.g., T cell malignancies). We believe that with our products we will address unmet medical needs of patients.

Our services: 
- Software development: We offer customized software development solutions to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our team of skilled developers will work closely with you to develop high-quality software applications tailored to your specifications.

- AI solutions: We leverage the power of artificial intelligence to develop innovative solutions that help businesses streamline their operations, automate tasks, and gain valuable insights from their data. Our AI solutions range from machine learning algorithms to natural language processing and computer vision technologies.

- Outsource: We provide outsourcing services to help businesses offload their non-core activities and focus on their core competencies. Our experienced team can handle various tasks, including data entry, customer support, back-office operations, and more, allowing you to save time and resources.

- Web development: We specialize in creating visually appealing and highly functional websites. Our team of web developers will work closely with you to design and develop a website that not only represents your brand but also helps you achieve your business goals.

- Mobile app development: In today's mobile-dominated world, having a mobile app can provide a competitive edge. Our skilled mobile app developers can create user-friendly and feature-rich apps for iOS and Android platforms, catering to your specific business needs.

- Data analytics: We offer comprehensive data analytics services to help businesses gain valuable insights from their data. Our team of experts can analyze your data, identify trends, and provide valuable business intelligence that can drive informed decision-making.

- Cloud computing: We assist businesses in transitioning to the cloud and leverage its benefits, such as scalability, flexibility, and cost savings. Our experts can help you migrate your infrastructure, develop cloud-based applications, and manage your cloud environment efficiently.

- IT consulting: Our experienced IT consultants provide strategic guidance and support to businesses in aligning their IT infrastructure and strategies with their business goals. We can help you optimize your technology investments, improve operational efficiency, and ensure business continuity.

- Cybersecurity: We understand the importance of protecting your business from cyber threats. Our cybersecurity solutions include vulnerability assessments, network security, data encryption, and employee training to ensure the highest level of protection for your business assets.

- Digital marketing: We help businesses establish a strong online presence and reach their target audience through effective digital marketing strategies. Our digital marketing services include search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, content marketing, and paid advertising.

- Training and courses: We also offer training programs and courses to empower individuals and businesses with the latest skills and knowledge in technology. From software development to AI, cybersecurity, and digital marketing, our training programs are designed to enhance your capabilities and stay ahead in the rapidly evolving technological landscape.

businessDescription: We give you access to a dynamic pool of tech talents, providing high-quality applicants for hard-to-fill roles, all within one platform.
longBusinessDescription:
Our platform is built to deliver both scalability and high applicant quality. It serves as the main gateway to access a one-of-a-kind talent pool comprising 2 million candidates. Our platform empowers you to connect with these candidates through three key methods:
‍
1) Matching jobs with freelance recruiters
We match every job posted on juucy with highly specialized freelance recruiters that forward hidden, passive candidates from their network to our roles. On average three recruiters work on every job posted on juucy which is more than any traditional headhunter agency.
2) Job multi-posting
Instead of manually managing and posting jobs on multiple job boards, simply upload your job once on our platform and receive all applicants in one centralized location. We have extensively tested thousands of job boards in the EU and established partnerships with the most effective ones. Every job posted on Juucy is optimized for maximum visibility across our partner job boards, which collectively generate millions of monthly impressions.
3) Candidate board
Our dedicated candidate board acts as the dynamic epicenter where everything comes together. Here, you can directly connect with active candidates and provide them your job offers. Think of it as a vast digital marketplace for all available talents, where you can expect a 10x higher response rate to your messages compared to LinkedIn.
Quality is guaranteed through a rigorous pre-screening of candidates that join our platform. Our dedicated talent managers pre-qualify each candidate across the dimensions skills, motivation, relevance & commitment. All this valuable information is presented in crystal-clear candidate profiles.

Beispielsweise bei der Erstellung eines Gemeindehaushalts oder für die Werbekampagne eines Finanzinstituts, die dann auch gemäß der Scrum-Methode durchgeführt wird.
Die Anforderungen und Vorstellungen der Kunden ändern sich ständig. Durch die intelligente Zusammenarbeit bei der Entwicklung von Produkten und Dienstleistungen kann darauf problemlos reagiert werden.

longBusinessDescription:
KRAFTMATCH ist zweifelsohne eine herausragende und hochspezialisierte Recruiting-Lösung, die gezielt auf die Bedürfnisse und Anforderungen des Handwerks- und Logistiksektors ausgerichtet ist. In einer Zeit, in der die Rekrutierung von qualifizierten Fachkräften zu einer immer größeren Herausforderung wird, setzen Unternehmen verstärkt auf diese innovative Lösung, um ihre Personalsuche effizienter, planbarer und kostengünstiger zu gestalten. KRAFTMATCH hat sich im Laufe der Zeit als ein äußerst leistungsfähiger und zuverlässiger Kanal in der Personalgewinnung und -einstellung von Mitarbeitern im Handwerks- und Logistikbereich etabliert, und dies aus verschiedenen Gründen.
Zunächst einmal zeichnet sich KRAFTMATCH durch eine herausragende Anpassungsfähigkeit an die spezifischen Anforderungen und Qualifikationen im Handwerk und in der Logistik aus. Die Plattform wurde entwickelt, um ein breites Spektrum an Fähigkeiten und Berufen abzudecken. Dies ermöglicht es Unternehmen, gezielt nach den passenden Kandidaten zu suchen und sicherzustellen, dass sie die benötigten Fertigkeiten und Erfahrungen mitbringen, um die jeweiligen Aufgaben effektiv auszuführen.
Ein weiterer entscheidender Vorteil von KRAFTMATCH ist die Geschwindigkeit & Planbarkeit, mit der Unternehmen qualifizierte Bewerber finden können. Die Plattform verfügt über eine umfassende Datenbank von Arbeitsuchenden, die aktiv auf der Suche nach Stellen im Handwerks- und Logistiksektor sind. Dies bedeutet, dass Unternehmen oft in der Lage sind, innerhalb kürzester Zeit passende Bewerber zu identifizieren und einzustellen, was die oft langwierige und kostspielige Suche nach Personal erheblich beschleunigt.

Qwist is a regulated payment institution under the Payment Services Supervision Act (Zahlungsdiensteaufsichtsgesetz – ZAG), and offers seamless solutions for business expansion and risk mitigation through intelligent automation.

Qwist utilizes new data sources and goes beyond traditional PSD2 APIs and basic categorization, providing unparalleled connectivity and enrichment services that are adaptable to evolving regulations.

Built on 11 years of extensive experience in Europe's open banking landscape Qwist is committed to innovation, financial independence, and making complex topics simple. Driven by the belief of 'data for good,' Qwist advocates for a more open and inclusive, regulated data landscape,benefiting consumers and businesses alike.

longBusinessDescription:
"ReplyGenius.AI was developed to address two key challenges faced by businesses in today's digital landscape.
After working for an e-commerce brand (where part of my job was to craft responses and analyse customer reviews on various review platforms) it has become evident that crafting personalized responses to online reviews is often a struggle. With limited time and resources, it becomes challenging to provide highly individualized and meaningful replies that resonate with customers.
The second challenge arises from the vast amount of customer reviews available online. It can be overwhelming for businesses to manually analyse and extract valuable insights from these reviews. Identifying common complaints and praises across different platforms becomes a time-consuming task that hinders the ability to take prompt action.
ReplyGenius.AI combines the power of artificial intelligence and natural language processing to revolutionize the way businesses handle online reviews.
With ReplyGenius.AI, you can:
🚀 Create highly individualized responses to online reviews across various platforms
🚀 Automatically analyse customer reviews to identify common complaints and praises
🚀 Gain actionable insights from customer feedback to enhance your business operations
How Does It Work?
→ Start your free trial on ReplyGenius.AI → Select a Review Platform and paste your review → Get your ready-to-post Response tailored to the review's content in seconds.
But that's not all! ReplyGenius.AI also offers powerful review analysis features:
Once you have processed a couple reviews:
→ Navigate to the Analysis section and Click Analyse Reviews → Receive actionable insights and recommendations based on what your customers say → Make informed decisions and implement necessary improvements to enhance customer satisfaction.
Try ReplyGenius.AI for free! I am excited to hear your feedback and welcome any suggestions to further improve the product.
"

name: aimed analytics
businessDescription:
Business concept in one sentence:  
We accelerate, deepen, and democratize the knowledge gain from biomedical data for our customers from pharma and biotech. 

Product and customer benefit:
We develop a platform that provides access to cutting-edge analysis of all kinds of biomedical data in an easy way.  

It is obvious that the success of newly starting pharma and biotech companies is highly dependent on the usage of modern ways to analyze big biomedical data. However, due to high competition with other business areas for machine learning and data analysis specialists, talent is highly restricted. Companies lacking talent in this area miss on the promises of modern data analysis to cut down research costs and time-to-market resulting in a competitive disadvantage.  

Our software-as-a-service platform allows the pharma and biotech companies to analyze biomedical data without access to trained personnel. In addition, the platform offers a high coverage of machine learning and technology specific analysis modules than can be combined to provide in-depth insights into efficacy, mechanism-of-action, toxicity and other parameters that are important to the success of drug candidates. Those crucial insights can be used to improve the drug development processes.  

Our platform will democratize the usage of cutting-edge data analysis for pharma and biotech companies, which will greatly benefit the discovery of novel treatments of human diseases.
longBusinessDescription:
Our USP:
The main unique selling point of aimed analytics is the platform and the architecture itself. The platform rethinks how biomedical data is analyzed. The modular system enables that medical data can be analyzed quickly and highly flexibly in order to answer a wide range of medical questions. This is crucial to cover the wide range of data analysis demands of our target customers. Furthermore, the underlying architecture allows the platform to grow with the progress and developments in the field of biomedical data analysis and hence to become more and more powerful.  
The principle of the platform also enables that any input data can be used, as the system is easily adaptable to different data types (e.g. genomics data, imaging data or patient's medical records). Thus, aimed analytics brings a solution to the market that enables every owner of medical data to quickly gain deep biological/clinical/medical insights into their data. Our platform is designed in such a way that the customer can easily and intuitively request an analysis and eventually interact with the generated results in a highly interactive way. With the aimed analytics platform, we have created a universal solution for medical data analysis which is a critical building block for today's era of modern data-based medicine.
Our initial customers are small and medium pharma and biotech companies (2026, from 4.9 billion to 45.2 billion USD (global prognosis, Source: Statista)). Initially, we will focus on the niche of small and medium biotech and pharma companies. This creates a directly serviceable obtainable market of 450 million USD (Europe, North America and Japan).       
No competitor currently offers an equivalent solution. Competitors either rely on pure services with limited scaling potential, on pure software solutions which do not provide the high flexibility of our system or they have focused on very specific medical issues. 
One of our strategies for a market entry relies on our extensive network in international biomedical research institutes.
Achievements:
With the concept, that aimed analytics advanced into the above mentioned platform, Dr. Günther and Dr. Baßler were already able to convince experts and received the renowned EXIST-Gründerstipendium from the Federal Ministry of Economics and Climate Protection. 
Furthermore, the idea has already been awarded and honored in numerous competitions, such as a University Bonn idea competition and the WOWFAKTOR ideas competition of the DIGITALHUB Bonn. 
With regard to the status of the platform, the proof-of-concept was successfully completed. Currently, we have started the test phase of our alpha-version of the platform with pilot customers. Recruiting pilot customers has proven to be extremely easy, as there is already a high demand for our solution due to the strong need in the market. In the process, we have not yet launched any active marketing, but the demand solely generated through word-to-mouth. To take the platform to the next level of development, we are currently recruiting a developer to join our team.

name: Preflet
businessDescription: Preflet is revolutionizing the energy intelligence. It empowers organisations to extract value from buildings’ energy data and reach their full potential. Our Energy AI Platform connects with existing smart meters, uses machine learning, and satellite imaging to help building managers reduce energy consumption, save money, and lower carbon footprint. We are Techstars ‘23 portfolio company and also supported by European Space Agency and EU’s Climate KIC initiative.
tags: Energy Intelligence, Decarbonize buildings, Proptech, Cleantech
longBusinessDescription:
Preflet is an artificial intelligence-based platform that helps building managers reduce their energy costs and carbon footprint. This platform connects with existing smart meters and uses machine learning to analyse
multidimensional data such as buildings’ energy, climate data, and satellite imaging. It identifies peak consumption, detects waste and provides immediate actions, measuring the environmental impact of energy-saving actions based on actual vs forecasted consumption. Preflet does not require any upfront investment and offers a unified approach to building energy management compared to current technologies or practices. Buildings are among the world’s most significant carbon footprint contributors, due to poor
energy management practices and a lack of emission knowledge. With energy prices going up and strict regulations coming in place, building managers need to act in time without heavy investment. We believe that our platform plays a critical role in the energy transition in buildings, by decreasing energy consumption, saving energy costs, and reducing the carbon footprint of buildings.

longBusinessDescription:
HonestDog is a platform to get pets (starting with dogs) from pre-vetted, ethical breeders. Our mission is to give pets a home for life and relieve shelters in the long term.
The current way to sell dogs online is broken. Dogs should not be sold on classified websites (e.g., eBay Kleinanzeigen, Quoka). The lack of transparency in the market leads to illegal puppy trade and ‘puppy farms’. Dogs coming from puppy farms are highly prone to genetic disorders, behavioral issues, and disease. This can lead to extremely costly medical treatments and both animal, and human suffering. Furthermore, ethical, responsible breeders, who educate themselves, genetically screen parent dogs, and carefully raise their puppies have to advertise on the same untransparent platforms.
That is why we are building HonestDog, a high-quality, exclusive platform, going to the source of future pets, pre-vetted breeders.

businessDescription: Junto is an EdTech that offers digital live training for companies. It is founded by a team of serial entrepreneurs to unlock this knowledge and make it universally accessible, globally. A new kind of digital-first, cohort-based leadership training, powered by world-class operators and a startup community you can trust.

name: GreenTrade
businessDescription: The marketplace for forward financing of nature-based carbon credits and impact claims - Climate Tech, Marketplace, Fintech, Blockchain.
longBusinessDescription:
GreenTrade is a marketplace for nature-based carbon credits and impact claims. The company accelerates the funding of new carbon projects by turning long-term purchase agreements into digital tradable assets and making them available for corporate buyers today.
Their ambition is to realize the supply of 1 Bn tonnes of CO2 by 2030. GreenTrade is changing the way carbon projects are funded by utilizing Blockchain to provide massive liquidity for the Voluntary Carbon Market and create a sustainable impact.

name: Enable 3D
businessDescription: Enable 3D develops and commercializes 3D printing use cases in collaboration with leading brands and designers
longBusinessDescription: Enable 3D develops and markets designs for additive manufacturing for brands who aim to digitize their industries. All products like storage solutions, accessory and lifestyle products are designed to be produced by the end-user. This disruption in the value chain is following the concept of co-production (consumer production). The decentral production approach with mono-materials that are 100 percent reusable overcomes traditional vulnerable value chains by enabling the circular economy. Like this Enable 3D is eliminating transport and waste while involving the consumer deeper in the product life cycle to fit a sustainable lifestyle. Combining innovative designs with future-proof technology and collaboration marketing with ambitious creatives and brands, Enable 3D aims to recreate the future.

name: nPro Energy
businessDescription:
nPro offers a planning software for district energy systems (software-as-a-service, SaaS). It helps urban planners and district design engineers to plan and size district heating and cooling networks, microgrids as well as hybrid energy systems. The tool is available at www.npro.energy and has three core functionalities: 1) generation of energy demand profiles for buildings (space heating, domestic hot water, space cooling, process cooling, electricity and e-mobility), 2) simulation of district heating and cooling networks (including pipe diameter sizing, and 5GDHC networks), 3) sizing of hybrid energy systems with renewable energies, seasonal storages, hydrogen, heat pumps and many more technologies.
Users can share projects with other users and work on the same project in the cloud. The user-friendly interface allows planning and simulating energy systems for districts and neighborhoods within minutes and strongly simplifies the planning process, especially in the early planning phase.
Overview of all functionalities here: https://www.npro.energy/main/en/help/all-tool-features

name: Cimenio
businessDescription: Authentic, verified product reviews from real customers.
longBusinessDescription: Cimenio collects high-quality product reviews for its customers, which contain helpful information to support other users in making a purchase decision. For this purpose, Cimenio has developed an app through which users can rate products, receive an incentive for helpful reviews and through which users must submit a photo of the product so that Cimenio can verify ownership. B2B partners can then connect many verified reviews to their shop system via an API and display a large number of genuine and authentic product reviews in their catalogue.

name: gen:m
businessDescription: gen:m is the first empowering platform to make mental toughness training more accessible to athletes and high-performers.
tags: mindfulness coaches, sport psychology, high-performance psychology, mental toughness trainers
longBusinessDescription:
gen:m is the first empowering platform to make mental toughness training more accessible to athletes and high-performers.
the platform is created by people who understand the importance of mental leanness and high-performance psychology, aiming to resolve the barrier and destigmatise mental training in environments that demand high performance now and always.

name: ai.dopt
businessDescription: Discover Your AI Potential
longBusinessDescription: We enable medium-sized companies to continuously manage their individual AI potential. We provide automated support from the prioritization of relevant applications to their implementation and successful monitoring - and always regardless of the underlying technology and in compliance with the highest security standards. For competitive value creation, today and in the future!

name: Bizzllet
businessDescription: Self-custody business wallet for day-to-day crypto operations.
longBusinessDescription: Bizzllet is a self-custody multisig business wallet that helps you manage day-to-day crypto operations. With multi-chain wallets, team collaboration features, and customizable role-based rules, Bizzllet simplifies crypto invoicing, payments, and expenses. It’s powered by Account Abstraction (AA) and Multi-Party Computation (MPC) to ensure that users retain complete control of their crypto assets while minimizing risk through key-sharing between users and Bizzllet

name: Rechargy
businessDescription: Rechargy - PowerBank To Go provides portable power solutions for people on the move, making device charging easy and accessible wherever you are.
longBusinessDescription:
Rechargy Powerbank To Go is a Berlin-based startup providing on-the-go charging stations across the city. Our conveniently located charging docks contain lightweight, pocket-sized powerbanks that can be rented for charging smartphones and devices on the move. Businesses can advertise on our displays, while professionals stay charged through our powerbank rental service.
Our mission at Rechargy is to empower people with convenient and reliable power solutions that keep them connected and enable them to make the most of their digital experiences. We strive to provide innovative and accessible charging options that enhance productivity, convenience, and enjoyment in an increasingly mobile world.

name: ai.dopt
businessDescription: The aim of ai.dopt as a No-Code AI Platform is to offer companies a safe and secure solution to immediately benefit from the potential of artificial intelligence without complex, expensive, and lengthy pilot projects. Ai.dopt enables the rapid use of AI use cases with a simple software solution including the integration into existing internal processes and products or services.

name: Novumstate
businessDescription:
Property management companies are the unsung heroes of the real estate market. Not only do they maintain but also increase the value of our properties to meet the increasing requirements from stakeholders and legislation. As real estate investors and owners, we know the importance of property management companies in a market that becomesincreasingly complex.
We founded Novumstate with the vision of transforming traditional facility management through digitalization, modern processes, synergies and more attractiveness.

Our goal is to establish modern, digitally positioned, professional and well-staffed property management companies that meet the increasing demand from real estate investors, owners, tenants and other stakeholders.

name: Wonnda
businessDescription: Wonnda enables the next generation of consumer brands to launch new products with the best European contract manufacturers and suppliers e.g. packaging). In the last years, we’ve realized how tedious and inefficient the process of bringing new products to the market can be. That's why we are building wonnda, the next generation of collaborative sourcing, where all needed stakeholders can work and communicate on one central platform in order to launch new products. With wonnda, European manufacturers and suppliers get access to aspiring brands (such as startups, influencers, etc.). Brands use wonnda to launch their next best-seller fully digitally. Wonnda fosters the production of sustainable consumer products, we take care that our suppliers stick to the best manufacturing standards and promote suppliers, who are able to produce in an environmentally conscious way.

name: Corbiota GmbH
businessDescription: Corbiota aims to become a new standard for livestock solution and to create a more sustainable modern farming by providing young animals with natural and animal-friendly nutrition increasing farm productivity at the same time. Feeding young animals with Corbiota’s earthworms strengthens their eubiosis, the natural balance of microorganisms in their gut and immune system and triggers their natural instincts. They grow up stronger, healthier and more resistant towards diseases, reducing the need for antibiotics treatment - one of the biggest global challenges in today’s farming.
longBusinessDescription:
We as Corbiota want to redefine industrial animal nutrition by introducing a natural solution backed by science. We feed special live worms to young animals right at the beginning of the rearing period to transfer complex
microbiota. When administered to young animals such as chicks but also piglets they enable optimal health and growth, reducing antibiotics and diseases and increase animal welfare. Specifically they support the eubiosis, the natural balance of microorganisms in the gut. Our waste Product is high quality vermicompost, a natural fertilizer, which makes our production fully circular.
When feeding live worms we can solve several issues at the same time: not only health and welfare but also future needs for healthy nutrition of world population as we will have meat as source for the coming decades. We also have first trials with crops, as microbiomes can make them more resistant against climate issues.
We manage to reduce pollution by using our vermicompost as fertilizer and our production sites are CO2 positive and built on vertical farming concept. We do own 7 patents on feed and technology and do file 2 more for crops at the moment.

name: Deep Alpha Research
businessDescription:
Deep Alpha Research  is a quantitative investment research start-up specialized in machine learning and market decomposition to highlight the best performing assets available to retail investors.
We believe that volume, variety and velocity of financial and alternative data hold the key to gaining an investing edge.
longBusinessDescription: Generating alpha (α), referred to in the financial world as the ability of beating market returns, is the goal of Deep Alpha Research. As such, our task is to discover alpha signals and provide these to retail investors through our platform. This is achieved by decomposing the market into its basic factors and identifying correlations and patterns to capitalize on. While we explicitly do not provide investment advice, we provide unprecedented transparency and sophistication to retail investors.

name: MachineWare
businessDescription:
Headquartered in Aachen and emerging from stealth mode earlier this month, MachineWare is set to revolutionize semiconductor design with its high-speed functional RISC-V simulator, SIM-V. 

SIM-V, the company’s flagship product, combines unprecedented simulation performance with exceptional design customizability for applications ranging from the tiniest embedded devices to warehouse-scale supercomputers. SIM-V enables software developers to test full software stacks – including firmware, operating system kernel and complex user-space applications, such as (Java-) virtual machines or rich graphical environments – in real time.

‘Our mission is to equip RISC-V software developers with the tools they need to deliver safe and secure software stacks on schedule and glitch free,’ says Lukas Jünger, MachineWare managing director and co-founder. 

Today’s hardware-software systems are becoming increasingly complex, with even tiny edge systems executing millions of lines of code. SIM-V gives software developers the ability to interactively debug even the most complex designs without the need for physical hardware, even before first prototypes are available. Integrating SIM-V into continuous integration systems minimizes test execution times, saves compute resources and allows developers to continue their work sooner.

name: Scoopas GmbH
businessDescription: The Duesseldorf-based company Scoopas has launched a musician platform with which musicians and artists can sustainably improve their income. This income is made possible on the one hand by selling NFTs (Non Fungible Tokens) and on the other hand by streaming live concerts or other content.
longBusinessDescription:
ScoopasXchange
The exclusive NFT marketplace especially for musicians & artists
NFT are on everyone's lips. The abbreviation stands for Non fungible Token (not exchangeable or unique assets). Behind them are mostly digital collectibles, images or access rights - for example for discord servers. On the platform nft.scoopas.com, artists can now create their own NFTs and sell them to their fans. The team at Scoopas offers a unique service for this and provides full support in the planning, creation and launch of NFT projects. "We want to support artists to realize their ideas and projects. Even if, and especially if, they have no experience with NFT, crypto or blockchain" tells Steven Palumbo (COO at Scoopas).
Scoopas is particularly interesting because it focuses exclusively on the music and artist industry as a provider of NFTs. In addition, artists are individually supported by the Scoopas team in the creation and marketing of NFTs. Purchases of NFTs are also very easy for fans. These can also be processed easily in euros.
Interested parties can register or apply for the Scoopas NFT platform by providing a few key data. After successful registration, the Scoopas team will contact you to discuss the possibilities and initial ideas so that the artists* can create their own NFTs and sell them to their fans." We are already in talks with well-known artists who are enthusiastically working on presenting their first NFTs on the platform," Steven Palumbo reports.
NFTs offer real added value to their buyers, as they are limited and can grant special privileges. Examples for NFT can be special songs, videos, unique pictures or digital tickets. If you want to learn more about the topic and are interested in your own NFT as a new source of income, you can apply now at nft.scoopas.com in just 2 minutes. Free of charge and without obligation!
A unique microcosm for musicians* and their fans
In the future, musicians will be able to build up the second income stream via Scoopas by streaming live concerts. They generate money by selling digital concert tickets for streams on the Scoopas platform, offering merchandise items or having their fans support them with a donation. This component of the Scoopas microcosm is scheduled to go live later in 2022.
"Our team is currently working on the extensive programming of our platform. We have already successfully implemented the first streams and will be adding one or two other live concerts to our stream in the coming months. On the one hand, this way we make sure that the technology works properly as it should and at the same time we get valuable information and requests fed back to us first-hand."
Scoopas' musician platform is a revolution for the music industry because it is a microcosm that directly connects musicians and their fans. Record companies or labels are no longer necessarily needed as financial backers, or marketing entities for musicians*. Scoopas offers a powerful tool to generate more income, build reputation and put self-determination back into the hands of the artists.
For more info, visit www.scoopas.com
The makers behind Scoopas
Scoopas is a company based in Düsseldorf, Germany. The company was founded with the vision to improve the financial perspectives for musicians globally. The Scoopas team consists exclusively of musicians and music enthusiasts who want to take the music world to a new level. More information about Scoopas' vision can be found online at www.scoopas.com.

name: UX&I
businessDescription: UX&I offers advice, enablement and implementation on all aspects of user experience. The focus is on deep tech, enterprise software and digitization. Our goal is to support people in putting complex technology at the service of users. We combine all relevant perspectives: from people, business and technology. User experience consulting & digital product development with offices in Düsseldorf, Munich, Berlin, FFM & Hamburg. Together with you we shape the digital world of tomorrow - at your pace, with your teams and for measurable improvements of your products for users and customers.
tags: Consulting, Information Technology, Management Consulting, Software

name: 21strategies
businessDescription: 21strategies is a B2B deep tech research and operation company. We support organizations making smarter decisions under uncertainty. To aim a our mission, we build and operate Enterprise AI for real life situations. Because we want to grow profitably, we develop long-term strategic partnerships with organizations to leverage their own and their ecosystem's expertise with Enterprise AI.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Finance, Government, Machine Learning

name: ASCon Systems
businessDescription: ASCon Systems - The Digital Twin Company - is very successful in shaping the digital transformation of its customers in the automotive, aviation and mechanical engineering sectors. From engineering to planning and commissioning to the self-controlled real-time operation of factories and logistics processes, our developments and technology are revolutionizing the way products are manufactured flexibly and large, complex systems are controlled in real time. What is special about the ASCon Digital Twin: Business and process logic models are created quickly and efficiently based on referenced information from PLM platforms and configurable behavior library objects with flexible model depth and breadth from the value-added level to the signal level. Company history: ASCon Systems GmbH was founded in January 2017. The management team and the core team consists of experienced developers, consultants and managers. As early as 1990, this team founded the first software company with a focus on digitization in the planning process using 3D planning and industrial engineering systems and was sold as part of the Dassault Systèmes Group in 2000. This was followed by the founding of a company with a focus on sophisticated process and technology consulting in the field of digital change projects. In 2016, all the necessary elements for the successful founding of ASCon Systems were together.

name: box-to-box
businessDescription: box-to-box is the ultimate football training app featuring professional football training content and personalized training plans to im young players around the world. The users are part of a global community of football players and enthusiasts where they can improve, share, and benchmark their skills.

name: MicroStream
businessDescription: MicroStream has reinvented the way of storing data to make database query 100 up to 1000 times faster, by eliminating any expensive data conversion between apps and databases. MicroStream is suited for any company and organization developing individual software in Java and either want to benefit from much more powerful software solutions or save up to 90% costs in the data center. Unlike MicroStream, all of today's database systems and in-memory technologies set their own specific data structure that is in any case incompatible to Java object graphs which leads to lots of technical problems, increases complexity, slows down database apps, and increases the cots of infrastructure.

name: Yolife
businessDescription:
Yolife is an app that helps people live longer in good health and avoid age-related diseases. Our vision is to add 15 healthy years to 1 billion people. We believe that the active and social pursuit of healthy longevity is the greatest potential to be unlocked in our society.

We have the opportunity to radically reduce our risk of age-related diseases like cardiovascular diseases, diabetes, cancer, and Alzheimer’s as well as to free ourselves from reoccurring illnesses and a general impairment of our capacities.

So much can be changed for the better through lifestyle changes. What is needed are right instructions, good experience design, and a social environment. This is what Yolife aims to provide for a large number of people of all ages.

name: kollex
businessDescription: We are a young tech start-up based in Berlin. Clarity, efficiency and digitization instead of cumbersome ordering processes - that's what we stand for. Together with our joint venture partners from the Bitburger Braugruppe GmbH, CHEFS CULINAR GmbH & Co, Coca-Cola European Partners Deutschland GmbH, Krombacher Brauerei and Rotkäppchen-Mumm Sektkellereien GmbH, we have set ourselves the goal of using digital channels for restaurateurs and suppliers to network with each other in order to make orders easier and more efficient in the future. This is kollex: We care & create. We put the customer first. We dare & share. We are collective. We cheers to each other.

name: Probably Genetic
businessDescription: Probably Genetic is on a mission to help get answers for those with rare genetic conditions that are commonly initially diagnosed as autism spectrum disorder. On average, a patient with a rare genetic condition waits up 7 years to find answers. In the meantime, they spend years bouncing around from doctors to specialists, often at an enormous personal financial cost, to understand if there is more to their, or their child's symptoms. They believe this is too long! Probably Genetic offers educational material and DNA sequencing tests to make it easy to find out if there is more to your symptoms. Their aim is to help those who fall through the cracks of the current healthcare system.

name: MOOVE
businessDescription: With our industrialized, purpose designed light commercial vehicle platform we gained a key strategic position for a comprehensive last mile, emission free delivery ecosystem. Our platform is capable to fulfil the requirements for the M2 and N1 vehicle categories. The vehicle architecture was developed by embracing all of the degrees of freedom that a purely electric drive brings to the fore. We fully exploited those freedoms to create a purpose designed vehicle architecture which was made possible by specifying a purely electric drive train. In addition, we manufacture the first industrialized Level 4 light-commercial electric vehicle.

name: Pixtunes
businessDescription: Pixtunes introduces a new music & sound format that enables inspiring experiences, new levels of musical performance and powerful creative tools.  Our invention, a radically new media format, transposes a person's reality into a highly personalized and immersive soundtrack that is constantly being generated and adapted in real time. This ultra-real format enables people to experience everyday life in exhilarating new ways based on their current context, mood, and environment.
tags: Digital Entertainment, Information Technology, Music Streaming

name: Linkster
businessDescription: Linkster revolutionizes the way results are measured from influencer marketing campaigns thus enabling brands to systematically use influencers to actually drive sales, revenue and customer acquisition. Linkster's technology allows effectively measuring meaningful results (conversions, revenue, follower-interests) from influencer marketing campaigns for the first time. Up to this point brands had to make do with inferior 'workarounds' like personalized voucher codes as standard tracking mechanisms don't work in the app-environments influencers operate in. Linkster solves this problem through its proprietary technology not only better but also a lot cheaper than today's 'solutions'. This way advertisers can measure results transparently and generate valuable data to actively and systematically work with influencers to maximize sales and customer acquisition.
tags: Advertising, Analytics, Big Data, Business Intelligence, Marketing, SaaS, Social Media Marketing, Software

name: OmniBot
businessDescription: Conversational AI & Automation Platform develop scalable voice assistants and chatbots for virtually any use case to improve your service and efficiency, save costs and focus on your core business. The solution combines a deep understanding of the dialogs and processes involved in CX management (Majorel) with a next-gen conversational AI platform (OmniBot). majBOT’s CX designers create the dialogs and train the bot continuously. Supported by natural language processing (NLP) and a human-like voice, the bot takes over defined requests. majBOT’s customer care professionals are there to help your customers whenever needed.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Call Center, Information Technology, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Software, Speech Recognition, Virtualization

name: license.rocks
businessDescription: license.rocks powers on-chain brand experiences for fans to trade and collect NFTs. Licensing digital assets and establishing new monetization opportunities for the future is our mission. We redefine license trading and traceability as a platform you can trust. All our solutions aim to make licensing simple, fair and digital, for you and your customers. Whether in the real world or in a #metaverse. Founded in 2017, Berlin-based blockchain startup license.rocks is a customizable white label platform specializing in the topic of licensing. In the process, software license management in particular crystallized as a real first use case for the blockchain.

name: Celestial Space Technologies
businessDescription: Celestial enables data-driven industries to stay ahead of the increasing demands on telecommunication performance. This includes high performance small satellite antenna, active array antenna and radar systems for applications across different industries, and precision tracking and navigation solutions for the mobility sector. Ultimately, Celestial wants to propel all industry actors forward by providing industry grade engineering and academic educational training.

name: RiseUp Fashion
businessDescription: OCEANSAPART is the first non-competitive activewear brand. Standing for diversity and inclusion, we have been selling our products via our online shop along with a strong social media presence. Since 2018, we have quickly become a team of almost 200 employees and established ourselves as a relevant D2C provider for activewear and lifestyle apparel in our core markets in Europe. Our mission is to help our community to love themselves and their bodies and motivate each other to be more confident. We live Love Only.

name: Advanced Blockchain
businessDescription: Advanced Blockchain is a publicly listed investor, incubator, and partner in the blockchain industry. Our stock is available for purchase to eligible parties on the following exchanges: XETRA, Frankfurt, Düsseldorf primary market and other stock exchanges.

name: Sunbloom protein
businessDescription: Proteins are becoming an even more important element for both nutrition and wellness for many consumers. More consumers than ever before are actively seeking food that are high in protein and in particular plant based. Proteins have many functions in our body and are essential in assisting with growth and repair, but also provide functional attributes in structure of the food in which we obtain these nutrients. We at Sunbloom Proteins GmbH, produce patented plant based, functional proteins and cold pressed oil from sunflower seeds. Sunbloom Protein is a alternative for replacing as well as complimenting existing plant or animal proteins where it serves mainly as a functional ingredient in food and beverage applications.

name: Captiq
businessDescription: Innovation, artificial intelligence and hybrid engines are the focus of attention today. Many alternative financing services just serve start-ups or companies that have the potential to become the next Facebook or Google. It goes without saying that progress is important for global development, but in everyday life, we also have academics such as doctors or pharmacists who generate enormous value for us and our economy every day. At CAPTIQ GmbH, we have set ourselves the goal of providing these companies with access to modern and easy financing while offering our investors a sustainable investment opportunity coupled with an attractive risk-return profile.

name: is it fresh
businessDescription: is it fresh is a research center in areas such as nanotechnology, material science, biomedical, and quantum-information related technology. The companyâ€™s vision is to digitalize the food value chain and enable real-time, in-package freshness, and quality controls. They are creating a platform to conduct a direct relationship between various participants of the value chain through smart packaging.

name: Zana Technologies
businessDescription: Zana is committed to innovate and improve healthcare through Conversation and Voice AI technology. Our technology platform combines cutting-edge Conversational AI with Medical knowledge, Mobile Apps and Devices, Vocal Biomarkers and tools for Data Collection and Analysis. Together with partners from leading medical clinics and universities, healthcare organizations and companies we develop, Smartphone apps for patient engagement and self-management of chronic diseases, Voice biomarkers for COPD, Asthma, Heart Insufficiency and further illnesses, Conversation & Voice AI for implementation in medical devices and software for healthcare application, and Patient apps for clinical studies, for a modern way of data collection from patients in their all-day life. Our smartphone app "Tidda Herz" is a Self-Management App for people suffering from Heart Insufficiency. Tidda supports patients in their daily treatment routine to deal with the illness, conveys knowledge about Heart Insufficiency, and is available at any time to answer questions. Thereby the app increases treatment adherence and health literacy of the patients.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Fitness, Health Care, Home Health Care, Personal Health

name: Jolt Energy
businessDescription:
High-Power Charging for cities where 2/3 of us live. Urban high-power charging network of 25,000 mobile chargers in 100 European & North American cities by 2025. Raising a 10m in two tranches of a 5m over 24 months for growth. Positive Cashflow and Op Margin in 2023. Multiple revenue stream business model. Lead investor is identified. Off-balance sheet asset financing. Vertically integrated IOT / e-mobility green tech solution. We’re believers. We’ve worked at major global corporations, lived automotive, power engineering, and IT, but we love the opportunities and challenges of e-mobility.

Our common goal is to enable e-mobility by building, owning, and operating a fleet of ultra-fast chargers, focused on cities & suburbs

name: Basking.io
businessDescription: Basking Automation (basking.io) is a workplace analytics platform, helping corporate real estate managers to get a detailed understanding of how their offices are being used. To provide these insights, Basking is using existing WiFi networks and machine learning algorithms. It's fast to deploy across portfolios, affordable at scale and privacy-compliant. Basking.io is a Techstars- and Innogy Ventures-backed company. It has won the German Property Association's Office Awards 2019, is endorsed as one of "The 2019 Top 25 Under The Radar CRETech Companies You Must Watch"​, and partnered with Colliers International to provide occupancy analytics to its clients in EMEA and the US.

name: Promethion
businessDescription: Promethion is an A.I. startup from Berlin. We are pioneers, builders, hackers, developers and artists. We are building the largest open code library & hardware platform for robotics vision and perception A.I. - powered by fully synthetic data. It is our mission to challenge some corner paradigms in A.I. development to ultimately make autonomous robotics more accessible to everyone. We enjoy creative thinking and the continuous exchange of ideas. We thrive for rapid prototyping and quick field-testing. We love to have fun at what we do. Our office is a comfortable space where we embrace curiosity and value an open and positive team spirit. If you feel you can contribute with knowledge that will blow our mind, please do not hesitate to send us your application.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision, Image Recognition, Machine Learning

name: Qualifyze
businessDescription: Qualifyze was originally founded under the name ChemSquare during the doctorate at the Technical University Darmstadt in September 2017. The company employs 60 employees across offices in Frankfurt and Barcelona. Today Qualifyze works on a global, digital network in which customers, suppliers, auditors, subcontractors, and authorities continuously and securely exchange quality data in order to make supply chains more transparent and secure. A global pool of independent and accredited auditors publish their results on the Qualifyze platform, giving companies access to relevant information and quality data from their suppliers without having to carry out extensive audits themselves. Due to the higher reuse of quality data, the total number of supplier audits is reduced, which results in a significant cost reduction for all interest groups in the industry and at the same time increases transparency and security along the value chain.

name: Fliptable
businessDescription:
Get matched with the perfect hospitality job in minutes with Fliptable, the #1 restaurant career matchmaker. Fliptable is the fastest way to find a job and hire staff in the restaurant industry. Local restaurants are using Fliptable to match with the best job candidates and are paying top dollar for the right talent, at all levels.

The Fliptable App is the faster, easier and more affordable way to find and post a restaurant job. Contactless app provides QR technology to restaurants in order to offer a seamless recruitment and hiring tool in the post-pandemic economy.

name: Finrocks
businessDescription:

Finrocks is an agency for the implementation of IT projects and the development of innovative software solutions based in Hamburg, Germany. We advise on questions regarding digital business models, develop innovative software solutions and ensure that you can scale your IT teams at any time. Our customers include both startups and established companies.

name: Heynannyly
businessDescription:
The B2B platform heynannyly gives access to verified, insured and tax free childcare and homework supervision for employees. Bookings in under 5 hours are possible as well as regulary plans. The processes are scalable and include a smart calendar, algorithm and filter functions.
The return on invest for companies are:
-a higher employee satisfaction
-recruitment of employees (employer branding)
-tax savings
-reduction of absences
-increase in the womens quota...

name: Dikabon
businessDescription:
Dikabon means digital receipt, it is derived from Digitaler Kassenbon
Our Vision: Dikabons for everyone everywhere!
longBusinessDescription: Our Mission: Replace the paper receipts by dikabons at POS terminals to reduce the costs of our customers and decrease the paper waste and save natural resources.

name: Reachfox
businessDescription: The platform for B2B influencer marketing on LinkedIn. We connect your company with business influencers who post about your product. What is the fastest way to get highly qualified leads in your market? With our B2B influencers, your message goes to thousands of industry-specific decision-makers at the push of a button.

name: eventgrated
businessDescription: Get valuable analytical data and meaningful insights about your organisation with Eventgrated, the plug & play Business Intelligence software for the event, leisure, tourism, retail, and eCommerce industry. Never lose track again â€“ Centralizes all data and numbers for analytics and analysis purposes of your business in one place and gets valuable insights into the health status of your organization. Markets situations are changing rapidly. Eventgrated provides you the right tools to analyze the performance of your company so that you can maximize and optimize your business tactics immediately on the basis of forecasts and artificial intelligence.

name: Mio Health
businessDescription:
Mio Health accompanies you on your way to improving your quality of life and health. With an individual program and specially trained health coaches.

Mio Health accompanies you with individually compiled expertise and targeted support in the areas of nutrition and exercise therapy as well as mental health. Discover new heart-healthy routines for your personal everyday life.

A science-based program tailored to your heart health needs. With just 15 minutes a day, you'll become your heart's health expert. Mio Health sets new impulses with practical exercises and helps you step by step to inspire yourself and establish new routines in your everyday life.

name: Mermaid Bio
businessDescription: Mermaid Bio's mission is to discover and develop breakthrough intrabodies (antibodies for intracellular targets) to treat unmet patient needs. The platform links single domain antibodies (nanobodies) together with advancements in drug delivery (using mRNA/LNP systems) to create the possibility of producing breakthrough medicines. The technology platform works in a safe and specific manner on key intracellular proteins, an approach which could be used for a plethora of intracellular targets. Nanobodies are small, have high target affinity and specificity and can be designed against a wide range of intracellular targets, thus represent a next-frontier technology for intracellular delivery. By delivering intrabodies via mRNA, Mermaid Bio will solve the key challenge to using antibodies within cells, allowing its platform to become the essential enabler for drug development of previously undruggable targets across a broad range of disease categories.

name: Plan-D Akademie
businessDescription: Die Plan-D Akademie, ist der erste voll digitalisierte Bildungsträger in Hessen, welcher nach den Grundsätzen der digitalen Transformation geplant und nach AZAV zertifiziert wurde. Unser Alleinstellungsmerkmal ist die vollständige Digitalisierung.
longBusinessDescription:
Die Plan D-Akademie ermöglicht den schnellen beruflichen Wiedereinstieg mit digitalen Umsetzungsprozessen und setzt Bildungsangebote schneller, flexibler, effizienter, kostengünstiger und innovativer um. Wie wir das machen? Die gesamte interne und externe Kommunikation organisieren wir digital und damit Zeit und Kosten
sparend. Kaufmännische „Abläufe“, Dokumentenverwaltung und Personalmanagement, Zugang zu Unternehmensdaten etc. – durch digitale Prozesse werden Bürokratie abgeschafft und so neue Ressourcen freigesetzt. Das Angebot von Plan-D ist einfach und familienfreundlich, senkt die Zugangsschwelle und gewährleistet damit eine größere Motivation für Teilnehmer. Ein größerer Teilnehmerkreis bietet kostengünstigere Lösungen. Wir begleiten vollumfänglich den Strukturwandel mit. Demnach ist es unser Ziel, als neuer starker Partner und Dienstleister für die Arbeitsagenturen und Jobcenter den Markt neu zu denken sowie zu verändern.
Was in Präsenz nicht geht, wird online gemacht. Digitale Bildungsangebote sind so populär wie nie zuvor. Schluss mit schlecht belüfteten Räumen, endlosen Monologe oder der üblichen Frontalbeschallung.
Lernvideos, Webinare, Podcasts und interaktive Lerneinheiten sind die Zukunft der Fort- und Weiterbildung. Dadurch entsteht maximale Flexibilität und eine bessere Einbindung der Lerninhalte in den Alltag.
Die Plan-D Akademie hilft dabei, durch unterschiedlichste Online-Bildungsangebote die Digitalisierung weiter voranzutreiben.
Wiedereinstieg in den #Beruf oder Schritt in die #Selbstständigkeit? Kein Problem, wir haben für jeden Bereich, das passende Programm.
Jetzt ein kostenloses Erstgespräch sichern und durchstarten.
www.plan-d-akademie.de - der neue Partner für AVGS Coaching!

name: Karla
businessDescription:
Founded in 2021, Karla is reimagining and simpliyfung the frustrating post-purchase experience with its customer communciation platform for merchants. According to a recent Accenture study, 90% of shoppers like to track their delivery status and want deliveries to be easily integrated into their busy lifestyles. Karla intends to address this need and will include an intuitive overview of tracking and visibility across all carriers and online shops.

At the same time, the overall number of packages delivered worldwide is expected to grow at 15% annually and climb to 200 billion parcels by 2025.  This parcel volume corresponds to a global e-commerce value of approx €4.5 trillion predicted for 2025. This rapid growth of parcel volumes demands intelligent and efficient parcel delivery solutions that Karla intends to develop and provide to consumers.​​

Later this year Karla will launch a unique engagement solution that will allow merchants, carriers and consumers to communicate across the end-to-end post-purchase experience. Consumers will enjoy an intuitive interface, giving them an overview of all deliveries, providing a means to manage them with ease and to make individual delivery adjustments. The experience will go beyond the delivery and unboxing moment all the way through returns, refunds, claims, questions and potential repurchases in the future to elevate today’s shopping experiences.

longBusinessDescription: Cardino started in 2022 with a vision to build a better market for electric vehicles, harnessing the power of technology to deliver a fantastic experience. We use a European-wide network of verified dealers that compete to provide the best possible price — with no fee on the sellers’ side. Selling a vehicle with Cardino starts with precisely valuing your vehicle with our dedicated tool, updated on dynamic market prices and basic information on your car. After some quick necessary and easy verifications, we take care of all the rest. This includes advertising the car to dealerships, handling contracts and coordinating vehicle pickup. With its focus on simplicity and ease, Cardino aims to make the sale of an EV as seamless as possible, and participate in a more sustainable and circular economy.

name: mellow
businessDescription: Mellow is an HR platform offering tools and solutions that transform the way companies engage with contingent workers. It enables the seamless integration of contractors into companies' workflows, streamlining their talent management and selection processes. Additionally, Mellow provides various mechanisms to support freelancers with a wide array of issues, including payment solutions. With offices in New York, Limassol, and London, Mellow's services are available globally.
longBusinessDescription:
Mellow is a global HR platform transforming how companies engage with contractors, moving from one-time task hires to incorporating them as integral members of the workforce. The company streamlines this process through a set of technological solutions and by assuming all risks and obligations associated with engaging contractors, such as misclassification or legal issues. At the same time, it benefits contractors by ensuring they are paid and receive benefits, bridging the gap between full-time and project-based work.
Mellow was founded in 2024 by Pavel Shynkarenko, an entrepreneur with over 20 years of experience in financial and legal technologies and client-contractor relationship automation. In 2014, he noticed a growing demand for payment and administrative assistance for businesses working with independent contractors, and this prompted him to launch his first HR tech company, Solar Staff. Initially, the firm provided solutions for service deal optimization. This gradually led to the creation of a multi-tool platform that capitalizes on Solar Staff's decade-long work in this field and responds to the growing demand for specialized solutions for long-term interaction with contractors. Thus, Solar Staff, as a global company, pivoted to Mellow, transferring to it an extensive base of clients in the USA and Europe. Mellow’s mission is to help companies prepare for the future of work, where contract relationships become a common alternative to full-time employment. The company’s CEO is Pavel Shynkarenko, who has stepped down from leading Solar Staff to fully concentrate on this new venture. Benefiting from Solar Staff's client base, Mellow is already working with more than 1,500 companies and 400,000 contractors from over 100 countries. It has a monthly turnover of €18M and an MRR of €800K.
Despite playing in a crowded field, Mellow stands out from its competitors. For instance, firms like Deel, Remote, and Oyster limit themselves to offering either Employer-of-Record (EOR) services for company staff members or tools like payroll management, but do not assume any legal risks. Other services, like Deel Shield, Worksome, and Talent Desk, focus exclusively on expensive Contractor-of-Record (COR) services. On the other hand, Mellow comes with a set of various contractor-related solutions within one contract, and a pay-as-you-go model that makes the non-employee engagement process convenient, transparent, and legally viable. This is the case even when companies are working with contractors from hard-to-reach regions.
The portfolio of Mellow’s solutions is centered on regional demand. The US-based tools, which feature Contractor-of-Record service and an AI-powered tool for finding the right talent by leveraging the hiring manager’s network, are focused on B2B audiences. The European solutions respond to the local demand for enhancing freelancers’ social security, including payment-related assistance, legal services for obtaining digital nomad visas, and tax support.
Mellow is headquartered in Limassol (Cyprus) and has offices in New York and London. The company has a team of 60 people and works with brands such as SumSub, Joom, G2G, Paltalk, Clickadu and Stocksy.

name: Fusion Bionic GmbH
businessDescription: The start-up Fusion Bionic develops and distributes systems for producing biomimetic surfaces using a unique high-speed laser technology. The solutions offered are up to 100 times faster than established processes, paving the way for high-performance surfaces with self-cleaning properties, reduced friction, improved contacting and more.
longBusinessDescription:
Fusion Bionic is a solution provider for laser-generated functional surfaces. 
Born as a spin-off from the Fraunhofer Institute for Material and Beam Technology IWS, Fusion Bionic is transferring bio-inspired principles such as the Lotus leaf or the Moth eye effect to technical surfaces by a high-speed laser process. The application of biomimetic functions can lead to a significant increase of the individual surface performance to enable the next generation of products.
The solutions offered by Fusion Bionic are based on the high-speed laser technology Direct Laser Interference Patterning (DLIP) which is up to 100 times faster than established processes. The high-speed functionalisation using DLIP pave the way for high-performance surfaces with self-cleaning properties, reduced friction in tribological systems, improved contacting of connectors, enhanced biocompatibility of implants and more.
Fusion Bionic covers the full value chain in laser-based surface functionalization, as follows:
-	System solutions as production hardware using Direct Laser Interference Patterning
-	Consulting on biomimetic surface functionalization
-	Application development for advanced surface functions
-	Engineering service for process machinery
-	Integration, Service, Support & Training
-	Manufacturing services for functionalized products
Fusion Bionic – We evolutionize surfaces!

name: Fyrabend
businessDescription:
