Users enter their current availability, see a list of other users whose availabilities somehow overlap with theirs, can check out their profiles and get in touch to meet in real life via the integrated chat. 

The product is aimed at solo travelers, digital nomads, people new in town or simply those who would like to meet others around them. 

We're a well-rounded team of three people - Valerie (Marketing and Communications), who's consulting businesses on social media topics since she's 18, Shargeel (Development), senior mobile engineer with 8+ years of experience and Paul (business and strategy), previously leading projects on digital business models in the mobility field. Our company is based in Germany and we're mainly working together remotely. 

We are currently self-financed and have launched Fyrabend in August 2021. We've been testing various marketing strategies at a small scale and were able to generate relevant insights and first users. We're approaching a point at which we'd like to apply our findings and accelerate user growth massively, as well as start monetizing through subscriptions and ads. In order to do this, we are now actively looking for financial backing by a partner who would like to join our mission.

name: RadarScreen
businessDescription:
The insurance market of digital devices is archaic and not disrupted yet. Traditional insurance companies due to lack of innovations focus on new devices only.
There are more than 60 million smartphone users in Germany. They are our target group, as display damage is by far the most common. Our goal is to set new standards in the insurance world: Innovative, highly technical, transparent, and simple. 
RadarScreen brings simple and affordable smartphone insurance with a fully digital experience solution to everyone with an intuitive mobile app and no need to visit a store or office. We developed mobile apps with a unique combination of technology based on AI and ML engines. That helps to conduct screen checks to verify device integrity and collect unique credentials which makes any form of fraud impossible. It means that the customer can insure his device anywhere and anytime. Moreover, it allows insuring used devices without any limitations.
The monthly subscription on-demand instead of one bulk amount upfront encourages customers to try.
longBusinessDescription:
Problem:
- Insurance doesn’t match with customer expectations: 65% avoid fixing a cracked screen, and 38%of cracked screen owners don’t get their phones fixed at all.
According to PRNewswire (https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mobile-myths-cost-consumers-dearly-as-americans-report-spending-3-4-billion-replacing-millions-of-smartphone-screens-last-year-300753419.html)
- 74% of people have cracked the screen, and the most likely way it happens is by dropping the phone.
According to Market Watch (https://www.marketwatch.com/story/americans-spent-over-3-billion-last-year-fixing-their-smartphone-screens-2018-11-20)
- 70% of smartphone owners think cracked screen repairs cost less than $150, but the new iPhone Xs Max actually costs $329 to fix
According to PRNewswire (https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mobile-myths-cost-consumers-dearly-as-americans-report-spending-3-4-billion-replacing-millions-of-smartphone-screens-last-year-300753419.html)
- Nearly 15% of adults said they would be cautious about dating someone who had shattered smartphone screen, according to a survey from dating site Match.com
According to Market Watch (https://www.marketwatch.com/story/single-iphone-owners-dont-want-to-date-someone-with-an-android-phone-2017-02-07?mod=article_inline).
RadarScreen brings simple and affordable smartphone insurance with a fully digital experience solution to everyone with an intuitive mobile app and no need to visit a store or office. We developed mobile apps with a unique combination of technology based on AI and ML engines. That helps to conduct screen checks to verify device integrity and collect unique credentials which makes any form of fraud impossible. It means that the customer can insure his device anywhere and anytime. Moreover, it allows insuring used devices without any limitations.
The monthly subscription on-demand instead of one bulk amount upfront encourages customers to try.

name: ENEKA Energiekartografie
businessDescription:
Wir wollen die Energiewende entscheidend voranbringen. Und zwar lokal! Doch hierfür braucht es geeignete Werkzeuge, die den Kommunen nachhaltig helfen. Wir liefern Ihnen die Toolbox, die eine unübersichtliche Datenlage beherrschbar und die komplexen Zusammenhänge verständlich macht.

Mit ENEKA Energieplanung werden die Aufgaben des kommunalen Klimaschutzes und Energiemanagements einfach und anschaulich bewältigt. Unser Tool stellt Energiepotenziale, Energieverbräuche, Kosten und Emissionen dar  – skalierbar vom einzelnen Gebäude über Quartiere bis zur Stadt oder Region – und erlaubt es Ihnen diese Ergebnisse mit weiteren Benutzern zu teilen.

Angewendet wird dies bei der Wärmeplanung zur Abbildung der Bestands-, Potenzial- und Versorgungsanalyse, beim Monitoring von CO2-Emissionen und CO2-Kosten zur Konzeptentwicklung oder bei der Berichterstellung für Beteiligungs- und Abstimmungsverfahren. Auch erleichtert ENEKA die Erstellung von Fördergeldanträgen.

Unsere für ganz Deutschland einsetzbaren Karten sind stufenlos skalierbar und ermöglichen es mehreren Usern Änderungen vorzunehmen und Pläne zu vergleichen – natürlich mit standardisierten Geodaten und datenschutzkonform. Anstelle von Einzelaspekten arbeitet das Energiesystem prozessorientiert und erstellt ebenfalls Karten zum möglichen Solarpotenzial. Und all das ohne Installation, denn unser Tool ist webbasiert.

longBusinessDescription:
Speedy Newsletter is an online email template creator that helps you create responsive email newsletter templates with an easy-to-use drag and drop editor.
With the email template maker, you can create newsletter templates in minutes without any coding skills. Using an intuitive UI, you can create responsive HTML templates and embed social media content like YouTube, Vimeo videos, Tweets, and Instagram posts.
Speedy Newsletter allows you to export your email templates to your preferred email client application, Email Service Provider (ESP), email marketing platform (i.e., Mailchimp, Hubspot), or as an HTML template file with or without your images.
With the editor, you can build responsive, beautiful, and professional-looking HTML templates that look great on any email client and all devices. During the design process, you can save time using prebuild building blocks that were intensively tested on multiple clients (i.e., Outlook, Gmail) and screen sizes.

name: CLAIOS
businessDescription:
In the new everything as a service era, traditional enterprises are forced to move from their legacy infrastructure toward cloud services. At the same time, in most cases enterprises are bound to their old proprietary vendors with complexity, missing features, overvalued busy consultants and other well-known issues, described as vendor lock-in. Even when those vendors are cloud-ready, they will now dictate their service roadmaps and "steal" the freedom of decision from businesses, their flexibility and ability to act over re-act.

As a game changing alternative, the CLAIOS company provides open and scalable replacements for particular software components or services. A business can now build up its own ecosystem based on OpenSource platform, turn every component into a service and integrate it with other CLAIOS or non-CLAIOS services.
tags: Cloud, Enterprise Software, Low-Code/No-Code, Collaboration, Coworking, Workflow Automation
longBusinessDescription: It is possible to build up Multi-Language and Multi-Tenant Knowledge Management Services, Corporate Social Media, Content Services Platforms, Compliance and Governance Management Systems, Product Information Management, Multi-Site, Multi-Shop, Multi-App and other solutions.

CanPostThis offers tools to validate social media accounts, social

Using proprietary algorithmic solutions, CanPostThis system collects publicly available information and provides hereby facts, valuable information, real-time alerts and insights that enable decision-makers on all levels to execute effective decisions.
tags: Social Media, Influencer Marketing, Marketing, News and Social media validation engine
longBusinessDescription:
CanPostThis re-establishes trust -
Through validation, analysis and evaluation of news, news sources, social media contributions and social media accounts.
CanPostThis allows its users to check the authenticity of social media accounts, contributions, news, news sources and thereby enabling them to make better decisions.
The spread of disinformation is shaking modern societies today, undermining trust in brands, individuals, communities, democratic institutions and hereby destabilizing modern societies. CanPostThis offers tools to evaluate social media accounts, social media contributions, news and news sources.
Social Media platforms play a dominant role in our daily lives. The trustworthiness of an evaluation of news,  news sources and content on social media is crucial for any decision-maker. CanPostThis offers a technology that enables decision-makers of all kinds to
detect and monitor Social media activities as well as news and news sources.
According to a study conducted by the University of Baltimore, the economic impact of disinformation is estimated to be $78 billion; the World Economic Forum’s 2024 Global Risks Report identifies disinformation as the most significant short-term risk of modern societies.

longBusinessDescription: Our vision is to transform the collaboration between companies and advisors. name: Machine2Human Solutions
businessDescription:
Our focus is to automate the knowledge of engineering companies to efficiently guide service staff through each service case. 

With AI, NLP and speech recognition we have developed two products, which are united under the M2H Co-Pilot, to provide knowledge to the service employees at any time:

1. case management: our ticketing software analyzes conversations between service agents and customers, extracts case-related information and automatically creates tickets for any CRM. At the same time, documentation and assignment to each service case is automatically applied.

2. knowledge management: conversations create a knowledge database that is available to the service employee at any time. During an interaction with the customer, our Knowledge Management solution shows the service employee what problem the customer has encountered and how it can be resolved.

In addition, we plan to launch our industry-specific LLM for enterprises in 2024.
longBusinessDescription:
Our focus is to automate the knowledge of engineering companies to efficiently guide service staff through each service case. 
Engineering companies can be 5x more profitable with good customer service than with new machinery and equipment sales. However, the reality is different. Because in fact, service employees are limited in their daily work by inefficient processes:
- 89% of service employees search for information for at least 30+ min every day
- 50% of service employees lack step-by-step instructions
- 90% of service employees make do with their own notes, mostly on paper.
This can cost an average, mid-sized company more than €110,000 per year.
With AI, NLP and speech recognition we have developed two products, which are united under the M2H Co-Pilot, to provide knowledge to the service employees at any time:
1. case management: our ticketing software analyzes conversations between service agents and customers, extracts case-related information and automatically creates tickets for any CRM. At the same time, documentation and assignment to each service case is automatically applied.
2. knowledge management: conversations create a knowledge database that is available to the service employee at any time. During an interaction with the customer, our Knowledge Management solution shows the service employee what problem the customer has encountered and how it can be resolved.
In addition, we plan to launch our industry-specific LLM for enterprises in 2024.
Service cases can be standardized and solution approaches no longer have to be laboriously reproduced. Implicit know-how can be captured so that problem solving no longer depends on a few. Onboarding new employees is easier and faster. We put service staff back in control, despite a shortage of skilled workers and increasing work intensity. Due to a lack of central data and information stakeholders are unable to take sustainable and informed decisions across the value-chain. In order to reduce GHG emissions, information needs to be digitalised, centralised and accessible.
Our platform enables stakeholders to measure and optimise the sustainability performance of their projects, business operations and value-chain. name: TrÃ¶delSpende
businessDescription: TrödelSpende is an online second hand marketplace where people can exchange their items for a donation to an NGO. It works just like every other online second hand marketplace, with the exception that the item price is fully donated. Users can therefore declutter their home and help their favorite non-profit organization to raise funds. This will promote a circular economy with less waste and more resource efficiency. At the same time people can have an impact while shopping online by supporting charity. Givers of their items will receive a tax receipt so they can deduct the donation item price from their taxes.
longBusinessDescription:
Non-profit organizations often have difficulties collecting donations and can therefore only advance their projects in a limited way. In consequence the impact they have is not as wide as it could be. On the other hand, people are willing to make more and bigger donations than ever and want to have a broader impact with the choices they make. Yet, they still have to support non-profit organizations by the established way of sending them their money.
At the same time, a completely different problem is that many people have numerous items at home that they no longer need or that they could do without. Many people want to live a more sustainable life and are therefore selling and buying items second-hand. In consequence the online market for second-hand is booming right now.
TrödelSpende solves these two problems by creating a second-hand online marketplace where individual items can be exchanged for a donation to a non-profit organization: The donor advertises their item and someone else receives that item only in exchange for a donation to a non-profit organization chosen by the donor. In the end, everyone profits from this: The item donors can raise money for their favorite local charities while recycling their unused items. In return they can deduct the raised amount from their annual tax. For the item buyers, they not only ecologically consume by using a second hand marketplace, they also make a sustainable and ethical action by giving their money to the people and organizations that need it the most. For non-profit organizations, it is a new easy and passive way to raise some funds.

name: Remi Health

No wonder then that STIs are on the rise. And that’s where REMI comes in. Our inclusive, affordable at-home testing kits come with simple instructions to collect urine and blood samples from the comfort of your home, and we offer discreet and clear test results from our certified lab as well as medical support if you have questions. Get tested, consult a doctor and receive medication all on one platform

longBusinessDescription: While the demand for lithium-ion batteries is increasing exponentially the required resources are limited leading to a twofold demand to supply in 2050. However, while further increased efforts for mining and raw material extraction might resolve some demand issues, it also introduces high levels of pollution, safety concerns, equality, inclusion, and social responsibility issues all around the globe. However, to minimize further mining needs, we as Niocycle want to change the ecosystem and business environment by imposing circular economy strategies. Thus, Niocycle's main objective is to innovate sustainable and profitable technologies and our primary step is the implementation and roll-out of a highly efficient and environmentally friendly lithium-ion battery recycling process for batteries from electrical vehicles but also notebooks, mobile phones and other devices, which will be able to fulfill the upcoming lithium-ion battery recycling legislation by 2026.

name: EQWAL
businessDescription:
EQWAL enables corporate legal departments to flexibly adapt their internal workforce. Whether due to a staffing shortage, a special project, or new regulations which require generalist expertise or specialist inhouse counsel, EQWAL provides counsel on an interim basis.

Counsel provided by EQWAL are not external counsel. They are part of the inhouse team, for a limited time. They think and act like experienced inhouse counsel, because they are. Depending on individual needs, they bring either specific knowledge or skills to the existing team, or they simply expand the team’s capacity.
tags: Alternative Legal Service Provider, Flexible Legal, Legal Interim
longBusinessDescription:
Typically, inhouse workload fluctuates depending on certain projects and regulatory requirements. Sometimes, positions become vacant or cannot be filled as quickly as needed. Staffing an inhouse team to cover any fluctuations is cost prohibitive. As a result, teams are staffed slimly. And work that cannot be covered internally during “peak situations” is given to external law firms. On a regular basis, this concept also applies to work that doesn’t require specialist expertise or the liability coverage of a law firm. The work is outsourced simply because there is no internal capacity.
Law firms, however, are very expensive for several reasons. Due to their time-based billing models, little incentive exists to think pragmatically and act as inhouse counsel. In addition, communication between the legal department and the law firm tends to be inefficient. After all, law firms are external service providers with very different revenue mechanics and without first-hand experience working inside a corporate legal department.
With EQWAL, legal departments can easily scale up and down, depending on their current workload. They no longer need to instruct external law firms with work they would preferably handle internally to external law firms. As a result, legal departments benefit economically while remaining in full control of the quality of their work.

name: Meet@Lunch

longBusinessDescription:
Meet@Lunch is revolutionizing the way you manage your professional network. With our app, you can meet both familiar and inspiring new people during your lunch break and make a REAL connection that will really help you when the time comes.
Do you know the feeling of not being able to do justice to all your contacts or that some good contacts simply fall asleep due to forgetfulness or time constraints? If so, you are by no means alone. That's why Meet@Lunch not only helps you expand your professional network, but also manages a large part of it automatically.
With Meet@Lunch you can escape the impersonality of networking and build and manage a real and sustainable network.
Our assistant impresses with sophisticated features and accompanies you no matter where you are in the world. Meet@Lunch is available worldwide in over 100 countries, thousands of cities and 6 different languages. You always have the choice: Would you like to meet your lunch partner digitally via an integrated and encrypted video call or would you prefer to meet live on site in a restaurant of your choice? With Meet@Lunch, both are possible at any time. This gives you maximum flexibility.
With Meet@Lunch...
- ... valuable contacts never fall asleep again
- ... your personal network becomes bigger and stronger
- ... you don't lose time in the app, but GAIN time in the real world
- ... you find a good balance and don't overextend yourself in building your network
- ... we take a large part of the organizational work off your shoulders
- ... you network easily during your lunch break
- ... you can meet interesting people in your area, in your country or all over the world -> it's up to you!
We love diversity!
That's why gender doesn't matter in our AI algorithms. No matter if you are diverse, female or male: Everyone is welcome at Meet@Lunch and treated equally!

tags: VPN, Zero Trust, Network Security, Network Access
longBusinessDescription:

You can precisely control who can see and connect to which machine, through single sign-on, multi-factor authentication, and access control policies.
No more need for VPN gateways, complex firewall rules, network segmentation via subnets / VLANs, VPN client configuration files, and unreliable VPN clients.

businessDescription: UniExo is a high tech startup company, that creates rehab platform of modular exoskeletons with using machine learning algorithms and doctor online-surveillance. longBusinessDescription:
"UniExo Rehab"  is a service platform, where patients will be able to rent a suitable exoskeleton for a rehabilitation period assigned by the doctor. The device can be use through  in different locations and for assistane in home.
 Upon the termination of the rehab program, the patient will return the exoskeleton device back to UniExo rehab, for the next clients to use.
A hundreds of millions of people after accidents, neurological diseases need physical rehabilitation. It's also different traumas in different situations. Only 3 out of 10 people are fully restored, 7 out of 10 this people receive ineffective, uncontrolled and rather expensive treatment. And as result have problem with movements after rehab, but only 1 person out of 100 can buy and use exoskeleton. As a result, treatment is unproductive, people feel unwell do not return to a full life, and have problem with movements. 
We are solves the main problem of rehabilitation offering faster recovery after injuries and use of a cast, without a need to stay 6-8 weeks in hospital.

name: PRAMOMOLECULAR
businessDescription: PRAMOMOLECULAR is developing drug candidates to silence proteins that cause serious diseases. With our highly innovative drug candidates ("self delivering siRNAs) we can silence disease-causing proteins in the lungs, heart or pancreas. On this basis, we are developing drug candidates for the treatment of the particularly aggressive forms of lung and pancreatic cancer.
tags: life sciences, drug development, onkology, gene silencing
longBusinessDescription:
PRAMOMOLECULAR is founded by a team of six experienced scientists in the field of gene silencing by RNAi as well as siRNA delivery. Three of our team members also have extensive start-up and corporate experience, including building siRNA start-ups, drug-compliant siRNA synthesis or financing and business development of high-tech growth companies. In addition, we are advised by best-of-class experts in the areas of pharmacological and pharmaceutical development, quality management, study design, IP and contract drafting.
Based on our in vivo proof of principle, we are currently preparing company formation and seven-figure seed funding (venture capital and grants) to rapidly deliver an in vivo proof of concept (PoC) in lung cancer. In early 2022, we are aiming for follow-on funding and intensive discussions with pharmaceutical companies to achieve first-in-human in 2024.
So far, siRNAs can silence mRNAs mainly in local applications (eye, skin) or in the liver. PRAMO's expertise lies in also being able to introduce siRNAs into cells of the lung and pancreas and to silence mRNAs there. "pramo" means "ferry" in Esperanto.  
In addition, we have profound knowledge in the design, modification and (GMP-compliant) synthesis of siRNAs. With the rational design of our particularly simply constructed self-releasing and synthesisable siRNAs, we can rapidly design, stabilyze and synthesize new promising drug candidates and develop them preclinically and in early clinical phases when our PoC is successful. 
Initially, we are focusing on the RAS oncogene family, which is involved in 50% of all cancers. Since many of these cancers are not yet treatable by targeted therapies, we expect to quickly build a very valuable drug pipeline.

name: Ubiscore
businessDescription: Ubiscore provides instant notification and resolution of privacy threats by providing real-time monitoring of data breaches and GDPR, CCPA, CRPA, and LGPD compliance risks.
longBusinessDescription:
Ubiscore provides instant notification and resolution of privacy threats by providing real-time monitoring of data breaches and GDPR, CCPA, CRPA, and LGPD compliance risks.
## Our Mission 
To provide an independent guarantee of privacy protection, similar to a credit or food label.
The idea is simple: if you want to work with companies and organizations, you should be able to trust that they’re using your personal information responsibly. We make it easy to identify companies that protect your privacy and give you real reassurance that they’ve got your back.
## Our Vision 
To have the Ubiscore label become the standard for trust in an organization.
Many companies claim that they handle sensitive information with care, but the Ubiscore badge can be a way for companies to show you that they protect your privacy rather than just telling you they do. Our certificate will be a mark of quality that indicates you can legitimately trust the organization to keep your personal data safe.

name: Trackboxx

longBusinessDescription:
Introducing Trackboxx, the smart and streamlined web analytics solution that makes analyzing your website traffic a breeze. Unlike other platforms that require intrusive content banners and the use of cookies, Trackboxx is fully GDPR compliant and doesn't store any personal data, so you can forget about the hassle of opt-in banners.
Our intuitive dashboard provides you with a clear and concise overview of what's happening on your website, without overwhelming you with complicated data. While we believe that simplicity is key, Trackboxx can also handle more complex analyses for those who require it. With our cutting-edge server architecture and worldwide CDN network, Trackboxx can process billions of page views with ease, making it a reliable choice for businesses of any size. So why settle for a clunky and outdated web analytics platform when you can have the simplicity and efficiency of Trackboxx?

name: clare&me
businessDescription:
On a mission to break the taboo around the topic of mental health and democratise access to support, clare&me was founded in 2021 in Berlin by Emilia Theye and Celina Messner, who have since been joined by Xaver Ebner as a technical co-founder. 

Mental health is finally getting more recognition amongst society. More often, people are recognising the importance of caring for their mental health as much as their physical health. However, access to support remains a challenge. 

Anxiety disorders and depression are among the most common mental illnesses, and it’s claimed by the healthtech startup that around 374 million people worldwide are affected by anxiety disorders, and around 246 million suffer from depression. What’s more, the pandemic has exacerbated the problem – increasing the total number of people affected by mental health challenges by 25% since 2020.

Speech therapy has been shown to have a positive effect in treating both anxiety and depression, but it’s no secret that the demand far exceeds the supply. Access to therapy that is affordable and of a high standard is severely lacking. Clare&me was developed to help the millions of people who do not have access to such help or are reluctant to seek it – an artificial intelligence that engages in verbal conversations with users via smartphone and conveys clinically proven approaches to behavioural therapy.

Clare&me is designed to feel human and is intended to counteract the significant bottlenecks in treatment capacity – offering psychological support for everyone, regardless of location and time.

name: MyGutachter
businessDescription: Individual vehicle appraisal after a car accident: simply commission us to prepare your appraisal online
tags: Car accident, vehicle appraisal, damage report
longBusinessDescription:
After a car accident, an accident report is the basis for processing by the insurance company.  If you used to have to put up with long waiting times for a damage report and also pick up the phone more often, MYGUTACHTER now offers a better and particularly flexible solution.  Start your individual online vehicle report with just a few simple steps.  You can pass your damage on to our experts without a personal vehicle expert.  We prepare the necessary accident report and then settle the bill with the responsible insurance company in an uncomplicated and flexible manner.
 With us you can rely on excellent service.  Our damage report, which is prepared for you, is accompanied by a lawyer from the commissioning to the payment by the insurance company, so that you can rely on maximum security.
 We need photos of your damage In order for us to be able to create your vehicle report, we first need photos of your damage.  You can record this easily and simply with your smartphone and send it to us after registering your damage.  Furthermore, we need all important documents for the preparation of your report.  In addition to the exact accident information, we depend on the police report, if available.  When we have all the necessary documents and information, we start preparing the report.

name: Beautinda
businessDescription: Mit Beautinda können Beauty-Dienstleister Ihr Business in nur drei Minuten kostenlos digitalisieren und vermarkten. Kunden auf der anderen Seite finden bei Beautinda einen individuellen Anbieter aus der Umgebung, der wirklich zu einem passt.
longBusinessDescription:
Das Startup Beautinda mit Sitz in Essen ermöglicht Beauty-Dienstleistern in nur drei Minuten kostenlos Ihr Business zu digitalisieren und zu vermarkten. Bereits jetzt hat das Startup über 1.000 Beauty-Dienstleistern dabei geholfen, sich digital aufzustellen. Nun soll das Konzept durch die erste Finanzierungsrunde deutschlandweit ausgerollt werden.
Die Beauty-Dienstleistungsbranche hatte es durch die vermehrten Lockdowns im Rahmen der Corona-Krise nicht leicht. Laufkundschaft bricht fast komplett weg und plötzlich werden Termine meist nur noch im digitalen Bereich abgestimmt. Die Digitalisierung rückt in den Fokus.
Online-Buchung über Instagram, Online-Zahlung mit Klarna oder digitale Terminverwaltung von überall aus – und das kostenlos. Vielen Anbietern wird durch den kostenlosen Zugang die Angst genommen, digitale Lösungen auszuprobieren. 
Alle Anbieter aus der Umgebung in einer App:
Bei Beautinda werden zudem alle Beauty-Dienstleister an einem Ort gebündelt. So hat man hunderte einzigartige Beauty-Experten aus der Umgebung griffbereit in seiner Hosentasche. Das Besondere: die persönliche Komponente. Denn jeder Anbieter erhält ein persönliches Profil. Keine langweiligen allgemeinen Salonprofile. Man möchte ja schließlich nicht nur einfach eine Dienstleistung in irgendeinem Salon buchen, sondern vielmehr bestimmte Fähigkeiten einer Person. 
Mit der jüngsten Finanzierungsrunde steigen drei namhafte Business-Angels aus der Beauty-Branche in das Startup ein. Sie waren sofort vom Konzept überzeugt und sehen enormes Potenzial. Wir sind gespannt, wo die Reise noch hingeht.

name: dasABOmobil
businessDescription:

Genug von gebundener Liquidität durch herumstehende Autos sowie Abhängigkeiten und unflexiblen Vorschriften anderer? Dann bist du hier genau richtig.
longBusinessDescription:
Dein dasABOmobil Auto-Abo kannst du für jegliche Anlässe nutzen. Ganz egal ob für einen Kurztrip oder längeren Roadtrip, mit der ganzen Familie, Freunden oder allein – wir finden für dich das geeignete Fahrzeug. Und falls du mal Lust hast ohne bestimmtes Ziel und Grund herumzufahren, Automodelle zu testen und einfach (nur) Spaß zu haben, bist du hier auch an der richtigen Adresse.
Bei uns bekommst du dein Auto-Abonnement flexibel und spontan, genau auf deine Vorstellungen zugeschnitten. Und wenn sich dein Wunsch-Auto doch mal verändern sollte, gibst du dein Auto im Abo zurück und suchst dir ein anderes aus!
Und das Beste an allem? Dein Abo-Preis versteht sich als All-inclusive* Paket. Das bedeutet KFZ-Steuer und Zulassung, Reparaturen/Verschleiß und Reifenwechsel sowie Versicherung, sind bereits im Abo-Preis verrechnet. Du musst dich also um nichts kümmern, außer dein Auto auf Zeit ab und zu mal zu tanken.
Einfach mit wenigen Klicks online buchen, reinsetzen und losfahren. Mit deinem dasABOmobil Auto-Abo liegst du voll im Trend und kannst flexibel und unabhängig durchs Land fahren.

name: Sense â Your Artificial Memory
businessDescription: Sense is an AI-powered artificial memory for your work, designed to keep all your company’s activities automatically organised in one place.
tags: future of work, knowledge management, technology for teams
longBusinessDescription:
Sense is a single automatic place for all company work, where all types of data are stored, easily accessible, and well-organised.
Our AI-powered platform integrates with your existing apps within seconds, providing a centralised place for accessing updates across the entire company, projects, and team members, facilitating seamless communication and collaboration with no need to share, search, and manually organise information.
It automatically combs through all tasks, presentations, documents, links, meetings, people, public discussions, and personnel interactions, compiling them into Self-organised Spaces.
With Sense AI, relationships between every piece of data—from emails to presentations—are identified and maintained. You’ll never have to work with isolated documents or links again, as Sense provides comprehensive background information, related resources, previous versions, and discussions.

businessDescription: LIVID is an augmented live-shopping platform for high-involvement prodcuts. tags: Live-Shopping, Social Commerce, Digital Retail, Augmented Reality
longBusinessDescription:
Physical retail is seeing a sharp decline in customers and sales in their showrooms as digitalization continues to advance. You may assume that buyers would just make purchases online at that point, but this isn't always the case, particularly for the retail of complex products like vehicles, where consumers lack the trust necessary to complete their digital shopping process. More than 70% of all online shopping carts are abandoned, primarily as a result of customers' significant resistance to investing in pricey goods without any assurance.
Building this trust in the digital sphere is made possible with LIVID for physical retailers. Our augmented live-shopping technology allows salespeople to conduct digital one-to-one, one-to-many, or webinar sessions in real time while showcasing and promoting the products using numerous camera streams in various locations, augmented product overlays, and pre-recorded marketing content. The streams can be broadcasted simultaneously on their website and social media channels.
With LIVID, we bring the most important factor of retail into the digital world - the human interaction with a product expert. Because people buy from people.

name: ecoLocked
businessDescription:
ecoLocked is turning buildings into carbon sinks!
We convert captured carbon into functional, carbon-negative construction materials. Our products permanently store CO2 in the built environment, reduce the need for fossil raw materials, and deliver targeted functionalities such as thermal insulation, durability, or curing time reduction. Thereby, we combine carbon storage and utilization and create a self-sustaining CDR business case.
tags: biochar, climate tech, deeptech, concrete, cement
longBusinessDescription:
ecoLocked is a developer of carbon-negative building material solutions based on Biochar Carbon Removal (BCR). BCR is a mature and scalable carbon removal technology that extracts carbon from biomass residues to prevent emissions. ecoLocked's mission is to turn that carbon into functionalized materials while at the same time creating a secure, high-permanence storage solution (a 'carbon sink'). 
Our initial focus is on concrete, the world's second-most used material, which is responsible for nearly 8% of annual global emissions. We have developed a data-driven product platform, allowing us to provide a portfolio of additives and admix materials that cater to the intricacies of concrete production and the diversity of concrete applications and leverage locally available biomass residues. 
All our products can be integrated directly at the concrete plant or construction site, without retrofits. Our first product, eLM Zero, is an admix material that reduces the net carbon footprint of concrete by up to 100% while delivering optimized performance. It partially substitutes conventional inputs like cement and aggregates based on our customized recipes, minimizing the CO2 footprint and maximizing functionality. Thereby, we give concrete producers and real estate developers a way to take direct climate action and compensate for hard-to-abate emissions such as from cement production.

longBusinessDescription:

Hackers have also benefited from the fact that in the last 24 months, a large number of business processes have been digitized and hybrid work models have been established across the board, opening the door for more attacks.

name: iComplai
businessDescription:
iComplai is a Munich based start-up in the field of product safety. It helps companies assess, monitor and predict the product risks worldwide for consumer goods, with a focus on food. The company is founded in April 2020 by Asli Solmaz-Kaiser, who brings 14 years of management experience in the product safety industry, and is backed by a number of industry experts as advisors. 
iComplai also provides services in the area of product benchmarking and virtual testing, helping companies better assess the risks and opportunities for their products, as well as what the customers like and dislike.
tags: foodsafety, productsafety, compliance, machinelearning, artificial intelligence
longBusinessDescription:
iComplai B2B SaaS platform comes with 2 main solutions:
1.	Product safety risk prediction platform 
This platform helps manufacturers assess, monitor and predict the risks of their products and supply chain. It is currently focused on food.
Product risk assessment can be really complicated, especially without sufficient data to rely on. iComplai product safety platform provides the necessary backbone to make future-proof decisions with 4M+ data points visualising the past and predicting the future. The vision of iComplai is to simplify the lives of quality, R&D, and purchasing managers by providing them the necessary tools & insights for important, strategic decisions regarding product safety and supplier verification.
This solution is especially requested by the companies with complex supply chain and the ones which enter into new product categories or re-formulations.
2.	Product Benchmark and Virtual Testing
iComplai provides services in the area of product benchmarking and virtual testing, helping companies better assess the risks and opportunities for their products, as well as what the customers like and dislike. 
iComplai solution differentiates itself through deep analysis on product features, helping companies understand the preferences of the consumers for instance in regards to sensorik, packaging specifications or microbiological quality of the products. The manufacturers can also choose the categories they would like to get analysed. 
By understanding both own products and those of the competition, the customers are able to identify the market gaps, improve their products and positioning. The service is especially geared for product management and R&D teams. 
iComplai is a Munich based start-up for product safety in B2B SaaS area. iComplai team gathers data from various sources including official bodies, ecommerce platforms and consumer portals and transforms these into machine readable datasets, enabling machine learning algorithms like anomaly detection and prediction. 
The outcome is presented in an interactive, continuously updated, easy to use dashboard, providing deep and actionable insights for the users.

The ecolytiq software calculates personal environmental impacts, such as CO2 values, on the basis of payment transactions. ecolytiq also provides a library with content and valuable background information on individual environmental impacts. ecolytiq aims to empower consumers to reduce their own impact in the long term. name: tl;dv
businessDescription:
Join fewer & host leaner live meetings. Catch up on meetings in minutes.

If you could catch up on entire meeting recordings in minutes, which meetings will you still attend live?!

Meetings with more than 4 people - are a thing of the past. Our vision is to end meeting fatigue and build technology that enables people to organize work around life...instead of the other way around.

Companies need tools to collaborateasync-first and efficient, yet employees also long for emotional connection among their peers across the globe. tl;dv combines the efficiency of async collaboration with the human element of video and democratizes your access to knowledge and emotions - wherever you are and what schedule you're living on.
We at tl;dv are big believers in a remote future of work. Far before the entire world population was forced to work from home in 2020, we have already been working in remote and distributed teams at global organizations. We know what works ... and we know what doesn't work just yet.

If you'd like to read more about our reason for existence check out our Manifesto!

name: DGLegacy
businessDescription: Digital Inheritance Service
longBusinessDescription: DGLegacy enables people in the USA, the EU, and other countries across the globe to protect their digital, financial, and physical assets. Through DGLegacy, people can designate specific beneficiaries to each of their assets and decide whether they want the beneficiaries to be informed immediately of their status or only in the case of a fatal event. DGLegacy ensures that the designated beneficiaries will be proactively informed about the designated assets should anything happen to the user. Beneficiaries don’t have the burden of remembering or storing access details. Users and their loved ones have the peace of mind that they will be aware of the assets, will be able to identify and locate them, and will receive support in the process of claiming.

name: Techmap.io
businessDescription: Techmap is a workplace search engine to find companies using technologies that are used internally.
tags: Technology Graph, Company Search, Employer Branding, HRTech
longBusinessDescription:
Techmap helps developers, students and freelancers to find companies using specific technologies in their region.
We love technologies and care deeply that developers work with technologies they love. Therefore, we've charted technologies used in companies from different sources and built an extensive technology knowledge graph. This Technology Graph is used in our tech search engine to help developers, students and freelancers finding companies using specific technologies right at their doorstep.
Our goal is to build a one-stop platform for all your technology info needs – from simple searching for companies using the tech you love to technology usage, alternatives, experts, news, and more.

name: Chaingateway.io
businessDescription: ERC20 API & Ethereum API
tags: blockchain projects, cryptocurrency exchanges, e commerce, cryptocurrency projects
longBusinessDescription: Chaingateway.io offers a variety of API functions that make it easier to work with ERC20 tokens and Ethereum. No matter if the goal is to use an own ERC20 token or Ethereum as a payment method in an online shop, create an exchange, provide a wallet function to users, send tokens to millions of airdrop participants or building a bridge between a website currency and an ERC20 token. Chaingateway.io has you covered with all needed functions. There are functions to send any ERC20 token, send Ethereum, rent and control Ethereum addresses, receive any ERC20 token via webhook/Instant Payment Notification, check ERC20 token balances, check Ethereum balances, get info on transactions and more. It can be used with any programming language that can send JSON encoded HTTP POST requests, which should be easy for every developer.

longBusinessDescription: WEROCK is a manufacturer of innovative industrial electronics, mainly computer and communication systems. Other target markets include the manufacturing industry, rescue services, hospitals and the transport and logistics sector. The products withstand special requirements. name: QueryBoost.com
businessDescription:
QueryBoost provides one API to read and write data from multiple SAAS tools.
Every company outsources functions to different tools. Developers then need to glue these tools back together to create internal processes. This means dealing with different API's, all with different implementations. Hunting through documentation ends up being a significant amount of developer time. QueryBoost does away with this, by giving developers one place to browse API fields and one method to request data.

We offer environmentally friendly shipping and receiving with DHL allowing you to send all parcels in a 100% climate-neutral way, all at no additional cost. We do this by ensuring that all the greenhouse gases that are generated by the transport are counterbalanced by our participation in climate protection projects such as GoGreen.

Another major benefit with Wir Reinigen Deinen Teppich is that all carpets are insured against loss or damage by our shipping partner DHL during transport, from the washing center, during the entire time from collection to return delivery so you have nothing to worry about.

name: DGLegacy
businessDescription: DGLegacy is a service through which, in the case of an unforeseen event happening to you, people whom you designate as beneficiaries will be informed about your assets and will be able to identify and locate them, without waiting years in the struggle to find and claim their assets.
longBusinessDescription:
DGLegacy is a service through which, in the case of an unforeseen event happening to you, people whom you designate as beneficiaries will be informed about your assets and will be able to identify and locate them, without waiting years in the struggle to find and claim their assets.
You can choose whether your digital legacy is stored in encrypted form in a private data center in Europe, or only in your pocket - in a physical digital inheritance card with the size of a credit card.
It's easy:
1. Catalog your assets - in an encrypted private data center with bank level security, or in a physical card in your pocket.
2. Designate beneficiaries.
3. The custom-engineered Heartbeat protocol detects unforeseen events happening to you.
4. Upon detection of such an event, the information about the assets is provided to the beneficiaries to whom the assets have been assigned. They are aware of the assets and can identify and locate them.
Protect your family and secure your assets with DGLegacy!

name: James AI
businessDescription: Manual Task Planning is now a thing of the past. James AI helps you to save a lot of time when planning and structuring tasks. Our artificial intelligence takes over manual task planning for you!
longBusinessDescription:

In this way, it helps you to be even more productive and additionally to have more time for the really important and also beautiful things in life. It is like a personal butler who is available around the clock as a virtual assistant.
The special thing about it is that JAMES AI creates dynamic to-do lists. This means that they are not fixed, but learn the user's habits, adapt to them, take deadlines into account, and present the task next whose completion makes the most sense now. This increases productivity and saves a lot of time and effort that would otherwise be necessary when scheduling manually. It also relieves you of the decision to work off anything arbitrary as an upcoming to-do and the possibility of procrastinating or postponing undesirable things over and over again.

name: Barba Brada
businessDescription:

That's why, in a market that's progressively getting saturated with mass market products filled with synthetic ingredients, we decided to go for the opposite.
longBusinessDescription:
We prefer to use only the best essential oils extracted from plants and fruits (even if they're more expensive than synthetics), because they result in a experience for your nose and health.
Sustainability is achieved not only through ingredients, but also through production in small quantities: our costs are higher, but there's less waste. Our packaging is minimal - only the essential to make sure our products get safely to your hands. The product inside should shine on its own.
Lastly, we believe in constant growth, not only of our beards, but also of our products and ourselves. That's why we go beyond selling products and promote education. Here you'll always find someone who cares about your beard as much as he cares about his!

name: iFactory3D
businessDescription:
Founded in 2020 by Artur Steffen and Martin Huber, the company is working on an industrial revolution to make additive manufacturing competitive with mass production in terms of automation and scale without losing the clear benefits of 3D printing: flexible and individualized production on demand, resulting in less waste. In addition, it eliminates long transportation routes and complicated supply chains with specialized manufacturing processes in Asia. 

iFactory3D has developed the mass market proprietary belt printer technology for automated batch production and long objects. This technology operates by printing at angles of 30 and 45 degrees and utilizes a conveyor belt as the building surface. The belt technology enables the production of reliable, high-quality parts that are fully automated and can be printed at infinite lengths, achieving faster production.

longBusinessDescription:
Digital nomadism is on the rise and shows no sign of waning. In fact, there are now over 10 million digital nomads in the United States alone. This is a significant 49% increase from just around 7 million a year ago. It is expected to increase even more and reach a billion by 2035.
Our team consists of digital nomads and working professionals who love to travel - which is where our idea for high quality, lightweight, in-house designed apparel, and accessories with minimalism as a core principle derived from. 
As a team that loves to travel, we noticed that there aren't any brands that cater to the needs of digital nomads and working travelers. We are here to help nomads stay productive, motivated, and stress-free while they live the dream.
We look for creative and innovative ways to find solutions to some of the problems that come with working and traveling. Our interactive co-working spaces, travel-friendly and fashionable merchandise that brings life to them are loved by one and all over the globe. ​

Date polls will come soon, allowing users to plan meetings with colleagues and friends. It aims to provide the services of tools like Doodle, Strawpoll or EasyPoll on one single website without the need for users to sign up or fight an overloaded interface with constant requests to pay for the service.
VotyVote is available in five languages and can thus be used with an international audience, friends from other countries or global business partners. The supported languages are English, German, French, Chinese and Japanese. VotyVote was built to be lightweight, it is ad-free and loads quickly even on bad connections. It is free and runs on servers powered by Green Energy.

name: J.B.N.
businessDescription:
Wir möchten uns als die J.B.N. UG vorstellen. Wir sind ein dreiköpfiges Team, dass aus zwei CEOs & einem Mitarbeiter besteht. Seit 2019 arbeiten wir Zusammen und im Jahr 2020 haben wir die UG gegründet.

Im März 2021 haben wir uns eingeschlossen um unsere Innovation und Sinn des Lebens mit J.B.N. zu finden! Das haben wir uns & unser Plan ist es eine Social Media-Game-App auf dem Markt bringen. 

Diese App ist/soll für den User, Gamer & Fan kostenlos sein. Mit dieser App hat der Gamer die Chance im Game Aufgaben zu lösen & somit im Real Life Gewinne zu erlangen die einen im Alltag oder Bedürfnis Moment weiterbringen. 

Wir suchen einen Partner / Investorin / Investor der uns auf diesen Weg komplett begleitet. Geld ist die Energie aber nicht alles. Wir benötigen eine Person die auch das Know How / Kontakte mitbringt. 

Nun kommen wir wieder zu uns. Wieso sollten Sie in uns Investieren? 
Wir haben viele Rückschläge im Alltags Geschäft erlitten und stehen immer noch auf unseren Füßen. 
Wir haben uns in den drei Jahren in einem Lean Startup entwickelt. Wir sind Psychisch/ im Kopf so entwickelt das uns nichts aufhalten oder auf die Knie bringen kann. 
Wir werden mit Ihnen oder mit Jemanden anderes unser Ziel erreichen.
(Bitte nehmen Sie das nicht Arrogant auf, dass sind Fakten von unsere Seite aus) 

Zum Schluss erläutern wir Ihnen die erste Finanzierungssumme von 1.000.000€.
Wie sind die eine Million aufgeteilt? 

300.000€ gehen für drei Jahre unsere Gehälter drauf um uns zu 110% auf unsere Idee zu Fokussieren.
300.000€ sind für den Prototypen kalkuliert, der für Freunde/Familie & erste User sein wird.
300.000€ für den Vertrieb/Marketing nachdem wir ein System für die Coustumer Delverment entwickelt haben. 
100.000€ werden als Unternehmens Rücklagen verlegt. Für Unerwartete Rechnungen oder Kostenpunkte.

You can partially own these items starting with only 250€. We are letting each item appreciate for a set amount of years, then sell it to collectors. name: BOSETEIN
businessDescription:
Real-time diagnosis of bacterial contamination & hygiene with ReBIS. 
At BOSETEIN we are at the forefront of developing novel real-time optical sensor to help food producers, retailers and packaging companies in ensuring safe and hygienic food for all.
longBusinessDescription:
Each year foodborne illnesses sicken 600 million people worldwide and more than 23 million people in European region. Bacterial inspection methods have an important role in preventing this problem, but the slowness (requires 2 to 4 days to produce the results) of the present inspection techniques is a major hurdle. At times the results come after the product is already in the market, resulting in food recalls which causes huge losses and bad brand reputation for companies.
To solve these issues we are developing a Real-time Bacterial Inspection Sensor (ReBIS). It utilizes an optical sensor and innovative Artificial Intelligence algorithms to scan and predict the bacterial count and freshness level of food items in real time. The sensor is completely automated and does not require a trained personnel to operate it. Using this sensor the use of anti-microbials can be significantly reduced in food processing factories and the supply chain can be made more transparent.

name: E-BAUS
businessDescription: A strong Amazon presence is the key to creating a successful e-commerce business. name: Type
businessDescription: Type is a text-based video editing software for content-focused videos.
longBusinessDescription:
Type Studio is a new and easy way to edit your video by just editing text. You can edit a video without having any video editing skills. The only thing you have to do is edit the transcribed text document and we do all the heavy lifting for you.
We started Type because we got frustrated with the way video editing is today! A typical video editing experience is counterintuitive when compared to everything within the modern conventions of UI design and functionality. There are so many buttons, dials, knobs, settings, and keyboard shortcuts to remember, that learning how it all works becomes in and of itself an exercise in patience and resolve. For content-focused video editing, you don’t need most of the features offered by most editing software, and the barrier to entry is very steep — you have to own a machine capable of running these programs and know-how all of the functions work.

name: Vyoma Gmbh
businessDescription: Vyoma is building the operating system of space. In short, Vyoma provides the critical infrastructure needed for satellite safety as our orbits get 10-100x busier in the next decade.
tags: Space safety, space situational awareness, real-time mapping of space objects, safe satellite operations
longBusinessDescription: We are taking space traffic management services to the next level. How? First, you get access to real-time tracking data at a click of a button, from a pool of space-based and ground-based sensors. Second, you have at your disposal the latest atmosphere-calibrated models that make trajectory predictions with an accuracy that would make even Nostradamus turn pale, supporting you in making informed operational decisions. Put both together and you maximise the safety of your satellites in orbit, wherever your satellites need to fly

name: Sysmagine
businessDescription: Sysmagine provides tools and consulting to make software development easier and more efficient. Our software MergeBoard is a web-based code review tool that helps you understand code changes faster, for example by highlighting easy-to-miss changes that affect the program logic.
tags: code review, software engineering, artificial intelligence, efficiency
longBusinessDescription: Sysmagine is a young startup from Heidelberg (Germany) focused on making developers lifes easier, in particular by optimizing code review workflows. You don't know what code review is? It's a common practice for developers to peer review their code changes, which can be very time-consuming, and according to a study by Microsoft, requires an average of about 5 hours per developer and week. MergeBoard addresses this problem by helping developers to understand code changes more quickly and therefore saves valuable time. To mention some of the most exciting features: Changes that do not modify the function of the program can be hidden, similar changes can be grouped together, developers can mark which code sections have already been reviewed, and the system automatically notifies developers when they need to act on change requests.

name: Reframd
businessDescription: Reframdbegan with a personal frustration of not finding fitting glasses and avoiding wearing any because of how they sat on our noses. It turns out that most off-the-shelf or ready-to-order glasses are designed around “Caucasian” nasal features, i.e., narrow and high nasal bridges. Consequently, people with low and wide nose bridges (primarily black people and people of East Asian descent) wear ill-fitting products. Reframed designs and produces custom-fit eyewear products driven by each customer’s facial measurements. Our products use widely available technology and parametric design.

name: {privatescope} GmbH
businessDescription: Our annually licecnzed B2B software "openTurtle metadata" and "SPICE microtubes" reads automatically data from any source and creates value directly at data’s origin, without need to save it into Data Lakes / Datawarehouse / ETL.
longBusinessDescription:
Problem: A huge amount of digital data is off little use: it is on outdated systems or is not in a quality that can be used. Data warehouse approaches and ETL (Extract-Transform-Load) are usually unsuitable as a solution, especially for smaller companies: too expensive, too complex, too complicated. This forces companies to solve the problem manually through programming, which is costly and inefficient.
Solution: We develope openTurtle metadata and SPICE microtubes.
Our software reads data from any source and creates value directly at data’s origin. Our technology has several advantages over ETL/ELT solutions:
We let machines „talk“ to each other and save on staff, storage, energy and time.
Customer benefits: Up to 65% cost-saving. No need for expensive data duplication or ETL/ELT.
Minimal personal resources are necessary. Fast ROI and moderate Cost2Connect. Ideal for recurring tasks. Transparent plans. Written in C++, software fits in any environment. It’s sustainable.
Made in Germany, it represents a new quality of German engineering.
Business:  Our business model is based on recurring revenue: basic editions or individual products are licensed on an annual basis. Sales are made online and through partner channels. 
Vision:  {privatescope} becomes a leading provider in the EU: openTurtle metadata and SPICE microtubes will become the standard technology to use across industries and countries. SMEs in the EU will discover new opportunities of data usage.
Status: The first big customer from the logistics industry: data migration, merging and data provision for machine learning.{privatescope} is looking for capital to implement further customer requests
and to finance further development. {privatescope} is BAFA / INVEST - eligible.

name: DIDIT
businessDescription: Didit is a company that is revolutionizing the market with a free KYC solution that offers unlimited identity verifications at no cost.
tags: Free KYC, AML Screening, Identity Verification, Compliance
longBusinessDescription:
Didit is a digital identity company that is revolutionizing the identity verification market with a free KYC solution that offers unlimited and forever verifications. Our mission is to make the internet a more secure, people-centric and efficient place, that's why we offer world-class identity verification at no cost to all businesses, regardless of size or location. Our system supports document verification in over 220 countries, advanced facial recognition with liveness detection and optional AML detection.
Why do we offer this service at no cost while other providers continue to charge $1 to $3 per verification? In the age of generative AI and deepfakes, we believe that verifying people's identity is a fundamental right, not a nice-to-have. Therefore we curate the best content of German-language media on a daily basis and make it available in the form of audio articles. Start your free trial subscription now!

name: ASEIKO Skin
businessDescription:
ASEIKO SKIN® is revolutionizing the beauty industry with its innovative approach to skincare shopping. With a vast range of products available, it's often challenging to identify the right skincare products that match your 
specific needs. ASEIKO was designed to solve this problem. ASEIKO SKIN® is available as mobile application for download in App Store, Play Store and Huawei App Store, and get an advice on skincare products in less than 2 min!
tags: advanced virtual skincare advisor, mobile marketplace, platform for clean skincare, personal shopping guide for clean skincare
longBusinessDescription:
ASEIKO SKIN® is based on the technology of AI and offers hyper-personalized shopping experience. With ASEIKO, customers can find and purchase products tailored specifically to their needs while brands can sell to a precisely targeted group of customers. ASEIKO uses visual AI recognition to classify the user's skin condition in real-time, without full face recognition, to provide a personalized skincare routine. With advanced data analysis and matching of various criteria, the recommended routine is tailored to each individual's unique needs. ASEIKO also has an integrated warning system that analyzes ingredients to
indicate the possible degree of harmfulness of a certain product as well as an integrated In-App-Messenger.
ASEIKO combines life style, shopping and community in one easy-to-use application.

name: Soapbox

tags: Social Audio, Drop in Audio, Social

name: wunderbon | smart receipt hub
businessDescription: wunderbon | smart receipt hub transfers forgery-proof digital receipts from the POS to any smartphone worldwide & offers data mining as a service — and protects our forests!
longBusinessDescription:
wunderbon is the secure and GDPR-compliant platform for merchants, their customers and suppliers. We enable our partners to deliver digital, visually customizable receipts to their customers; in addition, we provide analytics and insights for retailers and their supply chain up to the manufacturer, that can be accessed directly via a web app in any browser. By doing this wunderbon provides merchants with the tools to improve their digital relationship with their customers and increase understanding of customer needs and preferences, all while contributing to a more sustainable future. 
Using wunderbon, consumers receive their receipts digitally, encrypted and legally compliant directly on their smartphone and are thus relieved of the flood of paper in their wallets. This ensures that important receipts (e.g. for warranty claims, tax purposes, expense reports, etc.) do not get lost, can be easily exported (e.g. for tax declarations) and the receipts are given a central, digital home. All receipts can be easily found at any time and from anywhere in the world (indexed search) — without the hassle of printing them first and then digitizing them afterward in a time-consuming and potentially lossy process (such as with scanning-Apps). For shoppers, a fully automated budget book, product recalls via push notification, and a reminder function for warranty and guarantees complete the additional feature set.

name: Moincoins
businessDescription: Moincoins is a cashback site operating in the US, UK and Germany. We focus on highlighting eco-friendly alternatives to your everyday online purchases.
longBusinessDescription: At moincoins you find your favorite stores and shop as always to save your money. The site offers up to 30% cashback in a variety of different online shops. In the eco category, you can find brands that we hand-picked as sustainable and eco-friendly. Once you earned your cashback you have the option to pay it out and enjoy the extra cash or you can donate it to charities that help restore the nature.

name: Yook
businessDescription: Yook provides sustainability-as-a-service software enabling SMEs to calculate, analyze and act on their product and portfolio-related carbon emissions. The software solution eliminates tiresome manual effort in data collection through automated data extraction and structuring provides fast results even for incomplete data sets and provides transparency through an accuracy score. The constantly updated carbon data is used to identify emission reduction potentials and validate environmental product claims, strengthening consumer trust and compliance with upcoming regulatory requirements.

We are a small, passionate team driven by a sense of purpose to do good in the world.

longBusinessDescription:

We believe that a specific focus coupled with 100% transparency and out-of-the-box thinking is the right formula to succeed within retail technology, logistics, and E-commerce.

name: oji life
businessDescription:
Aufrüstung von RLT-Anlagen zur automatischen und kontinuierlichen Beseitigung von Krankheitserregern in der Luft und auf Oberflächen für die permanente Kontrolle der Raumhygiene in Gebäuden und Verkehrsmitteln.

Upgrade of air handling units for automatic and continuous elimination of pathogens in the air and on surfaces for permanent control of indoor hygiene in buildings and public transportation.
tags: roomhygiene, long term disinfection, hvac upgrade, protective atmosphere
longBusinessDescription:
Die oji Europe GmbH hat ein innovatives und weltweit einzigartiges System für eine permanente Raumhygiene entwickelt. Die Schutzatmosphäre kann über raumlufttechnische Anlagen in ganzen Gebäuden erzeugt werden und wird automatisch aufrechterhalten. Molekulare hypochlorige Säure, eines von unseren weißen Blutzellen produzierten Desinfektionsmittels, schwebt in der Raumluft und deaktivieren dort unmittelbar und höchst effektiv Pathogene. 
Die oji active air Technologie ist ca. 10x effektiver als ein ähnliches von der NASA entwickeltes System. 
[EN]
oji Europe GmbH has developed an innovative and globally unique system for permanent room hygiene. The protective atmosphere can be generated via HVAC systems in entire buildings and is maintained automatically. Molecular hypochlorous acid, a disinfectant produced by our white blood cells, floats in the room air where they immediately and highly effectively deactivate pathogens.  
The oji active air technology is about 10 times more effective than a distantly related system developed by NASA.

name: IveTime
businessDescription: The worlds most spontaneous App for meetups  with your Friends or just by your own.
longBusinessDescription:
Are you bored? Wanna be spontaneous?
IveTime stands for "I have time".
Who of my friends have time - right now?
Press the IveTime Button: IveTime tells you.
No idea where to meet?!
IveTime suggests you a venue in the middle - fair for all, isn't it?
No idea what to do?!
Let IveTime make a guess for you.
And what if none of my friends have time?
IveTime tells you what you even can do on your own instead.
And IveTime will inform you as soon as your friends have time!
And what if I do not have any friends yet?
IveTime suggests you other IveTimers with similar interests that want to meet you :)
___
- No problem with asking friends having no time.
- No endless discussion about place, event nor activity.
- No wasted time.
___
Ask your friends to install IveTime too in order to make this work - it's a social app.
We just need the mobile number to connect you with your friends (just like WhatsApp). No worries about that please. And the location is only needed to suggest you a nice venue.
Give IveTime a try!

name: LEVY Health
businessDescription: LEVY Health is the first company in the world to develop a licensed medical product that analyzes female fertility disorders. Based on the results, users are given personalized therapy recommendations. LEVY Health looks at each woman, her body and her situation individually, bringing holistic reproductive medicine straight to users’ homes.

name: Cofenster
businessDescription:
Founded in 2020 by Tom Vollmer, Oliver Wegner and Finn Frotscher, cofenster helps large and medium-sized companies to find new ways to communicate with their teams. In the age of the home office and hybrid work, it’s perhaps more important than ever to find new and innovative ways to connect between teams, in order to strengthen employee engagement and promote long-term employee engagement. Cofenster’s software offers a solution that reflects three core trends in business in 2022 – the need to improve communications for remote teams, the increased popularity of video and the need for a more ‘friendly’ team culture. 

Cofenster’s software solution has radically simplified the creation and publication of professional videos, and, as a result, every employee can create a pro-level video in no time at all. It’s part of the company’s vision to make video the central instrument of corporate communication, to bring more empathy into everyday work.

name: Zerosandones
businessDescription: IT Services and Consulting
longBusinessDescription:

Established in 2014, Zerosandones Digital is headquartered in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, India with offices in Germany, the Czech Republic, & Morocco. Our commitment to quality and 7+ years of experience have made us serve over 25 clients across 15 countries with 90% client retention.
Our objective is to deliver robust, scalable, innovative, and quality solutions while adhering to strict deadlines, for small-medium businesses as well as Fortune 500 Companies. tags: Commercial Real Estate, AirBnB, Workspace Marketplace
longBusinessDescription: The ambivalence in the demand and utilization for working space is increasing. Enterprises own unused desks & office spaces, while SMBs in Cities & Rural areas lack office space or miss the financial strength. Employees have to continue commuting, which is inefficient & demotivating. With DeskNow we created an Asset Management cloud-solution making offices digital. You can analyze real usage data, and let them with a click, or lease additional space for a project office, flexible as online shopping. Based on an E2E automated contractual process, we make WorkWhereYouWant available to everyone.

name: DerShop
businessDescription:
DerShop is an open source Ecommerce WebShop system built from the ground up with developers in mind.

Our mission is not only to challenge the way we think about eCommerce but to revolutionize it and bring it into the 21st century.

A traditional eCommerce outfit produces around 12 tonnes of CO2 emissions throughout a year with 1 million page views a month through power wastage from idling servers. Our goal is to produce a sustainable eCommerce webshop ecosystem that helps businesses reduce their carbon footprint and operating costs while at the same time improving their customer engagement.

We believe an open source approach is the best way of tackling these issues by giving developers the tools they need to build eCommerce platforms that are sustainable for the future and can scale to modern eCommerce webshop requirements.

name: ConstellR
businessDescription: Using our patent-pending miniaturization technology, we will realize the world’s first high-resolution infrared monitoring system to create a daily global map of our planet’s surface temperature. Similar to existing data providers in the Earth Observation (EO) market, including Digital Globe, Airbus, or Planet, we will record and process recorded imagery to become analytics-ready for value-added service providers. This will enable them to improve (agriculture) and better predict crop yield (commodity market), to timely observe environmental changes (insurances), or to perform remote infrastructure monitoring (oil and gas). The data will be made available via a pay-per-use model and an API-based subscription model.
tags: remote sensing, thermal infrared, CubeSats, evapotranspiration, water stress, soil moisture, crop yield forecasting, and emergency response

name: faktual
businessDescription:
At faktual, our mission is to reduce journalistic desk research to one click and give back the time journalists need to focus on writing ground-breaking stories. We’re developing an AI-supported research suite that substantially speeds up information and content gathering for articles. 
faktual provides journalists a database with all relevant texts from primary sources such as ministries, associations, authorities, and companies in real-time. faktual’s natural language processing (NLP) algorithm processes the text by extracting relevant facts and quotes as well as performing statistical analysis on data from primary sources specific to the journalist’s search query. Overall, faktual can reduce the time spent on desk research by up to 40% without sacrificing article quality.

We're not only about sharing gear, but also about sharing ideas and creating all together, as a community. To build this community, we host regular offline events with over 200 attendees.

businessDescription:

name: ANNEA
businessDescription:
ANNEA provides a next-generation automated predictive maintenance platform enabling renewable energy assets to analyze and communicate their own health status. This knowledge guarantees maximum uptime of the machines and saves money and time. 
Using the data coming from the already existing sensors, our IoT-solution leverages data pipelines and builds up digital twins of each asset, based on a combination of physical and data-driven artificial intelligence models. These are then used to perform the real-time failure and root cause prediction. The platform gives alarms, identifying where the asset will have a problem, what will cause it, and suggests how and when should it be repaired.
We are positioning our product with a SaaS (Software as a Service) model. The revenue model will be time-based subscription per monitored asset. Our main product is the fully automated backend engine which provides results on the future failures. The results of the backend predictions can easily be integrated within other 3rd party existing solutions in our customers via an API which is also provided.
In addition to our backend engine, we also do have an optional frontend dashboard which is also positioned as a SaaS time-based subscription per user model.
tags: Predictive Maintenance, Internet of Things, Artificial Intelligence, Automated Condition Monitoring, Renewable Energy, Production Machinery, Aircrafts, Transportation & Logistics, and IoT-Platform

name: Mimetik

Seamlessly embedded in a textile glove it does not interfere with the work process but guides the user through intuitive feedback.

name: klaeny

name: dasABOmobil
businessDescription:
dasABOmobil is the first digital car subscription platform by dealers for dealers. Our platform enables dealers to offer vehicles on a subscription basis, independent of manufacturer and individually while maintaining direct contact with the customer. dasABOmobil operates in the B2B market and initially focuses on regional and medium-sized car dealers.




 




dasABOmobil wants to reset the thought and work processes of the industry and thus contribute to the digital transformation - as Europe's strongest and largest subscription platform. Always with the premise: There is only one platform, and it belongs to the trade.




We want car dealers to be able to trade independently again. By merging different dealers on our platform, we want to create a consistent size of a dealer network.

Problems or feedback? Help us make Gapless a little better every day. We highly appreciate your ratings and reviews in the App Store. You can also email us at [email protected].
We take data privacy extremely seriously and comply with GDPR. All the data you give us is encrypted and securely stored on European servers. businessDescription:
Sunvigo provides you with cheap solar power from your roof and real green power from the grid. 
Until now, anyone who wanted solar power had to buy or rent a system. The problem here is not only the high acquisition costs when buying or high monthly payments of up to several hundred euros. Above all, you always have to take care of the operation of the solar system yourself - that is an enormous effort. On top of that, you have to bear tax, regulatory and financial risks and meet requirements.

At Sunvigo, we think it has to be easier.

That's why we equip your home with a free solar system - and instead of high fixed costs we offer you a flexible electricity contract. You only pay for the electricity you use from the system. You have no acquisition costs, no high monthly payments, no risk - and if you spontaneously take a longer vacation, you also have no electricity costs. Sounds almost too good to be true, doesn't it?
