name: novapace
businessDescription: We provide a training device for Parkinson's patients. Using our sensor embedded shoe insole in combination with our smartphone application, patients learn to reintegrate correct walking patterns into their everyday life. This is achieved by giving haptic feedback about the current movement status in real time. Via the application, users receive individualized training suggestions.
longBusinessDescription:
Parkinson’s patients suffer from insecure walking - they show a short strided gait with a small foot
clearance. Due to their characteristic walking pattern, patients tend to stumble and fall, leading to
serious injuries (13 percent of all Parkinson’s patients require medical treatment due to falling each
year) and fear of further walking. Instead of keeping up physical activity to compensate for
Parkinsonian symptoms, the fear of falling keeps patients inside of their house and isolated from
social activities. Physical therapy helps Parkinson’s patients with this difficult task, but they struggle
with the implementation of the right walking techniques into everyday life.
The key to improving autonomy and quality of life in Parkinson’s patients is physical and medical
therapy. Novapace is an insole with embedded sensor and feedback unit, which serves as a 24/7
physical therapy unit. Thus, patients learn the right walking pattern on the go - it reminds them of the
correct techniques via a haptic feedback directly at the foot. Furthermore, they can see their training
progress on a mobile application.
Patient-related data collected by the device is optionally transferred to the physical therapist and
neurologist in order to validate the state of the disease and the therapy progress. It can serve as a
basis for the adaption of physical therapy techniques and medication, leading to individualized
therapy for each patient.
Novapace was initiated by Patrick Scholl during his Mechanical Engineering studies at Technische
Universität Darmstadt. Having a grandfather with Parkinson’s disease, he decided to support him
using his technological knowledge. Patrick won the third prize in the students’ category and a
special prize at the ideation competition at TU Darmstadt Startup and Innovation Day 2017. With the
support of Patricks co-founders Simon Staffa and Lukas Braisz, the project won the 2018 Global
Challenge Virtual Preliminary, which featured a trip to the Virginia Tech Global Entrepreneur
Challenge in the United States. Among 14 teams, the team won the Information Technology Award,
including prize money of 10000 Dollars.
The project was approved for the governmental funding scholarship “EXIST Business Start-up
Grant” (see www.exist.de/EN/ ) in September 2018. Until September of 2019, the team will optimize
and test the product and get into contact to possible investors.
Momentarily, a prototype (which is shown below) is evaluated within a scientific study at University
of Applied Sciences in Bremen. Physical therapy students test the applicability of novapace in
physical therapy within the scope of a group project. Therefore, gait analysis with and without
novapace is conducted. Outcomes of the study are implemented into the ongoing product
development. A following long-time evaluation with the next prototype generation is planned in the
scope of a Bachelor thesis.

name: Manyfolds
businessDescription: Manyfolds is an intelligent platform for instant packaging creation and production, focused on SMBs and micro industry customers that require high variety & individualization, low volume and just-in-time packaging solutions.
longBusinessDescription:
Market need
SMBs, micro-industry and medium-sized e-tailer are in the need for better packaging solutions when it comes to ship different item combinations. They want less breakage, smaller boxes for lower logistics costs, less filling material, a better eco-friendliness, avoid packaging errors, and they want a better unboxing experience for the goods recipients. But most of all: They want a better on-site availability of “fitting” packaging. 
Solution
The Manyfolds platform enables small and medium-sized businesses to instantly create and produce eco-friendly, size-optimized packaging.
Once the dimensions of the individual shipping goods are entered, the packaging incl. protective positioning inserts are automatically calculated within the WebApp. Customers order online or produce their packaging instantly through a copier-sized machine, fold them together, and place the individual items in recesses in the inlay. The goods are thereby ideally protected during shipment to the inside and outside, with no filling material needed.
With this solution, customers are significantly reducing overhead and packaging costs, minimizing shipping damage, eliminate filling material, and achieve better end customer reviews through better unboxing experiences. Conventional systems are more space-consuming, more expensive, much more complicated.

Companies can find developers on EntwicklerHeld who can contact them via the platform, for example to submit job offers. longBusinessDescription:
WHY zip.app?
— Intuitive operation: zip.app is a messenger, id est no complicated navigation or nested functions like in classic software

— No language barrier: automatic translation of messages in your own language
— Just start: No training required, runs on any PC, tablet and smartphone
MANAGE PROJECTS PRODUCTIVELY
— work intuitively
— Structure communication
— Share project information bindingly
— Communicate efficiently via text and voice messages
— Also share files, pictures and videos
— Create transparency about construction progress while ensuring confidentiality
ACHIEVE TEAM SUCCESS
— Accelerate work processes
— Use personal assistant
— Reduce email and postal traffic
— Communicate bindingly
— Synchronize data across devices in the cloud
PROCESS DATA WITH LEGAL CERTAINTY
As a German company, we comply with data protection laws that are among the strongest in the world: of course, the European General Data Protection Regulation (EU GDPR) as well.
— All correspondence and shared documents are documented auditable
— Data processing is state of the art in terms of safety
— "Coded in Germany": our software is developed in Germany and contains highest technical standards
A key challenge of an entrepreneur is mastering daily chaos. Chaos costs a lot of time, money and nerves. The main cause of chaos is administration and communication: especially media discontinuity, time offset and effort to make information aware, to utter, to convey and to transform information into action. This is where the zip.app comes in!

We are PianoMe - and we believe in the idea of a ‘shared economy’. Thanks to today’s focus on digital infrastructure, customers and vendors are closer than ever before. With this in mind, our goal is to make the process of renting and hiring piano practice rooms as simple as possible. Advantages:

- High-quality scanner with automatic edge detection, perspective correction, filters, cropping & more
- Accurate data recognition even under difficult conditions
- Guaranteed data security: SDK runs locally on the device, 100% offline. No data transfer to server/third-party provider
- Fast integration thanks to ready-to-use UI components
- Easy-to-understand UI
- Easy to use
- Professional support
- Native Android & iOS, Windows, Flutter, Xamarin, Xamarin.Forms, Cordova, Ionic, React Native, .NET MAUI platforms


Typical use cases are the integration of Scanner & Data Extraction SDK for capturing paper documents with the mobile phone to forward the scan and data extracted from it for further processing. The OCR can be used flexibly for all document types. This also means one can expect a high recognition rate for different information (e.g. invoices, payment information, IDs, or prescriptions).

Industry examples: Banking, Logistic, Insurance, Retail.

This is what sparked the idea of Leverice as a messaging platform, built on a unique & ground up architecture, that allows for a deep channel tree structure for effective communication from day one!
 
Thanks to the strong business and technology background of the team, we realised that the platform can be extended even further into an open eco-system for Apps to be built and hosted natively within the Leverice platform. Think of it as a ‘Salesforce for messaging and collaboration’

Vara’s mission is to make affordable diagnostics available all over the world. name: Kopply

longBusinessDescription:

In our today's world everything has to be fast, snappy and sustainable. Exchange your business card with a digital solution and let Kopply help you to stand out.
You can exchange your contact information in seconds via a QR code or a link. The person who receives your contact information can save it immediately in their phone or connect with you via our platform to get additional features that help you to manage your contacts more efficiently.
Say goodbye to typos and outdated information. Because your information is already pre-filled, the receiver only has to download your card or connect with you. Once your are connected, the auto-updates will ensure that your information is always up-to-date. It's that easy.
GDPR and the protection of your data is part of our core values. As a German company, we have to comply to GDPR and do our best to protect your data. As global citizens, we don't beliefe in business models that are based on selling your data or do harm in general.
Still reading? You could have your card already created at https://kopply.com.
Launched at the Founder Institute.

name: Envoria
businessDescription: Envoria is an all-in-one sustainability reporting software that helps large and medium-sized companies manage their carbon footprint, report ESG & CSR metrics, and comply with EU sustainability regulations such as the EU Taxonomy, CSDR, DNK, and more.
tags: ESG software, sustainability reporting, EU Taxonomy
longBusinessDescription: Envoria is a brand of Financial Software Architects GmbH, which was founded in Munich in 2018. Envoria's current focus is on covering the new regulations under the EU Green Deal. This is a concept presented by the European Commission that aims to reduce net greenhouse gas emissions in the European Union to zero by 2050. Envoria covers the requirements of the EU Taxonomy and the CSRD (Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive), as well as the world's most widely-used sustainability standard, the GRI (Global Reporting Initiative). Envoria is one of only a few solutions that have been audited and certified by the GRI. In addition, reporting according to the CSRD (Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive), as well as according to the SASB (Sustainability Accounting Standards Board) specifications and the Supply Chain Act is possible.

name: Plantbreak
businessDescription: Plantbreak manufacturer and supplier of vegan baking mix intended for fitness enthusiasts.

businessDescription: Prepmymeal offers a healthy meal prep delivery service through a subscription-based online shop. In our modern society time is one of the most important assets. Often, we have no time to cook fresh and healthy every day. Outside unhealthy fast food dominates the restaurants. We want to solve this problem and change the way people eat. Therefore, we remove all the barriers like planning, shopping, and cooking that prevent you to eat healthily.

name: EatFirst
businessDescription: Eatfirst is based in Berlin, Germany. The startup is a leading corporate food management platform for business and their staff. It was founded in June 2018.

name: Linguation
businessDescription: Linguation provides High Quality Translations, Made in Germany. Online Translation Agency.
longBusinessDescription: Linguation is an online translation platform offering simplicity with its three step order process and the complete management of a document until it’s delivered. Linguation keeps below market average as a result of its lower operational management costs. This is accomplished through automated management processes and high work volume. Linguation works with freelance translators of different languages and operates as an online agency between customers and translators. name: Deep Green
businessDescription: Deep Green was originally founded in Germany in 2018. Both of our brands, CANYA FX and SWISS FX are now among the market leaders in the CBD Pen and CBD Oil categories in Europe. In 2020 we expanded into Asia. Our product portfolio formulations for Asia have been adapted in light of regulatory compliance.

name: The Drivery
businessDescription: The history of mobility within Europe has a legacy of its own but has fallen behind in the digital era. Fast forward to March 2019 when The Drivery opened as a Marketplace for Mobility Innovators to provide the modern infrastructure needed for rapid innovation and the meeting place for the European mobility community.  Now, The Drivery is home to over 130 startups that are focused entirely on mobility within the European tech ecosystem. It’s a perpetual motion machine that brings together futurists, makers, thinkers, and doers who are all passionate about shaping the future of mobility. Located in Berlin with over 10.000 m² (and growing) space in the historic Ullsteinhaus building, The Drivery includes high-tech prototyping maker garages, a GPU farm that provides excessive processing power for AI development, and coworking, office and event spaces.

name: StrongSD
businessDescription:
Being on the market since 2009, we have managed to gain the trust and respect from our clients. Long-term relationships and happy customers have always been one of our main goals. Our STRONG mission is to make our customers and their business STRONGer. We are ready to transform your ideas into STRONG market-ready solutions and support you at all stages.

In addition to software development, we can also suggest business analysis, UI/UX design, project management, test automation, training, and infrastructure management services.

name: PREA Group
businessDescription: PREA is an investment consultancy in the B2B segment that specializes in making machine learning usable for the real estate industry. With the help of self-developed software solutions, we at PREA specialize in sustainable increases in value for users, investors and owners. PREA supports you in making your investment easier and more productive, solving problems creatively, working together towards your goal and increasing your investment performance. PREA is constantly developing new solutions to ensure your real estate investments grow the way you want them to. It is here that some of the most passionate and creative people develop innovative products that will forever change real estate transactions in the future. Especially today, in times of high market volatility and low interest rates, this is more necessary than ever. With the help of our technologies, we systematize, simulate and visualize investment scenarios on the basis of relevant and alternative key figures. The insights gained in this way help third parties to better understand your property and support you with your investment.
tags: Information Technology, Machine Learning, Real Estate
longBusinessDescription: https://prea.eu/de/

name: Experiment X
businessDescription: We are singularly focused on advancing health tech within the realm of wellness and diagnostics — Accessible, Preventative, Rapid Results. Our team is diverse in backgrounds and skills, yet we come together to succeed at the intersection of health and technology.  If you are equally motivated to grow health tech and create exciting new products, contact us.  We are keen to meet you.

name: Muydozo
businessDescription: We’re doing online marketing since 2010, resulting in 2 Exits millions of €s spend online and a whole lot of expertise in various lines of business. Being entrepreneurs we understand that it takes a wholesome approach to ensure your brand’s success online. We analyze your business, brand, customers and market to craft a tailor made full funnel concept for you. Always focused on the most relevant platforms for your audience, we work ourselves from awareness, over consideration to conversion using the best converting media outlet for each of the steps in a multi platform funnel.

name: Itsapark
businessDescription: We’re so proud to announce that we’re taking our mission for sustainably driven style to a broader audience. Our learnings will create more value in a greater context together with H&M Group — where we can build awareness higher and explore wider. Our spaces remain a welcoming place for brands, organisations and people who are taking steps together towards a circular future.

name: Coview
businessDescription: Onboarding is an opportunity to connect and build trust with your customers. Coview allows your team to walk them through your web app - in their own browser. Your customers feel like there’s a helpful person by their side, and your support team will have the time to do what they love - helping customers. Coview is just as intuitive for your support team as it is for your customers. Any technical errors, compatibility issues or even network problems are automatically highlighted. Meaning that most tickets can be quickly resolved at first-level contact. So rather than slogging through an overwhelming backlog, your team can hit inbox zero at the end of every day.

name: cabasus
businessDescription: MedTech IoT startup in the equestrian industry that developed an innovative wearable device that monitors in real-time the health condition of the horse in order to detect and prevent life-threatening colic and lameness from becoming a fatality. The Cabasus SmartBoots™ are a combination of a smart wearable for your horse and an intelligent app that covers all your needs in the stable, monitors your horse's vital signs and lets you organize and optimize your training. Designed to guarantee protection and at the same time maximum comfort over long periods of time, as well as being useful for all types of riding. Whether it's endurance, show jumping, dressage, eventing, hunting, vaulting, racing, recreational riding or groundwork, with the Cabasus SmartBoots™ you'll be able to improve your performance like never before.
tags: Equestrian, Medical Equipment Manufacturing, Smart Boots

name: Valtech Mobility
businessDescription: Valtech Mobility is the software manufactory for digital solutions for everything to do with connected vehicles. With electromobility and autonomous driving, networking has become a core component of the automobile. Our aim is to provide innovative solutions for this that are intuitive to use, offer defined added value and are consistently thought through down to the last detail. Design and implementation come from a single source - from user interaction to vehicle integration. The focus is on the topics of big data, e-mobility, autonomous driving and networked platforms. Our colleagues work at the Munich headquarters and at the Braunschweig, Dresden, Düsseldorf, Frankfurt and Ingolstadt locations.

name: CurveSYS
businessDescription: CurveSYS is a system sensor development, design & integration company from Munich | Germany that specializes in providing its cutting-edge curved and elastic sensor systems international. CurveSYS™ sensors are ultra-thin, flexible and bendable, pressure-sensitive and even heatable. With all those characteristics CurveSYS satisfies the upcoming design and functional requirements of potential customers throughout various industries all over the world. Our sensors established a unique position on the international high-tech sensor market. MARKET FOCUS AREAS: Automotive, Security, Gaming, IoT, Smart Logostics and Smart Wearables for comfort enhancement. The company offers its customers and partners, also smart system sensors to reduce casualties while driving.

name: whoelse.ai
businessDescription: We develop a namespace protocol for the Internet of Voice. Open source, privacy-by-design, and based on public industry standards. We develop technologies for voice AI interoperability based on Noam Chomsky's theory of hard-wired and universal language in human intelligence. The project launched in 2018 by initiating an ISO-compatible standard for NLP API harmonization. We are currently raising funds on Republic. Learn more about the idea, our forthcoming voice browser, industry solutions, and how to get involved.

name: Marvest
businessDescription: Invest together with the European market leader for digital maritime investments. That`s why we invest together with you and make professional investors grade investments accessible for everyone.

name: CFgO
businessDescription: CFgO offers a complete outsourcing of accounting for start-ups, self-employed and medium-sized companies. CFO Agency for scale ups. Most startups as well as small and medium-sized companies control their company with gut feeling. They're either lucky or wrong. As an entrepreneur, why should you risk being wrong instead of using a simple and super meaningful tool that already keeps an eye on liquidity for the future. This allows entrepreneurs to act before they have to react. Liquidity forecasting requires more than just the bank statement - there are many more variables to consider. Determining this takes time and experience. As an entrepreneur, you often don't have either of these when it comes to finances. Our MISSION is to take the issue off your hands and save you valuable time and money.

Our motto: timeless, functional, affordable. Our furniture is designed for a wide variety of living spaces and purposes and combines many practical functions.

This is who we are at hagebau connect Founded in 2018 with almost 60 people, our goal at hagebau connect is nothing less than to offer our customers the best cross-channel shopping experience in the DIY market. This also creates new and sustainable business and supply models for housing companies, health and care insurance companies, employers, cities and municipalities as well as outpatient and inpatient care facilities.

name: Raven51

Together with JOBmenu, Hecona and Königsteiner E-Recruiting, we not only bundle concentrated HR competence, but also more than 50 years of experience in a new agency, Raven51 AG. A new agency driven by innovation. Who wants to be pioneers and trailblazers. The Next Level Recruiting in mind and you as a customer in mind. Because despite all the digitization, the following still applies to us: Customer first! Next Level Recruiting: Easier, more accurate, more efficient. This is Next Level Recruiting! To be more precise: We combine the potential of digital change with over 50 years of experience in HR marketing. In addition, we use the skills and the almost insatiable curiosity of our employees and always go one step further. Into the new. Beyond the comfort zone. For your success as an employer!

name: SudoSpeak

Technology companies are the rising stars of the new era and some of the most successful ones were built by non-native English speaking founders who were used to be developers. More and more, developers are managing not only the tech and code they build, but teams, projects, customers, financials, and investors. We understand that this shift in role requires great effort and takes time to get the hang of it. That is why we are happy to support software developers on their journey.

name: Robin Data

Robin Data - Your strong partner in matters of compliance!

name: Juconn

The software solution is focusing on asset tracking and monitoring of sensor values and is already used by various industries as an innovation-driving component in the context of their digital transformation. name: Shower chunks
businessDescription:
Shower chunks are the manufacturer of the shower boulder, a solid shampoo & shower gel in one, especially for travelers. It is perfect for skin and hair and hand luggage, the ideal companion when traveling & doing sports. It is sustainable and eco-friendly.

The shower chunk is a solid shampoo and shower gel in one. Our vision is to eliminate the need for shampoo and shower gel in plastic bottles without sacrificing a pleasant shower experience with foam and fragrance. Many people only shower with the shower block - both at home and when travelling. We are super proud and grateful that together we can create such an impact in avoiding plastic waste and we will continue to step on the gas to ban plastic from the bathroom!

Picstagraph is an innovative platform & community for digital photo and video competitions to find the most creative customers of companies and then turn them into brand ambassadors. This creates a win-win situation between brands and customers.

name: Spectrum Markets
businessDescription:
Spectrum is an innovative new approach to retail trading for those who want 24-hour trading access to the markets. 

Headquartered in Frankfurt, Germany, we offer a new way of dealing in securitised derivatives for the Pan-European retail market; introducing a purpose-built 24-hour lit trading venue, with complete transparency, increased choice and maximum control. 

Our best-in-class technology ensures we safely match thousands of orders and quotes every second, meaning retail investors can be confident in trading what they want, at the price they want, 24 hours a day. BaFin authorised, we're forever exploring new ways to light up potential within people, technology and the markets, so that we can enable our customers, and importantly their retail investors, greater access to unlock a new world of opportunities.

name: ekipa
businessDescription:
To overcome today's challenges, boundaries must be crossed and sustainable collaborations must be enabled.

With ekipa, we create innovation ecosystems that make this possible. We combine the innovation potential of the digital generation with the power of established organizations from business and politics to shape a sustainable change towards an innovative society.

name: iNNOVO Cloud
businessDescription: German Edge Cloud (GEC), a Friedhelm Loh Group company, specializes in innovative edge and cloud solutions. GEC solutions make data in networked environments available quickly, easily and securely, support process optimization in the manufacturing industry, for example, via data analytics and guarantee the customer full data sovereignty in the connection to the public or private cloud. GEC is a developer and service integrator for turnkey solutions and offers both its own and industry-specific systems. The company is already using its solutions in the Industry 4.0 plant of sister company Rittal in Haiger. German Edge Cloud integrates and operates hybrid private edge cloud infrastructures from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) and Platform as a Service (PaaS) to industry-specific applications in the Software as a Service model (SaaS). As a co-founder of the Gaia-X Foundation, the German Edge Cloud pursues the goal of interoperable platform solutions with lock-in minimization from the customer's point of view.

name: Veronym

name: CannaCare Health
businessDescription: CannaCare® Health is one of the leading German manufacturers and wholesalers of high-quality cannabidiol (CBD) products. We have made it our task to transport the positive properties of the hemp plant, which have been known for 10,000 years, into the 21st century. In doing so, we will focus in particular on the currently much discussed and described positive effects of the active ingredient CBD contained in the hemp plant. CBD is the focus of many studies and is said to have anti-inflammatory, relaxing and pain-relieving properties, among other things. ​ Everything clean, everything good - that is our claim. We at CannaCare® Health want to "make the best of nature available for your well-being". Our aim is to contribute to that the promising natural active ingredient CBD is being intensively researched and made accessible to everyone. Our maxim is transparency and clarity with regard to our products. In order to increase the well-being of our customers, we ensure that our products are always of excellent quality. We source our raw materials exclusively from certified European suppliers and check each batch for purity, CBD content, THC content and heavy metal pollution. All our products are manufactured in Germany and Europe according to the highest safety standards. The finished batches also go through a testing and approval process, so that we can always guarantee the best quality. we ensure that our products are always of excellent quality. name: Bownce
businessDescription:
We make the world bownce. As the first IoT sports device of its kind, bownce is connected to the blockchain and allows users win crypto coins by competing successfully against one another in sport events.
bownce is easy to set up and can be used for short or long training sessions at anytime and anywhere. Unlike other fitness devices it is suitable for everyone in all fitness levels.
 
The integrated micro technology and bluetooth connectors allow a real time performance tracking in the provided smartphone app with its innovative features. In the app the players are being supported by bownce and the community to improve continuously their fitness level and to relieve stress in their daily life with fun and joy.

name: FinMatch
businessDescription: FinMatch | finance simply – digitally We digitize the initiation of financing between companies and banks via our online platform and make the entire process digital, eﬃcient and fast. As an independent platform, we bring medium-sized companies together with selected financing partners. We prepare your financing request in a bank-friendly manner and make it available to our large network of over 600 profiled financing partners. You will receive binding and attractive financing offers and can decide on the optimal financing solution. From registration to the conclusion of the contract, we are personally at your side throughout the entire process. Only the best financing partner understands all the important details.

name: Arineo
businessDescription: We provide support for medium-sized companies in their digital transformation – from choosing the right combination of IT solutions and implementing them, to operation and support. To do so, we rely on Microsoft and SAP solutions for customer engagement, enterprise resource planning, workplace and collaboration as well as data analytics. Our experts extend these solutions with artificial intelligence, big data, and IoT technologies to leverage a real competitive advantage for its customers. Arineo was founded in 2018 as a so-called employee-owned company (EOC) and has its headquarters in Göttingen, Germany. According to the founding articles, 51% of the company will belong to the employees by 2023; by 2028, the employees will hold 100% of the company’s shares. Thanks to this innovative ownership structure, we can invest all our revenue in the continuous training of our employees, expanding the range of our services, as well as continually improving the quality of our services. Our organization banks on self-management, which allows for short decision-making paths and maximum agility – and benefits customers and employees alike.
tags: Cloud Computing, CRM, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Information Technology

name: Ankercloud
businessDescription: Ankercloud is the cloud and technology partner for data-driven digital transformation. Ankercloud provides consulting, implementation services, and industry-specific analytics solutions that deliver cost-effective and high-impact business value by processing data. AI/ML platforms help you process volumes of data collected from different data sources, which are trained to identify and predict demand.   Accelerated Go to Market strategy introduces you to a series of accelerators, making data-intensive processes automated that otherwise introduce a delay in the implementation. Constantly training the data that matures over time on AI/ML models improves data consistency and makes enterprise systems run the business successfully. Ankercloud brings the data-driven approach by combining data-intensive processes, spanned across multiple technologies and business activities. Our cloud solutions are the most efficient, cost-effective and are deployed faster without compromising on quality. We are agile and strive to be trusted technology and cloud partners focused only on what's best for our customer’s business.

name: ROQQIO

The solution covers all retail processes, from order management and logistics to shipping and integrated POS systems, and links all sales channels. Our smart solutions combine all online and offline sales channels into a continuous customer journey.

name: EMSU
businessDescription: Digitization in the supermarket is progressing only slowly. Classical advertising media such as cardboard displays and brochures are the same as 30 years ago and have not adapted to the digital development of recent years. EMSU allows every brand to become individual and interactive at the POS through our technology and AI. On the one hand, this consists of a software platform for making promotions available in the store with just a few clicks, digitizing process chains, and playing out and analyzing DSGVO-compliant advertising in the market. On the other hand, we are developing solutions to make various processes in the supermarket measurable with sensors and at the same time make them attractive.

name: ewa
businessDescription: Digitization is revolutionizing the way we work. And it destroys jobs - at all levels and in all sectors. How can you protect yourself from the financial consequences? ewa reduces the risk of losing your job through digitization. And if it does happen, ewa protects the customer against the financial consequences: with a basic income through insurance.

name: Rhyton Solutions
businessDescription: Rhyton Solutions GmbH puts the software, artificial intelligence, and data science to facilitate agility and intelligence in your business. In order to do so, we bring together all your people, data, and systems into one place for a digitally-connected business and gather all organizational activities, processes, competencies, and models in one platform. This integrity empowers the companies to manage effectively and gain detailed insights and consistency of processes. The combination of our solutions and experience help organizations harness the power of digital technology without the immense complexity associated with digital transformation.

name: BooleWorks
businessDescription: We are specialists in mathematical logic and its application to industrial problems. We have been dealing with Boolean and pseudo-Boolean logic as well as linear optimization for many years, both in science and in practice. We focus on algorithms for variant and complexity management at automobile manufacturers and their suppliers. The resulting software tools and systems help the OEMs to get the enormous variety under control. We develop tailor-made software components and services in small teams of specialists. We have specialized in Java and JavaEE. Our own open source logic library LogicNG is the basis of many of our projects.

name: Farmee
businessDescription: The new online platform Farmee Experts provides affordable crop consulting services online. Farmers having an issue with their plants can post a question on the Farmee Experts website. Within 24 hours, the question is answered remotely by Delphy’s experienced agronomists. Farmers just have to pay for this specific troubleshooting without any long-term costs. As a special launch deal, Farmee Experts offers the first answer for a new registered user completely free. Especially owners of small-sized greenhouses, indoor growers or urban farmers will benefit from having access to professional advice through an affordable service.

name: Pacura Med
businessDescription: Pacura med GmbH is the specialist in finding, placing and leasing medical professionals. We have a Germany-wide workforce of over 1,800 employees and work with over 2,000 renowned clinics and care facilities throughout Germany. Our portfolio ranges from geriatric nurses, nurses, midwives, anesthesia and surgical assistants to specialist nurses. Ever since we were founded, we have made it our task to convert the temporary work business into an absolutely employee-oriented concept and not only offer our nursing staff a stopover, but long-term employment. With significantly above-average starting salaries, shorter working hours.
tags: Employment, Health Care, Recruiting, Staffing Agency

name: NAIX
businessDescription: NAIX was created to automatically anonymize documents. Formed in 2018 we have developed an intuitive and responsive anonymization tool. Created based on practical and real-world language models, our anonymization tool is adaptable to your project needs. There are many features including manual redaction options. With only three simple steps, you have an anonymized document that is GDPR compliant. Our goal is to provide a reliable, efficient and accurate anonymization and pseudonymization solution.

name: TutorSpace
businessDescription: The three founders are true education enthusiasts. Patrick has been tutoring since his youth, Christoph taught at the university for a long time and wrote an anatomical textbook at a young age, and Felix was appointed professor at the age of 32. The three of them pursued their idea of ​​a central marketplace for knowledge just as quickly and purposefully as their own careers. The TutorSpace app has been downloaded over 50,000 times and has over 7,000 verified tutors registered. With hundreds of downloads per week, the community is also growing rapidly and a total of over 14,000 people have already found each other via TutorSpace. “Our goal is to become the leading platform for tutoring in Germany. Everyone has a skill and special knowledge.

name: Fulmo
businessDescription:
Building the Lightning Network. Fulmo is a Berlin-based company dedicated to research, development and consultancy on the Lightning Network and Blockchain scaling. The RaspiBlitz is a do-it-yourself Lightning Node based on LND running together with a Bitcoin-Fullnode on a RaspberryPi 4 – with a SSD and a nice touchscreen for easy setup & monitoring. This setup is totally unique in the environment of Bitcoin Nodes.
The RaspiBlitz is designed to be a very secure routing node. Therefore it does not use docker or any insecure JavaScript libraries.

name: Sooqua
businessDescription: Sooqua is a smart water network company that prevents pipe burst and finds leakage. The company is using GIS-data we create a digital twin of the pipes network so that their algorithms understand the connections and positioning of sensors within the network. It also uses suppliers pipes and already existing sensors which send their data via LoRaWan/SigFox or directly by cable to the suppliers facilities. Sooqua shows the networks status in realtime, detect and localize leakage in an early stage and predict when and where a pipe is going to burst. They also make repair measures plannable and thus help water suppliers to optimize their limited resources like budget, material and staff. The company's solution ensures a reliable supply & Sustainable use of the limited resource water. Sooqua was founded in 2018 and is based in Darmstadt, Hessen, Germany.

name: M7 Trading
businessDescription:
M7 Trading sells mobile phones, smartphones, accessories, textiles, and trend items online. They can direct the right product into the right sales channel through their network of partners. That is a wholesaler of household appliances and electrical and electronic goods. We are active in the e-commerce sector of mobile phones, smartphones and accessories as well as trend items and textiles.

Through our network of partners, we are able to steer exactly the right product into the right channel. We founded this company in 2018 because of our passion for sales.
tags: E-Commerce, E-Commerce Platforms, Sales, Trading Platform

name: nuco.cloud

Additionally a part of our proceeds are donated to scientific research-teams so they can compute their projects for free!

name: IONIQ

We combine advanced German spraying technologies with the empathy for the skin. 

Our first product is IONIQ One a smart skincare spraying device. Its worldwide innovative Magnetic Skin Technology works like a magnet to spray skin care products evenly onto the skin.

name: New Shore Invest
businessDescription: New Shore Invest is a brokerage platform through which private investors invest directly and free of charge in promising ship projects. It focuses on brokering securities to finance modern, economical, and flexible ships that serve high-growth and promising market niches. It was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Hamburg, Germany. Digital Ship Investments – Tokenized. Green. High yield. Almost tax-free. Digital ship investments From 1,000 euros | Up to 7% return and more* | Below 1% tax burden.

name: mentalis
businessDescription: mentalis provides people with mental illnesses with seamless, digital aftercare after treatment in the hospital. Algorithm-based apps and tele-coaching stabilize the therapeutic successes developed in the clinic and, if necessary, transfer patients to further treatments of standard care in a targeted manner. In this way, the high rehospitalization rate in the field of F-diagnoses can be reduced, more complex follow-up treatments can be avoided and individual suffering and costs for society can be reduced. The mentalis aftercare connects seamlessly to the hospital treatment, as it is technically and procedurally integrated into the hospital discharge process. Due to the registration process in the hospital and an intelligent algorithm, the aftercare is as patient-oriented as possible,

name: ZF Micro Mobility
businessDescription:
We create and develop smart micro-mobility solutions aimed at accessible and sustainable zero-emission technology. Smart and simple mobility matters to all of us today. No matter if you are commuting to work, for shopping or riding as a leisure activity. E-bikes enable everyone, regardless of age or fitness to move more in a flexible way. The more E-bikes are on the road, the less cars are.

What is ZF MICO MOBILITY GmbH doing?
ZF MICRO MOBILITY GmbH is a start-up/Joint Venture, with sites in Ravensburg and Karlstein, has over 200 years of international experience, specializing in the development of complex mobility systems and adapting them to the needs of our partners.

name: ConnectyCube
businessDescription: 1-1 and group chats, chat moderation, video calls, push notifications, files storage, users authorisation and automated chat bots - the complete features set for your mobile and web apps, for hundreds to millions users. Give your audience possibility to stay connected with friends, meet new people, discuss news, events and many other! Allow even more ways for users to communicate with each other through 1-1 or group video and audio calls. Keep users entertained from the very beginning of using application. GDPR compliance, HIPAA compliance, end-to-end encryption via OTR/OMEMO and other to keep security on a high level.

In addition to professional care, the tracking system supports patients in mastering the tasks of disease management on their own responsibility. By regularly collecting relevant parameters (tracking), he is sensitized to good dental care and supported via app (coaching).

name: Freeyou
businessDescription: We are freeyou: a team of creative talents, IT specialists, industry enthusiasts and idealists, and we want to make insurance easy, digital and smart. Our customers let us take care of the annoying paperwork and boring insurance jargon by using IoT, data based analytics and an agile approach. We believe good insurance is characterized by services that are transparent and easy to understand. In November 2019 we launched a car insurance policy.

name: Fast Biotechnologies
businessDescription: At Fast Biotechnologies we uncover the unseen. We are developing a revolutionary method for highly-sensitive and fast detection of microorganisms. Our proprietary "AVALANCHE"​ technology has a potential to disrupt the way diagnosis of infectious diseases is conducted today. No cultures, no lab, fast and reproducible results. We are zeroing in on one of the biggest socio-economic challenges of our time – sepsis.

name: Petfluencer
businessDescription: We are the startup Petfluencer.com founded in 2018. A digital consulting agency with a tech background for professional petfluencer marketing in the pet industry ecosystem. Originally started as an idea by Mauz & Wauz GmbH, founded in 2013, a manufacturer of subscription surprise boxes for dogs and cats as well as our own pet food and pet accessories in Stuttgart, DE and New York, USA, our customers benefit from many years of experience in the Cooperation with influencers as well as our deep knowledge of specialist trade and processes in the pet industry. Since June 2020 we have been concentrating full-time on our digital platform solutions and consulting service, because now we help others to professionally market their products in the industry!

name: Intertempi
businessDescription: With intertempi you can easily manage your Hybrid Office or Flex Space. Eliminate manual coordination of employees to use the office and stop spending money on unused space. intertempi will push your workspace to the next level through automation and technology. No more annoying lists, chat groups and endless emails to coordinate who uses which workspace, meeting room or parking lot and when. Let your employees easily plan their home office days vs. office days and book them with one click. Our intuitive app offers a floor plan and timeline view in addition to a calendar view to make it as convenient as possible. And of course you can customize our app with your own corporate design or branding.

name: HetrixTools
businessDescription:
HetrixTools (beta), launched in May 2015, was created with the purpose of giving webmasters a useful set of monitoring tools that would improve their efficiency and make their workflow simpler.
The platform you see before you is the result of thousands of coding hours, tens of thousands of lines of code, extensive QA testing, and countless cups of coffee. We've custom coded HetrixTools from scratch, and not just the main features such as the blacklist monitor and uptime monitor modules, but also the support desk and billing system, because we wanted the final product to offer a premium experience for all of our clients, and we didn’t cut any corners in order to accomplish this.

businessDescription: Aigora makes high quality medical image datasets accessible to AI researchers and developers. Through our partner network of medical imaging centres, pathology labs and clinics we can provide diverse datasets for algorithm training and testing.

Patient confidentiality and data protection are our top priorities. We have experience in own algorithm development. Together with our partners we can provide additional development and annotation services, if needed. Let’s discuss.

name: ROBO.AI

We do that by creating technology, and designing innovative software solutions that apply AI to their challenges. The company was founded in 2016, serving clients in the Insurance business in Switzerland and developing Hiringcue for the Recruiting industry in the US. In 2017 we started servicing the automobile industry in Germany and developing ROBO.AI. In 2018 we started developing Ultratimeseries. In 2019 we entered the pharmaceutical space.

name: Pininfarina Automobiles

It means an agreement of lines, a sense of proportion, simplicity and harmony, so that, when a considerable time has passed, one can still notice something that is more vivid than the memory of beauty.” Battista “Pinin” Farina. Following Battista’s vision on the purity of design, with more than 80 years of heritage, we are creating the first Pininfarina branded luxury electric vehicle. Automobili Pininfarina represents a lifestyle. Sculpted like a piece of art, developed with cutting edge EV racing technologies, our car will be the ultimate object of desire.

name: Yptokey

One of our key values is hardware independency. Here, we are partnering with professional hardware manufacturers.

name: CoPlannery
businessDescription: CoPlannery is a Berlin based ConstructionTech company. As a spinoff of Technische Universität Berlin we explore the intersection of architecture & technology. Our innovations have been awarded by the German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs, the Berlin Senate Department for Economic Affairs, and the European Social Fund. In April 2018 we launched Baustarter.com,an online platform that simplifies construction for people who want to build or remodel their home.

name: Xelera Technologies
businessDescription: Xelera's software makes state-of-the-art accelerator technology accessible to commercial applications in the data center and in the cloud. Due to the growing data volume and emerging demand for real-time analytics, businesses are increasingly required to build up accelerated data processing capabilities. FPGAs and GPUs will become an integral part of tomorrow’s data centers, cloud services and IoT infrastructure, powering a broad range of constantly evolving business applications. Accelerator technology can provide orders-of-magnitude acceleration to business-critical applications using Big Data analytics, machine learning, database management and to IoT infrastructures. FPGAs boost the energy efficiency of data center servers and can substantially reduce TCO. Despite the tremendous benefits delivered by FPGAs and GPUs, there still exists a large gap between applications and the processor technology today. Xelera Technologies develops software to bridge this gap. Xelera Technologies has been selected to receive funding under the EXIST Technology Transfer Program. The program is financed by the German Federal Ministry of Economics and Energy (BMWi) and is co-funded by the European Union.

name: Legalbird
businessDescription: You can trust that you will reach your destination safely and reliably with us. With our many years of expertise, we take care of your concerns and do our utmost to protect your rights! You also have a personal contact person in our service team who is always available for you.
tags: Consulting, Internet, Legal Tech, Professional Services

name: LevlUp
businessDescription: LevlUp was founded in 2018 with the intention of supporting gamers in their performance. Currently, #teamlevlup has more than 70 employees in various fields such as online marketing, social-media, logistics or design & video. With more than 100 affiliated content creators and streamers LevlUp is one of the pioneers in influencer marketing and supports gaming enthusiasts in over 30 countries.

name: PlugVan
businessDescription: PlugVan was founded in 2017 after visiting the world's largest camping fair: Why do so many people buy camper vans (99.5% diesel!) and then use them only a few weeks a year for just one purpose? Why don‘t we convert existing empty vans into camping buses when needed - and back again? In this way, even commercial vehicles from everyday working life could become the perfect camper at the weekend! The solution: a complete separation of interior and base vehicle - a mobile camper box that fits into every van! The idea for the PlugVan camper module was born! Back in Berlin we unpacked the tools and started building the first model: a simple wooden frame with a folding chassis. Still a bit provisional, but it seemed feasible to us now. With this first version of our take-away extension, we sat down with TÜV, DEKRA and other industry experts and discussed the concept in detail. Then we got the „GO“ and we started developing our idea of the (camper) box in the car.

name: Deutschfuchs
businessDescription: Deutschfuchs is a blended learning platform that includes an LMS and a fully digital textbook for German as a foreign and second language. Since the market launch in 2019, Deutschfuchs has been able to convince numerous schools, language schools and universities and is constantly being expanded to include functions and content. The young startup wants to contribute to integration with its work and bring education into the 21st century with the help of meaningful digitization of learning. Because: Technical equipment alone is useless, the pedagogy must be reformed in order to prepare young people and young adults for life in a fast-moving world. Deutschfuchs therefore not only promotes pure language acquisition, but above all media skills, creativity, collaborative work and critical thinking. The software makes it easier for teachers to prepare for and follow up on their lessons and enables simple internal differentiation in heterogeneous learning groups. Deutschfuchs has been a cooperation partner of Hueber Verlag, the world market leader in the field of German as a foreign and second language, since 2020.

name: Betriebsarzt Service
businessDescription: Betriebsarztservice Holding GmbH was founded in Berlin in February 2018. Our vision is to enable our customers throughout Germany to provide modern, flexible and transparent occupational medicine and occupational safety from a single source, thus making a lasting contribution to the health and safety of all employees. We master the classic approaches of occupational medicine and occupational safety and combine them with the modern possibilities of digitization. In addition to our first practice, which opened in Berlin in 2018, practices in Hamburg, Cologne and Düsseldorf were added in 2019. Since 2020 we have also had practices in Stuttgart and Kiel. Modern. Precise. Transparent. These basic values ​​determine the day-to-day work at the company doctor service. We are a young and family-friendly company. We are constantly growing and offer our employees flexible opportunities for personal development within the company. We support and encourage our employees - so that we can all grow together. Because healthy employees are the basis for strong and successful companies!

name: manroland Goss web systems
businessDescription: In 2018, manroland web systems and Goss International became one company: manroland Goss web systems. We aspire to be an exceptional supplier serving global print markets with value-adding products and services. By combining the strengths and opportunities of two leading web offset equipment and service suppliers, we will create a truly global entity, offering the broadest portfolio available on the market, with a lower cost structure focused on lean operation principles. The portfolio is marketed and distributed worldwide by an international sales and service network with company-owned market organizations and established commercial agencies with years of experience in their respective markets. To achieve this in the new presses business as well as the service and spare parts business, manroland Goss supports its customers as a high-performing partner for the printing and media industry with more than 1,000 employees worldwide. manroland Goss web systems part of the Lübeck-based Possehl Group and American Industrial Partners. The strategy of Possehl is founded on continuity and investment security, path-breaking technologies and a strong focus on service. The world market leader in web offset printing and innovator in digital inline finishing and packaging printing also follows these principles. Pioneering technologies, comprehensive service offerings and customer orientation based on strong partnerships, offer a benefit that creates success. American Industrial Partners is a private equity firm with a strong commitment to strengthening and building its businesses.

name: Orangery
businessDescription: Whether in Berlin or Hildesheim - creative minds need an environment in which they can develop freely. We prove that success stories don't just happen in the big city and that there is also potential for extraordinary projects in small regions with up to 300,000 inhabitants. The Orangery delivers an ecosystem that adapts flexibly to the needs of our members. It enables founders to use the infrastructure they need for their start-up, even in rural areas. For this reason, we have made it our goal to open Orangery locations throughout Germany. We give inspiration a space - in our coworking space and in our community. Here, lateral thinkers meet, develop innovative ideas and grow together on their projects. we go new ways break up old structures, design, transform and create space for creativity. The Orangery enables founders and established companies to realize their visions and to discover potential. We bring talent and technology together to solve problems and achieve meaningful results.

name: Otalio
businessDescription: Otalio’s mission is to revolutionise how the cruise companies are going to handle their fleet operation in the following years, incorporating the new cloud technologies and giving both shore-side and onboard teams the single platform to communicate as one voice. The three visionaries had to look no further when it came to building-up their team. Their excellent reputation in such a refined industry sector gathered the best cruise experts and innovative software developers around them, with a team totaling up around 40 employees residing around the world, making it easy to reach out to our customers globally. At Seatrade, you will be able to meet some of our team members which are listed here. The company is still in its growth phase. Like a plant in its juvenile stage of development, Otalio’s primary focus throughout 2018 was to develop its Ship Property Management System (SPMS) fully integrated with Point-of-Sales (POS) and other revenue facing applications such as Spa, Excursions, and fine Dining. (for more details about our products, check the next blog). In 2019, Otalio matures further by adding new branches in areas such as Sales, Marketing and Operations.
tags: Cloud Computing, Enterprise Software, Payments, Point of Sale, Software

name: Azeria Labs
businessDescription: Driven by the realiztion that Arm-based devices were going to take over the world and nobody was looking very closely at how to secure them, Azeria Labs was founded in 2017 with the goal of educating the next generation of security experts on how to defend and exploit these Arm-based devices and the software that runs on them. Since then, Azeria Labs has grown beyond belief, providing private trainings all over the world, partnering with industry-leading security conferences, and training hundreds of security engineers how to attack and defend IoT devices, phones, and other Arm-based devices. As part of its mission to get new young talent into the industry, Azeria Labs also provides free educational content and short workshops for students in partnership with industry-leading technology companies and security conferences.

name: INDICAL BIOSCIENCE
businessDescription: INDICAL − Improving diagnostics for better animal and human health. With over two decades of experience, INDICAL (formerly QIAGEN's veterinary business) is a leading provider of molecular diagnostic workflows, the protocols for their use and support that empowers our customers every day. Our customers play a central role in protecting the health of animals and humans. INDICAL’s sample prep kits, assays, reagents and instruments are used by veterinarians, industry and government agencies worldwide.

name: Rehago
businessDescription: Every year about 500,000 people are NEWLY diagnosed with half-paralysis (hemiparesis), in Germany alone. This corresponds to almost one new affected person every minute! This is accompanied by severe restrictions in everyday life: the affected people have problems to dress and care for themselves. They can no longer pursue their hobbies, work and social life as usual. The most important factor for a successful re-entry into an self-determined life is consistent and intensive training. However, the limited resources in our healthcare system are not sufficient for highly intensive training and optimal recovery. The possibilities for home training are boring, demotivating or too expensive. Rehago enables millions of half-paralysed people worldwide to get back to an independent life faster. Through modern virtual reality games we offer independent, inexpensive and motivating training and encourage users to regularly push their performance to the limit. Thanks to the mobility of the system, training can take place in the clinic, in a nursing home or in the comfort of your own home, where users can train independently or accompanied by a therapist.
tags: Health Care, Information Technology, Medical Device, Rehabilitation, Software, Therapeutics, Virtual Reality

name: OndoSense
businessDescription: OndoSense realizes breakthrough radar sensor technology for a digitized industrial world. With sensor solutions based on high-precision, robust radar technology and smart sensor software, we ensure customers get relevant data for the intelligent control and monitoring of production plants and machines. That way, we are helping to drive digital transformation in the industry. Our micrometer-precise radar sensor technology can be used reliably in a wide range of applications - even in challenging environments with dust, steam, smoke, fire or noise. OndoSense sensors are "Industry 4.0 or IOT-ready" and can be operated via our OndoNet sensor software both in stand-alone mode and as an intelligent sensor network.

name: Othermo
businessDescription: Digitization and optimization for boiler rooms and energy centers. othermo enables the manufacturer-independent operational monitoring of energy centers. In addition to the generators, we are able to connect a wide range of other peripheral devices (e.g. meters, pumps or pressure maintenance). We use the bus systems of the connected components to obtain detailed operating information. Our web-based platform then enables you to have a comprehensive overview of the system at all times and to be informed immediately in the event of faults. With the help of the collected operating data, we enable you to remotely monitor your system, identify optimization potential and increase the efficiency of the entire system. With a self-learning optimization algorithm and a control system based on it, we optimize the operating process of the system. Instead of the classic control technology (based on current measured values), we use forecasts of future consumption and generation, which serve as the basis for optimization. The most economical operating procedure ("timetable"​) is identified, which is then implemented automatically.
tags: Energy, Energy Management, Industrial Automation, Information Technology

name: coneva
businessDescription: coneva GmbH (LLC) headquartered in Munich, Germany, provides white-label offerings to municipal utility companies, real estate and housing administration corporations as well as telecommunication companies for smart energy management and for integrating their customers into the energy market. For the industrial and commercial sector as well as public institutions, coneva offers comprehensive solutions for energy monitoring and controlling. Our business model is focused on the holistic energy management across sectors, i.e. covering energy production (e.g. solar and wind power), various appliances such as lighting, heating, cooling, air conditioning, energy storage and e-mobility, as well as bundling supply and demand via the ennexOS platform developed by our SMA technology units.

name: BitterLiebe

The most important goal of this enterprise is first class products - the child of this ethos is the product; "BitterLove"​. BitterLove contains the secret properties of fifteen exquisite natural herbs and follows the ancient,

name: Hyconnect
businessDescription: We offer fasteners for fiber composites and metal. The integration of FAUSST in the production of the fiber composite component creates a wide range of options for connecting to steel or aluminum. We make fiber composite materials weldable with FAUSST.

name: Stigo Fleet
businessDescription: STIGO provides specialized software and machines for the industrial sector, in particular production. We are a long-term distributor of various systems: CAD / CAM (SigmaNEST), MES (MES PHARIS), MRP / ERP (Plan-de-CAMpagne, STRUMIS, APM +, SigmaMRP), CFD (PyroSim, Pathfinder). We offer implementation and consulting. STIGO provides its clients with professional technical care . A team of consultants is at your disposal in case of any problems or doubts related to the programs and machines.

businessDescription: AVA & MAY offers you high-quality fragrance products that bring the world into your home. We value the highest quality and naturalness. All our fragrances are developed together with renowned perfumers. Each fragrance is as complex as it is unique. In order to maintain the quality of our products, we value loving craftsmanship. Each product is unique in its manufacture. Our candles are made from 100% soy wax, which is also used in the food industry. They are free from harmful substances.
longBusinessDescription: https://www.ava-may.de

name: Locaboo
businessDescription: Locaboo is the venue management platform for space, sports and events, which seamlessly accompanies the entire process from resource and customer management to booking, billing and evaluation in one software. In addition to an open and modular structure, Locaboo also adapts to your specific requirements and also offers extensive integration and expansion options. Numerous communities and municipalities, but also clubs and companies from the entire DACH region are now using our software to simplify their booking and occupancy planning, to automate processes and thus save a lot of effort and time every day. ‍ We want to make booking and occupancy processes as easy as possible to give everyone the easiest possible access to rooms,

name: logistics.cloud
businessDescription: The future of logistics is a seamless data exchange between all supply chain partners. Of this we are convinced. More transparency in the supply chain, higher data quality and easier connection of partners? Of course, with the Logistics Cloud. Standardised. Inexpensive. By subscription. The Logistics Cloud (powered by Lobster) is a neutral logistics platform open to shippers, forwarders, carriers, customs and third parties with low entry barriers. From industry for industry. We offer a global and multimodal solution for the exchange of transport data between all participants in a supply chain with the aim of maximum transparency and automation. Across companies. In real time.  We rely on pre-existing interfaces, supplemented by a cloud-based exchange with high data quality. Traceability and documentation included. In addition, the platform also uses APIs for transmission, offers new channels for additional data and enables the simple connection of data-driven technologies such as IoT tracking or block chain services. On this basis we also establish a marketplace for third-party services: App offers, transport insurance, predictive analysis, risk analysis, regulatory compliance checks. A logistical ecosystem. Complicated made easy.
tags: Internet of Things, Logistics, Shipping, Supply Chain Management

name: Village Data Analytics
businessDescription: VIDA creates digital twins of villages anywhere in the world, in near real-time. Then your team adds own datasets to plan and monitor investments through the VIDA software. VIDA is used by leading companies, governments and banks in Africa, Asia and Latin America.
tags: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Information Technology, Software

name: XVA Blockchain
businessDescription: We strongly believe that the application of our XVA-Blockchain distributed ledger technology to financial services can fundamentally change the way how market partners in the capital market interact in business. Our core proposition gravitates around TRANSPARENCY, EFFICIENCY, SECURITY and ultimately TRUST between business partners. Apart from improved security, transparency, stability and reliability for all involved parties as outlined above, the application of blockchain technology greatly improves on operational efficiency by increasing speed and decreasing cost of financial services. Thanks to full digitalization and central availability of key data points within the blockchain, turnaround time of service offerings is much quicker than in traditional set-ups. At the same time operational workflow investments decrease considerably, leading to cost savings for the involved parties. We estimate a savings potential of up to 90% for some of our usecases.

name: medifa healthcare group
businessDescription: medifa is an owner-run and internationally active company in medical technology, and covers all operating room requirements from modular wall, door and ceiling systems (RooSy® Room Systems) for the turnkey operating room, mobile operating tables and operating room accessories, right up to examination chairs, with its product and service portfolio. In addition, one of the largest German OEM suppliers in the medical technology sector also belongs to medifa. medifa GmbH & Co. KG (Finnentrop), medifa hygienic rooms GmbH (Ötigheim) and medifa metall und medizintechnik GmbH in Rastatt are all part of this group of companies. The medifa healthcare group employs approximately 350 employees at three locations within Germany. The planning, engineering and production take place exclusively in Germany, and with over 90% added value in the group of companies, the group guarantees fast reaction times.
tags: Medical Device, Health Care, Medical Technology

name: Cyclic
businessDescription: Cyclic Design develops sustainable packaging and strategies for the circular economy. Through a unique design aesthetic and an impact-driven strategy, we aim at maximising the reduction of waste coming from the daily consumption of plastic packaging of consumer products. Our first in-house flagship product: Nepenthes, the refillable bottle for your bathroom inspired by nature. For shampoo, shower gel or other personal care fluids. Modelled on the tropical plant of the same name, Nepenthes has a curvy design so it’s cap-less and hangable. Reusable, 50% bio-based material, 100% recyclable, 100% climate-neutral, Made in Germany, it replaces 20 single-use shampoo bottles.

name: Safion
businessDescription: As developer and distributor of innovative hardware and software components, Safion offers overall solutions for battery quality assurance, research and development as well as onboard diagnosis. Our high-throughput battery screening solutions, based on online Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy (oEIS) combined with machine learning algorithms, give system integrators and cell manufacturers deep insight and confidence into the quality of every integrated or produced cell. With roots to RWTH Aachen University, our novel measurement techniques and evaluation algorithms are based on more than 10 years of interdisciplinary battery research and have been proven in numerous scientific publications. International customers in the fields of automotive, aviation and consumer electronics already rely on our technology.

name: lets
businessDescription: Lets is a SaaS company that helps enterprises unlock new levels of their social and environmental impact through corporate volunteering. As a Social Business we believe that interconnecting the profit and nonprofit sector is a key puzzle piece for transitioning into a sustainable future. All the while bringing more joy and sense of purpose into work life. Via our platform corporate teams are provided with a management tool as well as a social project database (all accross Germany) to help them organize and measure their impact generation more easily and effectively. This leaves more remaining time to actually do good!

name: memopay
businessDescription: memopay delivers ad messages directly to the wallets of thousands of active Bitcoin Cash users.  With memopay any business can run a Cost-per-Click or Cost-per-Send on-chain ad campaign to reach out active Bitcoiners and introduce its product or service. Each contact with Bitcoiners is recorded on the Blockchain and can be easily checked. In both Cost-per-click and Cost-per-send campaigns you'll know exactly what the price is. Your ad message with an active link will be stored on the Blockchain forever. Each ad message is delivered along with a small amount of Bitcoin Cash to pay for their attention.

Whether in a separate room arrangement or a connecting version: the living and dining room should offer a high level of functionality and an attractive appearance that makes you feel comfortable and relaxed . The creatively designed dining room tables and coffee tables made of durable solid wood are a sure eye-catcher and high added value due to the possible usesFor relaxed sitting, even over a longer period of time, you can choose from different model versions of the right chairs for the dining room table at an acceptable price.

It started with gluten-free protein bread, followed by many other innovations, including some in organic and vegan quality. name: kamioni
businessDescription: On a long drive home, Jacek, Jörg and Daniel were stuck in traffic for several hours. This was very annoying, but they made an interesting observation: most of the time, one or more construction sites were the reason for the traffic jam. After taking a closer look at the problem, they realized that the supply of building materials to construction sites and the removal of materials from construction sites is very inefficient and nowadays coordination is mostly still done by telephone. It was at this point that the founders of Kamioni decided that everything had to go digital and better. The idea of ​​a digital platform for transporting building materials was born. Development began in a small office provided by the Technical University. From the very beginning, the intention of the founders was to bring transparency and efficiency to the chaotic world of building materials. And they wanted to achieve this with software that is appealing and easy to use.

WLOUNGE has collaborations in Germany, Israel (Tel Aviv), the US (Silicon Valley, New York) and China.

It is small, always with you, resource-saving and also perfectly suitable for children (from 4 years, self-application from 12 years).

name: CoinMirror
businessDescription: CoinMirror enables the average user to mirror the moves of experienced tokenized asset investors, while providing access to offerings that traditionally have high barriers to entry. CoinMirror identifies and collates SmartFund Leads who have proven track records of successful tokenized investing. Investors will be able to back their chosen SmartFund Lead and 'mirror'​ their decisions. The entire process is automated via Smart Contracts on the Ethereum Blockchain. With ever increasing number of token offerings and tokenization of various assets, it is hard for the everyday investor to cut through the noise and differentiate between great projects and well-crafted scams. CoinMirror assists in fulfilling the promise of democratized investing, while giving power and access back to the people.

In addition, Relok supports the management of material resources within companies. Together, Relok can be used in costing, purchasing, sales and on the construction site.

This places us in an ideal position to cross-sell and up-sell additional financial solutions throughout the user’s journey. Put simply: by offering an extensive and growing array of attractive services, we maximize the value of each user relationship on a lifelong basis.
Our initial focus is on the fast-growing Asia-Pacific region, but we plan to scale up operations to cover all geographies worldwide where there is a strong interest in studying abroad.

name: b.fab
businessDescription: b.fab is specialized in the efficient conversion of CO2 and hydrogen (H2) from renewable energy into biotechnological value chains. CO2 and water are abundantly available and therefore it is our starting point to build a sustainable bioeconomy.  We use formate as our central mediator to bind and store CO2 and H2 (made from water) in liquid form. Our bioprocesses start with the feedstock formate and we use Synthetic Biology to design specific pathways and to convert formate into value-added chemicals.  Our platform is build on anaerobic and aerobic microbial production hosts to provide flexibility in the process design and adaptation to specific product requirements. We apply laboratory automation, high-throughput experimentation and advanced bioprocess development in an agile environment to develop new bioprocesses efficiently and in a minimal time frame.

name: tooz technologies
businessDescription: tooz technologies GmbH is a joint venture of ZEISS and Deutsche Telekom. The Group works together across the entire value chain of oral care and dental laboratories to offer first-in-class service to its patients.
