name: Ooshi
businessDescription: We see ourselves as a Female Empowerment Company and we see our core task as bringing about social change for women* by conducting dialogues and initiating them with our innovative products - by women for women*. ooshi GmbH was founded in mid-2018. She has two direct-to-consumer brands ooia (period underwear & absorbent nursing bra) and Ida's Place (aesthetic, absorbent incontinence underwear)

name: ProMaterial
businessDescription:
ProMaterial is a technology network specializing in the online sale of building and construction products. ProMaterial solutions enable manufacturers and distributors to use various sales channels and improve the efficiency of presenting and selling construction materials. Buyers can now retrieve information about products right within the context needed at the time - integrated while using a BIM or estimation system or simply in a webshop, mobile app or using a tablet. 
The product offering becomes richer and ordering more convenient for both B2B and end customers. The network already has 200+ manufacturers and 500,000+ products. ProMaterial customers sell these products online - enabled through ProMaterial technology.

name: AVE + EDAM
businessDescription: Our story begins with our founder Franziska - or rather her problem in finding the right skin care product for her, despite a seemingly endless selection of standardized skin care products. Because just like our personality, our skin cannot be reduced to an adjective. And what is normal? Over time, she realized that it wasn't just her experience, but that many of her friends shared it. When Franziska met Dominik, a scientist and technology expert, he gave her an analytical perspective on her practical problem: skin care based on factual analysis rather than conjecture. And because real beauty doesn't fit into any pigeonhole, with the help of Dominik's expertise and the collaboration of dermatologists, they developed a whole new generation of skin care: with products that focus on our uniqueness, special needs and individual beauty goals, can be personalized through advanced technology and contain only the purest, high-performance ingredients. AVE & YOU is the brand for those who, like Franziska, have no desire to be pigeonholed and for whom "normal skin from 30" is not an adequate description. Because AVE & YOU offers cosmetics that understand and appreciate contradictory uniqueness, are as multifaceted as their users - and smart enough to make these facets shine individually.

name: Bambus.io
businessDescription: Real estate assets are a safe investment. You live cheaply in your property and have made financial provisions. But in certain phases of life it can become important to access this wealth. This is exactly why Bambus Immobilien GmbH offers the concept of a partial sale. Together with us, you can benefit from your real estate property in order to shape your life optimally. In the case of a partial sale, Bambus (the buyer) will pay you the value of the sold share and will be entered in the land register as co-owner of your property. In everyday life, practically nothing changes for you. You continue to live in the property and can buy back the sold share at any time. You can also obtain the entire sale of the property at any time. Bamboo charges you a clearly defined and fair user fee for using the sold share.

name: NX Food

name: WeShare

This means that we not only have good ideas, but also the resources to make them happen. And when it comes to mobility services, we are far from finished. Cities are organisms: they grow and change. We want to contribute towards and help shape the future of our cities. Because flexible mobility has the potential to change our lifestyle, we want to move away from ownership towards individual but sustainable mobility. The future is not just shared mobility, it's green. Electric mobility is good for the environment, saves space on our streets and is economical. We believe we’re making cities, and the world, a little bit better.

We are always looking for interns in the areas of e-learning, animation and marketing as well as permanent employees in sales (Augsburg / remote). We look forward to receiving your application: https://studyflix.de/jobs exciting tasks and an open feedback culture. We are always looking for interns in the areas of e-learning, animation and marketing as well as permanent employees in sales (Augsburg / remote). We look forward to receiving your application.

In January 2021 we joined the European eMobility Association ChargeUp Europe. Eduard Schlutius, CEO of reev, was elected to the board in February 2022. We are pursuing the goal

name: elearnio GmbH

Get in touch with the new employees as soon as the contract is signed and provide them with important information digitally. By doing this, new employees receive important knowledge remotely even before their first day and immediately build an emotional bond with your company and your colleagues. Professional and individual onboarding is the basis for successful work for every employee. The faster employees are trained, the faster they can work independently. Your employees can use the intuitive onboarding software to complete the trainings & courses that have been put together for them at any time. Support your employees even after the onboarding phase! With elearnio, you can easily create courses, manage them and release these courses for your employees. Even necessary topics such as fire protection and data protection training can easily be brought into your company via elearnio and the level of knowledge can be checked.

name: LightTag
businessDescription: LightTag is a tool for managing in-house team annotation projects, designed to accelerate and improve the outcomes of Natural Language Processing initiatives. LightTag removes the misery of manual project management and QA of large annotation projects and instead promises ease, simplicity, speed and superior quality. As a product designed specifically for in-house annotation of complex or proprietary data by large (or small) teams, LightTag has incorporated all of the best practices into its UI, to minimize mistakes and ensure the best quality annotation output.
tags: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Developer Platform, Developer Tools, Information Technology, Machine Learning, Software

name: chunkx
businessDescription: chunkx transforms unique learning moments into continuous learning experiences: supplement every learning measure, whether analogue or digital, with our micro-learning app. chunkx connects any number of topics in individual feeds and selects content based on user behavior.

name: cellEQ
businessDescription: CellEQ is developing the next generation of plastics analysis to optimally design products and processes with reactive plastics. Our focus on the chemical and plastics industry enables us to link material analysis directly to the individual processes, boundary conditions and challenges of your company. CellEQ analyzers combine the different aspects of production with reactive plastics in one device - starting from material storage, automated dosing, mixing, injection and curing. In this way, compact plastics and foams can be analyzed directly and holistically. Our customers benefit from data on reaction progress, foam morphology, chemical and thermal shrinkage and much more. The results can be used in the simulation, be used for product control and direct optimization of component production. With cellEQ, for the first time, all boundary conditions of a series process are already recorded in the laboratory in order to make interactions visible. In this way, errors due to incorrect material selection or unsuitable process management can be avoided. With our automated devices, the early phase of material development and selection is accelerated and the development effort for new innovative plastics and components is reduced. At the same time, errors and batch fluctuations can be easily detected in ongoing production in order to minimize production errors and rejects. Established processes also benefit from optimized settings and integrated quality assurance based on our holistic approach.

name: Fundament Group
businessDescription:
The FUND token is the first fully regulated digital and blockchain-based German real estate bond. The tokens as a digital asset are freely transferable at any time - independent of banks, custodians or stock exchanges. The FUND token pursues a value-oriented investment strategy by investing in newly constructed German properties that have already reached ready-to-build status and the construction of which can therefore begin soon or has already begun. Development of a risk-averse real estate portfolio with diversification across the commercial and residential asset classes in several German metropolitan regions. In the low-interest environment, stable returns are to be generated. The aim is to generate stable cash flows with a sustainable annual return.

​
tags: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, FinTech, Real Estate

name: Wellabe
businessDescription: Wellabe generates personalized, digital prevention programs based on the most relevant human biomarkers. It is a cloud-based and patient-centered prevention platform. Wellabe enables the agile integration of state-of-the-art medical sensors in a lab setting for on-site screenings.

name: Mindable Health
businessDescription: Mindable Health facilitates access to psychotherapy through mobile health promotion and actively supports the therapy process. The Mindable app is a BfArM-approved digital health application (DiGA) for the treatment of panic disorder and agoraphobia. Mindable can be used both to bridge the waiting time and to accompany therapy, as well as to prevent relapse. According to behavioral therapy guidelines, the app provides comprehensive psychoeducational information and supports patients through confrontational exercises in actively reducing their fears.

name: SEG Automotive
businessDescription: SEG Automotive stands for more than a century of innovations in its product sector: from the invention of the starter motor and generator to Start/Stop and mild-hybridization. As a global supplier we make a significant contribution to climate protection by reducing emissions across powertrain technologies: Fueled by our passion for innovation, we are driving the transition towards more efficient combustion engines, 48V hybrids and electrification.  SEG Automotive combines the strength of global player with the short decision paths and culture of a mid-sized company. We offer you a fulfilling, challenging, secure job that contributes to society and provides you ample opportunities for personal and international growth.

name: wertfaktor
businessDescription: The market for financial services in old age is opaque and often not easy to penetrate. That is why the company is now offering a new solution that is flexible, fair and transparent: the conversion of existing real estate assets into available cash assets. For real estate owners, this means that they can easily enjoy financial independence without having to take out loans or move out of their homes.
tags: Financial Services, Real Estate, Small and Medium Businesses

name: realcube
businessDescription: Realcube is the cloud solution for smart and flexible digitization in real estate management. Our API-first platform is here to revolutionize the real estate industry. It is a one-stop-shop for intelligent solutions which are adaptive to every client’s individual needs. Realcube’s ecosystem offers a growing number of applications from our valuable and industry-leading partners which aggregate the customer’s data. It is worth mentioning that we keep our customers' data privacy and well-being as our top priority. At Realcube, we enable the real estate companies and their contractual partners to consolidate their data in our state-of-the-art platform. This creates a uniform database that gives access to asset managers and other management levels to all relevant information at all times, just a click away!
tags: Asset Management, Facility Management, Property Management, Real Estate, SaaS, Transaction Processing

name: AskBrian
businessDescription: We build Brian in order to create value for consultants, corporate developers and alike high-pace business professionals. We do so by exploring innovative ways of connecting human talent, state-of-the-art technology and data. We aim to ‘generate’ time that our clients can invest in new business ideas or share with loved ones. We believe that thanks to our independence, personal integrity and high data security standards we establish lasting trustful partnerships. We love what we do.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Information Services, Machine Learning

name: Zvoove Group
businessDescription: Welcome to zvoove. We are the digital home base for personnel, event and building service providers . And what does “digital home base” mean? It means: zvoove gives all your processes a secure home, a digital control center where all the threads come together. Because at zvoove, we think digitally holistically: We optimize processes end-to-end : from recruiting to identifying needs and disposition to billing and the final analysis. With us, all of this comes from a single source – or from a home base. The backbone of zvoove is formed by the formerly independent companies LANDWEHR, rhb, prosoft and BackOffice . The merger of these 4 industry experts resulted in zvoove in 2020. Supported by our investor LEA Partners, the course is clearly set for growth. In 2021 we welcomed Dutch start-up Leviy on board. We owe this flourishing growth to our stable foundation: By merging different focal points, zvoove benefits from a wealth of experience in the development of business software.

name: Klarsolar
businessDescription: As a full-service photovoltaic provider, we are at your service throughout Germany, from the contact request to the commissioning of your system. Photovoltaics must be easier and cheaper for our customers to do!" With this guiding principle, Klarsolar was founded. Under the leadership of Bastian Arend, who has been working in the PV industry for 11 years, we aim to make the energy transition as easy as possible for everyone.

name: Mooncamp
businessDescription: Nurture your culture in one single workspace. Life is short. Work is a big part of life. Therefore, we should make work fulfilling and enjoyable. At Mooncamp, our vision is to create the All-in-One Operating System to develop agile and purpose-driven teams. Just one single workspace from where you can create transparency and alignment by introducing agile goal setting (OKRs), weekly check-ins, and much more yet to come. At the heart of it all will be flexibility. Every organization is different. Great software should adapt to your individual needs – not the other way around.

name: Alteos
businessDescription: At Alteos, we believe that with the right technology, smart use of data and a drive to build a world-class organization, buying and consuming insurance can be made seamless, easy and fair. Our goal is to add an extra layer of protection to the things and activities people value most. We combine decades of insurance and engineering expertise to simplify, automate, and transform today's solutions to deliver flawless user experiences for our channel partners and their customers. Alteos offers Insurance-as-a-Service and since its foundation in 2018 has developed into one of the leading European providers of embedded insurance with a broad portfolio of insurances - fully integrated and ready to take out at the point of sale. Our international team is based in Berlin, from where we will change the world of insurance as you know it. Imprint & data protection notice: https://linktr.ee/alteos At Alteos we believe that with the right technology, the intelligent use of data and a dedication to building a world-class organization, the experience of buying and using insurance can become seamless, easy and fair. Our goal is to provide the things and activities people value most with an extra layer of protection. We embody decades of insurance and engineering practice, to simplify, automate and reshuffle today's solutions before delivering a flawless user experience, both for our distribution partners and for their customers. Alteos offers insurance-as-a-service and since its founding in 2018 has become one of Europe's leading providers of embedded insurance with a wide portfolio of insurances - fully integrated and ready to purchase at the POS. Our international team is based in Berlin from where we are changing the world of insurance as you have come to know it. s leading providers of embedded insurance with a wide portfolio of insurances – fully integrated and ready to purchase at the POS. Our international team is based in Berlin from where we are changing the world of insurance as you have come to know it. s leading providers of embedded insurance with a wide portfolio of insurances – fully integrated and ready to purchase at the POS. Our international team is based in Berlin from where we are changing the world of insurance as you have come to know it.

name: Blok-Z
businessDescription: Blok-Z offers a straightforward software platform for energy companies. It helps them prove their green energy sources hour by hour. This is more important now because of new rules against green-washing and rewards for using renewable energy right. Our software makes sure energy companies can show their energy is green in a simple way. We're working with a big energy provider in Europe and have support from ConsenSys, Draper University VC, the Energy Web Foundation, UC Berkeley Xcelerator, and Google for Startups Accelerator.
longBusinessDescription: Blok-Z is at the forefront of renewable energy technology, offering a transformative solution with our GreenLink platform. GreenLink seamlessly integrates with energy providers' systems to match hourly energy consumption with renewable sources. This empowers utilities and retailers to accurately validate and report their source of sustainable energy, ensuring regulatory compliance and enhancing consumer trust. Corporate energy consumers can use this service to comply with reporting frameworks and improve their ESG scores. As a key player in the evolving energy sector, Blok-Z is strategically positioned for growth, meeting the increasing global demand for transparency and sustainability in energy consumption.

name: Condens
businessDescription: Condens is 100% owned by its founders and no investors have a share in it. That means we have full control over where we go and can completely focus on creating value for customers. While we continue to strongly invest in the team and technology, we are operating profitably to remain independent and stay around for the long term. As a team we are organized to stay close to the people we build for. For example, everyone at Condens is responsible for support and it might well be the CTO or CPO answering if you reach out to us. We strive for minimum overhead and avoid management layers to make decisions and act on them quickly. This speeds us up in introducing improvements which our customers value.
tags: Computer, Consumer Research, Product Research, Software

name: Loewi
businessDescription: LOEWI empowers people to be the healthiest version of themselves by making personalized health transparent and accessible. LOEWI analyzes micro- and macronutrients through finger-prick blood tests, visualizes the results through the LOEWI platform and offers personalized diet recommendations and personalized supplements to match individual needs. Thereby LOEWI applies renowned methods of the sports medical examination center in Munich to provide a user-centric and end-to-end concept for its clients.

name: Breakthrough
businessDescription: Breakthrough is a digital health startup based in Berlin. We're a diverse team driven by a desire to use technology, data, and design to have a positive impact on the lives of people living with chronic disease. We build privacy-focused applications that empower people living with chronic disease to track their health, discover potential triggers, and meaningfully contribute to research. Our first product, 'Emilyn',​ became Google Play's #1 ranked app for Multiple Sclerosis within 8 months of launching. We're working with a leading research institution on a clinical study in MS. We also won the award for 'Outstanding Innovation in Digital Health' at London's CogX Awards 2019.

name: Innoport
businessDescription: Innoport is the venture capital unit of the Schulte Group (https://www.schultegroup.com/) that identifies investment opportunities in startups from the global maritime, logistics, and other related industries and equips entrepreneurs with smart capital. The Innoport team works globally to build up a diversified investment portfolio of innovative and high potential early-stage startups across Asia and Europe while supporting Schulte Group business units in their technological transformation. They work with founders from the discovery stage up to successful exit, promoting the portfolio companies to a wider network within the Schulte Group.
tags: Boating, Logistics, Marine Technology, Marine Transportation, Shipping

name: Syncier GmbH
businessDescription: We’re independent idea makers in the insurance world. At Syncier, we craft digital solutions to make businesses safer, faster, and more efficient. Uniquely positioned to optimize your operations, we combine the insurance excellence of Allianz, an established global player, with the agility of a startup company. From our SaaS philosophy to cutting-edge cloud technologies, we bring new impulses to a sector that’s had a late start to digital transformation race. As a trusted partner for innovative solutions, we’ll help reaping the benefits of early adoption in a way that’s discrete, flexible, and affordable.
tags: Cloud Management, Information Technology, Insurance, Software

name: Culcha
businessDescription: Culcha is a behaviour change engine in the business sector. We provide a tool to all company transformers that comprises a channel (apps), a method (EduChange) and content to keep executives (and their direct reports) always up to date. We do this with A) highly engaging tech, based on latest insights of neuroscience, psychology and instructional design 29% der Führungskräfte stehen unter hoher Belastung, 33% leiden unter starken Selbstzweifeln.* Aus Überforderung und Unsicherheit resultieren falsche Entscheidungen und schlechte Stimmung – das schwächt Unternehmen und kostet viel Geld.
tags: Corporate Training, E-Learning, Education, Information Technology

name: Simply Aloud Ltd
businessDescription:
Simply Aloud is a media company offering speaker-as-a-service solutions with real human voice.  
We create audio versions of news articles in English and in German for our publisher partners. 
The audio articles may either appear in the publisher websites or in our own website, www.bricking.news. Bricking News is the on-demand service for audio news to be listened on the go. With Bricking News, you can create your own tracklist of newspaper articles and listen to it in two touches.

name: alcemy
businessDescription: Concrete is the most widely used building material on our planet. The only thing mankind uses more of is water. With a wave of urban development coming in the next few decades, concrete is also a rapidly growing trillion-dollar market. However, cement and concrete production is responsible for 8% of the global CO2 emissions, making its growth a big cause for concern. Using alcemy's software, cement and concrete producers receive precise quality predictions already during production. Based on these prediction models, our AI identifies which production parameters need to be adjusted to mitigate the impact of fluctuations. Thus, the quality of cement and concrete can be optimized BEFORE delivery – for the first time in history.

name: WI Venture
businessDescription: Wi Venture's vision is to make our energy supply, mobility, agriculture and food sustainable. To do this, we support startups that share our vision. Together we drive the change that gives everyone access to sustainable basic services. On this basis, we harmonize growth and prosperity with a healthy ecosystem.

name: Lunu
businessDescription: Lunu creates an ecosystem that integrates the use of stablecoins into the real economy — in everyday life, everywhere.  Lunu introduces the mobile terminal and revolutionary processing service that allow customers to spend their cryptocurrencies immediately as local currency at the point of sale in retail transactions without expensive exchange commissions.

name: Logward
businessDescription: Logward is a logistics technology company run by supply chain experts and top rate developers. We offer supply chain management as a service and ensure end-to-end visibility as well as control over freight shipments through cloud based solutions. As a 4PL, Logward helps shippers manage FCL, LCL, air, and overland transports while reducing unplanned costs like detention & demurrage, improving invoice accuracy, monitoring allocations and capacity, and much, much, more. From your containers to our cloud, we foster a collaborative, self-starting, and open-minded atmosphere. With German and Indian roots in our DNA, we strive to build a diverse and competitive team. We offer flexible and family friendly benefits to provide our employees with the resources they need to succeed. We are always on the lookout for sharp talent, so drop us a message to learn more about Logward.

name: Enote
businessDescription: Enote is a music technology startup using artificial intelligence to bring the world’s sheet music into a fully digital format. The company’s iOS app gives musicians unlimited access to centuries of written music in a completely digital format that makes it easier to find, prepare and explore sheet music. Unlike today’s static paper and PDF standards, Enote’s native digital scores unlock powerful features that once seemed impossible. Discovering new works, highlighting parts, referencing multi-part scores, navigating between movements, printing custom copies and even changing keys are all just a few taps away, and the app is full of intuitive little features that make working with sheet music a more streamlined experience. Digitization is made possible by an advanced AI system that analyzes millions of static pages and critical findings to reconstruct a definitive digital version of each work. The Enote Library already contains thousands of scores, and dozens of new pieces are added to the library each week.

name: CheMondis GmbH
businessDescription: We believe that digital won’t stop at the door of the chemical Industry. That’s why we are building the online marketplace for Chemicals - for buyers. For suppliers. For good. CheMondis (www.chemondis.com) is the leading and fastest-growing B2B marketplace for chemicals in Europe. The marketplace connects verified buyers and suppliers from the chemical industry to facilitate digital trade of industrial chemicals. Today, more than 7,500 buyers and suppliers are already registered on CheMondis. The portfolio of >70,000 listed chemicals ranges from basic chemicals to specialties. Buyers profit from a precise product search by filtering the preferred incoterm, packaging type, or the delivery country. They can request multiple offers from different suppliers (distributors and manufacturers) in one single step to compare different offers for the best purchase decision. Buyers can negotiate long-term conditions to purchase products regularly or order immediately with a few clicks. Suppliers use CheMondis to broaden their international reach and acquire new customers with a high online visibility of their product portfolio. They can create their own Brandshop within the marketplace and use CheMondis as their online shop. Additionally, suppliers can reduce the order processing time by getting complete and real-time customer and order information directly into their ERP.

name: Ducktrain
businessDescription: We developed Ducktrain: A smart, electric and automated logistics vehicle system made for the urban and industrial last mile. Combining up to 5 single Ducks virtually into a platoon allows you to transport the equivalent payload of a conventional delivery truck. Ducktrain aims to replace bulky parcel delivery trucks in urban areas and has the perfect fit for inner city alleys. We are with you: from the distribution centre to the doorstep. No more damaged groceries! Your goods are safe and sound, because of the special spring-damper system integrated in our Ducks. The exchangeable shelving system for standardised boxes offers 360° accessibility for a more comfortable loading and unloading.
tags: Automotive, Autonomous Vehicles, Logistics, Robotics, Transportation

name: Umeleon
businessDescription: Founded 2018, Umeleon develops the multicolor Extruder (MCE). The machine itself is an external add on for FMD desktop 3D-printers and colors a single monochrome plastic string (or filament) according to the user color needs. The coloring process takes place before the actual printing process. Furthermore, the MCE is compatible with every single 3D-printers. Another advantage is that the color information can be saved directly in existing software so that users can keep using their favorite software. Beneficial’s of this technology are specially engineers, designers, artist, the plastic industry but also end users will get a direct access their customized filaments in small batches.

name: Becanex
businessDescription: Becanex is bringing cannabinoid extraction to a higher level in Europe. We let the science speak for itself. Our patented extraction method can extract a wide range of cannabinoids in just one step; no further processing is required. Thsi preocedure is really mild so that the extract contains a large range of cannabinoids and terpenes. It is effective, produced under the highest German Food Safety standards, and has a subtle taste. We supply and advise businesses who are looking to white label, private label or to infuse high-quality natural hemp flavouring preparation in (food)products.

name: Citkar
businessDescription: For a long time, we have been concerned about the environment and climate, and not least the question of what kind of world we and our children want to live in. Mobility is changing. And we are all right in the middle of it. At citkar, we are working on environmentally friendly transport and mobility solutions that pay attention to the future and improve city life. A kettcar with a roof and a transport box? What started as a prototype in 2013 is now the basis of a new mobility. With the citkar, a symbiosis of e-bike and commercial vehicle, we are rethinking last-mile transport and implementing modern standards in a practical way. We are constantly working on further development, also thanks to feedback from our customers. citkar has created a product that adapts to and solves the logistical challenges of many industries. For the Europe-wide distribution of citkar, we work together with selected dealers who have special expertise in the field of cargo e-bikes and have their own workshop. This has many advantages for you: our Premium Partners are not only responsible for sales and regular maintenance, but also provide individual advice on possible subsidies in each federal state. Furthermore, contact persons are available on site to provide unbureaucratic help with questions about the citkar and are quickly and reliably on hand for minor or major repairs.

name: E-LLOYD
businessDescription: The Butterfly is a solar-proa yacht, an asymmetric double-hull vessel. The proa type of a sailboat has its origins in the South Pacific and it was primarily used by Austronesian people for fishing and carrying cargo across vast distances of water. With the idea of sailing the whole day without charging we implemented a very low water resistance and incorporated a large solar roof on our proa. As a result, The Butterfly can run in solar-mode for 14 hours (Central-European summer conditions) with a speed of 5 knots. Neither direct nor indirect emissions are attached to The Butterfly.

name: CollarCare
businessDescription: The young startup CollarCare from the Founders Foundation Bielefeld has set itself the goal of bringing dogs into the age of the Internet of Things with a digitized identity. Building a digital coach for dog owners that helps dog owners to keep track of their dogs exercise, nutrition and behavior.

name: LiSA
businessDescription: LiSA is on a mission to bring the most joyful and seamless live shopping experiences to online shops across the globe. We believe that we are on the cusp of a new era of e-commerce. One where social interaction, entertainment, and product discovery will blend into one seamless experience. Sophie and Philippe, our founders, have extensive experience in retail innovation and retail tech - you might say they live and breathe awesome retail customer experiences. Surprised by the lack of companies focusing on helping retailers to enable such joyful experiences in their own digital environments, they founded LiSA. Together with Michael, their Tech Lead, who has years of experience both in e-commerce building and conversational commerce, they are proud to develop live entertainmerce products today with the specific needs of different e-retailers in mind from the outset.  This passion and obsession with e-retail, and designing the perfect products for it, is what sets us apart from our competition. When onboarding and working with LiSA to enable your own  liive shopping channel, you will feel that difference EVERY. SINGLE. DAY.
tags: E-Commerce, E-Commerce Platforms, Marketplace, Retail, Retail Technology, Shopping, Social Shopping, Software, Video Streaming

name: Horizons
businessDescription: Horizons is proud to offer our clients the highest standards of support and expertise, across the lifecycle of their global expansion. Through our Global PEO and customized solutions that encompass international payroll processing, recruitment, global mobility, and legal compliance, we enable businesses to expand with confidence and reach their full potential. When you partner with Horizons, you’re provided with a single point of contact that allows your business to quickly build a successful presence in your new market. We ensure all employment documentation is drafted in accordance with local regulations and that your business maintains full legal and tax compliance. You also benefit from our intuitive cloud platform that streamlines your company’s payroll, expenses, and reimbursements.

name: mybacs
businessDescription:
mybacs is a Swiss biotechnology company with offices in Zug and Munich. The company‘s goal is to revo-
lutionise the healthcare market around the human microbiome and thus make a profound contribution to the health and daily wellbeing of its customers. Accordingly, mybacs has specialised in the development of
innovative and high-dose synbiotic dietary supplements. These are aligned by their unique formulation of
specifically selected bacteria cultures (probiotics), prebiotics, as well as minerals and vitamins tailored to
the individual needs and ranges of application of its customers.

name: Loewenkind
businessDescription: Löwenkind is a start-up founded in 2018 with the aim of supporting the health of babies and children with natural herbs. Our main product are our various herbal mixtures, which can unfold their beneficial effect as lion pads for typical children's ailments. These can easily be placed in the integrated pocket of our bodies and triangular scarves. Our goal is for our children to grow up as naturally as possible and to develop a healthy immune system.

name: DatenBerg GmbH
businessDescription: We are a young startup based in Karlsruhe, Germany focused on the evaluation of measurement data in industrial production. Due to digitalization, data collection in manufacturing increases rapidly. Our aim is to make better use of accrued measurement data. Complex process steps with an enormous volume of data allow for new possibilities in analysis. The comprehensive study of impacts of tolerances, systematic mistakes and correlations between measurements is no longer possible in a manual way. Using our innovative algorithms we are able to identify hidden connections between process steps. These algorithms work on real measurement data without bias. We derive recommendations for action for different problems and supplement the expert knowledge of staff. Consequently we reach a comprehensive understanding of the interactions between complex process steps and a sustainable improvement of the production process. As an innovation in data mining we consider the whole production process yielding a solution which is comprehensible to people. Our solutions can be adapted for problem statements in different sectors in industry.

name: Loco Adventures
businessDescription: Loco empowers creatives to easily build location based AR games with no coding and sell them to players today.  We are building a community of AR game creation pioneers ready for the next evolution in gaming.
tags: Augmented Reality, Gamification, Internet, Location Based Services

name: Capmatcher
businessDescription: Capmatcher provides crypto/web 3.0 services for startups and investors to help find their perfect match by utilizing latest technology and digitalize the process of acquiring the right project and/or capital to get/deploy funding/capital. Currently running and matching in Germany, Austria and Switzerland, we tackle US and UK in Q2. Find out more at capmatcher.com or capmatcher.com/en.

name: Nocturne
businessDescription: Nocturne is the first product to offer OCT analyses specifically for neurological applications based on proprietary technology. The service works on data from standard optical coherence tomography (OCT), which is used in ophthalmology. In combination, diagnostic, treatment decisions, disease monitoring can be made directly in the neurologic practice. This speeds up treatment decisions in relevant neurologic disorders, in which early treatment responses are greatly beneficial to the clinical outcome.
tags: Biotechnology, Health Care, Health Diagnostics, Life Science, Software, Wellness

name: tradingtwins
businessDescription: The data-driven B2B matchmaking platform from tradingtwins brings together small companies that want to make a complex purchase and the right product providers. Tailored to their specific needs, interested parties for complex and high-priced capital goods receive comparable offers from different providers with transparent conditions free of charge in just a few minutes. In turn, tradingtwins offers providers of advice-intensive B2B products direct access to qualified prospective buyers from their target customer segment.
tags: B2B, Internet, Lead Generation, Lead Management, Marketplace, Software

name: Osteolabs
businessDescription: osteolabs GmbH is a spin-off from the GEOMAR Helmholtz Center for Ocean Research Kiel. This is where the idea was born to use trace elements in the human body to detect osteoporosis at an early stage, which was previously impossible, and to make the success of therapy measurable. Marine researchers from the GEOMAR Helmholtz Center for Ocean Research Kiel, together with physicians from the University Medical Center Schleswig-Holstein (UKSH), have developed an early detection method for osteoporosis based on an analysis method derived from marine research, which allows an early diagnosis that is much faster than conventional methods . "We use an analysis method for calcium isotopes that only requires urine or blood for the examination," says Prof. Dr. Anton Eisenhauer, Marine researcher and scientific director of osteolabs GmbH. The approach met with great interest from the start and was supported by several public and private institutions.

name: FittiCoin
businessDescription: FittiCoin aims to enhance peoples lifestyles through encouraging them to move, we did this by creating our app which is available in Google Play and the App Store. Our app will count your steps and convert those steps to coins, and with those coins users can redeem them with valuable free and discounted products! Suppliers who are interested to join please email us at [email protected] to give a full brief on how we can cooperate.

name: COMAN Software
businessDescription: COMAN project management software connects clients, executives, project managers, employees and suppliers. We synchronize all the parties involved in your project in real-time and provide them with a common perspective. Our visualizations and individual approaches create interlinking overviews, bringing control and cost savings for your project. We have more than 10 years of experience, 6,000+ users and 1,200-plus completed large projects for more than 70 global players. COMAN‘s flexible approach makes it suitable in all kinds of collaborative fields. Designed to meet the needs of industrial giants in mechanical and plant engineering, our solution is also used and trusted in the construction and remodeling industries as well as ramp-up management.

name: HandEX
businessDescription: HandEX is revolutionising the export finance market by using leading technology, to revamp processes and make it as easy as possible for exporters and importers alike to access the financing they need for international trade.  The platform provides German SMEs with export credit up to EUR 5 M ("Small-Tickets"​) with a particular focus on exports to emerging markets. HandEX facilitates and integrates the issuance of export loans and export insurance covers, including guarantees issued by the German government, for which the export credit agency Euler Hermes is mandated.

name: RideBee
businessDescription: A central component of the RideBee application is the calendar view, which allows users to get a structured overview of their daily mobility options. Trips can be searched for and offered spontaneously via the calendar, but recurring trips can also be planned and implemented. This particularly increases the long-term benefits. To increase the matching rate, RideBee allows registered users to switch between different roles for each ride. The hybrid driver role, which also connects drivers with each other, supports this. Flexible drivers confirm their requests and RideBee calculates the ideal route. The fixed route function also allows drivers to specify specific boarding options and automatically confirm requests. Since the daily commuting habits are usually very similar, there is the function to realize inquiries and bookings directly for several days. The system checks availability and supports recurring trips of up to two weeks in one request. RideBee calculates a fair cost compensation and enables contactless, digital payments within the carpool. RideBee does not charge any fees and reduces transaction costs through virtual credit. In order to ensure that it remains on the platform and to ensure smooth communication, the RideBee chat supports important functions: Group chats, conversations before request confirmation, sending photos, replying to messages, deleting messages, delivery and read receipts.RideBee supports users in planning, organizing and realizing trips. Interactive notifications and navigation based on live locations are particularly helpful here.
tags: Association, Human Resources, Information Technology, Internet, Railroad, Transportation

name: HeartSpace
businessDescription: HeartSpace was founded with the vision to build a global infrastructure that supports a new way of living. Where a lifestyle of ‘live anywhere, work anywhere’ is accessible to everyone, and no longer a luxury reserved for creatives, coders and digital nomads. With one membership, we provide access to a suite of spaces and on-demand services that gives you freedom and flexibility to design the lifestyle that is unique as you, your team and businesses are. Today our Berlin Campus provides a homebase to a diverse community of passionate freelancers, founding teams and late-stage startups who enjoy the opportunity to connect, collaborate and grow together.

name: Lucky Plant
businessDescription: Lucky Plant produces plant strengtheners, biologicals and sustainable fertilizers for the home and garden, professional sports turf care and horticulture. We have put the experience of many years of use in agricultural cultivation into our products. All Lucky Plant products follow the motto natural solutions for the future. Our team consists of true plant enthusiasts. With passion and expertise, we produce, optimize and sell the product we all stand behind: Lucky Plant. It is particularly important to us to combine the right know-how and expertise in the team. That is why our team consists largely of gardeners and agronomists. They provide detailed insights into lawn and plant care and much more. We also have experienced colleagues with us for filling, packaging and shipping.

name: MATCHBASE
businessDescription: Matchbase set out to rebuild how we play football together. But sometimes despite the best team, community, partners and advisors the timing is not right. We made it through many waves, lockdowns and re-openings. Sadly the last wave was one too many. We are proud of the countless friendships that started with us on the pitch and all the moments we had together. We want to thank Matchbase Family, our community, our investors and partners. At Matchbase we are building the world’s first on-demand football club. Our members can play football when they want together with great people on the most beautiful venues. We believe that football should be easy. That’s why our mission is to make football as easy as going to the gym.

name: XO Life
businessDescription: We are a young and dynamic eHealth company setting a new standard patient data collection through scientifically based questionnaires across all treatments and medications. XO Life helps the pharmaceutical industry to better understand its patients. Our goal is to make digital treatment monitoring and patient feedback the gold standard in R&D, marketing and sales, while ensuring the highest data protection and security standards.

name: MetisMotion
businessDescription: We are a Munich based tech Start-up, founded in 2018. Our core competence covers ultra-dynamic and space/ weight saving linear force actuators. The MetisMotion technology platform combines decades of experience in actuator development for challenging automotive and industrial applications. We are further addressing diverse use-cases, spanning from aviation to robotics. Compared to conventional linear actuators, our actuators are up to 80% smaller and lighter and respond up to 10x faster. In addition, they bring inherent sensing capabilities, which would not be readily available in electromagnetic, hydraulic or pneumatic solutions. This allows our solutions to drive the electrification of hydraulics for the Industry 4.0 revolution.
tags: Computer, Consumer Electronics, Information Technology, Manufacturing

name: WechselGott
businessDescription: Always in the best energy, insurance or household contract without any effort? Do you always have an eye on your accounts and finances? In contrast to classic comparison portals, WechselGott not only helps you with the first change of contract, but also takes over the ongoing optimization of your energy, insurance and household contracts. We always monitor the best offers, switch to the best tariff for you every year and take over the support. 100% green electricity or would you prefer the cheapest contract? Our tariffs are based on your preferences. In this way, you retain control of your tariffs and can view your contract in the app at any time. Our unique selling point is the simple process. Specify an account, issue a mandate and we can analyze and optimize your contracts. We are a venture of the largest future research institute in Europe, 2bAhead, and the Volksbank Mittweida eG. Stay tuned for more!

name: Utry.me
businessDescription: Utry.Me is the first online supermarket without prices, where our members can try any product for free. Our product range is constantly being expanded, so there is always something to discover. Our members can regularly choose from the entire range and can fill their shopping cart. You only have to pay for service and shipping costs. Thats Utry.Me - Your exclusive community for product trends and innovations.

businessDescription: corrux is now proudly part of Gropyus. corrux is an industrial data analytics company, developing solutions that leverage big data to prioritize efficiency and equipment maintenance for the heavy civil industry. Our solutions achieve guaranteed outcomes and maximize uptime through predictive and condition-based monitoring.

name: Plan4 Software
businessDescription: PLAN4 Software GmbH is a company from Freiburg that develops solutions for the construction industry. The software PLAN4-GebäudeCheck - for the assessment of the structural condition replaces notebooks, pencils and cameras. With the project planning tool PLAN4-tick@time, you can visualize your own standard processes and thus efficiently organize the planning and construction of your projects. In workshops, experienced coaches from the industry will show you how you can optimize your work processes and thus gain more time for your core competencies.

name: Kraftling
businessDescription: WE ARE KRAFTLING With the aim of inspiring people to live an active and healthy life, we bring innovative and functional products into the world. Fresh snacks and drinks ready-to-consume for a more conscious diet. Having become known with the hottest ginger shot on the market, we now want to conquer the whole of Germany with our fresh and healthy products. Started in a shared kitchen in 2018, you can now taste our products throughout Germany.
