name: insha
businessDescription: An innovative digital account. Secure, simple and transparent. Manage your finances sustainably and ethically. Because your money can do so much more. getinsha is a FinTech-Startup based in Berlin and offers an innovative, fully digital & ethical account based on principles. With a range of innovative products in our app, getinsha is for everyone who cares about what is done with their money. As a digital financial service based on our 13 principles, we offer tools to save and grow your money.

name: Farmlyplace
businessDescription:
Developer of a modular farm system closed-loop hydroponic. Farmlyplace stands for conceptual design, planning, construction, marketing, sales and the operation of modular farm systems as well as the trade of produce coming out of these farms.

- Development of management- and controller systems for farm operations (smart farming). 
- Operation of the online marketing platform for locally produced products. 
- Providing a quality management solution for the farm system customers.

- Farmlyplace will not only install its hydroponic farm on site, but staff a designated team of farmers to operate, monitor, and maintain the farm completely. The service includes the consumables, seedlings and nutrients to run a hydroponic farm.

Farmlyplace Services can immediately integrate with any foodservice operation or any supply chain for produce. Clients choose what to grow, and how that produce will be distributed within their organization.

name: bezahl
businessDescription: The cologne-based FinTech startup NX Technologies GmbH is the #1 provider of innovative and digital payment management. Our technology-driven platform bezahl.de automates, digitises and simplifies the entire receivable lifecycle from payment request to 100% reconciliation and booking in the accounting system. The holistic approach enables companies to focus on their core business and provide their customers with a modern and convenient payment experience at the same time.

name: Vay
businessDescription: Vay is a Berlin-based deep technology company that is on track to launch the first driverless, safety-certified, commercial fleet on European public streets. Starting this year. Unique about Vay is its teledrive-first approach to autonomous driving. Vay’s fleet of vehicles is already operating with safety drivers across all of Berlin today. Recent technological and regulatory advancements will allow Vay to remove the safety driver from its vehicles this year.  Thomas von der Ohe, Fabrizio Scelsi, and Bogdan Djukic founded Vay in September 2018. Their team combines the best of two worlds - software and product experience from Silicon Valley and automotive hardware & safety engineering from Europe. Vay’s team members have previously worked at companies such as Tesla, Google, Waymo, Zoox, Byton, Argo, Amazon, Uber as well as Audi, BMW, and Daimler, and have founded various companies before. Vay has raised over 100m USD from leading VCs such as Coatue, Kinnevik, Eurazeo, Atomico, Creandum, LaFamiglia, System.One, Visionaries Club, Signals as well as business angels Patrick Pichette (Partner at Inovia Capital, chairman of the board at Twitter, former global CFO at Google), Cristina Stenbeck (Board member of Spotify, chairman of the board at Zalando), Qasar Younis (co-founder and CEO of Applied Intuition, former COO and Partner of Y Combinator), and Formula 1 champion Nico Rosberg. The company has offices in Berlin, Germany, and Portland.

name: Mindpeak
businessDescription:
MindPeak's mission is to make microscopical analysis accessible for everyone in the world. We automate visual processes in the clinical laboratory with Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning. 
Our partners are leading pathology and university labs. Our team consists of world-class industry experts in machine learning and company building. The demand for medical image analysis is growing rapidly but the number of cancer experts remains the same - this results in growing workloads per specialist. We help cancer experts meet this challenge. We build automation tools for visual diagnosis using state-of-the-art artificial intelligence and deep learning. Our tools assist cancer experts in providing reliable and reproducible diagnoses. This frees specialists from tedious, repetitive tasks such as quantification of cells or biomarkers and allows them to focus on tasks where their human expertise is indispensable.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Health Care, Machine Learning, Software

name: Makersite GmbH
businessDescription:
We are a software and data technology company, as well as a pioneer in Product Intelligence. 
Our award-winning platform is the only cloud-based platform combining data aggregation and live applications for agile product life cycle management. We help manufacturing companies manage product data across their business and support decision-making through integrated views of a product’s financial and non-financial performance metrics. Makersite uses artificial intelligence and graph technology to build digital twins of manufactured products. This way, engineers and product teams can develop more compliant, safer, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly products faster, and get results up to 40x faster than traditional methods.
tags: Analytics, Big Data, Business Intelligence, Compliance, Data Visualization, Machine Learning, Procurement, Product Management, Software, Supply Chain Management

name: ZkSystems
businessDescription: ZkSystems provides software for Industry 4.0 champions. Our software is used by industrial manufacturing leaders like Siemens. We are an official partner of Oracle, Sopra Steria, and SAP.iO.
tags: Blockchain, Industrial Automation, Industrial Manufacturing, Information Technology, Internet of Things

name: Nostos Genomics
businessDescription: At Nostos Genomics, we partner with genetic testing labs to give more people with genetic diseases a fast and clear diagnosis. Over 300 million people live with a rare genetic disease and for most, the journey from the first symptoms to a diagnosis takes more than 5 years. Even after that, diagnoses are often incorrect, and many people end up not being diagnosed at all. Now, new technology is allowing millions to benefit from genetic testing for diagnosis, while at the same time targeted therapies for previously untreatable disorders are being developed. But the last step in genetic testing – interpreting mutations – remains laborious and costly. It can take a genetic testing lab weeks to interpret data from a single patient. Because of limited understanding of the consequences of mutations, the test results are often inconclusive and leave 70% of people undergoing a genetic test without diagnosis.

name: Kwara
businessDescription: Kwara is a Nairobi and Berlin based startup turning credit unions into modern digital banks. Founded in 2018 in Kenya, our mission is to enable the world's 3 billion underserved to become financially healthy. Backed by Finparx, Google, Norrsken, FINCA Ventures, Catalyst Fund and Kepple, today Kwara serves over 50,000 end clients. Kwara offers a secure, simple and affordable digital banking platform for SACCOs and their members, who are often excluded by traditional banks.

name: Checkly
businessDescription:
Checkly is the active monitoring platform for developers: programmable, flexible, and loving JavaScript. 
Checkly allows cross-functional DevOps and engineering teams to run deep API monitoring and Javascript-powered flexible frontend tests across 20+ global data center locations. With Checkly, developers can identify bugs early and reduce downtime in production. Checkly is easy to get started with and seamlessly integrates into the modern development workflow.  Until today we executed more than 1 Billion API and browser checks for over 300 customers. Among them are modern technology firms such as Vercel, 1Password, Scale, Humio, and large organizations like Europe’s largest retailer.

name: MushLabs
businessDescription: Mushlabs is a technology-driven company that produces food from edible mushroom mycelia. Our fermentation platform allows us to unlock the potential of an overlooked kingdom of life - fungi - as a foodsource. Mushlabs is dedicated to building solutions that change the way we consume food, by producing food that is good to our senses, our bodies and our planet. Our mission is to change the way people eat by producing tastier, healthier and more sustainable foods. We believe in the power of biotechnology in disrupting the food industry and we want to bring about a meaningful and lasting change to our food system through our fermentation platform.
tags: Biotechnology, Food and Beverage, Health Care

name: Garden
businessDescription: Garden is a development automation platform for Kubernetes and cloud native applications.  The widespread adoption of cloud native technologies such as containers and Kubernetes has made it easier than ever to operate and scale applications. But important developer workflows have been overlooked or neglected along the way. Many developers find that they’re now less productive than they were before the cloud native era. Developers working on distributed microservices applications have been left without an efficient way to build, run tests, and iterate in a production-like environment. Garden makes it easy to spin up production-like environments for development, testing, and CI, and to use the same workflows for every stage of the process. With Garden, developers get fast feedback exactly when they need it, and DevOps teams are no longer bogged down with provisioning and managing ad hoc environments.
tags: Cloud Data Services, Cloud Management, Information Technology, Internet, IT Infrastructure, Mobile, Software

name: Legendairy Foods
businessDescription: We're Formo, the future dairy from Berlin. We're here to bring the future of food to life through science, cheese, and conversation. We’re here because we truly believe that science, technology and food belong together like cheese and crackers. We know that by bringing them together we can make real cheese with none of the downsides.
tags: Biotechnology, Food and Beverage, Life Science

name: Feather
businessDescription: Whether it’s the advice you get through our team or our recommendation tool, we don’t just tell you what you should do, we show you how your lifestyle affects your options so you can make informed decisions by yourself. Insurance plans are complicated, but they don't have to be. We've built our products and recommendation tool to let you know which insurances you need and which ones simply don't make sense. Let's be honest. No one wants to think about insurance. We're here to make insurance easy to understand and simple to register. Our goal is to create plans that cover your lifestyle with a simple, digital claims process and customer service without any extra fees.

name: BOCAhealth
businessDescription:
Since BOCAhealth’s main usage will be in homecare the reimbursement will take place from the health insurances or national healthcare systems. 

The use of BOCAhealth will be prescribed to the patient from a doctor (hospital or outpatient clinic), the instrument will be picked up in pharmacies or delivered by homecare providers. The setup of the system can be done directly from the patient at home, and he is ready to start with daily measurements. 

 The instrument and each measurement will be reimbursed from the insurance or the healthcare system.
 Reimbursement codes for this kind of product are partly already existing and reimbursed by the National Healthcare System.

name: Linguidoor Translation Services
businessDescription:
Linguidoor provides you with robust and automates translation solutions helping you in transmuting your business into global revenue and global customer engagement. With our professional translation and localization services, we translate all your professional and personal needs with a positive local and global impact. We can help you with following Services:
- Document Translation
- Website Translation and Localization
- Software and App Translation and Localization
- Videos and Audio Transcription
- Content for Website, Social Media, and SEO

name: Curiosity
businessDescription: Curiosity gives busy professionals one place to search all their files and apps.
longBusinessDescription:
Professionals struggle with too much information in too many places. That leads to a frustrating waste of time as they search for files and emails.
Curiosity is a modern search engine that gives people one place to search all their folders and applications, including network drives and cloud applications (O365, Google Workspace, Slack, etc.). That helps businesses save 4h per employee per week and improve knowledge sharing.
Curiosity is available as a free desktop app and enterprise search. It's built for blazing-fast search and on-premise data security (no data is sent to the cloud).
Curiosity was founded in 2018 by industry veterans Leon Zucchini and Rafael Oliveira.

name: Curiosity
businessDescription: Curiosity gives people and teams one search for all their files and cloud apps. That helps them save time and get more done.
longBusinessDescription:
Curiosity is a desktop search application. It gives people and teams one place to search all their local files and cloud apps (Gmail, Notion, Slack, ...). 
We all have too many files in too many places. Curiosity helps you avoid frustrating searches so you can focus and get more done.
Curiosity doesn't stop at file names: It searches deep in the contents of documents and emails. It also acts as a launcher (start programs, manage clipboard, ...) and a contacts manager. You install it locally on Mac/Windows and it keeps all your data safe on your computer.
Curiosity is available for individuals and teams, and we offer custom (on-prem) solutions for enterprise customers. It's used by thousands of people as well as large organizations like Airbus and Telefonica.

name: Hilfy
businessDescription: Broken smartphone or laptop? Book a repair service in two minutes
longBusinessDescription: Hilfy is a highly innovative help-tech platform that extends the life span of technology. We deliver transparency, streamline the processes, and digitalise a highly fragmented consumer electronics repair market.

name: TRGTR.IO
businessDescription: TRGTR.IO (pronounced 'targeter'?) is a sales prospecting tool that curates and distributes up-to-date contact details of professionals. It helps B2B/B2C marketing and sales professionals to find the right business prospects based on Professional Email Addresses, Professions, Industry, or Locations.
longBusinessDescription:
TRGTR.IO is a sales prospecting tool that helps you to find contact details (emails, phone numbers, social networks, job titles) of more than 140 million professionals, easily and accurately at an affordable cost.
Using state of the art technology to elicit and organize contact details of professionals from publicly available sources and combining that with some services from third-party service providers, TRGTR offers an economical and accurate service that helps your business to find right professional contacts- even freely if your monthly requirements are not substantial. You can search your prospects on the basis of the web domain, professions, industry, and location. TRGTR.IO allows you to make specific lists of your potential prospects which can be downloaded as .csv files or integrated to a CRM platform (It supports Salesforce, Hubspot, Pipedrive, Insightly, and ZOHO).
TRGTR Chrome Extension/add-on allows you to add the email addresses to your List directly from your browser. When you visit a website where you have a potential prospect, click on the TRGTR.IO add-on that will immediately show you a set of prospects from that organization. You can easily add these contacts in a single click.
TRGTR.IO does not have any personal or behavioral data and deals only with professional data. For the sake of transparency, in the search results, it provides the public sources from where we availed the contact details.

name: kiwiHR
businessDescription: Simply efficient HR Software. kiwiHR helps small and medium sized businesses manage employees' records, time off, working hours and more. Designed to be as intuitive and user- friendly as possible, kiwiHR will take off the workload off your shoulders. Cloud-based, does not required any downloads or complicated setups.
longBusinessDescription:
Simply efficient software. kiwiHR helps small and medium sized businesses manage employees' records, time off, working hours and more. Designed to be as intuitive and user- friendly as possible, kiwiHR will take off the workload off your shoulders. Cloud-based, does not required any downloads or complicated setups.
kiwiHR allows you to manage time off with a plan. Start planning ahead for the holidays with smart time off management that shortens processes and saves you time and money.
You will love being able to approve or decline requests with just a single click and your employees will love being able to see how many days they have taken off and how many are left without having to knock at your door.
kiwiHR will also alert you if a time off request overlaps with another employee's request to help you plan ahead better.
Dashboard with overall company's time off and remaining leave balances.
Customize types of leave, annual leave expiration dates and restrict time off on certain dates.
Moreover, with a company overview, tell your employees everything they need to know about your company. This will be the place to share documents, mission statement, inventory available in the office and which resources they can work with to enhance collaboration and communication among teams.
kiwiHR will track time for you. Simply create working schedules to enable automatic working hours and overtime calculations.
Work clutter-free with efficient employee records management and save your employee records in the cloud and find everything you need in one place. By giving your employees access to their own personal information, they will be able to update important information for you and get the workload off your shoulders. If you wish to have several admins, you can also assign level access to different employees to manage and view employee documents.
kiwiHR is also equipped with an integrated smart calendar which includes public holidays per region. Simply add your company's locations and it will also take them into consideration for time off calculations.

name: Nesty Flat mate
businessDescription: Nesty Flat mate is a portal which help people to find better fellow in shared accomodations. With the exclusive feature  to see directly in the listing the linked profile of the people already living in.
longBusinessDescription: In big cities like Berlin, find accomodation is stressful and time consuming. Taking appointment and visiting places is time consuming, for the renter and the landlord, so is now the time to increase transparecy with a simple feature. In this portal is possible to see directly in the listing not just the characteristics of the apartment but also the profile of the people already living inside. The market of flatsharing in Germany moves millions of capitals, soon it will be present in the mayor cities in Europe. Best 10 competitors raise 40 m. Just in Germani 1,5 of flat are shared. Here is potential to expand. We are working in real estate, surely one of the the top 5 sector will grow in next three ten years

name: Cangler Analytics
businessDescription:
Cangler automates and democratises data analytics, making it simple, easy, and accessible for everyone. 

We help organisations tap into the gold mine of data they hold and unlock the business insights within their data so they can build better products and services, make smarter business decisions, and compete in their respective industries.

Cangler is developing an end-to-end platform to help simplify, automate, manage, and democratise enterprise data analytics with artificial intelligence generated code, self-healing technology, and an in-built app store ecosystem, enabling enterprise data analytics to be delivered faster than ever and at a much lower cost without needing to build or manage any complicated analytics products or technologies.

name: Layer7 AI
businessDescription: Layer7 AI is a leader in the field of artificial intelligence. We work with distinguished AI researchers from the Max Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems and the University of Tübingen, who are experts in many areas of machine learning. Together with our clients, we leverage this unique pool of expertise to identify opportunities and implement AI solutions that drive our clients' future business success and impact society as a whole.

name: Black Pearl Digital
businessDescription: The Black Pearl Digital AG is a publicly-quoted company with focus on blockchain technology related software development and consulting. Additionally the Black Pearl Digital AG functions as consulting and financing company for high-growth enterprises in an early stage of its corporate development cycle.

name: gBridge.io
businessDescription:
gBridge.io is a service that allows to control any (yes - really any) device with voice assistants like Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa.
Now, own smart home applications (like Home Assistant, NodeRED, Domoticz and others) can be integrated easily.

gBridge wraps around the proprietary APIs of the manufacturers of the smart home speakers, while it provides an unified, open and well documented interface (MQTT) that might be used in combination with own devices.
tags: voice assistants, smart home, voice control

name: coin.ink
businessDescription: Free cryptocurrency tax tool and portfolio manager.
longBusinessDescription: Free cryptocurrency tax tool and portfolio manager.

name: aassio
businessDescription: aassio is a platform based on blockchain technology where people can get easy access to invest, hold, buy or sell real estate with other crypto currencies. It is low-cost and people can benefit from the secure asset class real estate with small capital in token form.
longBusinessDescription:
We want to create a better life with real estate.
aassio is a platform based on blockchain technology where people can get easy access to invest, hold, buy or sell real estate with other crypto currencies. It is low-cost and people can benefit from the secure asset class real estate with small capital in token form.
We strongly believe that the blockchain will fundamentally change the way people own and trade real estate. In the future, everyone could be an owner of real estate, everyone could benefit from investing, holding and trading real estate in token form.
The ancient Chinese characters ?? means assistance from both left and right sides.
aassio = assistance to access

name: Spanflug Technologies
businessDescription: Spanflug is an online manufacturer offering instant pricing for custom CNC machined parts based on an CAD file.
longBusinessDescription: Spanflug is an online manufacturer offering instant pricing for custom CNC machined parts based on an CAD file. The time from the inquiry to the customer order is reduced from several days to one minute. This does not only enable our customers to make their purchasing as fast and efficient as possible, it also reduces the sales effort of our manufacturing partners to a minimum. The offer includes CNC turning and milling. The goal of the company, which was founded in January 2018, is to make the often time-consuming and resource-intensive bidding process for CNC turned and milled parts as quick and easy as possible for both customers and suppliers, and to advance the digitization of the manufacturing industry in the field of CNC turning and milling. Spanflug is a spin-off from the Institute for Machine Tools and Industrial Management (iwb) of the Technical University of Munich (TUM).

name: LoadFox
businessDescription: Munich-based start-up LoadFox, ridesharing for freight, develops digital solutions for the logistics industry. Since its founding in 2016, with MAN Truck & Bus and the Boston Consulting Group as founding partners, LoadFox has been tackling a well-known problem: Unused truck capacities. In mathematical terms, around 40 percent of the available freight space on European motorways is unused - the trucks are driving air. LoadFox offers its users the possibility to share freight and loading capacities via a platform and thus to meet the shortage of loading capacity and the shortage of drivers. The company is thus bringing sharing economy to the logistics industry.

name: Storybacker
businessDescription: We connect social media influencers with followers and businesses
longBusinessDescription: Storybacker is the first media discovery network which allows you to search for irresistible social media content, communicate with the top social media influencers and organize promotional campaigns for your service, business or startup. By using a special secret sauce, Storybacker brings traditional advertising and content discovery to the new level!

name: Neohelden
businessDescription:
Meet Neo, your digital KI-assistant for business. Neo is an AI-assistant for business, powered by Neohelden's Enterprise Assistant Platform. Learn how to build custom use-cases and understand, how Neo works.
Our Neo Enterprise Assistant Platform contains all the components, that, when used together, enable you to (a) build and configure your assistant, and (b) actually use your AI-assistant at work. With this platform you can essentially build any use-case you can think of.
tags: AI, future of work, Enterprise Assistant
longBusinessDescription:
Work is really complex due to the variety of software we use. If you look at software and machines today, youll realise that they work perfectly fine as long as theyre judged individually. However, if you think of each tool you use as an instrument, and would then listen to all the instruments play simultaneously, youd hear gibberish  and thats exactly what it feels like, if you work with a diverse set of software-systems and tools: Instead of focussing on meaningful work, you have to act as a director of your software-orchestra. So, managing a diverse set of software-systems and machines is a major challenge for employees: Its increasingly difficult to get actual work done instead of reading inboxes and yet another manual. We dont always know how to use the app that, but we also dont want to bother a specialist to again pull our budget-data from SAP. Thats why we built a tool that answers our questions in an easy way: the digital assistant Neo.
Neo is an AI-based virtual assistant platform that integrates into your tool-set and immediately starts aggregating and summarising information from your tools. And voila, your calendar, to-do-lists and inboxes are in sync, meetings are being prepared and scheduled automatically, and the latest report is just a question away.
From a technical point of view, Neo is cross-platform and cross-device, which allows our customers to use Neo on their phones (Android and iOS) and also on their desktop-PCs (Windows and Mac OS). This also enables Neo to deliver and understand information in the right context, and to bridge the gap between smartphones and PCs (e.g. receiving a command on mobile phone to open an Excel-file on desktop).
With Neo, everybody can benefit from a personal assistant. Neos usability across devices is underpinned by using a conversational interface (a.k.a. chatbots), whereby content becomes the visual (or auditive) medium itself and interactions with Neo actually feel like real conversations you could have had with a human-assistant. With our workflow-automation-system, we can automate (and semi-automate) a lot of routine-tasks (such as creating new listings, editing listings, review-processes, expose-creation) and integrate into various b2b-systems (such as SAP, Oracle, onOffice). We have a natural language understanding and intent-recognition algorithm, that can also run on your own servers (so no connection to an external cloud is needed). We are able to integrate systems using 18 different programming languages.

name: fulfin
businessDescription: Warehouse financing for online sellers
longBusinessDescription:
The fintech company fulfin from Munich is a pioneer in the field of Amazon warehouse financing. fulfin's innovative fulfilment loan is a type of purchase financing that enables merchants to use their inventory as collateral for growth financing. This enables online sellers to significantly improve their liquidity.
Ebay, Shopify, Shopware, Magento sellers etc. can also apply for product financing at fulfin.
The fulfin team consists of experienced experts with years of experience in e-commerce, online marketplaces and financing.

name: AAAgiler
businessDescription: Offering accounting, payroll and part-time CFO services for (international) Startups in Germany
longBusinessDescription:
Germany has been ranked as the best country for entrepreneurship among 80 countries based on ten relevant attributes by US News / Wharton in 2018. For the third consecutive year, Germany grabs the No. 1 position. True, creative energy does cluster in the countrys major cities, helping make Germany a startup haven.
In January 2019 I will take over an existing accounting office in Darmstadt (http://german-startup.com/darmstadt/, near Frankfurt) in Germany, which is located in the center of the EU. I plan to offer services like accounting, payroll and part-time CFO to international startups. Currently, I am still working for a US technology company, which is NASDAQ listed, as Head of Finance and Controlling (EMEA). For more than six years I have worked and studied abroad (including India, China, Canada, Brazil and Singapore). In India I started a company manufacturing automotive switches as CFO of the company (with 450 employees today).
Looking forward to hearing from you. Just drop an email at info[@]aaagiler.com

name: UrmO
businessDescription: We have developed the UrmO, a lightweight and foldable self-balancing scooter, perfectly suited to complement all kinds of urban transport on the last mile. Thanks to the patented, innovative folding mechanism, the urban electric vehicle can be transformed into briefcase size within a second and then taken along. Big 14 inch wheels and the small packing size are a huge benefit in crowded urban areas. These features enable simple mobility and thus provide perfect user experience every day.

name: Emblemotions
businessDescription:
Emblemotions provides an outstanding approach for music creators who want to adopt AI. Different from current AI-music solutions, we deliver a 360º service for artists, powered by analytics of emotions.
We apply Deep Learning to support the entire process in order to offer a personalized experience for each individual.

name: STRAFFR
businessDescription: STRAFFR is the next generation of smart fitness equipment: an all sensorial smart resistance band. We are tackling the decreasing health condition of our communities with a high-tech, portable sports product that is connected to an inspiring and motivating app, which will provide customized AI training, based on personal fitness goals and current mood. For the first time, users have an all-sensorial fitness device and a new training experience in their pockets. STRAFFR not only provides guided videos & inspiring music - the innovative correction feature alarms visually and audibly when you pull too hard, hold too short or count too less - no more cheating!

name: gust.network
businessDescription: gust.network is an open and decentralized recruitment ecosystem that empowers candidates to ensure full data privacy and to directly share their professional identity and career ambitions with recruiters and HR applications by updating a single profile. We provide an open-source applicant tracking system (ATS) for recruiters with an integrated token management service (TMS) to facilitate adoption without the need for a wallet or cryptocurrency. Moreover, any HR application can access the professional identity network via an open API. Our business model is based on a commission for transactions performed by TMS and scales with the adoption of the network.

name: Prolendo
businessDescription:
We are a mortgage financing platform for retail banks - we connect institutional investors with mortgage providers. Our platform offers high risk-adjusted returns for investors while making mortgages more affordable and accessible for consumers.
Prolendo came about from a desire to positively impact the mortgage market amidst rising property prices, which are growing faster than personal income levels. Seeing how it has become increasingly more difficult to jump on the property ladder, we decided to set out to improve upon the status quo of mortgage lending.

name: oculid
businessDescription: oculid develops a completely new biometric method that is based on individual characteristics of a persons eye movements. As compared to existing biometrics, such as the face, iris, finger or vein scan, this new procedure is much harder to fake and it cannot be misused to track an individual against their will. A multi-factor authentication performed in only one step, making it both extra secure and very user-friendly at the same time. oculid targets the digital payments market, as mobile biometric authentication is projected to generate ~ 33 billion US$ annually by 2020, with a total transaction volume of 8.9 trillion $US.

name: Ladwork
businessDescription:
Ladwork is about a movement. A movement of people that connect  as team players, partner streamers or opponents that compare themselves to the best players.
We aim to become the Linkedin of esports. Our team is developing a social platform and recruitment service in esports. On top of that, we are implementing management and analytics tools, smart contracting, and tournament solutions.

name: VISSEIRO
businessDescription: Seniors are sitting 6 or more hours a day in front of the television. What if you could make their armchair smart and enable it to be used for proactive medicine? Our technology is integrated into a chair pad, measures vital signs like heart beat and respiration and analysis these by AI. The data helps nurses and physicians provide better treatment. Seniors can live at home longer and do not have to live in a nursing home.

name: Varia
businessDescription:
We are the first news platform that provides different perspectives as a service - and rewards the users for leaving their filter bubble. 

We are a media-software startup, our approach is topic-agnostic, AI-based and fully scalable. 

Varia is a media company that aims to confront users with complementary content and through that, pull them out of their filter bubbles. Our vision is simple but important: make complementary information of high quality easily accessible and consumable for everyone.

name: RE-NT
businessDescription:
We build AI-powered software and hardware solutions to make it easy for fashion brands and retailers to integrate a rental solution into their business model.
Fast Fashion 2.0: RE-NT builds SaaS solutions for fashion brands to distribute high street fashion in a sharing concept. Via the RE-NT App, we connect fashion brands with End-Users: On-demand access redeem ownership. It's greener, cheaper & faster.
tags: AI, fashion brand, retailers, artificial intelligence

name: Heytax
businessDescription:
Automatic portfolio tracking · Accurate gains and losses · Extensive import and export possibilities.
Heytax is a service provider for tax reporting for cryptocurrencies. We want to make the hurdle to entry the market easier by taking care of the tax framework for users.

name: Wieblebub
businessDescription:
The innovation driver of the future.
Innovation processes need improvement.
This is our purpose. 
This is our goal.
This is the Wieblebub Vision.
We use modern encryption systems and blockchain technology to prove authorship of your intellectual property. A cryptographic fingerprint of your IP is stored on the NEM blockchain, providing it with an immutable timestamp.

name: Smile Me Up
businessDescription: We decided to provide a revolutionary solution in the market, the singularity theory. We will provide for the first time clear aligners at a disruptive singular price using decentralized manufacturing through the orthodontists. We simply make specified orthodontists our tool to target the masses using one service, one price, and one platform for everyone.

name: Techbros
businessDescription:
Established in 2017, Techbros UG is dealing with IT and Telecommunication hardware and software services in Germany. 

Our Service is included 
- M2M / IOT devices prototyping solution
- Cloud Consulting
- End 2 end Telecommunication Solution provider
- RF Network Shaping 
- RF Tuning and Optimisation
- Verification of Telecom new Features and Testing
- Core and Radio Engineering

name: Schmaus
businessDescription: We are building a platform which connects hobby chefs with hungry neighbours. Via our mobile app Hobby chefs can offer portions of their homemade food to people from their neighbourhood or their city. A hungry member of our community can book the dish, pay via the app and pick his order her dinner up at the cook's place. Chefs get an appreciation for their cooking skills and the price per portion they set by themselves. Hungry "Schmauser" get a fresh dish with a history prepared by a cook from their neighbourhood.

name: Whammychat
businessDescription:
Whammychat: short-lived, playful chat-rooms
 * Short-lived: each chat-room created lasts for a maximum of 20 minutes.
 * Playful: a big component of gaming is integrated. Users can battle each other mid-chat to prove a certain point by using skills which enable them to damage heal and decorate other messages.
 * Chat-rooms: A certain topic can be discussed with friends and/or strangers.

name: tribe
businessDescription:
What's the most natural interface? A face.
 
We give teams a team room to hear, see and interact with each other as naturally as if they were in the same room, and we enable every team to add their personal A.I. assistant to make the team more productive.
 
Our live animated 3D avatars are as realistic as a video call, offering more control and privacy to human users, and give A.I. assistants a face capable of expressing human emotions.

name: Expanenta
businessDescription:
Expanenta is a cloud platform for fair evaluation of offline marketing performance.
Its aim is to make offline advertisement (print, TV, radio, billboards ) as simple in tracking as online campaigns by using advanced machine learning methods.
Its the Google Analytics for offline ads. Our clients use our service for understanding which channels work best, for optimising client targeting and improving the allocation of marketing budgets.

name: QVSTA
businessDescription: QVSTA is an online marketplace, that connects model agencies and clients from the creative industry. With the first online platform that allows model agents to place their talents online and clients to get inspired and book models directly, we are revolutionizing the way models get found and booked.

name: Softr
businessDescription: Softr enables startups to build responsive web applications, without a single line of code. Our mission is to free startups from reinventing the wheel with millions of engineers. Softr is the virtual engineering team that helps you build a 100M tech startups in 12 months. 10x faster, 10x cheaper. Our mission is to free companies from reinventing the wheel with millions of engineers. Softr is a no-code platform to build powerful websites, web apps, and client portals on Airtable in 10 minutes.

name: Searchtalent
businessDescription:
Searchtalent offers every entrepreneur, whether StartUp CEO, small business owners, medium-sized or large companies, the right solution for their personnel search. 
Simply upload a job description as a PDF and Searchtalent will search through 1 billion profiles, contact suitable candidates automatically and match incoming applications with the job profile - the easiest and fastest way to successfully fill vacancies.

name: GermanTechJobs.de
businessDescription: The first German IT job board built with Software Engineers in mind.
longBusinessDescription:
Our mission:
We started in Switzerland as SwissDevJobs.ch with the goal to bring more transparency, openness and diversity to the Swiss IT market.
After achieving this goal, we now strive to do the same on the German IT market. We want to make the job search process for Software Engineers more enjoyable by gathering all job postings in Germany and presenting them in an informative way.
Our portal is not only for Developers but for everyone working in the IT industry: Engineers, SAP and System Admins, Product Managers, QAs and UX/UI Designers!

name: FLYLA
businessDescription: FLYLA is a platform for cheap last minute flight tickets exclusively for students to improve the capacity utilization of international airlines.
longBusinessDescription: We seek to offer students and young people an affordable way to discover the world. Travelling around the world enriches young peoples minds and expands the individuals horizon and worldview. We at FLYLA believe that getting to know different places and cultures in your youth should be mandatory to reduce prejudices and conflicts around the world. Having this in mind FLYLAs business tries to close the gap of inefficiencies in the flight selling processes and students lower abilities to pay for air travel.

name: trepcademy
businessDescription: Curated Resources for Entrepreneurs and Startups.
longBusinessDescription: trepcademy is an online resource for entrepreneur and startup tools, online courses, books, and links. Carefully curated for the most important entrepreneurial and digital skills. All resources are updated daily!

name: ODE.systems
businessDescription: ODE wants to support people on their way to make better informed, transparent and stress-free decisions.
tags: Decision-Making, Education, Mental Health, Social Impact
longBusinessDescription:
The ODE app will be a sanctuary for safe, honest and self determined decision making. ODE will be used the world-over. No third party bias, no advertising and no data harvesting.
With the bottom-up approach it combines education and mental health and provides space for the full range of decisions in private and professional life and thus forms the basis for participation in society.
Focussing on GenZ and Millennials with their pending decisions for education (job, studies, subjects, etc.) and the choice of the appropriate path (schools, university, ERASMUS, internship, studies, countries ...) as a self-determined decision of individuals.

name: Linguidoor Translation Serices
businessDescription:
Linguidoor is Berlin-based and one of the fastest-growing professionals yet cost-
effective Translation Service provider.  Linguidoor enables you to develop a strong client base in your foreign markets and reach audiences around the world and achieve international success.
Our solutions include Document Translation, technical translation, website and software localization, transcreation (creative translation and content for Marketing and Advertising), subtitling, interpreting, voiceover and audio/video transcription. Linguidoor works for customers in a variety of business sectors including Marketing and Advertising, IT and Software, Telecommunication, Manufacturing, Energy and Environment, Automobile. E-Commerce and E-Learning and many more. For more details please contact us at https://www.linguidoor.com/contact-us#contact-form
tags: Certified Document Translation, E-commerce Website Translation, App and Software Localization, Content writing

name: Flow Lab
businessDescription:
Flow Lab (Flowletics) is a training app for mental and emotional fitness that helps ambitious people achieve peak performance in their work life. 
We all experience a variety of mental distractions and emotional distress in our work days that prevent us from finding the motivation, focus and energy to perform at our best and use our time productively. If we want to experience more flow - the state where we are able to unleash our potential while feeling at ease - we believe that we have to start training our mental and emotional fitness the same way we train our physical bodies. With Flowletics we’re developing the digital flow coach in your pocket that uses personalization, gamification and measurability to provide the long-term motivation that is necessary to establish a regular mental fitness training routine.
tags: Wellness, Mindfulness, Training app, Digital Health

name: immo.ai
businessDescription:
we-do.ai is a dynamic startup committed to seeing artificial intelligence change the way we live and work.
Through a cutting-edge range of products and services we actively shift people’s perception of what AI is and help implement it into the workplace so that productivity, exploration and discover is heightened.

IF YOU CAN DREAM IT,         
WE CAN MAKE IT

Künstliche Intelligenz ist nicht nur eine Sache. Es gibt viele Formen, von intuitiven Bots, die beim Chatten lernen, bis hin zu intelligenten Tools, die Datenerkenntnisse in leistungsstarke Geschäftslösungen verwandeln. 

Indem wir als KI Agentur mit Unternehmen sprechen und auf ihre Bedürfnisse eingehen, können wir KI-basierte Produkte und Plattformen entwickeln, die Probleme in das beste Kapital ihres Unternehmens verwandeln.

name: Klangchat
businessDescription: Klangchat is a mobile app, which lets you effortlessly mix music and sound effects to your voice messages and connects audio and a chat for more fun and empathic transcultural digital communication. We have a two-sided business model, in-app-purchase (effects, loops, lip-sync avatars) and later subscription model on the user side and branded content for engaging marketing purposes on the advertiser side. A voice message created with Klangchat is the next step in the evolution of emojis and stickers, which have the potential to reach an estimated social media market share of 20% ($6 B, LINE: $265 M, 2017). Klangchat’s branded avatar/music pack is a unique engagement tool for the gaming, entertainment, music, film, and sports industry and their fan communities. Klangchat offers for the growing marketing segment of engaging branded content (Snapchat sponsored lenses: $273 M, 2018 / Content Marketing $15 B, 2017) innovative solutions for the trend voice messages.

name: Roamlike
businessDescription:
Companies pay us to place products in fitting short-term rental accommodations. 
We automatically find the right accommodation for each product by analysing apartment and guest data. 
The products are placed by hosts themselves by ordering them through our web platform. 
By doing so, we create a win-win-win situation: Brands reach target audiences effectively, hosts delight their guests and guests have a better stay.

name: Simple Mobility
businessDescription: SIMPLE Mobility promises high quality at a low price and therefore makes clean, urban mobility accessible to everyone. The company started last year with selling its first model eSCOOTER1. The company grew rapidly in 2018 starting with selling to private customers. Today Clients also include delivery services and hotel chains who can also rent or lease the scooter. The next step is to build a mobility service platform with a large telecommunication partner.

name: AMBIDEXTER
businessDescription: AMBIDEXTER bietet dir mehr als andere Start-Ups. Wir entwickeln eine digitale Plattform für Near- und Beyond-Banking-Services, die Menschen hilft, das Beste aus ihren Finanzen zu machen. Dafür suchen wir kreative und motivierte Talente, Spezialisten und Persönlichkeiten aus allen Bereichen – so wie dich. Bei uns findest du einen Tech Stack, der so gut wie alles möglich macht. Dazu bieten wir flexible Arbeitsmodelle, flache Hierarchien und individuelle Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten. Und das „mehr“? Eine sichere Basis. Wir sind komplett unabhängig, haben aber eine starke Muttergesellschaft im Rücken: die Deutsche Bank. Bist du bereit, mit uns Geschichte zu schreiben?

name: Kayzen
businessDescription: Kayzen powers the world’s best mobile marketing teams to take programmatic in-house. Built on the three key pillars of performance, transparency and control, Kayzen is a software platform which enables leading app developers, agencies and entrepreneurs to run programmatic user acquisition, retargeting and upper funnel campaigns in-house with an unprecedented scale of 60bn daily ad requests from 1bn+ unique users worldwide.  Kayzen is accessible through its APIs or user interface and supports mobile video, playable / MRAID, native and banner ad campaigns.

name: Catchar
businessDescription:
The world's largest Augmented and Mixed Reality community. Catchar​ is the world largest Augmented Reality and Mixed Reality community and hub where users and developers can share, promote and discover the best XR examples, apps and lenses for HoloLens, Magic Leap, ARKit, Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, ARCore and Vuforia.

For users it provides a range of opportunities, namely: to discover the best AR apps and games, find interesting AR campaigns and try them out, explore popular Snapchat’s and Instagram’s masks, learn more about how to use different AR products and projects, easily get or download AR products and projects.

XR developers and makers can promote their AR products and projects by ​submitting them to Catchar. An ability to create a personalised developer profile and share their own information, skills and contacts allows to get offers from customers for product and/or project creation. Moreover, it is possible to collaborate with other xR developers and makers.

For businesses and brands this is a good chance to promote and advertise their AR products and projects, especially target image based AR experiences (food and beverage labels, magazines, brochures, etc.).

name: DOCIDENT
businessDescription: DOCIDENT is an online digital notary service allowing to create and manage blockchain-secured certificates for any digital object. This guarantees integrity, existence and ownership. Certificates can be shared and verified by anybody for free and forever.
longBusinessDescription:
DOCIDENT is an online certification and verification service. By making all types of documents digitally verifiable, we enable easy sharing of copies and prevent fraud.
With DOCIDENT any digital file can be secured against fraud and manipulation, this protects your business.
DOCIDENT add’s value to any of your documents and protects your: legal documents, employment contracts, training certificates, insurance contracts and many more….
We generate a unique hash of your document´s content and your identity and store them securely in the blockchain. A QR-Code can be added to all documents for additional protection.
After certification, copies of your documents can be shared easily and securely.
And all recipients can validate the authenticity of the content with just a few clicks.
Our Service is available on all plattforms: Smartphone, Tablet and Desktop.

name: Novego
businessDescription: Novego is a German startup that offers clients and 12-week program, priced at €177 to help overcome symptoms of depression, anxiety and burnout. It even includes access to advisers with degrees in psychology and who are reachable round the clock. Novego is headquartered in Hamburg and the company’s service is currently only available in German.

name: Donut
businessDescription: Donut is the easiest way to get started with crypto by allowing anyone to turn their spare change into Bitcoin.

name: Endel
businessDescription: Endel is a technology that creates personalized sound environments to reduce stress, improve sleep, and boost productivity — all backed by neuroscience and the science of circadian rhythms. The soundscapes are algorithm-powered and designed to gently rise and fall in line with immediate internal and external conditions like location, time zone, weather, and heart rate.
tags: Music Tech, Mental Healthcare, IoT, Generative Music, Digital Health

name: Foviatech
businessDescription: Foviatech uses digitalisation and smart automation strategies to transform the transportation and healthcare industries. We support automation and digitisation with artificial intelligence, end-to-end learning and deployment services. Foviatech offers AI based customised software solutions adaptable to Production and MRO processes for transportation industries. Foviatech's innovative strategy of combining artificial intelligence and graphene occupies a special position for industrialisation and digitisation. Foviatech has a unique in-depth expertise in both 2D Material technology, AI and their combination.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Intelligent materials, Transportation, Aerospace, Health Care
longBusinessDescription: Software and materials scientists work together in an interdisciplinary team to develop innovative solutions for the Transportation and Health care. One example of the hybrid products are sensor interfaces for seats, which enables digitalisation through Ergonomics instruction, Biometric data provision and Comfort enhancement. Our novel product,FOVGRAI SmartSeat Interface, a Graphene-based flexible sensor coupled with AI technology, enables to self-figure the seats based on user position directly contributing comfort automation.

name: ada
businessDescription: ada is a platform for the digital life and economy of tomorrow. ada is independent journalism, a source of inspiration and a stage for everyone whose thoughts about the world of tomorrow we can benefit from.
tags: Online Magazine, Media Production, AI, Robotics

name: ZEUS NEXT Advanced Technologies GmbH
businessDescription: International start-up from Magdeburg. Specialised for innovative super light 5kWh power sources based on super nano-capacitors, with 1.5kg.
longBusinessDescription:
We are a small international start-up from Magdeburg, but we've serious idea in energy storage field.
Our team believes that every person in the world deserves to have in his hand an autonomous source of energy. This will have not only a positive effect on the ecology of the planet as a whole, but will also lay the foundation for the education of a harmonisation and technically advanced society.
We want to produce innovative super light power sources based on super nano-capacitors (5kWh, 48V, up to 1,5kg) in Germany. This product is indeed a serious competition to exist energy storage systems that are chemistry-based. For now, we are actively looking for investments.

name: Bayes
businessDescription:
Bayes Esports Solutions is the Esports Data Company. Bayes is the go-to address for the Esports Data Industry - for data right holders, consumers and service providers alike.

Bayes delivers unprecedented opportunities for rights holders to utilize and monetize esports data of pro level leagues and tournaments through our extensive partner network of media and betting companies.
Bayes powers the innovative products of our customers with a wide range of standard applications and tailored solutions. Our customers benefit from unified feeds for fixture and result information, live in-match data, and live odds for major esports titles.

name: CUREosity
businessDescription: CUREosity is a fast-growing start up located in Duesseldorf, Germany, with the vision to revolutionize traditional rehabilitation by developing VR-based therapy applications and games to help people with neurological and mental disabilities.

name: Myos
businessDescription: Rethinking working capital | Myos helps merchants of all kind grow to scale, fully digital, flexible and without personal guarantees
tags: FinTech, Finance, Online Financing, Data Science, Machine Learning, AI

name: Framen
businessDescription: Framen wants to enable TVs to be the next level digital picture frames through its visual content streaming solution that makes it easy and interactive to use any screen as a new marketing channel.
tags: Digital Marketing, Marketing, Communication, Screen Technology, Streaming

name: Farmako
businessDescription: Farmako is an international operating enterprise with a clear focus on health care. The company's products serve the purpose to benefit patients as being an alternative medicine.
tags: Health, Alternative Medicine, Health Care, Frankfurt

name: The Female Company
businessDescription: The Female Company is a love brand that serves the needs of the everyday life of modern women. We deliver taboo-breaking, sustainable and well-designed products.

name: Capmo
businessDescription: Capmo develops software for the construction industry, enabling construction and real estate professionals to finish construction projects on time and on budget
tags: Construction, Property Management, Real Estate, SaaS, Software

name: Black One Entertainment
businessDescription:
Backed by Funkhaus Berlin and the Dan Pearlman Group, Black One is realizing the ultimate, one-stop entertainment ecosystem & the first modern integrated entertainment company in the West, like they have so far only existed in Asia.

With a proven approach, Black One utilizes systematic training and nurtures top talent to superstar status. Building brands with impact and influence.  All while crafting one vast world of content, products and experiences around them.

Dubbed by insiders as a future potential "Rocket Internet for Music", "Hogwarts for Future Popstars" or "Big Hit Entertainment of Europe"".
tags: Music Production, Content Production, Media, Talent Development, Talent Investment, Talent Incubation, Talent Acceleration, Content Monetization, Brand Building, Digital Products, and Experiences

name: Bote
businessDescription: BOTE is a wearable device for small children, that is connected to the mobile app to localize a child in a crowded place like a theme park. Bote cuts business operational costs and maximise visitors satisfaction while helping families enjoy their precious time.

name: YOONA Technology
businessDescription: Yoona Tech is a scalable Artificial Intelligence based B2B software solution, which shortens the fashion design process to only some simple clicks and furthermore the possibility to create an individual design is much more easier. By using design data YOONA proposes new collections, single designs, prints, materials or color concepts. New trends or other sales-oriented data can also be incorporated. The Yoona Technology pursues the vision of a holistic digitization and is committed to encourage conscious consumption and drive sustainability through the automation of design process
tags: AI, B2B, software, fashion, design, sustainability

name: Passbase
businessDescription: Passbase makes user verification simple. We give developers the tools they need to verify new users faster, cheaper and with bank-level confidence. Our mission is to create a more privacy-centric future that gives people control over their data.
tags: Identity Verification, Biometric Authentication, Machine Learning, Passbase, Berlin

name: Ceretai
businessDescription: The Diversity Dashboard is a software-as-a-service that automatically analyzes equality and diversity in media content such as news, TV shows and cinema movies. Based on machine learning algorithms the software can not only count quantitative representation, but also evaluate norms and stereotypes and address unconscious biases. Therefore a subscription to the Dashboard allows media houses, film producers and public service broadcasters around the world to keep track of how their content e.g. portrays men and women and which audiences are interested in which stories and narratives. Public service broadcasters can also get help with their diversity reporting, saving thousands of hours of manual labor every year.
tags: SaaS, media, news, tv shows, machine learning, algorithms, software

name: Rootify
businessDescription: The AI-assisted Tinder for languages: Minimalistic UI where individuals can swipe not only back& forth between vocabulary but also users they want to exchange with. They will be provided an individualized experience based on their prior knowledge in their native tongue. Rootify incorporates the all-in-1 solution combining gamification, spaced repetition& socialization! The next German Startup enabling global citizen to understand each other … literally! Let’s go back to the roots: Let's Rootify!

name: Back
businessDescription: Back is a modern collaboration and automation platform that enables internal service teams to manage all workplace requests on one intuitive platform.
longBusinessDescription:
The digital workplace promised to improve work for humans. But instead of removing distractions, it multiplied them. Finding or filing a piece of information can be time consuming, as everything is scattered throughout various systems. Getting help for a problem from the right colleague isn’t trivial, as different teams often use different tools and processes.
- Back set out to fix that -
Back is a modern collaboration and automation platform that enables internal service and business operations teams to manage all workplace requests on one intuitive platform.
It provides employees with a convenient way to get help and information and always know who is taking care of their question. The platform integrates with various communication channels (including Slack and email), so employees can submit requests the way they are used to.
For HR, IT, office or travel management teams, it is a centralized workflow platform to manage and respond to requests using approvals, forms and integrations into e.g. the HR management software. Back automatically answers recurring requests and tasks that do not require the experts’ involvement, saving the experts valuable time. Back provides full transparency to managers by tracking the time their teams spend on resolving requests and helping them proactively identify trends to improve internal workflows.

name: Smart Forest
businessDescription:
Our services: application/marketplace for tokenized trees & tokenization of trees, which means issuing of a digital certificate (Ethereum ERC-721 standard), the Passport of Tree.

There are projects who already offer forest/trees for investing (with profit return). Some projects offer donation possibilities for reforestation/ecology purposes.

For projects who plant trees, attract money for that and don't use tokenization/blockchain, we'll provide relevant services/possibilities.
For projects who already use tokenization of trees for crowdfunding/fundraising/certifying, we'll provide additional sales area, marketplace.
tags: carbon credits, blockchain, investing, sustainable forestry, Smart Cities, environment, geo-location, Cleantech, Fintech, Environment, and erc-721

name: Adsata
businessDescription: Adsata offers a webcam based eyetracking SaaS solution for measuring visual interaction with the web (b2b). As webcam based eyetracking systems start to mature, the focus has mostly been on data collection and accuracy, but not so much on data processing. Adsata offers a solution that not only allows users to collect remote and scalabe eyetracking data through the webcam, but also deeper insights into what the data means.
tags: market research, SaaS, visual interaction, eyetracking, data collection, B2B

name: PIELERS
businessDescription: Using PIELERS peer2peer cloud-based marketplace, food producers can sell their produce directly without any intermediaries to consumers. Thus, the food supply chain will become more transparent, efficient and resources effective. The shipping distance will also be largely reduced by using drop shipping and other local delivery services. It is essential to contribute to a greener economy by making regionals farmers competitive again and reducing shipping distance.
tags: digital enterprise, e-commerce, social good, online marketplace, selfdeveloped platform, and support local food producers

name: Pyoneer.io
businessDescription:
Pyoneer is a Feedback Analytics Automation SaaS. 
Pyoneer is an AI-powered customer feedback analytics SaaS. The tool allows to collect customer feedback from multiple channels like service tickets, NPS, reviews or CRM and to analyze the feedback automatically with AI. The AI clusters and quantifies feedback to identify product or service issues and allows to better prioritize improvements on customer needs. The solution allows to increase efficiency by delivering the right products or services to the market faster. Additionally, companies can boost the customer experience by tailoring products and services even more closely to the needs of customers.
tags: Lean Startup, Design Thinking, Lean Innovation, Innovation Management, Customer-centric, Design Development, Product Development, Digital Transformation, Lean B2B, SaaS, Collaboration, Process Framework, Persona, Customer Journey, UX, User Experience, and Customer Experience

name: Aiconix
businessDescription: aiconix.ai capitalizes on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning in the field of video optimization. Its unique software enables the start-up to deliver the important analysis data already during the video production and to swiftly integrate the necessary information into the video. This enables the optimal adaptation of content according to the needs of the target group and increases the rate of clicks.
tags: AI, Machine Learning, Video, content production, Aiconix, Hamburg
longBusinessDescription:
Video is King! Digital video content and audiovisual advertisement are among the most important driving forces of the digital economy.
Whether it is concerning conventional IP-based devices or desktop computers and mobile phones: the number of possibilities and formats is constantly growing and leads to tremendous changes in the audience’s viewing behavior.
Buzzwords such as interactivity, personalization, flexibility and autonomy are omnipresent and exceedingly challenge content producers. The Hamburg based start-up aiconix.ai recognizes this pressure of movie makers and offers a suitable solution within the war of strong content and numbers of hits through its software:

name: Localyze
businessDescription:
Localyze is a all-in-one software that simplifies the relocation process for companies and their international employees. 

From our own experience we know how difficult international relocation can be, not only for the individual but also for companies recruiting those internationals. We solve this problem with a software solution that provides all information for both sides to handle the process in the most efficient way. Our solution is flexible, easy to use and ultimately helps to simplify international relocation. 

We are a startup lead by three female founders, we like to do things differently and we are always looking for people bringing new ideas and ways of thinking into the team. Contact us if you are interested in working with us!
tags: HR Tech, Recruitment, Relocation, Localyze, Hamburg

name: Munevo
businessDescription: Munevo supports people with disabilities to live independently by using smart technology. Munevo Drive is a Google Glass app that helps people with disabilities to get mobile independently through hands-free wheelchair driving.
tags: eHealth, Disabilities, SmartTech, Google Glass, Healthcare, Munevo, Berlin

name: What2Work
businessDescription: What2Work is a platform for startup jobs that brings together talent and startups based on a company culture match. Startups only have to pay when they have successfully hired someone. Our goal is to let talents find a job that fulfils and makes them happy.

name: Kokoro Beratungsgesellschaft
businessDescription:
Kokoro helps organisations to continuously improve in the transformation process and contributes decisively to the overall success.
It offers transparent and anonymous data collection in real time. Our surveys collect data that not only support, but
accelerate and optimise transformation.
It provides insights in an intuitive way so that organisation/teams/individuals can take useful and continuous development steps with bottom-up and top-down learning cycles.
longBusinessDescription:
To keep the transformation process on track as a continuous expereince, Kokoro has implemented the latest scientific findings in pulse surveys:
1) Its Starts all starts with Psychological Safety
In high-performance teams, everyone can address things that are important to them without fear of negative consequences. What's more, they are heard and receive recognition and appreciation. Such an open working
environment is the basis for a successful transformation process.
2) Make Your People Feel They Fit In
Where do I fit? Belonging is an existential need. If this need is not met, our brain uses all available resources to worry about this lack of belonging. Inclusion releases these resources - and this enables constructive participation and belief in a common future. Both are basic prerequisites for successful transformation.
3) Quality and Intensity of Collective Energy
Collective energy is the fuel on the way to the common goal. Both the quality and intensity of the energy count.
Kokoro provides insight into all dimensions of collective energy, and identifies energy promoting factors.
Safety and belonging set the speed and direction, energy provides momentum - the ideal mix for successful transformation.

name: OroraTech
businessDescription: OroraTech offers a groundbreaking satellite-based system for global and automated wildfire management. Our solution significantly accelerates, digitizes and simplifies the process of wildfire detection and observation. By AI-supported processing of data from a steadily increasing variety of satellites and complementing it with our own constellation of nanosatellites, the detection time is strongly reduced. Our satellites are based on a patented novel CubeSat framework, a patent-pending imager design and on-orbit processing technology to compress the performance of a 100kg satellite into a shoebox.
tags: NewSpace, Earth Observation, Multispectral Imaging, Infrared, AI, On-Orbit Processing, CubeSat, Weather, Wildfire Detection, Optics, Waldbranderkennung, Wildfire, Monitoring, Satellite Data, and Machine Learning

name: INFLURY
businessDescription:
The way we reach people across borders has changed significantly over the past few years. The popular mediums of consumption are no longer television or billboards, and even banner ads and online advertising don’t get to your customer anymore. Now, social media is in power.
Think about whom you turn to for suggestions on what to buy, or where to go. We turn to people we know, people we trust, people we idolize. These people are content producers, photographers, and bloggers all at once - they are Influencers. With the power of Influencers, you can place your brand, and be sure that it will be presented to an audience in a way that appeals to each one.

But how do you manage to find the right people to talk about your brand? Imagine you could get 100 influential people to advertise your brand with a time effort of five minutes. INFLURY makes this possible. Let us introduce you to the world of Programmatic Influencer Marketing!

With our data-driven technology, we have identified already more than 1 million Influencers worldwide. Be in control how the Influencer posts should look like by choosing the photo and text of the posts. With just a few clicks you can select your target audience, the type of Influencers you want to book and the total amount of people you want to reach with your brand. Our technology matches the right Influencers and books the best Influencers to the best price automatically. We will then ship your products to the Influencers and make sure they publish the posts on time. A team of Influencer Marketing experts is working seven days a week, to supervise the process and make sure everything works just right.

With our extended analytics, you will be able to understand the success of your campaign and measure results in real-time. Run different tests to see what strategy works best for you and optimize your strategy.

longBusinessDescription:

Our interdisciplinary team of around 60 employees, develops and implements innovative solutions in the data science environment, including customized end-to-end as well as standardized SaaS solutions, for medium-sized and large companies across all industries.
Our experienced Data Activation & Innovation team offers tailored project support – from identifying the most relevant use case and carrying out the Proof of Concept up to the operationalization, i.e. the seamless and permanent integration of the analysis results into operational business processes and IT infrastructure.
Westphalia Forecast is our standardized SaaS forecasting solution. Developed based on our deep insights into customer needs, Westphalia Forecast offers forecasts at the push of a button: for future demand and sales, personnel requirements and other relevant business KPIs.
Whatever the individual business challenge may be, we will find the right solution and ensure that enterprises can use their data profitably in the long term.

Plan A’s software solutions comply with the internationally recognised Corporate Standard of the Greenhouse Gas Protocol and are officially certified by TÜV Rheinland (September 2021).

Founded in 2017, the company has already received several awards, most recently the prestigious The Europas Award 2021, the Digital Top 50 Award 2020, and the Digital Ventures Social Impact Award 2020 from the Boston Consulting Group. In April 2021, the start-up received USD 3 million in funding from its investors Demeter, Coparion, and Softbank. For more information, visit plana.earth.

name: oolipo
businessDescription:
Two questions drove co-founders Johannes Conrady and Ryan Mullins to start the company: What if storytellers could create new mobile series using the phones native features? What if there was an entertaining new format that sat somewhere between watching a book and reading a movie?

Download oolipo for iOS now and try it for yourself.
 
In the past, storytellers and creators had to develop an app to create one multimedia and interactive story that used some native features of the phone. There was no storytelling platform for mobile-native experiences like Pokémon Go or Lifeline. We wanted to change that. Our vision is to democratize the tools to create these story experiences and allow creators to monetize their work. Thats whats in the works. Ryan Mullins
longBusinessDescription: oolipo is a platform for the creation of original mobile series. Readers will experience a whole new format designed specifically for mobile, using words, videos, photos, GIFs, interactivity, animations, etc. Someone recently described the experience of reading one of our stories as The offspring of a love-affair between a book, YouTube, and a Snapchat Story.
