name: SolyPlus
businessDescription: We transform naturally occurring biopolymers into a new format ("smart materials") so that their full potential can be harnessed for highly innovative medical devices and cosmetic applications. Our products are not only sustainable and environmentally friendly, but also help to overcome unmet medical needs. In the meantime, we have already launched five products in the cosmetics and food sectors.
longBusinessDescription:
SolyPlus GmbH, founded in Berlin in 2017, is a start-up biotechnology company based in Haselund, Nordfriesland, since 2020.
SolyPlus technology makes it possible to improve numerous products and develop new ones forcosmetics, pharmaceuticals and medtech use. We are a team of experienced experts dedicated to developing new sustainable products to overcome unmet medical needs for a healthier future.
Products
Chitosan is a fungal biopolymer with strong anti-viral and anti-bacterial properties. In order to use this property as additional protection against viral infections (including coronaviruses) in the oral pharynx, we looked for dosage forms that would keep chitosan in the mouth for as long as possible, e.g. chewing gums and candies. Chitosan-containing chewing gums and candies were developed and brought to market in cooperation with specialist companies from the food industry (GoBeDo GmbH and Heller & Strauss GmbH). We are also currently developing chitosan sprays together with the companies Ursatec GmbH (developer) and Förde Ventures GmbH (financier). The entire program includes nasal, throat and skin sprays with development costs of approximately € 2.5 million. These medical products are expected to enter the human market in 2024. The hobby animal market can also benefit from these hygiene sprays, especially because Förde Ventures, through its chief executive, Volker Haak, has close ties with the local hobby animal company Trixie Heimtierbedarf GmbH & Co. KG in Tarp.
Another example of the application of our technology is the use of hyaluronic acid for cosmetics and medical deices in the form of defined microparticles, films, microneedles and implants with significant product benefits, which was not possible before. Our first cosmetic product "Hyalu-Pearls" contains 1.7% of a particularly strong water-binding hyaluronic acid, which would correspond to a normal hyaluronic acid of approx. 5%. Hyalu-Pearls uses hard hyaluronic acid microparticles as an exfoliating element, thus combining the exfoliating effect with the skin care effect in a brilliant way. Our second product, "Hyalu-Pearls 10%", even contains 10% hyaluronic acid (mass/ml), which is a world first. Both products can be used as a exfoliation and anti-wrinkle agent with high effectiveness. An Aloe Vera Gel is planned to follow in summer 2022 to expand our cosmetic line (SolyPure Cosmetics).
Our focus in the future will be on medical applications of our technology and the products made with it: For example, self-dissolving wound dressings and orthopedic material as well as microneedles for painless vaccination, all made from pure hyaluronic acid. With the prototypes already in place, SolyPlus is in negotiation with several German specialist companies who are very interested in taking over further development and marketing.
The scope of application of SolyPlus technology is not limited to the development of medical and cosmetic products or the aforementioned hyaluronic acid. The most diverse areas of application, e.g. in agriculture, 3D printing technology, ski wax improvement, lubricant developments, internal coating of gloves and booties, etc. are also conceivable.
USPs
SolyPlus' basic technology and application areas are broadly protected by 5 patent families (plus patent family relating to chitosan). The basic patent has already been granted in USA and Europe as well as two additional application patents in USA and India. This enables SolyPlus to develop completely new products that did not exist before due to the non-existing manufacturing technology. Examples are the microneedles, wound dressings and implants made of pure hyaluronic acid with significant product advantages.
Business model and distribution
SolyPlus is the thinktank that demonstrates the feasibility of new innovative products. The development of such products up to market maturity, as well as the approval and marketing are carried out by our licensees. We participate in the subsequent market success of the products through upfront and milestone payments as well as royalties. This applies to the dosage forms containing chitosan (chewing gums, candies, teas and soon also nasal, throat and skin sprays).
This concept enables rapid upscaling with manageable fixed costs.
The cosmetic products mentioned above are sold through the Amazon FBA Platform and our own webshop by our own cosmetic brand (SolyPure Cosmetics). In order to increase our sales, we have engaged suitable agencies in Germany and US in January 2022.

name: SirPlus

name: QUASA
businessDescription: QUASA implements a full cycle of freight traffic in the functionality of one application, using blockchain and smart contracts technology to eliminate the problem of trust, information barriers and court costs. QUASA infrastructure: a set of decentralized applications and services, as well as digital tools for building a business on the QUASA platform, where trust is ensured through blockchain technologies, smart contracts and economic incentives for all participants.
longBusinessDescription:
QUASA (www.quasa.io) is a new ICO that proposes solutions to global cargo shipping via blockchain technology. QUASA replaces all traditional forms of logistics platforms, making logistics system more transparent, clear, cost effective and fast.
QUASA provides a platform-marketplace for the dissemination of digital templates of contracts and agreements that have real legal value and validity in the blockchain environment.
Each module for a certain type of transportation passes a single development cycle, consisting of a number of stages:
- Standardization of the order process
- Standardization of the service delivery process
- Standardization of the transaction process
QUASA issues its own currency, the QUASA token (QUA), which will be required to interact with the QUASA platform to pay for services.
Token worth: 1 ETH = 3,000 QUA
QUASA offers a standardized API for building private ratings.
The basic economy of QUASA meets two main criteria:
- minimum volatility
- competitive cost of services
To ensure minimum volatility, tariffs are introduced for transactions and services of the QUASA blockchain-environment using the XDR (SDR) index. The IMF daily publishes the ratio of the XDR index (SDR) to the world's 20 major currencies.
To use all modules and full functionality in QUASA, each connected company will need to use a set of services provided by the platform.
Payment methods are variable; the commission for services can be collected in percentage, be fixed, and can consist of any combination. There may be a zero commission, or there may be a commission payment at the expense of the seller, as in modern credit cards. In addition, ‘reverse commissions’ are possible - material encouragement of users for transactions.
QUASA is now a partner of BestRate that means all currency is acceptable during the ICO.
We have different ways to influence the growth in the value of QUA: each connected company is an information guide, every successful one is an even larger, louder information guide. Every time a company starts taking QUA, this is good news. We have a lot of such companies, and there will be many positive news, we will be constantly on hearing and will be able to influence the course.
The value of our currency will be provided by the real services provided by the QUASA platform, which will change the idea of cargo transportation.

The relaxed music makes it easier for you to remember the words. Understanding: This is followed by a story that runs through the lessons like a thrilling series. "Be a sleeperoo - staycation adventures keep the planet green!" sleeperoo offers a holistic concept for sustainable indoor/outdoor adventure nights on your own doorstep and thus promotes the 365-day staycation as a new form of climate-friendly vacation in between. The concept includes the self-developed design | sleep Cube, online booking platform and uniform operating/catering concept (chill box with vegan organic snacks and drinks). sleeperoo offers 80+ locations nationwide and is uniquely represented with the concept of museums, thermal baths, beaches, castle ruins and viewing platforms. The USP is the mobility of the cube, which can be set up in 60 minutes using the plug-in principle without the need for a building permit. For the participating B2B spots, the concept is a marketing tool, for the B2C guests to get out of the busy everyday routine. SDGs: 13 Climate Action, 12 Responsible Consumption+Production, 17 Partnership for the Goals, 3 Good Health+Well-Being.

name: Conrati
businessDescription: The company was founded in the summer of 2017 by Hennie Conradie and Holger Hilzinger, with the mission to make advice accessible on demand, across international borders. The platform enables Advice Seekers to book online consultations with Advice Providers based on their skills and hourly availability and takes care of bookings, video consultations, pay-ins, pay-outs, vat calculations and invoicing. The marketplace for on demand consulting. Conrati is an on-demand advice based B2B and B2C marketplace Advice Receivers book paid video consulation with Advice Providers Easily search, book, consult, invoice and pay across borders.
tags: Consulting, E-Commerce, Environmental Consulting, Human Resources

name: Beercoin
businessDescription: et a beer of a participating brewery and scan the QR code on the bottle (e.g. cap, packaging) with any QR code scanner. The app starts right away and creates a wallet for your coins. You don't have to look for an app in a store and you don't have to fill in a registration form. Get started by enjoying a good beer and by scanning codes. The app has an integrated map where you can locate participating bars. You see where the bars are and how many coins you need. You can trade-in your coins for your favorite beer in a participating bar. Use your coins anyway you like. Send them to friends or buy merchandise.
tags: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Information Technology

name: HNC Healthy Nutrition Company
businessDescription: Smart fitness food and sports nutrition are our strengths: Our brands MaxiNutrition, Urban Crush and MaxiMuscle stand for high-quality products that are carefully manufactured in accordance with scientific knowledge from the best raw materials in the most modern production facilities. We make fitness food with passion. Our team brings together nutritionists and ambitious athletes. Our strength: We know what is important when it comes to fitness and nutrition. We combine our high level of motivation with science-based expertise, innovative production methods and international sales structures. We offer our international customers a wide range of high-quality fitness food in the form of protein powders, bars and drinks.

name: SunShine Energy
businessDescription: Without risks and disposal problems, solar energy is clearly the most ecologically sensible and also lucrative option for generating electricity for our daily use. As coal and nuclear power plants are gradually being replaced worldwide, the demand for green electricity (often also referred to as “green energy”) is constantly increasing. Electromobility will also account for a significant proportion of the increased demand for electricity in the future. You too can benefit   from the high and secure yields of your own photovoltaic system with a solar direct investment . When you buy a solar system from SunShine Energy , you invest in the clean energy of the future and make your contribution to the environment and your children's future and benefit from ever-increasing energy costs.

name: Picsure
businessDescription:
Picsure is focused on AI solutions for the insurance industry and provides an AI platform that brings AI to insurers. 78% of the world’s assets are outside the financial sector.  Real estate, infrastructure, equipment, machinery and much more are physical assets and no one wants to lose these non-financial assets in case of an unforeseen event.

Together with investors from the insurance sector provides Picsure a global asset management platform with integrated claims handling for and with connected insurance partners.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Image Recognition, Information Technology, Software

name: countify GmbH
businessDescription: countify GmbH is a SaaS company based in Berlin, Germany. Its core product, also named "countify", is a cloud-based business process modelling software. The company was founded in 2017 succeeding the Sayula Engineering AG which invented the original "Anima" machine, a server-based predecessor version of "countify". "Anima" is already used since 2011 in the banking sector. Through its transition into a cloud-based SaaS version, the new "countify" will now be rolled out across different industries and business processes. Countify upgrades your Excel spreadsheets. No more sending around spreadsheets and emails to share or collect data. With Countify you can manage data requests and shares without leaving Excel.

name: Third Element Aviation
businessDescription:
Third Element Aviation is not just a drone manufacturing company, but a drone applications company.

Based in Bielefeld, Germany, we have a long history in the drone application business before starting the company in early 2017. Our team combines years of experience in business development, several hundred commercial drone systems manufactured and sold and thousands of hours in piloting experience in virtually all applications, scenarios and parts of the world.

Based on this know-how, Third Element Aviation was founded on the idea to bring complete, drone-based application packages, from initial consulting to after-sales services. Our target is to provide the new industry standard for commercial drones.

name: keysurance
businessDescription:
Digital solutions to get car insurance companies ready to enter the era of smart mobility! 

There is an unprecedented diversity in the way people get from A to B! Individual car ownership will soon be a thing of the past. Car insurances, however, have not yet found a way to adjust their offers in an equally dynamic manner. As a result, most motorists pay excessive rates to their insurance companies! We from keysurance believe in this to require substantial improvement! Therefore, we build a fully integrated, digital driver’s log to document individual driving experience across all major mobility platforms (carsharing, rental, fleet) from day one. Based on this unique and rich information, car insurance companies are finally able to issue individually tailored insurance contracts based on motorists’ specific needs - that’s smart car insurance for smart people.
tags: Auto Insurance, Blockchain, Financial Services, Insurance

name: taxando
businessDescription: Taxando is a producer of software for submitting tax returns in Germany. The user can send the declaration online by himself or with the support of a tax advisor Steuerberater via the mobile application. The product is intended for German citizens as well as expats: Poles, Russians. Taxando also offers an application for business clients. Currently, the software is the most frequently chosen product by Polish tax settlement companies. Annually, over 20,000 testimonies are sent through the application.

name: Momunity
businessDescription: Momunity is a community app for modern moms to find like-minded moms nearby, connect, chat, share experiences, support each other and plan common activities. Momunity - the largest mom social app in Germany! There are already more than 100,000 users. We connect mothers and pregnant women for communication, recommendations and new friendships. Momunity is the largest & most used mom social app in Germany. More than 100.000 users are already there. We connect mothers & pregnant women for exchange, recommendations and new friendships.

name: TRECCERT
businessDescription: TRECCERT is a certification body for persons, providing certifications that attest the competencies of ICT professionals. The TRECCERT vision is to become a global leader in personnel certifications. TRECCERT believes integrity is essential in its’ relationship with certified clients and the ICT community. TRECCERT offers a range of quality training courses, developed to provide individuals the skills and strategic edge in the ICT industry. We deliver the very best training programs for professionals and organizations on a wide range of topics with emphasis on current ICT best practices and on demanded competencies. Choose a training course below to get started.
tags: Business Development, Information Technology, Professional Services

name: Nuucon
businessDescription: At nuucon, we are on a mission to make B2B furniture purchasing as easy as possible. Our work focuses on personal advice and our service as a project partner. nuucon started in 2017 as a B2B marketplace for the furniture trade. Our brand name was also created during this time (nuu = new, con = connection). As a new connection for the industry, we wanted to digitize the business model of B2B trade fairs and trade associations. The focus was on furniture manufacturers and small and medium-sized trading houses. Contrary to what was originally planned, we have received more and more registrations from customers in the project business: interior architects, interior designers, furnishing professionals, serviced apartments and offices, who are facing ever greater expenses in the purchasing and logistics of complex interior design projects stand. After more than 100 in-depth interviews, we understood that the purchasing processes in the project business are no longer up to date. There is less and less time for creative collaboration with clients. Projects require an increasing number of brands from different sales channels and segments. At this point we realized that it was time for a new industry solution. In the summer of 2019 we finally took the bold step and developed our business model, If you want to follow our journey from a different perspective, we recommend taking a look at one of our favorite articles about nuucon and the story of how it came about .
tags: E-Commerce, E-Commerce Platforms, Interior Design, Internet

name: Cinuru Research
businessDescription: Cinuru Research is a data analytics company for the movie industry, offering AI-powered digital loyalty systems to cinemas and data-driven online campaigns to film studios. We reimagine the way movies are marketed in the Netflix age by bringing the potential of recommender algorithms to cinemas, leveraging deep taste profiles from our cinema loyalty app Cinuru to identify most likely audiences for any given film. We then help cinemas and studios to target moviegoers more efficiently, drastically reduce waste in campaigning, and bring more people to the theater.

name: Befeni GmbH
businessDescription: Befeni is a textile and clothing company that manufactures dress shirts are made in our their manufactory. The Befeni team can look back on more than 10 years of experience in tailor-made textiles. By working exclusively with seasoned tailors in Asia and our local German production manager, the company is able to offer consistently consistent and high quality. It offers extremely high standards of cleanliness, free drinks, food subsidies, as well as joint employee events with management and management that are completely unheard of in Asia.
tags: Fashion, Food and Beverage, Manufacturing, Product Design

name: FUSE
businessDescription: Fuse is a Berlin-based startup launching the first dating app with real-life dynamics at its heart. We're here to shake up the online dating industry by matching modern technology with your analog world. Our app offers unique features that enable you to express and discover more than selfies. Listen to someone's voice, picture their everyday, and get to know the things that matter – even before you match. Fuse is currently entering its final beta testing phase, which will prepare the app for its official launch. Our open positions will be published soon, so be sure to keep an eye out!

name: TonePedia GmbH
businessDescription: TonePedia is taking selling music gear online to the next level powered by digital twinning. We operate a widget that can turn any website to a unique interactive playground for instruments. It increases sales, user experience and session times. Our widget is used by musical instrument manufacturers, retailers and influencers. We have the worlds biggest sound library of guitar gear, users can compare gear interactively, using the highest quality audio. Our goal is to help musicians of all levels find the perfect gear to make music with. All of our demos are recorded in house, using premium recording gear, our motto is do not make gear sound good. We show how good it sounds.

name: Pitchview
businessDescription: The Pitchview tools support your sales team when it matters most: for on-site customer presentations, in video conferences and at trade fairs. Robust, intuitive & fast. With Pitchview, your hybrid sales team delivers the ideal pitch in every situation - whether remotely, at the customer's or by phone. Health care professionals are harder to reach than ever. Pitchview makes it easier. The Pitchview Lead app is now called Pitchcollect. With Pitchcollect you turn trade fair contacts into sales opportunities in 10 seconds. Find out more at pitchcollect.de

name: KENFO
businessDescription: KENFO is a public law foundation formed by legislation to secure funding for the interim and final storage of radioactive waste generated by the commercial use of nuclear energy in Germany. KENFO was founded in 2017 and is located in Berlin, Germany. On 16 June  2017 the German Nuclear Waste Disposal Financing Act came into force and "Fund for the Financing of the Nuclear Waste Disposal"​ (KENFO) was set up as a public-law endowment by the German federal government. On 3 July 2017 the operators of all of the 25 German nuclear power plants fulfilled their legal obligation to fund the endowment with a total amount of 24.1 billion Euros.
tags: Funding Platform, Law Enforcement, Nuclear, Waste Management

name: LinguSocial
businessDescription: LivingSocial is a platform that lets you make free real-time translated video/voice chats, international voice calls to landlines & mobiles and instant messaging from within your smartphone, browser or landline. The app is available for iOS, Android and also Web (Google Chrome). Make automatically translated voice & video chats, voice calls to landlines & mobiles, instant messaging and much more in 31 different languages. Callback is the ideal solution for people who don"t have access to a reliable internet connection. The service works over cellular networks. You can choose between calling a local access number or receiving a call back from our service on any given number.

name: Q-nnect
businessDescription: Software should be easy! Software should be powerful! Software should be innovative! All of these expectations are hardly achieved. Q-nnect is providing software of the next generation. We want to give our clients the power to accomplish any goal you can imagine. Your data, your control! The data and information solutions of many big companies are already reaching their limits today. Emerging challenges such as Big Data, Internet of Things and the necessary digitalization of many processes will only increase the problems of IT departments. At the same time a majority of ERP products reach the end of their life cycle. The semantic integration platform Q! offers an innovative solution to these current problems. It is a cloud based enterprise software of the next generation, accelerated through In-Memory-Computing, designed and developed with the goal to integrate or gradually replace the company-specific and isolated ERP systems of different software providers. The innovative technical components are needed as a basis for the development of new business standard software which is based on modern frameworks. It is highly flexible and individually adjustable to every business process. Clients gain benefits, such as shorter project duration and lower implementation efforts which could already be verified in different lighthouse projects. In addition, Q! provides business processes and features in the form of standardized applications which cover fundamental ERP functions.

name: Digety
businessDescription:
Real-time locating system and electronic labels, DIGETY (formerly NoQ) was founded in 2016 as a university spin-off with a focus on the digitization of clothing retail.

Our unique location in the heart of a former stronghold of textile production (Albstadt, Baden-Württemberg) and a university with great textile know-how and a university specializing in the fields of computer science and textiles enables us to be the most innovative company in the field of digitization of the clothing retail trade to be.

DIGETY's Intelligent Tag System (ITS) with Real Time Location (RTLS) is a powerful platform for digital pricing and electronic labeling. With the help of real-time localization, it is possible to locate and track trackable labels. This paves the way for the digitization of retail, industry and many other industries that require item tracking or asset tracking.

name: SHOWROOMING

It helps pure e-tailers to develop brass tacks brick-and-mortar skills to succeed in the non-digital business environment and benchmarks success with a measurable platform. SHOWROOMING turns brick-and-mortar spaces into gingerbread houses and candy cane forests by turning the point of sale (POS) into a point of experience (POX).

Through a creative environment and agile methods, they as the crew generate measurable success. We build digital access, develop innovative business models and drive digital transformation. We build the future from 0 and 1. The multi-tool in the field of IT & innovation. We are convinced that the working world, work environment and way of working are changing in the course of digitization. New opportunities create new business models, but also new challenges. We face change with a hands-on mentality, tech expertise and an agile mindset.

businessDescription: The Pioneers Club creates a unique environment, to bring startups, corporates, digital experts, and creatives together. Our coworking space in the old town of Bielefeld shines with its inspiring atmosphere. Networking, especially internationally, is always a focus. Exciting events create the perfect space for exchange between our members and interested parties. We offer a platform for innovative exchange between startups, corporates and digital experts in the OWL region.

name: Quidtree
businessDescription: Quidtree is a web-based SaaS that revolves around the concept that, as marketers, we need access and control to a lot of data, in order to do our job. Our data is disseminated across many different tools, and we often revert to manually assessing data in spreadsheets, just to have an overview of the data we need. As marketers, we are a clever group of people, that would like to have data-driven, automated processes in place so that we can focus on strategies and providing creative content. Quidtree gives marketers a tool to dynamically import all types of data, edit, manipulate, optimize, analyze and compare their data, as well as view and export their data. The goal is complete control and flexibility to conduct data-driven marketing efforts, with zero manual processes.
tags: Advertising, Big Data, Data Integration, Marketing

name: DyNAbind
businessDescription: DyNAbind is your preferred partner for fast, reliable DNA-Encoded Library drug discovery. Our novel technology platform offers our partners a better way to higher-quality, more relevant medicinal chemistry starting points for nearly any protein target, even traditionally difficult classes like protein-protein interactions. We're ready to work with you all the way through the discovery process, from de novo hit discovery to focused approaches for affinity and specificity maturation. Unlike traditional high-throughput screening methods that test chemicals one-by-one, our DNA-Encoded Library platform allows us to simultaneously select from hundreds of millions of molecules. Our proprietary innovations make this approach better than ever before, with dramatically improved signal-to-noise ratios, reduced false positive rates and rapid follow-up hit validation. In just a few weeks, DyNAbind can deliver results that would have taken over a year with older methodologies.

name: Carrypicker
businessDescription:
The disposition of goods in transit is a highly complex process. Numerous, constantly changing influencing factors lead to millions of options with just a few orders, making profitable charge optimization even for experienced dispatchers almost impossible. Carrypicker calculates the best solution in a matter of seconds using high-performance computers and intelligent algorithms - faster and more accurately than any human.
The result is a next-generation freight forwarding company for the benefit of customers, hauliers and the environment.

name: Unaty
businessDescription: We believe well-organized groups of people who share a common purpose can change the world. Software was supposed to reduce complexity in organizations and help people save time and get more done — it hasn't. Everything we do, we do to enable people to focus on what they do best and help leaders engage their workers — because it drives organizations forward. Despite the rapid growth of software to help workers and leaders be more effective, only about 16% of the workforce is truly engaged and productive. Scattered apps and services, the complexity of IT systems, and a shortage of modern management practices are constraining the impact of people at organizations. Making IT simple for all organizations and enabling people to focus on what they're best at while helping leaders start, run, and scale organizations will engage workers like never before and expedite economic growth.

businessDescription:
We are a Hamburg AI startup that develops innovative HR software solutions, thanks to machine learning and artificial intelligence, for employees and employers. Experience our award-winning recruiting solution TalentScout, our unique ZeugnisParser and our popular ZeugnisGenerator.

AI-supported, DSGVO-compliant and user-friendly for modern companies, HR service providers and legal protection insurance companies. Experience the rethought process for creating job references. Our innovative solution integrates the (ex-) employee and supervisor more strongly into the process and automatically creates job references according to your ideas.

name: Kaltra

Kaltra is a provider of innovative thermal management technologies and advanced cooling equipment for mission-critical applications, such as data centers, cleanrooms, contaminant-free areas, processing plants, and other facilities where reliability and energy efficiency are key factors. Kaltra is a provider of innovative thermal management technologies and advanced cooling equipment for mission-critical applications, such as data centers, cleanrooms, contaminant-free areas, processing plants, and other facilities where the reliability and energy efficiency are key factors. name: Ginkgo Analytics
businessDescription: Our mission is to transform companies into data driven and AI powered enterprises. That mission drives our fast-growing team of talented data scientists and data engineers to help every step of the way, from ideation through pilots all the way to production. We create bespoke data-driven solutions to transform our clients into AI-powered enterprises.  We assess jointly with you your readiness to apply artificial intelligence on your company and your processes. This covers your organization, technology, methods, data as well as strategy and execution.

name: Varomo UG
businessDescription: Handicapped people find it difficult to carry objects. The CAREcules now offers a reliable solution. It transports all everyday objects in the home environment by simply following its user. Tracking control active automatically, no setup required, Low- vibration transport, even heels over 2cm high. and Height-adjustable up to 105 cm to achieve all common table heights. Surrounding sensors recognize all fixed and moving obstacles and avoid them. Thanks to different attachments, various applications are possible.

name: Idruide
businessDescription: iDruide Education, a young agile and innovative company, brings together women and men passionate about new technologies and sharing the enthusiasm for an ambitious project. Carrying the values ​​of our company, we believe that it is possible to put digital technology at the service of teachers and their students by offering a secure ecosystem, guaranteeing strict protection of personal data. Composed of digital tablets and a set of services, this innovative solution has been technologically developed for rapid commissioning, requiring no particular expertise. Fun and easy to use, it has been designed to allow the teacher to adapt his pedagogy to the student who can use it both at school and at home.

name: reFit Systems
businessDescription: At reFit, we develop cutting-edge digital solutions for healthcare. With the support of strong partners and a diverse and experienced team of physicians, therapists, game developers and software engineers, our focus is on the digitalizuation and gamification of medical processes. reFit Systems was born out of research – and we’ve never stopped there. We believe in evidence-based medicine and data-driven solutions. To stay on the cutting edge of technology and ensure continuous improvement of our solutions, we will never stop researching.

name: CAPVERIANT
businessDescription:
CAPVERIANT is a fintech company in the field of public investment finance. We are a digital, independent finance platform for public finance. We offer you: - an intermediary platform that combines loan requests from public borrowers and investment requests from institutional lenders - an information center for all aspects of public financing Do you need more information? Your digital partner for public financing.

In the CAPVERIANT market commentary you will find weekly assessments by our chief economist Daniel Bleiberg on topics such as growth prospects, fiscal and monetary policy, capital markets, interest rates, inflation, central banks, municipal finances and much more.

name: Transporter Lab
businessDescription: Transporter Labs is changing how developers and publishers manage their apps across platforms. With their revolutionary and innovative product "AppManager", users can connect all of their different store accounts to one convenient platform, where they can manage all aspects of their apps: Uploading screenshots and app previews, writing and optimizing store data, managing builds and much more. With smart workflow automation and team management, users can drastically increase their deployment and publishing times.

name: Bee smart city
businessDescription:
As the leading global smart city solution network & community, we simplify the development of smart cities. Our mission is to empower intelligent cities by facilitating the global exchange of best practice solutions and lessons learned. bee smart city creates market transparency as a trusted, independent platform and efficiently connects cities and communities among each other, with solution providers and other stakeholders.

bee smart city is the leading global community, connecting all smart city stakeholders with proven solutions, and the preferred network of United for Smart Sustainable Cities IP, the global smart city initiative of the United Nations.

name: Minship Shipmanagement
businessDescription: Miniship has extensive experience and proven performance in managing bulk carriers, from newbuilding supervision to chartering and operations, from technical to crew management. Additionally, they include freight forwarding services. In addition to providing services in short sea trade and tanker brokerage, they also operate in the shipping agency sector. The company also offers accounts payable and bookkeeping services to its customers and complete prospectus approvals with financial institutions. The Ministry of Shipping has provided full ship management, including commercial, crewing, and technical functions.
tags: Financial Services, Freight Service, Marine Transportation, Shipping

name: retest
businessDescription: Founded in 2017, retest is a software startup that will make GUI testing as simple, useful and efficient as possible. It uses the revolutionary paradigm of Difference Testing together with smart algorithms and AI to create innovative testing solutions. ReTest is a young software firm from Karlsruhe, that founded an innovative testing solution, that automates software GUI regression tests. Its approach is based on a combination of difference- and AI-based monkey-testing. Makes GUI test automation painless and intelligent.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Information Technology, Machine Learning, Software

name: Smaser
businessDescription: We support companies in the implementation of their vision. All companies have an idea of ​​what they want to accomplish and achieve: a goal or even a vision of where the company should be in the future. In times of digitization, companies need a partner who shares this vision. And someone who accompanies them in the realization. We bring companies closer to their visions: with individual advice, the right craftsmanship and suitable architecture. We understand companies and support and strengthen them with customer-optimal IT services. Our specialty is the realization and operation of business-critical cloud and IoT services that optimally match the needs of our customers. We create customer-optimal solutions, based on both standardized and customized components, bringing together the best of both approaches.
tags: Cloud Computing, Internet of Things, Software

name: Visualix
businessDescription: Visualix is now an Inpixon solution! Follow us on our company page: https://www.linkedin.com/company/inpixon. Inpixon® (Nasdaq: INPX) is an Indoor Intelligence company that specializes in capturing, interpreting and giving context to indoor data so it can be translated into actionable intelligence. The company’s indoor location data platform ingests diverse data from IoT, third-party and proprietary sensors designed to detect and position all active cellular, Wi-Fi, UWB and Bluetooth devices, and uses a proprietary process that ensures anonymity. Paired with a high-performance data analytics engine, patented algorithms, and advanced mapping technology, Inpixon’s solutions are leveraged by a multitude of industries to do good with indoor data. This multidisciplinary depiction of indoor data enables users to increase revenue, decrease costs, and enhance safety. Inpixon customers can boldly take advantage of location awareness, analytics, sensor fusion and the Internet of Things (IoT) to uncover the untold stories of the indoors.
tags: Augmented Reality, Computer Vision, Indoor Positioning, Mapping Services

name: Kerberos Compliance
businessDescription: Kerberos means digital AML compliance for all. It's an undesirable duty that we take off our clients' shoulders: Compliance with legal money laundering prevention measures. In Germany, often referred to as a "money laundering paradise", more than 100 billion euros are laundered every year. Regulators are responding to increasing international pressure by tightening money laundering laws. This also includes the expansion of the circles of obligated parties, which hits many sectors unprepared. We see our task in supporting all obligated parties in the digital compliance with their legal requirements. This allows them to concentrate on their core business.
tags: Business Intelligence, Compliance, Consulting, FinTech, Information Technology, Legal Tech

name: Userwerk
businessDescription: Improve the satisfaction of your online customers with our point-of-purchase strategy. Customer acquisition and -loyalty through target group oriented checkout marketing. We specialize in positively surprising your customers after their online checkout. We improve your customer journey with our successful point-of-purchase marketing approach and offer your customers an incentive to return. Based on simple techniacl integration and intelligent user content generation, we offer you a product that improve your customer satisfaction and provides you with advantages in terms of customer acquisition and loyalty.

name: ZITiS
businessDescription: Digital forensics, lawful interception, cryptanalysis and big data are our topics. Mastering complex challenges is our mission. To this end, we bring together experts with a pioneering spirit. Together, they drive innovations that are indispensable for the internal security of our country. As a research and development center, we support the security authorities with technical expertise with regard to cyber topics. In the popular high-tech region of Munich, we develop and test tools, solutions and strategies with which the security authorities can optimally fulfil their legal tasks now and in the future. We also conduct basic research with universities, institutes and companies and participate in scientific dialogs with partners worldwide. As an employer, ZITiS is particularly interesting for experts with a pioneering and innovative spirit. We are looking for people who are only satisfied when they have found the answer to a tricky technical question or have cracked a complex challenge. People like the ingenious inventor Q, whose extraordinary inventions make James Bond more successful. We are searching for specialists and creative minds who would like to use their expertise to protect our citizens and who are interested in working in an authority that is unlike any other. We offer them the ideal environment to develop their potential and help shape new ideas. Anyone who gets to know us quickly realizes that ZITiS is different from the stereotypical image of an authority - although you can choose to become a civil servant with us. As a new, young organization, we offer all the benefits of a public employer, but are not permeated by regulations and hierarchies. We value flexibility and meet our colleagues at eye level. If changes are necessary, they are implemented in an uncomplicated and pragmatic way. And we are happy to do without tie and collar!

name: Mawave Marketing
businessDescription: Mawave Marketing is one of the leading social media agencies in Germany. We do not offer a full service or 360 degree marketing, but one hundred percent paid social media performance. As a special agency for Facebook and Instagram, we take care of many fast-growing business cases in the DACH region and set new standards in the industry. As a Facebook Premium Partner, we manage millions in monthly advertising budgets and work closely with Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest and TikTok.

name: covexo
businessDescription: We help you get the most out of DevOps and cloud technologies. Custom development and consulting for your any software project. We are a team of Kubernetes experts that can work alongside your team to make the transition to the cloud easier and faster. With our expertise in Kubernetes and cloud-native infrastructure, we are the right partner for you to provide consulting services for your cloud-native projects.

name: LUQOM Group
businessDescription: LUQOM GROUP is the leading digital platform for lighting fixtures in Europe. Through our online shops as well as our presence in key European marketplaces, we provide more than 500 suppliers with direct access to private and commercial customers across 27 countries. We offer customers more than 50,000 products through LUQOM GROUPâ€™s online shops and channels: from value-level to premium design segment online shops, as well as private label brands to renowned design products.

name: LoyalGo
businessDescription:
LoyalGo sets up and operates electric car charging stations. Sebastian Schramm and Tarik Mian founded it in 2017, with its headquarters in Dresden in Germany. LoyalGo makes the setting up and operation of charging stations economical.

By well-visible screens for e-mobilists and passers-by, we turn the charging station into a digital advertising column. The selection of ads is made by our LoyalGo-algorithm that predicts in which adjacent business a purchase is expected. To improve the conversion rate of the displayed ads we developed a mechanism to track whether the advertising was followed or not. To round it all off to a comprehensive marketing ecosystem for local businesses, our integrated loyalty and voucher system offers additional incentives to visit the advertised businesses.
tags: Automotive, Clean Energy, Electric Vehicle, Energy Storage

name: Log-hub
businessDescription: Data driven innovation! We build data driven supply chain solutions based on leading-edge technologies to turn data into valuable information. We offer two products: Supply Chain Apps, an Office 365 Add-in and Supply Chain Anna, an analytics and automation platform. Supply Chain Apps empower you, as a supply chain expert, to transform Excel tables with intelligent apps into powerful insights. For complex use cases where tailor made solutions are required, we offer high-end IT consulting based on the Supply Chain Anna platform to build customized solutions in record time.

name: EarReality
businessDescription: EarReality provides TWIST, a no-code self publishing platform. This cloud-based Voice Game Engine empowers anyone to design, create and publish interactive stories for Voice, Web, App or as an ebook. Easy to use, fast to deploy.

name: ForkOn
businessDescription: ForkOn is a logistics startup with core competencies in the areas of intralogistics and process optimization. We combine many years of industry knowledge with innovative spirit and state-of-the-art IT solutions. ForkOn is a logistics start-up with core competencies in the field of intralogistics and process optimization. We combine years of industry knowledge with innovative spirit and state-of-the-art IT solutions.

name: WN Online
businessDescription:
WN Online-Service GmbH & Co. KG offers one-stop multimedia Internet presences - from advice to realization to successful marketing. Benefit from media competence that has tradition. For almost 300 years, the Aschendorff Group has dedicated itself to the publication of books, newspapers and more with passion, competence and responsibility.

With the Westfälische Nachrichten, Aschendorff Medien has the highest-circulation daily newspaper and the strongest advertising medium and information provider in the region.

name: Blindside

To ensure that this position does not lose its relevance in the future, we develop solutions for club sport in the 21st century. The main component is our software for digital training planning and athlete development.

name: VA SEVEN
businessDescription: Redefining the Functionality, Design and Quality of Strength Equipment. Innovation made in Germany - we ship worldwide. VA SEVEN develops and produces training equipment to increase performance in areas of physical fitness. The professional equipment in our product portfolio is designed for everyday use and is characterized by the following core properties: - high quality - innovation - easy to use and functional - clear design Our customers are institutions and organizations that are concerned with increasing their customers' physical performance or athletes are pursuing an economic goal, e.g. sports academies, professional clubs, fitness studios or personal trainers.

name: Magni & Tude
businessDescription: In order to win people over to its vision, Magni & Tude supports future-oriented and responsible companies in a creative and innovative way to identify, develop and communicate their social added value. Magni & Tude's services are requested by start-ups, medium-sized companies and global players. Magni & Tude is convinced that the digital fingerprint of a company must be of high quality. Because only if this is given, companies have the opportunity to impress and win partners and customers via digital channels.

name: The Prepared
businessDescription: The Prepared is the most-trusted resource for emergency preparedness guides and reviews. We help normal people learn how to get ready for life's unavoidable disruptions, from sudden job loss to car accidents to big natural disasters.  We won’t offer an online courses unless we think it’s just as good as an equivalent in-person weekend course. Some are even better than a week-long 24/7 course.

name: Schaeffer Nutraceuticals
businessDescription:
Schaeffer Nutraceuticals uses Nobel Prize-winning biotechnology research to produce diet supplements that tower above the rest of our Viproactive brand of products. Our goal is simple to enhance our customers diets so they achieve the best energy levels, health, well-being and productivity possible. Supplements for the Future. 

We employ working students as part of the funding program 'Brandenburg Innovation Specialists (2019-2022)'. The aim is to develop suitable communication concepts for the introduction of products that require explanation in foreign markets.
tags: Biotechnology, Dietary Supplements, Food and Beverage

name: RealNote
businessDescription: RealNote is a social network based on augmented reality. We make it possible to integrate text and images into the real world and to experience the environment in a completely new way. With RealNote, opinions can be written on facades and selfies can be posted at their place of origin. There are no limits to creativity when connecting the real with the virtual world. With neural networks and computer vision, we enable smartphones worldwide to overlay the real world with virtual content. Thanks to RealNote, users are able to share augmented reality with other users and save virtual content permanently in a location. We build augmented reality as it should be.

name: EIGENSONNE
businessDescription: We do (almost) everything for you - from advice on planning and execution to support with the annoying bureaucracy. We are on your side! In a matter of seconds you will receive your first yield result and within a very short time you will receive a tailor-made offer for your solar power system. We want to supply as many people as possible with solar power. We guarantee reliable fixed prices with the highest quality. In the event of damage to your solar power system, we guarantee you full service and cost coverage for 5 years. Your time is precious - we will advise you to the extent you require. Solar consultants sitting on your couch drinking coffee for hours? Not with us! Customer service and trust are our top priority. That's why you only pay for your solar power system after successful installation by invoice.
tags: Energy, Environmental Consulting, Renewable Energy, Solar

name: Clever Kids
businessDescription:
Who doesn't know it - life with children is colorful and new every day. A big city in particular offers a multitude of offers and opportunities for children.

On Clever Kids - the online leisure guide for families , you will find the best excursion destinations, always up-to-date interesting offers and events, as well as great ideas for children's birthday parties, holidays and courses for children and the whole family in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.

Clever Kids makes it easier for parents to decide where and how the next trip with the children should take place and at the same time offers event organizers the opportunity to attract potential customers. Furthermore, it should help parents to spend less time and energy researching good offers and to start planning their free time more quickly.

name: Reacnostics
businessDescription:
REACNOSTICS is modeling, constructing and building chemical research reactors for the spatially resolved investigation of catalytic processes. Our methodologies comprise simulations and operando measurements of concentration & temperature profiles in combination with spectroscopic catalyst characterization. Science and engineering company in the chemical industry. Simulating, constructing and building profile reactors for analysing catalytic reactions.

Catalytic reactors are at the heart of countless industrial production processes. Their application ranges from fuel production in refineries over chemical production processes to emission abatement in stationary and mobile applications. Further sustainable processes based on catalytic reactions include Power-to-X, Waste-to-Fuel, and Carbon2Chem technologies.

name: ScaleupLab.io
businessDescription:
Not a management consultancy. A consulting start-up. We are nugrow - the new way to start and scale your startup.  Launched three years ago, today we support the most innovative and successful Startups on the scene such as Beautyself, advocado or DataGuard. What drives us? Young companies need sparring partners who tick as much as they do to become successful - but many have already burned their fingers on a traditional management consultancy.
That's why our motto is: "From founders for founders”. Together with already successful founders we have developed a model especially for start-ups - individual, entrepreneurial-driven, and without consulting bullshit. With nugrow we want to become the No.1 contact point for Startup Consulting in Europe and help more and more founders to build their startup into a successful business.

name: Grace
businessDescription:
Grace is a management and consulting firm that empowers women in the community. Grace develops individual programs and initiatives to strengthen gender diversity in the German economic landscape. Grace empowers brave women to maximize entrepreneurial success.

Grace stands for Female Entrepreneurship, Empowerment and Diversity. We empower women with start-up ambitions and support them in further developing and implementing their ideas. With programs such as our Summer Accelerator for prospective female founders and Grace Scale for female founders in the growth phase or through various events, we create spaces to further develop ideas, creativity and entrepreneurship and to bring the founder community together. Grace has set itself the goal of actively building and shaping the startup ecosystem for female founders. Let's Accelerate Female Entrepreneurship Together!

name: Laser Melting Innovations
businessDescription: Laser Melting Innovations ("LMI") is committed to making it easier for companies of all types and sizes to access innovative additive manufacturing processes. With more than 20 years of experience in the field of additive manufacturing, our team has in-depth expertise in the areas of plant and process technology as well as training and consulting. Our multifaceted competence forms the basis for regularly challenging the status quo and setting new standards.

name: Faer
businessDescription: Faer, the first AI-powered mobile app to offer a seamless shopping experience for fair and sustainable fashion. Sustainable and fair fashion is made in an environmentally-friendly way and ensures workers earn a fair wage in safe working conditions. Using innovative voice shopping and visual look-alike technology, Faer helps consumers discover and shop styles by fair and sustainable brands they love. Faer’s innovative search technology allows users to tell Faer the type of styles they are looking for using their voices. At the same time, shoppers can use screenshots from social media feeds and apps to identify styles and find similar looking products made by fair and sustainable brands.

name: Whyapply
businessDescription: We want your job search to be easy and transparent. That's why we developed the JobChallenge. Each JobChallenge shows you which tasks actually await you in a job. This gives you an authentic insightinto your future everyday work and you can immediately see whether this job suits you.
tags: Advertising, Human Resources, Internet, Marketing, Recruiting, Staffing Agency

name: Jetlite
businessDescription: jetlite is a young company from Hamburg, Germany founded in 2017, which develops personalized lighting solutions tailored to the inner clock to increase humans' health and well-being. 90% of daytime we are exposed to artificial light which disrupts our sleep-wake rhythm. This leads to fatigue and can be detrimental to our health. jetlite has taken on this problem and develops personalized lighting solutions based on findings in Human Centric Lighting and chronobiology. This lighting technology guides the inner clock in line with our natural biorhythm and can reduce fatigue while increasing health and well-being. jetlite’s lighting solution was initially developed for the aviation industry to reduce jet lag. Nowadays, the solution is used outside the aviation industry as well e.g. in the healthcare segment.

name: RefineAl
businessDescription: RefineAI is a market research platform for video content creators. Measure the emotional appeal and engagement of any video without the need for a lab.

name: Acrai

Specifically, our team works on tough challenges in computer vision, deep learning and robotics. We're proud to have the best people joining us in our mission. If you're interested in developing yourself, building exciting technology and work for something meaningful, hit us up!
basedIn: Agriculture, Artificial Intelligence, Information Technology, Machine Learning, Robotics

name: YourVid

Our value proposition is unique and the reason why >90% of leads decide to work with us. We're bootstrapped, profitable, and in this for the long run. You will grow together with us, while learning from and working with the best. As a remote-first company, we empower our team to work from wherever they want, whenever they want.

name: KERNWERK
businessDescription: Our professional team of coaches & sports scientists create a new and unique "Daily Workout" for every day. Each Daily Workout is only available on this, one calendar day. This is how we combine professional fitness planning with the maximum variety in exercises and prevent boredom. The AI in our app customizes the Daily Workout before each training session based on your ability, equipment, and options: Before each workout, you can decide "live" which equipments you have available at the moment. Common equipment combinations are saved in equipment profiles (e.g. "at home", "gym"). Through feedback after each workout, our AI gets to know your fitness level better and better and adapts the Daily Workouts to your strengths and weaknesses.

name: Digital East
businessDescription: We are an international digital advertising company focused on our clients success. We are here to help you reach your target audience with intuitive self-service or premium managed campaigns. We believe in giving the best service, 24/7 at the best rates possible. Our design team can create personalised ads based on target audience and product location. You can upload your creatives or we can create them for you.

name: Billyard
businessDescription: billyard is the optimal solution to motivate your employees. In order to bind your employees to your company in the long term and to underline your attractiveness as an employer, you can offer your employees tax-free employee benefits, even at no cost. Our goal is to use leading technology to minimize your workload by 100% and to motivate your employees every day.

name: AiServe
businessDescription:
AiServe Technologies mission is to make walking safe and accessible to everyone (blind, visually impaired and elderly). Around 1 billion people worldwide. Our technology is a computer vision stack for assistance and navigation. The management team (former Microsoft, App Annie and Peel technologies employees) have excelled in startups in China and Silicon Valley and they know each other for more than 20 years.
Based on Leipzig and Berlin.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, B2B, Computer Vision, Health Care, Navigation, Software

name: Smart City Solutions
businessDescription: We establish our partners to independently collect data from various communication channels over a distance in order to create new business models, optimize processes and enable their target groups to enter the IoT world. We support both technically and strategically in the implementation of the use cases. With our data hub, we make it possible to collect data from anywhere in order to be able to use it for individual Smart City projects.
tags: Information Technology, Internet of Things, Small and Medium Businesses

name: ucair GmbH
businessDescription: ucair is the platform for simple, fast and transparent inspections of photovoltaic plants - from the air. We are using a network of more than 45 drone pilots across Germany, Italy and the Czech Republic, who use drones with attached thermografic cameras to collect radiometric data of our customers’ PV plants. After the flight, they pass on the thermography data to ucair for analysis. In the partially automated evaluation, damages to cells and modules or even complete failures of strings or inverters can be detected based on temperature differences. The results are then processed and presented to the customer in a transparent report, indicating the status of his PV plant and what he needs to do in order to receive the maximum yield.
tags: Drone Management, Drones, Energy, Renewable Energy, Solar

name: AVG Group
businessDescription: AVG Group Sarl is a specialist in Nordic ESG and Impact investments. The Nordics and specifically Norway, are the most advanced societies for furthering the ESG and Impact movement in the market place. AVG Group Sarl specializes in taking these undervalued projects and companies to the global market place.
tags: Financial Services, Professional Services, Renewable Energy

name: rfrnz
businessDescription: rfrnz contributes to intelligent digitization and supports companies and law firms in automatically checking their contracts. The Contract Intelligence Platform from rfrnz automates the analysis of contracts using artificial intelligence. We use the latest technology for this: state-of-the-art algorithms from machine learning and natural language processing. By using the Legal Tech solution from rfrnz, lawyers should be freed from routine tasks and achieve better results in their work. The Contract Intelligence Platform recognizes and extracts relevant information in contracts and documents such as topics, clauses or individual data. Unusual or missing clauses are identified. The results can be customized with your own standard or two corresponding contracts can be automatically compared to ensure that they match. The system is particularly suitable for the frequent review of individual (standard) contracts (e.g. NDA, general terms and conditions, AVV) and for the processing of large amounts of data (e.g. for legal due diligence in M&A transactions, compliance). The flexible solution from rfrnz is able to quickly learn new contract types and languages. No extensive training or labeling is required on the part of the customer, our application can be used immediately. Our contract specialists train the platform with sample clauses and the system learns to recognize clauses and content. The solution works as a standalone web application or as an integration with other systems, eg software for contract management and CRM or virtual data rooms. It can be easily integrated into existing workflows. rfrnz GmbH is a German legal tech company. Proximity to our clients and knowledge of the German legal system enables us to support law firms and legal departments in getting the most out of work and time.

name: PharmaTrace
businessDescription: PharmaTrace is a blockchain based ecosystem where the pharmaceutical industry works together to do better business based on a common distributed ledger. It is secure, fast, efficient, trustful, agile, cross-interactive, cost-saving and easy to install. Our ecosystem is built on a decentralized network, utilizing the latest blockchain technology, thus providing high-level data security, complete traceability and simplified process pathways at both local and global levels. Our bleeding edge platform leverages the blockchain, artificial intelligence, and machine learning, to protect supply chains, data exchange and integrity, in transaction channels, while also providing cost saving models and business operation upscale.

name: Beovita Vital
businessDescription: The unique periodontium gum care gel is based on a simple yet ingenious idea: black cumin oil is combined with a carrier gel. The carrier gel allows the natural power of the black cumin seed to work for a particularly long time on the gums that need acute care.  You can use the periodont gel in many ways. The application is very simple and effortless. The periodont gel can be used to fight gingivitis , bleeding gums and periodontitis /periodontal disease . In addition, the periodontium gel can be used very well against herpes.

name: betterECO
businessDescription: betterECO's platform revolutionize the procurement and offers convenient and comprehensive service, while keeping your contract partners and trading details confidential. With few clicks you can organize the procurement of organic and conventional agricultural raw materials for the food & cosmetics industry online including logistics, technology and other services. We ensure seamless traceability of your goods back to the field plot (unique selling point) and are the first service provider in the market with the ability to model the supply chain law becoming effective in Germany in 2023 with a digital solution. The platform is the modern and efficient way to organize sales and purchases including surrounding services with blockchain based backtracing for a risk reduced procurement. Customers from the food, cosmetics, and phytopharmaceutical industries will find new sources of supply and new varieties of produces.

name: camboo
businessDescription: Naturally grown bamboo is an ideal lightweight material and an environmentally friendly alternative to aluminum and carbon fibre. We use bamboo to replace the aluminum in prams, bicycles and walkers. 100% of the bamboo used is tested. This is how we guarantee the right pipe for every application. With low weight and excellent cushioning properties, bamboo strollers are attractive to the driver, passenger and the environment.

name: Pixelsplit
businessDescription: Welcome to your own indoor amusement park. Build your own indoor amusement park, manage it and convince your visitors with individually designed halls and rides that you can control yourself. Will you manage to exceed the needs of your visitors? You are the boss: Let your creativity run free and run your own customized park that fully immerse your guests into another world. Your rides are the center of attention at Indoorlands. Not only can you control them and paint them individually, you can also record and save your own ride programs. Choose from your different ride programs and let them play automatically.
tags: Console Games, PC Games, Video Games

name: Kinderheldin
businessDescription: Kinderheldin is the leading provider of digital care for pregnant women and parents in Germany. Experienced midwives and medical experts accompany you from the beginning of pregnancy until the end of the child's first year of life. Together with more than 60 health insurance and company partnerships, Kinderheldin is pursuing the mission of supporting pregnant women and parents digitally and relieving the burden on analog care structures in the health system. Kinderheldin offers a comprehensive range of digital courses for pregnancy and baby time. The individual immediate advice by experienced midwives guarantees additional care and personal coaching 7 days a week. In addition, pregnant women and parents can network and exchange ideas across Germany via the digital child heroine community.

name: Smart City System
businessDescription: Smart City System is a start up from the metropolitan region of Nuremberg that deals with the digitization of parking areas with the help of sensors. Founded in 2017 by five students, we've rapidly grown and already installed more than 45,000 sensors throughout Germany and other European countries. We digitize parking areas with the help of sensor technology to improve the search for, management and use of parking spaces in cities. In this way we want to reduce parking pressure in city centres and thus also traffic. After all, 30% of inner-city traffic is caused solely by the search for parking space. With our solution, we want to reduce traffic, the stress of citizens and, ultimately, harmful emissions in the city centre.
tags: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Enterprise Software, Information Technology, Intelligent Systems, Parking

name: VIREED
businessDescription: Virtual Reality (VR) is a computer-generated, digital world that can be experienced and made interactive with the help of special VR glasses. The immersion of human perception in the virtual world ensures a demonstrably more sustainable learning effect compared to conventional learning methods. VIREED MED is a medical virtual reality learning product for students, doctors, nurses and medical professionals to learn, train and simulate medical interventions and emergency situations.

name: The Double Alpha Factory
businessDescription:
Our values shape who we are, how we work with one another and what we represent. With a common mindset we will make sure that all our team members will work as one and our complex and growing organization will work towards achieving our purpose. We want to improve quality of investment decision by combining
user´s experience with data driven models and analytics.

name: Unipos
businessDescription: Unipos is a peer recognition and engagement suite designed to drive culture, values, productivity and collaboration. Unipos allows you to effortlessly motivate and connect your employees, manage your teams and make more strategic organisational decisions using real-time data and recognition. Unipos helps you onboard employees, spread core values, network your people and enhance transparency, all while rewarding employees with benefits they’ll love. The platform is highly customisable and easy to use. Unipos supports over 400 clients worldwide with sizes ranging from 20 to 20,000. If you value collaboration, motivation, your people and your culture, Unipos is the right tool for you.
tags: Human Resources, IT Management, Management Information Systems, Messaging, Software

name: Tec4Med
businessDescription:
TEC4MED LifeScience GmbH is providing smart Cloud-services combined with integrated hardware for End-to-End supply chain visibility. We believe that value-driven technological innovation pushes the human race forward.  
Get to know our products - visit us on: www.tec4med.com or directly get in touch with us.
tags: Clinical Trials, Home Services, Logistics, Packaging Services

name: CoinAnalyst
businessDescription: CoinAnalyst provides an artificial intelligence-based big data analytics Platform that enables investors in the digital asset sector and other industries to access a custom dashboard. The dashboard monitors and analyzes real-time data from the digital asset market (Coins/Tokens/NFTs/initial offerings). The software monitors news sources, tracks influencers, scans online social media, and provides sentiment analysis, forecast and trade signals on the top 300 digital assets (more are added regularly). Additionally, the software system provides news, price quotes and allows for messaging. A mobile version and professional terminal are in development with expected availability in Q1, 2022. The Platform is accessed through a monthly subscription model, which ranges in price depending on the plan. The plans include basic, professional, and corporate. The Platform is sold through business-to-consumer (B2C) and through business-to-business-to-consumer (B2C2C).

name: SportsTechX
businessDescription: SportsTechX is the #1 source for data & insights about startups and innovation in sports. Our mission is to promote and grow the international SportsTech ecosystem. The company is run by Benjamin Penkert and Rohn Malhotra, who developed a structured framework for the SportsTech industry and frequently publish content in form of reports (Europe, North America, Asia-Pacific, Venture Capital, Football, Fitness), a podcast show (The SportsTech Allstars), articles, newsletters, webinars, etc. SportsTechX works with investors and organisations in sports and adjacent industries helping them with market analysis and connecting them with startups. We also support select startups in business development and fundraising.

name: Blockbay
businessDescription: We provide a platform for traders of cryptocurrencies, which enables a new era of trading. Our solution will bring the maturity of classic exchanges to the new world of crypto markets. The regulation by German authorities and law provides trust for our customers and their funds. Blockbay has a well-established network to cryptotraders, exchanges, banks, auditing and law firms, consultancies, public institutions as well as to the blockchain community. With the Blockchain Research Lab we agreed on an official and strategic cooperation.

name: Durstexpress
businessDescription: With over 3700 drivers delivering a variety of over 1500 drinks directly to your door, Durstexpress is disrupting the old, tiring way of getting your drink on. No hidden fees, no extra charges, an easy bottle deposit refund solution and an outstanding customer service have won us tens of thousands of happy customers. Join us now, as we go nationwide on our mission to make discovering, buying and enjoying your favourite beverages as joyful and convenient as possible. We are a fast-growing team of over 160 experts from various fields, dedicated to creating the most customer-centric delivery experience in Germany. As part of the Oetker Group, our collaboration is guided by long term thinking, trust and teamwork. We believe in metric-driven strategy and offer a workplace shaped to fuel your ideas and ambitions. We offer you a great place to work in Berlin-Friedrichshain, directly on the Spree.

SOLARIMO plans, builds and operates solar systems on rental properties, commercial and industrial sites. We keep costs and effort away from you. Our goal is to make solar power as simple as possible. As a subsidiary of the world's leading energy service provider ENGIE, we rely on our many years of experience and the talents of our young team. Our offers are aimed explicitly at: Cooperatives: Our all-round carefree package takes the work out of your hands, ensures that you can easily switch providers and provides your tenants with cheap and green electricity without any effort. Municipal housing companies: They make a visible statement for climate protection and enable their tenants to participate in the energy revolution with cheap solar power from the roof. name: Localyzer
businessDescription:
Branches and local stores are reaching out to local audiences — provided with branded marketing materials supplied by the corporate, and with materials they create on their own.
With our Software-Solution, you find the right balance between maintaining control and simplyfing workflows so you can focus on the big picture

name: Impact
businessDescription: Impact makes it easy to measure, evaluate and visualise your organisation’s social value, social impact and sustainability without the unnecessary administrative burden of spreadsheets, manual data entry and trying to get your head around measurement frameworks.  Our intuitive SaaS solution is designed to combine all those spreadsheets and multiple tools into one. You can automatically convert your projects and actions into meaningful, accurate, and reliable social value data. Collect, communicate, and report on quantitative AND qualitative data to paint a full picture of what you’re achieving.

name: NOVA Audio Earrings
businessDescription:
NOVA Products GmbH is a Start-up based in Munich and the creator of the first and only Audio Earrings in the market. NOVA mission is to make audio invisible by blending technology and jewelry. The NOVA H1 Audio Earrings is a pair of wireless earphones hidden in a pearl and mounted on a silver- or gold-plated clip. Literally, tech meets jewelry.
 Just as ordinary headphones, the NOVA H1 Audio Earrings main function is to stream music and make phone calls. The revolutionary approach is their how. The H1 pack all technology in a 12,5 mm pearl, becoming one of the smallest earphones on the planet, and they stream any sound from the pearl to the ear canal in a manner similar to beamforming. This technology, patented by NOVA, is called Directional Sound and allows to keep the conversations and music private taking into account the H1 Audio Earrings are worn on the earlobe.

name: ResearchGermany

Airstage is not just another app - it's a new way for Artists to realize their full potential. Aspiring entertainers from all over the world who are willing to manage their careers, brands, bookings, tips and donations, and fan bases will have the opportunity to have their own personal digital assistant in the palm of their hands. We have a variety of services available on our app, ranging from geolocation to self-promotion, fan base building, management, analytics, as well as merchandising, and - more importantly - get paid!

name: 100 words
businessDescription: Conversion +17% Leads +20% Sales +25.7% This is what customers have achieved with our technology.
