Customers with these challenges use our technology? Companies... - who want to achieve higher conversions from their advertising texts by adapting their texts to the language of their customers. - who want to sell more by understanding your stakeholders better in their particularly complex sales process. - Ensure better communication with your customers by giving your sales teams a tool that gives you concrete recommendations for action when writing. - Promote diversity by eliminating linguistic bias. - who want to improve their communication processes without using expensive consultants or communication trainers. If these are also challenges for you, then test the solution at: www.100worte.de

name: the wearness
businessDescription: the wearness is an online marketplace for sustainable luxury, specializing in fashion, jewellery, accessories and beauty for women and men. Our goal is to change the image of sustainable, fair and locally produced fashion through a carefully curated selection of products. The fashion industry has changed rapidly in recent years. Collections are changing more frequently than ever before and global textile consumption has doubled since 2000. More and more items of clothing that are moving from the rack to the closet and from the closet to the container have set in motion a colossal process of alienation: fashion no longer means anything to us. And has become disposable. What does that leave behind? Mountains of discarded clothing that was produced far away because it was as cheap as possible. How a garment is made who worked on it under what conditions – that is hardly comprehensible. What is certain is that the clothing industry ranks second in the ranking of environmental sinners, just behind the oil industry. Sustainable fashion can be a way out, but it still has to contend with a crooked image: fair clothing and high fashion are mutually exclusive. the wearness wants to change the previous perception of ethically impeccable luxury. We want to offer fashion-conscious customers a positive shopping alternative - aesthetic, uncomplicated, but with a clear conscience. We have personally selected every product that can be bought at the wearness. We only work with manufacturers and designers who run their business with respect for people and planet and who meet our three most important criteria: good, timeless design, impeccable quality and sustainable production methods. What is shopped on the wearness has a story. And each of these stories fills the closet with pride.
tags: E-Commerce, E-Commerce Platforms, Fashion, Lifestyle, Sustainability

name: CCEX
businessDescription: CCEX Cloud Commodities Exchange GmbH enables Cloud Computing Resources e.g. IaaS, PaaS, etc. to be traded similar to traditional commodities such as crude oil, gas, electricity, etc. via already existing exchanges such as Singapore Exchange - SGX, Hong Kong Exchange - HKEX, London Stock Exchange - LSE, New York Stock Exchange - NYSE, Deutsche Börse, etc. With exchange-traded cloud computing, CCEX is introducing a whole new Asset Class to Cloud Consumers, Cloud Providers, Banks and Exchanges. That asset is the most in-demand commodity of our times, as essential to the world economy in the 21st century as oil was in the 20th. To make this happen, CCEX will do to cloud computing exactly what was done to oil in the 1970s, and to every other widely-demanded commodity in the history of the world: CCEX will define Cloud Benchmarks, license Cloud Benchmarks / Order Books (Revenue Share with Exchanges) and create Cloud Indices.

The individual conception of a sustainable IT security strategy forms the basis for this. Through our actions, we not only secure the continued existence of companies, but also jobs for society. tags: Cyber Security, Information Technology, Network Security

name: Cloudical
businessDescription: Cloudical is the creator of VanillaStack, the Open-Source Enterprise Kubernetes Stack, intended to simplify our customer's cloud-experience by integrating the best Open-Source Cloud-Frameworks into one great package. To us, Kubernetes is our operating system, and everything on top of Kubernetes should be easy and simple to roll-out. No more terminals, no more SSH'ing around - just a simple Web-GUI, understandable and carefully selected options, and a single promise: It simply works. With VanillaStack, we want to change the way, cloud is perceived: Simplicity and easy-of-use should not be limited to Hyperscaler-offerings. Instead, it should be available everywhere - on premises, on VMs, on Private Cloud environments, on Public Clouds, on AWS, Azure and Google Cloud. VanillaStack is more than just a simple way of installing and running your cloud-native workloads, it aims to become a complete Open-Source ecosystem: As open as Open-Source, as easy to be used as proprietary offerings. With VanillaStore, we are going to integrate awesome solutions, regardless of Open-Source or proprietary, into one environment. As a customer, you always have the choice: Install whatever you want using the great open-source tools and approaches, or utilize VanillaStore for rolling it out in minutes.

name: idatase GmbH
businessDescription: Unfortunately still today, two thirds of IoT initiatives fail, from which 60% stall at the PoC state Cisco Survey, 2017). The NetLume innovation platform solves the key problem of the “human factor” for successful IoT initiatives by integrating domain experts and business into the IoT domain. Semantic Digital Twins fuse human readability with machine interpretability. In combination with the NetLume ECA design process for rapid prototyping the platform allows the development of operative MVPs already at the PoC stage. The key diﬀerence between NetLume and other IoT platforms is a distinct focus on the problem and analytics domain instead of data management and computational services. NetLume is therefore able to augment IoT platforms and your existing infrastructure, to enable rapid ECA prototyping of intelligent systems based on the asset and data management or even analytic processing structures of other underlying IoT platforms. The so far unique focus of NetLume is to systematically enter a new realm we call Internet of Analytics in which AI systems solve use-case speciﬁc problems from analytic models, methods and machine learning algorithms.

In PRECISION CAPTURING a protein A-like scaffold serves for an antibody-like capture step even of non-Fc bearing molecules. Navigo Proteins’ unique protein engineering expertise is the basis a world-wide unique, versatile scaffold proteins platform. Our robust, rapid and reliable high-throughput-based, robotics assisted platform designs, produces, analyzes and selects suitable affinity ligand proteins, optimized for their tasks in industrial downstream processing or as biopharmaceutical drugs.

longBusinessDescription:
ShakeSpeare® streamlines workflows. ShakeSpeare® Software from 42DBS GmbH, a subsidiary of the Zejn Group from Slovenia, is headquartered in Munich, Germany. It's a cutting-edge Document Management System (DMS) with a robust Business Process Management (BPM) engine. Featuring an intuitive user interface, it integrates seamlessly with hundreds of Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and Business Process Automation (BPA) plugins, facilitating advanced process automation.

businessDescription: Platformly is a suite of tools for multi-channel marketing automation. From capturing and nurturing leads to turning them into customers and raving brand advocates, Platformly provides everything you need to build and grow a successful online business.

businessDescription: We are a young and dynamic e-commerce startup near Regensburg, which is passionate about developing high-quality products for your optimal cycling experience. In our products we combine safety, quality and progress to guarantee you the best possible driving pleasure. Conquer new terrain, feel the wind, the freedom and experience nature - we make sure that you are perfectly equipped for this! VELMIA - always a bike length ahead! We work around the clock to optimize and further develop our products, our service and our skills. In doing so, we focus solely on the needs of our customers. We love the process, because the way is the goal. This is how we create long-lasting products that bring you joy and accompany you for a long time. We are always looking for progress and open to any feedback.

businessDescription: SINGE GmbH is a multi-media company focused on gender equality, travel, integration and immigration. Headquartered in Berlin, Germany, we operate in the service and education sectors worldwide. SINGE GmbH develops and produces digital and live events, from workshops and seminars to full course curriculums, corporate policy and professional training, that promote gender equality, physical safety, and inclusion. Our products promote accessible, replicable, and scalable solutions that integrate technology with hyper-localization, working directly with stakeholders to create a hybrid approach that maximizes the full potential of our clients.

name: Chainsulting
businessDescription: Chainsulting is a consulting and development company, on the subject of Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT) & Digital Assets. We show ways, opportunities, risks and offer comprehensive solutions. Chainsulting was founded in 2017 by the managing directors Florian Protschka and Yannik Heinze and has grown up to 20+ employees. Since 2021 the brand Chainsulting is part of SOFTSTACK GmbH. Blockchain today provides an incredible amount of opportunities for enterprises. For example, we are witnessing the beginning of a new era in the financial system. Chainsulting wants to give as many companies as possible the chance to participate.
tags: Bitcoin, Blockchain, Consulting, Cryptocurrency, Ethereum, Financial Services, Information Technology, Internet, Software

name: Colorimetrix
businessDescription: At Colorimetrix we digitise analogue colorimetric tests. How we do this? We can turn any smartphone into a portable spectrophotometer. This way we read and interpret concentration values of the substances we measure on any colorimetric test (strips, dipsticks, lateral-flow tests, microplates, solution based assays).
tags: Apps, Fertility, Health Diagnostics, Home Health Care, Medical, Medical Device, Personal Health, Software, Wellness, Women's

name: Brainalyzed
businessDescription: Our goal in developing Brainalyzed Insight was to make the power of Artificial Intelligence accessible to mid-sized companies. It delivers the answer to business questions as a complete AI solution. It can be connected in parallel to a variety of data sources and develops highly efficient models of artificial intelligence without the intervention of data scientists. These models provide a higher prediction accuracy, because the inputs, network structure and neuron weighting were optimized for the data and the purpose of the business case. This ensures that the swarm of artificial intelligence is perfectly matched to the data volume and represents the best compromise between overfitting and underfitting. This optimization is fully automated! It uses multiple performance parameters and dramatically improves predictive stability compared to a single model of artificial intelligence.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Finance, FinTech, Information Technology, Machine Learning

name: TalentBait
businessDescription: TalentBait helps you easily and cost-effectively post your vacancies on social media and target suitable candidates. Start today with a job posting on one of over 15 social recruiting channels , tailored to your vacancy.

businessDescription: Since May 2017, Conmetall GmbH & Co.KG and Meister Werkzeuge GmbH have merged under the company name Conmetall Meister GmbH and have long been part of the Würth Group, Künzelsau. Conmetall Meister is headquartered in Celle and has a branch in Wuppertal. We are a reliable player in the supplier scene for the DIY trade. We are well known to the top retailers in the industry as a supplier of hand tools, plumbing, garden equipment, small hardware and fittings, power tools and electrical installation material. Modern quality products in every breadth and depth desired by the customer (over 35,000 products with a high degree of innovation) and an absolute focus on service are valued by our trading partners. Conmetall Meister is a future-oriented company and therefore focuses on modernizing the required technology. As an international company, Conmetall Meister has subsidiaries in China (specializing in sourcing, purchasing and its own set-up activities (Shanghai), but also the sales companies in Hong Kong), France, Belgium, Spain and the Czech Republic.

name: medicalmotion
businessDescription: medicalmotion (MM) is an AI-based digital physiotherapy platform to treat chronic pain with multimodal methods using highly individualized programs. This issue is the #1 driver of lost work days worldwide and has created a multi-trillion dollar pain-relief market which until now has had lackluster results.

businessDescription: MindMatch is a sourcing solution which helps recruiters increase the online reach of their jobs. This is done by an ad-distribution network paired with a matching system which targets the right candidates.  With sourcing applications being the costliest part of the recruitment process, MindMatch solves one of the biggest problems currently faced by recruiters and HR professionals. Targeted job ads increase the likelihood of a candidate applying, this way the recruiter can receive more candidates from the web and not worry about posting on multiple channels. We at MindMatch believe that technology can be deployed to make people much more productive.

name: HD Vision Systems
businessDescription: HD Vision Systems pushes the technology forward to close the gap between expensive 3D scanners and services and the need for high-performance systems for costumers. Our new technology significantly saves time in modelling and post-processing. It directly generates highly accurate measurements of shape and geometry in addition to surface properties such as colors, reflectivity and normals of real-world, complex objects. The HD Vision Systems'​ Scanner LumiScan+ and LumiScan1 offers customers time and cost reduction in the development, improvement and testing of products.

We haven't reached our goal yet, but we're on the right track! Working together in partnership, personal responsibility, but also a lot of creative freedom and entrepreneurial spirit for our vision are the basis for our common success story. Are you a visionary too? Then send us your application and become number 1 in Germany with us!

On the Viantro platform you have access to almost all jobs in Germany, you get all-round relief and you can apply with one click. Viantro. From doctors for doctors - your partner at eye level.

With this goal in mind, we developed our Smoothie Bowls and Bliss Balls. From breakfast to afternoon snack, you can feel good about your diet, no matter how busy your day is! And best of all - it's easy too.

name: Cadeia
businessDescription: Cadeia is a financial technology company with the vision to make global capital market transactions and financial products more secure and efficient for both, issuers and investors alike. Based on novel distributed ledger technologies, Cadeia develops and operates the Digital Services Platform (DSP) for complex financial products, catering to the needs of banks, asset managers, insurance companies and pension funds, among others. The DSP allows for the efficient structuring, issuance and settlement of complex financial products (e.g. asset-backed securities or syndicated loans but also simple bonds). In addition to enhanced servicing functionalities and a rule-based cash-flow distribution solution, the platform also offers reporting, compliance and analytics tools for issuers and investors. At its core, a blockchain-agnostic Smart Contract Engine (SCE) allows for the automated execution of legal contracts, transactions, and payments. Founded by an experienced and diverse team of investment banking veterans, financial technology enthusiasts, and digital asset experts with a combined +100 years in the market, the company aims to build a holistic solution to critical business problems from a client-centric perspective.

name: hocaboo
businessDescription: The hocaboo app will boost your hospitality career - it's easy to use, fast and free. Chat with potential employers to decide where your next challenge will take you. Embrace the possibilities of our modern recruiting tool and guide your company into the 21st century. We know the industry and offer solutions to support your human resource and recruiting. Stop running on skeleton crew and find new staff today.

name: Coinlend
businessDescription: Our main goal was to make this as easy as possible and to create a simple to use interface. You just have to register an account at Coinlend and enter your API credentials for Poloniex and/or Bitfinex on the account page. The Bot will then check your accounts on Poloniex and/or Bitfinex and create new loans with optimal interest rate if necessary.  The bot and the algorithm was developed and improved over years for private use Coinlend.org went online in June 2017. In December 2017 we incorporated the Coinlend GmbH in Mannheim, Germany.

name: FAIRLING
businessDescription: FAIRLING is a new platform that connects labels with independent retail stores. Meanwhile, the stores in our network profit through highly relevant product recommendations that are optimized to their individual assortment and needs. Why are we able to do this? Our Local Shopping App FINDELING connects us to more than 1,5K handpicked stores in the major cities of Europe.

businessDescription: A Travel-Tech startup based in Hamburg, operating the world’s largest community of trustworthy travelers. We are driven to be the global go-to community to inspire travelers to create and start living the experience of their lives. Together we have successfully connected over 200,000 travelers from all around the world. To this very day, we have accomplished to be the number one fastest growing travel startup in Germany. Including the title of the 16th fastest growing startup companies here in Germany. We provide travelers with a platform where they can book or create unique trips that cannot be found elsewhere. Our mission is to connect and empower travelers to create, discover, and join unique experiences. We believe nothing brings together two strangers with different backgrounds more than traveling. This is what drives our diverse team to support our clients with the best possible experience.

name: Melodrive Inc.

Our AI and data science experts are as adaptive as the music our AI system generates. Whether it's music information retrieval, game and behavioural AI, sound design or simply machine learning, we'll handle it with creativity, openness and ownership. These values are wired into our work, so that we continuously cooperate towards delivering you the output you deserve.

name: Soulside
businessDescription: We are Soulside, a Berlin-based Startup creating a 3D Social Media giving people space for expression, for creativity, and for fun. We want to place our users at the center of our platform and through technology enable them to interact & discover who themselves and the others are. We want to help people and improve their relationship with others, with themselves but also with digital social media. Our mission is to give those who cannot express themselves on classical social media the tools to express themselves without the fear of being judged and with a real opportunity to share who they truly are. Incorporated in a 3D environment, we display and offer people a creative, funny, and well-being social media app. At Soulside, we want to build a culturally responsible tech company that values individuality, privacy, and the data of our users.
tags: Apps, Art, Communities, Content, Digital Entertainment, Mobile Apps, Social Media, Social Network

name: Rehappy
businessDescription: Rehappy is the first digital health application (DiGA, so-called app on prescription) for stroke aftercare. Our Rehappy app is a digital support that helps exactly where the medical staff can hardly reach - at home! When developing Rehappy, we spoke to many stroke victims, their families and professionals to find out what those affected really need in their changed everyday life - stroke-specific knowledge and motivation. With the Rehappy app, this has resulted in individual everyday support for all those affected by a stroke. The Rehappy app helps those affected to find their way around better in their changed everyday life and to reduce excessive demands through targeted, well-founded information. In addition, the app adapts to each individual affected person and their situation thanks to its modular structure. Daily feedback on the progress made, individually set goals and the latest scientific findings inspire Rehappy users to keep going and go their own personal path to recovery. Rehappy is the first digital health application (DiGA) tested and approved by the Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices (BfArM) in the field of stroke and starts where inpatient rehabilitation stops. With individual motivation and information, Rehappy helps those affected by a stroke to restructure their changed everyday life and reduce excessive demands.

name: ADAMOS
businessDescription: ADAMOS was founded as a strategic alliance for the future topics of Industry 4.0 and the Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT). ADAMOS stands for ADAptive Manufacturing Open Solutions. ADAMOS is the first alliance of global market leaders in mechanical and plant engineering. The ADAMOS alliance aims at combining the know-how from mechanical engineering, production and information technology to produce a high level of added value and establishing standards for digital production. ADAMOS is particularly tailored to the needs of the mechanical and plant engineering industry and its customers. ADAMOS offers an open, manufacturer neutral IIoT environment based on leading technologies. Through innovative solutions and services ADAMOS drives digitalization for mechanical and plant engineering.

name: BOTfriends
businessDescription: BOTfriends is specialized in the development and design of conversational AI applications such as chatbots and voicebots. In this way, BOTfriends aims to accelerate the automation of customer communication and significantly drive the use of corresponding applications. BOTfriends was founded in 2017 and employs 18 people in addition to the four-person founding team. Its customers include medium-sized businesses and well-known companies from Germany such as Porsche, Telekom, and Innogy, as well as international customers from the USA, among others. Further information at www.botfriends.com.

We provide full range of STO services, namely fundraising, exchange, investor relations, and marketing. name: Medipee
businessDescription: The eHealth start-up was initiated in 2017 by the founders Thomas Prokopp, Paul Bandi and Frank Willems. Medipee is developing an app-controlled system for non-contact urinalysis for standard toilets, using a plug and play solution. The app and the device are already approved as medical devices and the company is certified according to DIN/ISO 13485. The company has several patent families and the system can be used universally. Using modern analysis methods such as artificial intelligence, future diseases can be detected earlier in the future.

name: QuantiCor Security
businessDescription: QuantiCor Security is a startup in Darmstadt, the digital hub for cyber security in Germany, which has been evolved out of Darmstadt University of Technology. It has committed itself to serve as an interface between science and business. Our vision is a secure world protected against quantum computer attacks. We offer the next generation of innovative security solutions. Virtually all asymmetric cryptosystems used in practice, e.g. RSA, can efficiently be broken by means of quantum computers such that any protection is lost. QuantiCor Security provides quantum computer-resistant security solutions encompassing encryption and signature algorithms that are developed based on the most current research. Furthermore, they are embedded into innovative applications ensuring very high security standards. We support you with your various design decisions around quantum-safe applications, quantum-safe IoT and blockchain applications in general.
tags: Cloud Security, Cyber Security, Identity Management, Network Security, Quantum Computing

name: impltech
businessDescription: We help companies worldwide assemble development teams and create world-class software. Companies that wish to fuel business growth with technology. Our clientele have in us a long-term technology partner and trusted advisor for software development, cloud computing, product design and dedicated teams. Do good and the good will come to you. The headquarter is Hamburg. All companies of the Baufi24 Group, which include Kredit24 GmbH, LoanLink24 Mortgage GmbH and FinLink GmbH, deliver fast and modern solutions in real estate financing. As an independent, founder-managed company, the Baufi24 Group drives innovation in the credit industry and enables a fair, personal and transparent customer experience.

Test design and usability enable tracking of memory performance over time, longitudinally. neotiv also provides customizable health questionnaires and adapted versions of established neuropsychological tests.

Automated upselling & guest communication that helps you engage with your guests and covert more

name: sustainabill
businessDescription: We are technology enthusiasts with excellent software skills. This allows your supply chain to be visualized and analyzed 1000 times faster than with conventional database technologies. All data in our platform is hosted and processed in the EU. We use Deutsche Telekom's Open Cloud to protect your data at the physical, network, host, application and data layers. All processes are 100% GDPR compliant. Our platform has a RestAPI for easy integration with other apps and services. If optimum data integrity is required, data can be stored in the blockchain. Of course, the platform also allows flexible importing and exporting via CSV.

Shaping clothing is available in a wide variety of variants: Classic  abdominal panties ,  figure- shaping  panties  with a high waistband,  body shapers , usually  corsages  or shaping  corsets ,  girdle pants ,  girdle dresses and shaping  skirts . All of these body shapers belong to the shapewear family and ensure that women feel comfortable in their own skin. Shapewear hides unwanted love handles, conjures up a smaller waist, a flat stomach, a more voluptuous or smaller décolleté, a shapely bottom and slimmer thighs. Gone are the days when shapewear had a reputation for restricting movement! We put an end to the old-fashioned image! Our shapers are breathable, skin-friendly and feel like a second skin.

Every day, employees decide how they want to get from A to B according to their personal needs – whether by bus, train or sharing services. You can submit the mobility expenses incurred using the MOBIKO app. Employees receive a tax-compliant reimbursement of their expenses when their salary is transferred.

businessDescription:
Electron Quasar is a brand new experience from its design to its speed, from its technology to its power.
In order to reach a speed that pushes the limits, it can reach a total power of over 2300 HP with four electric motors strategically placed on each wheel. Thanks to the Elektron Smart Torque Vectoring System (ESTV), which belongs to Elektron Motor, it is ensured that the vehicle has the most optimum road holding by controlling the torque going to each of the four wheels separately in the corner. With the support of this system and an incredible power unit, Quasar, which can reach 0 to 100 in 1.65 seconds, practically teleports its driver to a different dimension. The maximum speed of this hypercar is limited to 450 km / h. In order to optimize the maximum speed and acceleration, there are two two-stage gearboxes at the front and rear. Despite all its equipment, Quasar, which is much lighter than a normal electric car, weighs 1500 Kg.

name: sigo
businessDescription: sigo is a start-up based in Darmstadt that operates shared e-cargo bikes. With its inductive charging stations, the company is one of the first Germany-wide providers of a fully automatic e-cargo bike system. Special cargo bikes adapted to rental were developed for the sharing operation: high-quality technology, robust, easy to use. The bikes are charged inductively at a stationary charging station so that they are quickly available. Thanks to an app, lending is not tied to opening times. sigo runs a B2B2C business model, which is aimed at end users on the one hand and partners such as the housing industry, municipalities, institutions, local public transport, energy suppliers and project developers on the other. The sharing model makes quarters more attractive for tenants, parking spaces become obsolete and ultimately the use of the sigo cargo bike helps to calm down the cities and protect the climate. The company was founded in May 2017 by Tobias Lochen. In February 2020, the first location in Darmstadt was opened in cooperation with Nassauische Heimstätte. The roll-out of other locations then started, e.g. B. in Bochum, Hanover, Solingen and Wiesbaden. Further stations are being implemented. The NET Materials® consist of a combination of CO2-lowering biocarbons with different binders.  The biocarbons are produced worldwide at decentralized locations from local biogenic residues and problematic substances by means of a further developed pyrolytic carbonization.  As an attractive by-product, large amounts of excess, base-load renewable energy are created.

name: PlanBlue
businessDescription: Planblue is providing an intelligent (detailed) seafloor mapping technology, a so-called ‘Underwater Satellite’. This Underwater Satellite is used to improve ocean conservation and support (environmentally-friendly) industrial activities. Planblue's Underwater Satellite is able to automatically scan and map the seafloor, as well as man-made underwater constructions. It combines hyperspectral and RGB imaging with underwater navigation and artificial intelligence. The technology can be trained to identify and map many things, incl. plastic waste pollution on the seafloor, the effect of climate change on the health status of our seafloor, the degradation of underwater constructions, presence of invasive algae, biodiversity, algal growth for biofuels, etc. As such, our technology can be used for long-time monitoring of seafloor areas, to conduct environmental impact analyses and to inspect underwater constructions with high precision and at low cost.

Since 2017, the trio of founders and their team of around 20 have been working ceaselessly on this technology to transform their customers' supply chains into an intelligent, digital, collaborative network. name: Lumobiotics
businessDescription: Lumobiotics develops light-controllable peptide drugs as safe cytolytic agents for treatment of solid cancers and localized infectious diseases. We are dedicated to fostering the development of chemotherapeutics based on the technology platform, utilizing molecular photoswitches. Our drug candidates are peptidic therapeutics, modified by photoisomerizable building blocks. They can toggle between two forms, inactive and active, upon irradiation with light of different wavelength. The inactive (and non-toxic) photoswitchable peptidic drugs are administered to the patients. Switching the biological activity “on” with non-thermal red light irradiation in the sites of lesions (tumors, wounds) allows avoiding side-effects in the healthy tissues.

The software gives insurance companies more flexibility and faster time-to-market resulting in significantly lower total cost of ownership and is different to the existing market of core insurance software being a "no-code"-platform: integration of the technology, adaptions of products, underwriting, pricing, etc. can be solely managed by the insurances' business departments without any IT resources.

After many years of research and practice, our believe is that online therapy works - as long as it meets the same quality standards as traditional psychotherapy does. Therefore, our therapists as well as the therapy content,  processes and outcomes are constantly subject to evaluation by our research partners and the high standards of Schoen Clinic’s quality management.

name: Lab-on-Fiber
businessDescription: Lab-on-Fiber GmbH develops the most advanced surgical laser probes in the market, equipped with the worldwide first intrinsic sensory function. The award winning innovation of Lab-on-Fiber will significantly increase patient safety, shorten operation times, increase treatment success, avoid repetitive application and open up new fields of application for laser surgery. Among sensory fiber probes, Lab-on-Fiber offers also cost-effective and robust plug-and-play surgical probes for almost all indications where laser surgery is applicable from urology to laser thermo-therapy, laser-assisted lipolysis and EVLA. Selected Indications of Lab-on-Fiber laser probes can be listed but not limited to: Endovenous Laser Treatment, Laser Assisted Lipolysis, Percutaneous Laser Disc Decompression, Dacryocystorhinostomy, ENT Applications, Excision of Tumors, Tonsillectomy, Chondroplasty, Pneumology. Soft tissue sections (e.g. urethral stricture, posterior urethral valves, endopyelotomy, bladder neck contractures), resection and ablation (e.g. benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), condyloma, penile carcinoma, bladder and skin hemangioma), lithotripsy (e.g. renal pelvis, ureter and bladder), tissue coagulation (e.g. vasectomy, incision, diverticulum or fistulas, bladder augmentation, and urinary diversion) The company’s customers are surgical device manufacturers, clinics and practitioners as well as OEM partners.

name: Lukso
businessDescription: LUKSO is a blockchain platform specifically created for the lifestyle industry, providing a decentralised innovation and trust infrastructure for fashion brands, start-ups and customers. It offers the foundation for new forms automated economic interactions and sustainable ownership management. LUKSO makes it possible to create digital lives for real-life products with a combination of sewn-in chips, smart contracts, and user interfaces. The digital twin of a physical fashion item uncovers and preserves its unique history and value: this includes the knowledge about its producers, authenticity, provenance, previous owners, or about its order in a batch of production. The newfound knowledge about a fashion item then becomes a source of luxury in its own. The LUKSO architecture encourages its users to design and deploy an infinite number of innovative features for the modern fashion system: it opens up digital wardrobes and sharing economies, secures IP rights and authenticity, enables omnichannel communications and new ways of funding collections. Through their new interaction channels on the LUKSO blockchain, creators, consumers, and curators can become collaborators.  They may now engage in a seamless brand experience along their physical, digital, and virtual touchpoints. By providing these technological building blocks, LUKSO empowers the ecosystem to move fashion forward.

Spomoco Smart Timetable Manager is based on a matrix structure, so as a member, you can connect with any trainers on the system.

name: QLEX
businessDescription: The main performance gain is due to the innovative design of the propulsion system. The UAV was uncompromisingly designed for winged flight. With this approach, we were able to take further performance improving steps almost like a domino effect. Moreover, many aerodynamic details and an affection for light weight design helped to reach this outstanding performance. In many fields of development (aerodynamics, structure, propulsion, electronics and battery), we were able to get close to the optimum. With persistency and a little luck, we were able to form an outstanding team of industry experts.

name: AIM3D
businessDescription: AIM3D GmbH was founded in Rostock in 2017. As a system manufacturer, we have made it our goal to revolutionize metal 3D printing. After intensive work, our young engineering team succeeded in exceeding this goal with the development of the cost-effective multi-material printer ExAM 255. With the ExAM 255 it is now possible to print products made of metals, ceramics, plastics and reinforced plastics on the basis of standard injection molding granules without costly machine conversions.

name: BeastBI GmbH
businessDescription: Beast.bi - Digital Analytics made simple Beast.bi GmbH combines marketing agency with marketing SaaS solution online marketing agency - we have specialized in data-driven online marketing. We analyze the advertising accounts of our customers and then make data-based, logical decisions. IT - SaaS development - with our accumulated experience, we have developed a SaaS solution that automatically analyzes advertising accounts, evaluates them and then gives intelligent recommendations for action. In our opinion, this is the future of marketing controlling. The founders, Heinz Klemann and Tiberiu Novac, are both experts in the field of marketing technology with many years of experience. They are supported by a young team of developers and a competent marketing team. Our vision is by 2025 to give every marketing manager our SaaS solution to support him or her in the daily analysis of numbers and data, reduce wrong decisions and automate standard processes. Our SaaS solution can currently be tested in the beta version free of charge.

name: Perseus
businessDescription: Perseus provides a comprehensive but simple Security-as-a-Service solution to SMEs for their cyber security and GDPR compliance. It includes assessment, continuous risk management, human and AI-based prevention, incident management and insurance. Its system, starting with an AI-based security scoring model that continuously calculates and updates risk scores, automatically suggests measures to prevent breaches and adjusts risk scores based on the security technology used.
tags: Cyber Security, InsurTech, Internet, IT Management, Network Security, Privacy

name: Joyn GmbH
businessDescription: Joyn is a cross-provider entertainment streaming platform. Joyn offers a great variety of free services with numerous live TV channels, series, documentaries and films on demand, media libraries and sports content from ProSiebenSat.1, Discovery and other content partners, all bundled on one platform. Users get even more entertainment with the Joyn PLUS+ premium offer. It includes additional pay TV channels and even more on-demand content such as exclusives and originals. Users can stream their content on iOS, Android, and Huawei devices as well as on the web and via smart TVs, Google Chromecast, PlayStation 4 & 5, Apple TV, and Amazon Fire TV. The aim is to create a comprehensive German OTT platform of cross-provider content.
tags: Content, Media and Entertainment, TV, Video Streaming

name: Penseo
businessDescription: A monthly fee is charged for using the Penseo platform. This depends on the number of managed contracts. Because the company pension also reduces the employer's contribution to social security through deferred compensation, companies usually do not incur any additional costs. Brokers and companies pay a monthly fee to use the platform. This depends on the number of active contracts managed.

name: Exponenta
businessDescription: The VXV crypto is a decentralized and open-source cryptocurrency that offers privacy and security features. Transactions on the VXV network are untraceable, meaning that your identity is safe. Additionally, VXV has a built-in exchange that allows you to trade your currency for other cryptocurrencies or fiat currencies easily. VXV crypto is a decentralized cryptocurrency that uses a peer-to-peer network to validate transactions. This means that no central authority, such as a bank controls the currency. Instead, the currency managed by the users of the network. Transactions are verified by nodes, which are computers that run the VXV crypto software. These nodes work together to verify and record all transactions made on the network. The VXV network is secure and efficient and allows users to send and receive payments anywhere in the world without needing a third party.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Information Services, Information Technology

name: alphin
businessDescription: alphin is the leading marketing platform for local businesses in Europe. alphin provides local business owners with easy and affordable software solutions to centralize and automate their full customer lifecycle management. Currently, 1000+ local businesses in Austria, Germany, Israel and the UK rely on alphin, when it comes to winning and retaining clients through all relevant online channels. Digital marketing offers local companies unprecedented opportunities to grow quickly and sustainably. With alphin 80+ digital native and local loving people from all over the world made it their mission to ensure that every single local business can benefit from it. And that every local business owner can thereby focus on what they really love: their business.
tags: Advertising, Local Business, Marketing, Retail, SaaS, Software

name: METALSALE
businessDescription: Schrott24 took over the competitor METALSALE at the end of August 2019. METALSALE was founded in Cologne in 2017 by Jochen Kuritz and Gerrit Mewes and has so far operated Europe's largest trading platform for non-ferrous metals at www.METALSALE.com. Since it was founded, METALSALE has been able to attract well-known investors such as the 10x Group, Kristofer Fichtner and Gerald Schönbucher and has recently achieved monthly sales of around one million euros. Schrott24 takes over all relevant assets from METALSALE. It was agreed not to disclose the purchase price. The online trading platform at www.METALSALE.com will be transferred to schrott24.de or schrott24.at with effect from August 31, 2019 at the latest. Except for the new company name, nothing will change for the previous METALSALE customers: Business will continue as usual.

name: Blockwall Management
businessDescription: Blockwall is an independent venture capital firm that invests with its funds in the evolution of the internet and is dedicated to the development of Web 3.0 and decentralized technologies (Blockchain). We are hands-on investors and leverage our extensive venture expertise, operational knowledge as well as market access and our global network when partnering with entrepreneurs to accelerate their success. As experts and thought leaders in Blockchain we attract the best founders to partner with us. Our vision is to support innovation in Europe and democratize trust in a digital world. Blockchain and the development towards Web 3.0 is the necessary next evolution of the internet - empowering every individual, device, and entity to control their data.

name: YOLAWO
businessDescription: Shared sports experiences and working together in a club inspire us. In order to enable all clubs to have an active club life, we want to make organizing club offers as easy as possible. Yolawo is a booking system that helps sports clubs to organize their club offers more easily. The system enables club offers to be made available on the club's own website for online booking. It reduces the administrative effort for club managers by up to 70%.

name: Keyword Hero
businessDescription: Keyword Hero puts together nine different sources of data, including your Google Analytics and Search Console data via Google certified API access, to get a sound data basis for analysis. Massive parallel, cloud based Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning algorithms statistically match search phrases to your sessions and cluster them. Keyword Hero uploads the data back to a new Google Analytics property, allowing you to analyse your new data set in a familiar setting without interfering with your original data

name: JOIN
businessDescription: Great companies are made by great people. We understand that hiring those people is especially important in a small or medium sized growing company. But talent attraction and hiring can be time consuming and frustrating. To fix that we’ve democratised talent attraction to make the process faster, easier and more accessible for everyone. JOIN was created in 2018 and has grown to have over 45,000 clients posting their open positions, and more than 15,000 candidates applying per day for their dream jobs, that’s why we’re now Europe’s fastest growing HR Tech company.  JOIN’s streamlined recruitment tool allows our clients to build job ads, promote them on free and premium job boards, and manage candidates easily, as well as having a wealth of expert information to help our clients hire better.

name: Dandelin
businessDescription: Dandelin is a Berlin based FinTech Startup that's using sharing economy principles in order to democratise Health Care. We face a troubled period, aggravated by the pandemic, and unfortunately, we will not be able to continue offering services in the way our conviction as a company guides us.
tags: FinTech, Health Care, Health Insurance, InsurTech, Personal Health

name: snabBus
businessDescription: Simply rent a coach online! Snapbus makes coach hire a breeze. We automatically compare hundreds of buses from bus companies in your region for you. You save time and money and drive safely and comfortably.
tags: Information Services, Transportation, Travel, Travel Agency

name: listnride
businessDescription: ListNRide is an online booking platform that allows you to rent a bike of any kind at any location in an uncomplicated and secure way. For the supply side we provide professional tools to efficiently manage rental fleets and offer test rides to potential buyers. On the demand side, ListNRide provides direct access to bookable inventory combined with secure and convenient bookings and payment. We support tenants, rental companies and bike brands with our digital solutions to improve the access to a bicycle-friendly community. Any time, any place! Through our platform, we transform every place into a destination that is full of bicycling opportunities. Cycling is becoming a constant companion in everyday life and the embodiment of sustainable mobility. In the city, during holidays or for outdoor activities.

name: Verovaccines
businessDescription: VEROVACCiNES develops and markets a novel class of innovative, proprietary subunit marker vaccines for animal health. The technology provides a validated solution to the industry's need for cost effective vaccines, reduce immunization effort and reduced use of antibiotics. A recent development allows to combine several antigens (immunity generating substances) in an single vaccine without increasing production costs. This allows e.g. to target different pathogens with a single vaccine or to generate broad band vaccines targeting immunity evading variants of the same pathogen.  The company has a pipeline of 5 vaccine programs at various developmental stages. Four of these programs have already been validated (proof of concept). Several candidates have blockbuster potential. We are developing vaccine solutions for poultry, swine and ruminants.

name: NanoWired GmbH
businessDescription: The combination of 7 years of research at the Technical University of Darmstadt  and many years of management experience in industry has led us to the founding of NanoWired GmbH. Meanwhile, a highly motivated team, including in the fields of chemistry and materials science, drives the technology of NanoWired GmbH daily forward.

name: Fainin
businessDescription: Fainin is a sharing community which unlocks the benefits of access over ownership. We connect people to the things they need or want, help create new experiences, build relationships and support a sustainable environment. Fainin’s community run marketplace offers access to thousands of items to users, from action cameras for adventures, power tools to install a new kitchen or professional music equipment for a travelling artist. Fainin’s unique inclusive platform opens up entrepreneurship to anyone through the monetization of their belongings. Leveraging an end-to-end insurance policy facilitates secure transactions to help drive trust within the community. By supporting the transition to a shared economy with a easy-to-use app, Fainin aims to be the world's leading sharing platform. Frustrated by the resources and limitations required to access certain items Fainin’s founders were united by a passion for the sharing economy and a drive to support a more sustainable environment. In the summer of 2017 they set out to build a product that makes a real impact on the way people live, connect and share and ultimately make sharing cheaper, better, easier and more fun.

name: 4Gene
businessDescription: 4GENE develops and produces natural, biotechnologically engineered, activatable small molecules. Products are marketed as FLAVOR-ON-DEMAND to cosmetics and pharma and as SNIFF&SAVE® to industry customers worldwide. Our innovative solutions for cosmetics, pharma and industry: the molecule becomes chemically inactive through glycosylation and can be reactivated when needed in cosmetic products, the molecules of active pharmaceuticals are bonded to a glucose molecule; they have an antimicrobial effect and a much higher (up to 1000x) water solubility, smoky odors can act as Early Alert Solution signaling the overheating of Li-Batteries, machines and cabling systems, preventing fire and saving investments.

name: MOIO GmbH
businessDescription:
MOIO GmbH was founded in 2017. We aim to bring forward-looking ideas into the healthcare market. 
Our first product is the moio.care system. The digital care assistant can be used both in-patient and at home. For example, the patch can send a signal when a disoriented person leaves a defined zone. It is also able to detect falls and inform caregivers about them. Along with its other system features caregivers and the persons cared for are relieved.  With the help of our partners from research and industry, the moio.care system is to be permanently improved and expanded.

name: Serinus
businessDescription: A lightning strike in the data center, flooding in your region, an emergency case in the production line – whenever the worst case scenario occurs, it is important to be prepared. Serinus has been specifically developed for this purpose.  According to a predefined set of rules, Serinus provides information and sends alarms using all available communication channels, notifies users about specific events and informs about any required responses. The smart event communication platform is available in three editions to ensure efficient and reliable alarm and crisis management. The SaaS solution is operated regardless of the infrastructure. The on-premises version allows a full integration into the system landscape. The hybrid solution combines the benefits of the cloud and server-based solutions, while enabling a deep integration into the whole communication infrastructure. To develop this alert, information and collaboration platform, the three founders were able to fall back on their combined experience of over 40 years in the fields of IT, telecommunications, security technology, as well as alarm and crisis management. Shortly after its foundation, Serinus became one of the world's leading providers in the field of Smart Event Communication.

name: persomatch GmbH
businessDescription: Month after month, Google serves more than 70,000,000 job searches in Germany alone. The best way to get good applications is therefore to present the job offers exactly where they are searched for and read. persomatch currently offers the world's first and only customer self-service for placing job advertisements directly on Google! Our assistant guides you step by step through the booking process and ensures that the vacancy can be found directly on Google in just a few minutes. An intelligent and self-learning algorithm works in the background in combination with dedicated targeting to address exactly those candidates who are also relevant to your job offer.
tags: Advertising, Internet, Marketing, Recruiting, SaaS, Software

name: MobilityDataLab
businessDescription:
At MDL, our mission is to combine the online and offline world to enable new ways of marketing. We want to be seen as an integrator between online marketing and classic out-of-home advertising. We assure to show you different ways of analyzing your target group and help you to always look outside the box. While CAR2AD uses vehicles as a banner surface, STORE2AD on the other hand places ads on displays in local stores. 
Both approaches enable a location specific, target-group-oriented and automated manner through content on the digital screens, which can be uploaded in real time.

name: SPRT APP
businessDescription: A platform that makes the sports offer in the vicinity visible to the user and can be booked directly online. The SPRT app is free and offers everyone the opportunity to search for their favorite sport without an annoying contract. Even for people who already visit a gym, there are always new interesting sports to try out. The idea behind the app is that anyone interested in sports can find out about sports in their area. We want to make the offer accessible and bookable online - without a contract or subscription. The SPRT app is available for free download. Courses can be booked easily and quickly via the ticket system without taking out  a subscription. SPRT only serves as a platform for the mediation of offers. By booking, a binding contract is concluded between the provider and the participant. SPRT is not a contractual partner or other party to this contractual relationship. Claims must therefore be settled between providers and participants. The SPRT app works on all common smartphone models with  the operating systems Android and Apple iOS.

name: Dopavision
businessDescription: Dopavision is pioneering the development of digital therapeutics in ophthalmology. The Berlin-based start-up is developing a digital therapeutic for childhood myopia which can be easily administered using a smartphone app. Dopavision’s goal is to provide a clinically validated therapy to help fight the global myopia crisis.  Myopia is the inability to see far away objects clearly. It commonly occurs due to excessive elongation of the eyeball during growth. This elongation causes incoming images to be focussed in front of the retina rather than on the retina. Myopia is a recognized public health concern, expected to reach a global prevalence of 50% by 2050. Severe cases of myopia are associated with chronic sight-threatening conditions, including glaucoma, cataract, retinal detachment, and myopic maculopathy. Dopavision’s breakthrough technology targets children and young adolescents to address myopia early on and provide medical benefits for later years of life. The Company’s lead product, MyopiaX®, leverages a patented, light-based technology that stimulates specific photosensitive cells of the retina, which in turn modulate retinal dopamine, a key neurotransmitter involved in eye growth.
tags: Biotechnology, Health Care, Medical Device, Therapeutics

name: AISOMA
businessDescription: Our interdisciplinary team of experienced Data Scientists, Data Visualization Experts and Software Developers provides combined skill sets and competencies which allows us to not only build predictive and prescriptive models, but also to engineer software with an awesome user experience to efficiently process data and and expose data-driven insights. We help our clients to achieve their goals by the design, implementation and utilization of innovative and successful AI-based solutions.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Data Mining, Embedded Software, Human Computer Interaction, Industrial Automation, Industrial Engineering, Industrial Manufacturing, Machine Learning, Software Engineering

name: Forexfix
businessDescription: Forexfix provides easy, fast, and transparent international money transfers. We want small and medium businesses to have access to the same sophisticated financial solutions as large corporations- and at a significantly lower price! The Forexfix team is personally attentive to every client, and ensures that all your transactions go through securely. Transferring money in foreign currencies can be very risky- we provide currency hedging against the risks of volatile exchange rates. Keep your business protected to avoid unexpected, heavy losses.

name: O.G. Tech
businessDescription: O.G. Tech is a founder-friendly multi-stage VC primarily focused on Early Growth opportunities, typically B and C rounds. We team up with passionate founders and ambitious teams seeking to disrupt existing industries and create new markets. O.G. Tech is a single LP fund founded and backed by Eyal Ofer’s, Ofer Global. Eyal Ofer has been a long-time investor in a range of successful technology businesses and is a committed supporter of technology innovation. Eyal Ofer and the private portfolio of international businesses within Ofer Global use their vast experience, insight, and global network to help O.G. Tech’s portfolio companies and founders grow and succeed. As Managing Partners of O.G. Tech Partners, Roy Oron and Ziv Kop are leveraging their extensive experience as multi-stage investors, C-Level operators, and as Board members of both private and public tech companies. Our unique structure allows us to be fully flexible and enables our portfolio companies to benefit from fast decision-making, long term commitment, and a broad global network.

name: Aquahara Technology
businessDescription: Aquahara Technology GmbH is offering the most efficient solar atmospheric water generator. It produces clean drinking water on a large scale in a cost-effective, decentralized and environmentally safe manner. This is an economic alternative for dry regions out of reach of coastal seawater desalination plants. We use a process of industrial air dehumidification using a concentrated salt solution to extract moisture out of the air. Our patent-awarded innovations enable to run this process at low cost even under dry desert conditions, where conventional atmospheric water generators completely fail.

name: KitchenAdvisor
businessDescription: Through our vast network of kitchen retailers we are able to give every customer a great choice of products, best prices and an immense time save. Simply register online and get a phone consultation by one of experts. The prices on the kitchen market are not transparent and difficult to understand. Therefore, KitchenAdvisor has set itself the goal of redesigning the kitchen purchase and giving you the opportunity to get a fair kitchen price and, above all, the right kitchen. We are the Swiss army knife among online platforms, as we are brokers, comparison portals, advisors and best friends all at the same time. We avoid all the pitfalls when buying a kitchen with you - in order to actually get the best prices, you should get several offers from kitchen dealers - i.e. compare kitchen prices! If the mediation is successful, KitchenAdvisor receives a commission from the partner kitchen studios. KitchenAdvisor goes one step further and, after answering a few questions in our kitchen configurator, gives you a kitchen design and an estimated price, with which you can compare your wallet with the hard kitchen reality. This is also ideal if you are still in the shell construction phase but would like to have an estimate of how expensive your fitted kitchen will be. Nowhere else can you put together your own kitchen as easily as with us ! So go ahead and plan your kitchen online with KitchenAdvisor - now kitchensCompare on kitchenadvisor.de, completely free of charge and without obligation!
tags: Cooking, E-Commerce, Food and Beverage, Furniture

name: UPCUE
businessDescription: UPCUE’s sales assistant supports sales and service representatives individually prior or during every customer interaction to perform a successful sales conversation. Our first users love the simplicity of the  human-like interface along with fast access everywhere.

name: Smatched
businessDescription: With Smatched you will get a reward app that gives you the highest payout ratio across the market and therefore helps you to monetize your vouchers even faster than any other app. Smatched is a an omnichannel marketing platform that enables companies to go new ways in reaching the generation y and z with a new gamified app approach.
tags: Advertising, Advertising Platforms, Consumer Applications, Mobile Advertising, Mobile Apps

name: MateCrate GmbH
businessDescription: As a Hamburg esport startup, we have been pursuing the goal of making esports accessible to everyone since 2017. As a full-service provider, we organize esports tournaments from AZ. Our portfolio includes projects for companies such as Ubisoft or kicker, as well as our own products such as the UNITED Pro Series, a professional CS:GO tournament series. Live streams are produced in TV quality in our professional studio.

name: Monito fish
businessDescription: MonitorFish GmbH is a multicultural, innovation-driven agri-tech company based in Berlin, Germany, working in the field of AI-powered digital farm management, enabling fish farmers to achieve sustainable, competitive aquaculture.  A specially by Monitorfish developed cloud-based AI software helps fish farmers take their operations to new levels of profitability, predictability and sustainability through more accurate data collection and analysis. This reduces the ecological footprint and negative impacts on fish, people and the planet.

name: Hotelhero
businessDescription: Hotelhero is the dedicated marketplace for hotels to discover, review and manage their technology. Together with hotel associations (among others Germany (IHA) & Austrian (ÖHV)), we bring more transparency to the hotel tech jungle. Our free software discovery, matchmaking & evaluation tool helps hoteliers save time and make more informed decisions when buying new software. Complete product factsheets, references and verified user reviews help hotels objectively assess what's best for their business. Our contract management tool allows independent hotels, as well as hotel chains to track all running contracts and renewals as well as manage their IT budgets in one place. For hotel representation companies and soft brands we provide IT group analytics and branded marketplaces allowing their member hotels to access all perks offered by the group and easily benchmark and optimise their hotels tech stacks. The company was founded in 2017 by Julien Schmit, Thibault Gence and Florian Montag with the headquarters located in Berlin.

name: Enginsight
businessDescription: Enginsight supports you on a technical and organizational basis in implementing your security process and complying with legal standards. We are a growing company from Jena and are creating an integrated solution for IT monitoring and cyber security with the Enginsight platform. This allows you to keep an eye on your IT landscape, from the website to the server to IoT devices and networked production systems. The Enginsight AI supports you in detecting and preventing attacks or in defining the rules for monitoring autonomously.
tags: Cyber Security, IT Management, Penetration Testing, Software

name: Afilio
businessDescription: Prevention is the best way to protect yourself and loved ones. But prevention is often complex, non-transparent and expensive. Many people are therefore not properly protected: legally, financially and if something happens. We want to change that. We help people to protect themselves against the biggest risks in life in time, without expensive lawyers, lengthy applications, or shady brokers.

name: bi: sure
businessDescription: business insurance - sure! bi:sure combines all topics of commercial consulting from AZ on its platform. Insurance brokers can finally take care of their commercial customers again instead of sending out meaningless forms or scanning mail. It doesn't matter whether it's a comparison calculator, a digital query solution or a fully automated broker management program "MVP". We already have everything ready for you.

name: interpanel GmbH
businessDescription: We efficiently create a healthy indoor climate in new and existing buildings. Our system solutions are innovative, scalable and resource-saving. Our vision is to enable the transition to CO₂-efficient and healthy buildings globally with innovative indoor climate technologies. interpanel GmbH is a manufacturer, developer and system provider. interpanel offers a unique, efficient and healthy all-in-one indoor climate solution for lighting, acoustics, heating and cooling of new and existing commercial properties. Our core technology for surface cooling systems that are independent of the dew point (“Membrane Assisted Cooling”) is unique and patented worldwide. This enables silent and maintenance-free surface cooling to be operated safely and efficiently in any climate zone. This eliminates the need for energy-intensive, uncomfortable and maintenance-intensive air cooling and enables a more economical and healthier alternative on a global scale. In addition, the heating, acoustic absorption, and near-daylight and workplace-compliant lighting and sensors can be integrated to create efficient and systematized productive offices in new and existing buildings. The basis is the dew point-independent surface temperature control technology exclusively licensed by the Fraunhofer Institute for Building Physics .

name: NautilusLog
businessDescription: For centuries the manual data collection onboard has remained unchanged. With NautilusLog we have developed a smartphone application to digitize and simplify the documentation around the vessel. NautilusLog is adapted to the needs of the maritime industry and helps you to combine the mandatory reports and tracking with innovative technology. The digital tools replace all the paperwork (e.g. from clipboards to logbooks) and increase efficiency. In the interest of the stakeholder, all relevant data can be collected and comprehensive reports are generated within seconds. The operating system connects all maritime stakeholders and creates business process between ship and shore.

name: ClickClickDrive
businessDescription: With 2.5 million users and 30,000 listed driving schools on our platforms, we are the leading marketplace for driving schools in Europe. We create a seamless approach to mobility, including a management software for driving schools, a theory app for learner drivers and a marketplace. With our platforms In France www.vroomvroom.fr - Germany www.clickclickdrive.de - Poland www.superprawojazdy.pl we digitize how the world learns to drive.

name: CoolBeez
businessDescription: Choose from 100s of existing fundraisers or set up your own in 5 minutes. All free. Start shopping at your favorite online stores through the fundraiser page of your choice. Buy at normal prices. Each purchase generates 5% cashback to your fundraiser of choice. CoolBeez enables communities to fund common causes for free by generating cash-back from online shopping.
tags: Affiliate Marketing, E-Commerce, Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Shopping

name: Veritas Entertainment
businessDescription: eritas Entertainment is an award winning, fresh entertainment company dedicated to producing the highest quality entertainment for theatres, hotels, blue chip corporate events, weddings, Christmas parties, birthday parties or private events - any events requiring that extra special something to make it go with a bang! Our company’s extensive history with live entertainment and Big Band events culminates in perfectly tailored shows such as ‘The Rat Pack- Swingin' At The Sands!’. This features stars of the hit West End show ‘The Rat Pack - Live from Las Vegas’ and includes all of your favourite swing classics from Frank Sinatra, Sammy Davis Jnr and Dean Martin.

name: doks. innovation
businessDescription: Founded early 2017 in Dortmund next to the Fraunhofer Institute for Material Flow and Logistics IML, doks. innovation GmbH steps forward to improve the digitalization of stocktaking and logistics processes. Our solutions are based on years of experience and research and development work. As part of the AUTONOMIC FOR INDUSTRY 4.0 program of the Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy, InventAIRy became first visible in 2014. Operational since January 2018, we develop solutions for logistics and industrial companies to make the automation of stocktaking and data management processes possible. Thus a digital twin of reality is possible with the push on a button. Our solutions combine smart sensors and suitable carrier vehicles. With the help of machine learning algorithms we process your data into relevant information and help to develop planning and design processes. Currently we are a team of twenty employees at our headquarters in Kassel as n Dortmund and Hamburg in the Digital Hub Logistics.

name: USDX Wallet
businessDescription: We dedicated our expertise to the development of an efficient and trusted payment solution. Our ultimate goal is to make payments as easy as sending a text message. Our motto reads: “Instant payments without banks, borders or fees”. In our solution, we excluded intermediaries and constrained crypto volatility. How? By creating a stable and trusted cryptocurrency, i.e. a stablecoin. We also launched a secure wallet app with no fees for in-system payments and transactions. We choose to operate in the legal field and are ready to build relationships with financial institutions and local governments. Thus, we are always open for discussions and collaborations.

name: Lifespin
businessDescription: Lifespin GmbH, a deep data company developing a proprietary AI-based health testing platform to measure quantitative metabolic data in patient samples. Our platform is based on mapping metabolomics for human health and translating that data into health information that can be deployed in a wide range of pharmaceutical, research, and clinical settings. Lifespin’s health diagnostics software will be applicable in the broader healthcare space ranging from diagnostics to patient stratification and personalized medicine, as well as supporting the drug discovery process.

name: Freightly
businessDescription: Freightly TMS (transport management system) combines IT with expertise in the logistics sector and will digitalize your company – depending on your requirements, easily and accessible from anywhere. At Freightly TMS, we have the vision of making logistics digital in order to enable access at any time. With the aid of our smart data analysis techniques, it is possible to make qualified decisions more quickly. The management of logistics services is fundamentally simplified, and complex tasks are optimized. Information and document exchange with your forwarding agents, shipping lines and airlines is a key element of Freightly TMS. Freightly TMS covers all your logistics processes, from procurement and shipping to billing, to form a cloud-based solution aimed at reducing volatility within the supply chain and open up the opportunity to enter the age of digitalization. Every decision in the shipping process, from booking and documentation to payment, is supported by our intelligent database processes. Recurring work steps are automated, saving you enormous amounts of time. Freightly TMS also offers the possibility of live tracking your shipments and real-time checking for changes in freight prices or previously negotiated rates. Use our statistics and analysis tools to recognize trends in the market and react to them.

name: racksnet
businessDescription:
racksnet® is a leading software solution provider for cloud-managed IT networks for single or multi-vendor environments. The globally available cloud-based solution helps small, medium and large enterprises and IT service providers to automate, control and manage their infrastructure. Combined with an intuitive graphical user interface that is the same for all vendors (e.g. Cisco Systems, DELL Technologies, HPE, etc.), it eliminates the need to learn complicated command lines (CLI) and scripting to operate network devices from different vendors.
As an official member of the Open Networking Foundation (ONF), racksnet® not only supports the leading enterprise, but is also committed to supporting innovative top-of-the-line Open Networking White-Box/ Brite-Box hardware and software
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Information Technology, Internet, SaaS, Software

name: Uniwhere
businessDescription: A space where students can connect and emerge as their best self. We keep your data safe and secure and you can save or delete your data any time. We will never sell your data or use it to show you personalized ads. We're looking for smart students that can help us bring Uniwhere everywhere in the world. We want to drive change where change is needed the most.
