name: WeAre
businessDescription: WeAre enables you to boundlessly collaborate in virtual reality. Global, decentralized teams can prototype and sell products much faster and more cost-efficiently. WeAre is designed to enable people to easily deal with digital 3D CAD based prototypes. Easy-to-use for everyone. No IT or engineering skills required. Our approach allows you to precisely align the product design, its development specifics and a shorter decision making process. WeAre combines two worlds: Digital Engineering & Communication.

name: cabuu
businessDescription: The learning method combines interactive exercises with an effective learning process. This way you learn your vocabulary effortlessly and enjoy staying with it. The exercises, which build on each other, securely anchor the vocabulary and the spelling of the words in the long-term memory. The learning assistant helps with independent preparation for the vocabulary test with targeted exercises. The smart algorithm remembers more difficult vocabulary and asks for it more often. Take the vocabulary test with confidence! Track your progress after each learning round and collect your successes in the comprehensive learning statistics.

name: Freework
businessDescription: Freework aims to streamline the management of teams and projects for businesses, in order to simplify and speed up the planning and supervision of projects. We enable project-based organizations to work even more efficiently and easily - with one product.

name: SCAILEX Group
businessDescription: We are rethinking legal processes to create a completely new eco-system in the legal world. As one of the leading legal tech providers in Europe, we offer a unique cloud-based claim management system that has fundamentally changed the work environment for lawyers and legal departments through intelligent interfaces, automated workflows, text recognition and text interpretation. Our goal is to automate the handling of legal processes to the maximum, so that law firms and legal departments can significantly increase their current caseload within a short time. This requires an intelligent and flexible legal tech platform that, thanks to the latest cognitive technology, reduces the activities in a law firm or legal department by at least 90 percent. Through process automation, the error rate is reduced while the quality of pleadings and lawsuits increases. In this way, legal service providers can scale up their clients and thus their business volume many times over.
tags: Legal Tech, Legal Services, Leagal Tools

name: Pantherna Therapeutics
businessDescription: Pantherna Therapeutics is a privately-held biopharmaceutical Company developing first-in-class therapeutics for vascular diseases. Pantherna’s innovative technology platform is based on advanced nanoparticles for the delivery and expression of therapeutic mRNA drugs in the endothelium.

name: Prosoma
businessDescription: Prosoma is a medical company creating digital therapeutics products for cancer patients. We develop a portfolio of digital therapeutics medical software products that cover the entirety of behavioural treatment needs of cancer patients. Our clinically validated platform is set to be prescribed by doctors and therapists in Germany, and it will be reimbursed by the local healthcare system in 2022. We aim to become #1 global digital therapeutics solution for oncology and we have a pathway to get there. Prosoma’s “Software as a Medical Device” platform is a set of stand-alone apps tailored to the different stages of the patient’s journey, which includes: symptoms and treatment support, psycho-social support, and behavioural support. All of these pathways are clinically validated and accessible at any time and anywhere the patient needs it. Our medical self-care applications are designed to deliver therapeutic methods personalised to each patient based on their diagnosis and outcomes. It is the most comprehensive toolset to make patient’s life better. Prosoma is developed by medical experts and patients. We partner with the most renowned organisations for the clinical trials, as well as, large scale commercial partners in the USA and Germany. We are a part of various acceleration programmes such as: Accelerate Cambridge, Incredibles, and the HealthHub at the University of California. Prosoma is being developed and built to meet EU Medical Device Regulations: ISO 13485, ISO 62304, and ISO 27001.

name: Tenzir
businessDescription: Tenzir empowers defenders by developing an open security analytics platform that makes it easy to implement detection and response use cases. Tenzir is an open-core company committed to creating a future of sustainbly inter-connected security solutions. Tenzir's open-core VAST platform fuels core SecOps uses cases, as common in large enterprises, service providers, and managed detection and response vendors. As a SOC backbone, VAST relies on open and standardized protocols, such as Apache Arrow for telemetry and STIX for threat data, to avoid vendor lock-in and de-risk future integration building. VAST decomposes monolithic SIEM functionality and re-composes it in a federated deployment model. This makes VAST highly embeddable, in hybrid-cloud environments and at the edge.

name: Remind.me
businessDescription: Always get the best tariff with remind.me – we optimize electricity and gas contracts. For free! As an excellent switching service, remind.me ensures that consumers always use the best and cheapest electricity and gas rates. Our task: Keep an eye on all energy tariffs and use our automatic switching assistant to switch consumers to a cheaper energy supplier. With savings and price guarantees. Once changed, contracts are optimized year after year. This exchange service is free for all customers! The free switching service remind.me has been around since 2017 and we have already been able to optimize hundreds of thousands of tariffs and switch consumers to cheaper tariffs. With solid financing from a high-tech start-up fund and other angel investors, remind. me has already established long-term partnerships with media companies (Burda Media, Axel Springer SE & Co.). The remind.me team also offers well-known cooperation partners (such as Medion, Viessmann and many more) white label and co-branded solutions. We are an innovative employer who gives his team a lot of freedom to implement their own ideas. In our office in Berlin-Mitte, our founding duo works together with an open, friendly and pragmatic team. We offer jobs in the following areas, among others: product management, development (frontend JavaScript/React.js, backend – Java/Spring Boot, full stack), customer care, editing, online marketing.

name: KOZHYA
businessDescription: Revolutionise your daily skin care with putting active natural particles IN your skin, not ON your skin.  De-stress your skin. Benefit from skin boosting active nutrients. Restore your skin’s health with this spa-like at-home skin care treatment.

name: Cedalo

As IoT continues to grow rapidly around the world, Organizations can benefit from Cedalo’s high quality, secure, and scalable Steamsheets. With Cedalo Enterprise Platform for Eclipse Streamsheets, users can quickly build real-time, stream-processing applications. You can also build charts, send alerts, or even control processes. No IT experts, no platform, no third-party software, no schemas, no programming, or code required. With Cedalo Cloud there is no installation necessary. Just sign up, login, and get to work.

Compared to competitors, their product produces fewer false alarms making use of acoustic and vibration sensors, as well as advanced physical models. The analytics can be integrated in any IoT platform.

name: Keyp
businessDescription: We create the layer of trust for the digital world. Our mission is to bring trust to the European B2B online market by creating trust between companies and their business customers. One line of code to automize customer onboarding with best in class solutions instantly.

name: EcoG
businessDescription: EcoG’s mission is to shape the future of electric charging by turning the hassle of charging into an embedded experience of daily life. With our open Application Programmable Interface (API) architecture, we change the business model of EV charging by bringing the app economy onto charging infrastructure and make developing a service as easy as developing an app. Our technology can be used by charging industry for remote device management, by charger operators to increase their services utilization and offer rewards for usage, or by fleet operators to manage charging dispatch. We are an international startup operating in Munich (Germany) and Detroit (US) backed by TechStars and next47.

Cyber risks have emerged as the second largest threat to corporate organizations. Transferring cyber risks to a third party has been acknowledged as a meaningful addition to comprehensive Risk Management strategies. CyberDirekt partners with the world's leading Cyber Risk insurers with significant capacity for the German Market.

name: StarBerry Games
businessDescription: We combine familiar gameplay elements with new ideas to create fulfilling gaming experiences for our players. Dive into the juiciest merge game, with fresh evolving gameplay! You’ve just become Mayor of a small town, and everybody from business owners to private citizens need your help. Combine items on your board to complete missions and watch your small town grow and your Mayor points increase! Become the biggest coffee shop leader in the business! Create & manage your coffee empire in this caffeinated idle game! Refine your coffee recipes, boost managers and automate your workflow! Expand your franchise and give your economy a boost with specialized managers that will automate the workflow of your shop! Join our Discord server and hang out with other players and discover exclusive tips and updates.

name: Senorics
businessDescription: SENORICS'​ disrupts NIR-spectroscopy with its miniaturized, low-cost, monolithic NIR-detectors. SENORICS is a start-up originating from the University of Technology Dresden commercializing an optical sensor solution for near-infrared (NIR) spectroscopy based on organic electronics. This proprietary technology allows small, robust, wavelength selective and fully customizable detectors enabling NIR-spectroscopy on a chip level. Thus, SENORICS can deliver unique solutions for a multitude of measurement and detection problems in industrial applications. Examples are determining ingredients or compositions of raw materials, consumables or end products in the food, chemistry, packaging or automotive industry and many other branches.
tags: Big Data, Internet of Things, Semiconductor, Sensor

name: Lition Energie
businessDescription: Lition was a green electricity provider that connected green energy producers with electricity consumers through its marketplace. Together with our partners and customers, we were able to advance the energy transition. Due to the energy crisis, we unfortunately had to stop our business operations in October 2021.

name: Lindera
businessDescription: As a MedTech company, Lindera develops AI solutions for the health sector.  We specialize in AI-based motion analysis, through a simple smart phone camera. For the first time in history, this is possible via an app, without any additional sensors or hardware. With our technology we have digitalised geriatric and orthopedic assessments worldwide, our precision of measurement even beats the existing gold standard in science.  Lindera's products support care systems worldwide by reducing falls and designing recovery plans after common  operations such as hip or knee replacements. We are a passionate team of over 40 data scientists, engineers, psychologists and health care professionals. We're proud of what we have achieved so far, but have a clear vision in mind: to set world wide standards in Mobility Assessment and Mobility Decision Intelligence.

name: neuroflash
businessDescription: neuroflash generates the best German texts in the DACH region. The goal is for our AI technology to fully automatically generate 5 professional text suggestions on a given topic in just 5 seconds. neuroflash uses multilingual modern language models (auto-regressive language transformers; GPT-3) to generate texts. These enormously large language models are trained with content from the web (over 1 billion texts), books or even film transcripts. These text corpora are fed into neural networks (Deep Learning models) that are able to recognise statistical patterns in texts. This makes it possible, for example, to predict the next word in a text. This ability enables these language models to generate texts. neuroflash complements this forward-looking technology with associative analyses and thus knows which words work well with which other words, i.e. are implicitly positively associated.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Internet, Market Research, Natural Language Processing, Neuroscience, SaaS, Software

name: CryptoTax
businessDescription: CryptoTax is a brand of 21 Consulting GmbH. Our vision is to simplify legal obligations for investors in digital assets by serving easy but high quality services to businesses and private individuals. We are a Munich based startup offering and constantly developing tax reporting solutions and other regulatory declaration services for customers of cryptocurrency exchanges and users of blockchain assets to help them being compliant with the law of their residence state. The methodology used for processing of the tax reports is approved by a Big Four Accounting Firm. Currently we are developing a web-based solution for our B2C customers. Additionally for our B2B clients, which are mainly cryptocurrency exchanges, we are offering an outsourcing service helping them to provide their customers with country-specific tax reports.

Be it in the industrial or surgical environment, the focus is on the economical production of functionalized as well as patient-matched implants and instruments made of high-performance polymers. Kumovis also provides medical device companies and hospitals with a regulatory roadmap and documentation, enabling next-gen medtech to benefit patients faster.

name: Betteries
businessDescription: A profit for impact business headquartered in Berlin, Germany, betteries combines deep tech-nology know-how and frontier market experience to deliver mobile and affordable power.  betteries is much more than a battery, it is a multipurpose power sys-tem.  Each betteries system can store 3 kWh to 12 kWh of energy, offers fast charging capability and can flexibly deliver up to 5 kW of electric DC as well as AC power. betteries are modular in configuration to be stacked horizontally or vertically and can be charged by a variety of energy sources (solar, wind, hydro, grid).  Smart electronics including Wi-fi and GPS enables betteries systems to be remotely monitored and controlled through an IoT platform.  Rugged and water-proof, betteries offers solutions for e-mobility, off-grid productive use and on-grid backup pow-er.

name: 1NCE
businessDescription: 1NCE GmbH is the first fully-fledged IoT network carrier in the world to offer fast, secure, and reliable connectivity services at low cost based on an IoT flat rate. This makes IoT applications such as tank maintenance, smart metering, or vehicle telematics affordable. The 1NCE IoT Flat Rate includes 500 MB data volume, 250 SMS, and free access to the 1NCE Connectivity Management Platform via Internet and API. To provide the service, 1NCE cooperates with both Deutsche Telekom AG and its roaming partners as well as China Telecom Global Limited and supports all common mobile communications standards (2G, 3G, 4G, NB-IoT). In addition to direct sales of IoT mobile connectivity, 1NCE also offers its technology to mobile network operators via a Platform-as-a-Service solution. The company headquartered in Cologne offers its flat rate almost world-wide. 1NCE was founded in 2017 together with Deutsche Telekom AG and has 100 staff in Cologne, Hamburg, Hong Kong, London, Paris, Riga, Rome and Warsaw.

Homes are part of our DNA - we should work to live. Not live to work.

name: IrrigationNets
businessDescription:
We are a German-based company and offer a solution for farmers dealing with salinized groundwater problems or who wish to use sea water to provide freshwater to their fields.

Our product enables farmers who are affected by droughts and other climate change impacts to maintain production at full level. It can be used for most types of cash crops and sylviculture.

The technology we use converts seawater or salinized groundwater into foggy drizzle-freshwater that is spread over a large area and thereby directly supplies plants with a constant flow of cool moisture. The installation can be turned on and off as needed to meet the water needs of various crops.

The cooling effect will lead to less water loss due to evaporation and reduce stress for the plants. Over a period of time our product will restock groundwater levels and thereby prevent further seawater intrusion into coastal freshwater aquifers.

Our product is a highly cost-efficient alternative to desalination plants and enables farmers to become independent of outside freshwater supplies.

name: Hygraph
businessDescription: Hygraph is a GraphQL-based federated content management system for digital creators and digital products.

name: Mapify

name: Centrifuge
businessDescription: Centrifuge is an open, decentralized operating system to connect the global financial supply chain. It allows participants to transact on a global network while maintaining ownership of their data, including their validated company details, their reputation, business relationships, and subsequent transactions. The company's team built multiple companies together over the last 18 years and they still enjoy working as a group. Together, they created software that transacts billions of dollars each day and is used by 97 out of the Fortune 100.

name: eyecandylab
businessDescription:
Welcome to eyecandylab's AUGMENTV - the AR lens on every video.
We enable augmented reality on video, building the tool set for content creators to build engaging and interactive AR-experiences on video, driving user engagement and monetize it by uniting all devices into one seamless experience.

name: 27Pilots
businessDescription:
27pilots is a fully independent spin-off from the BMW Group. The founders of 27pilots are former BMW managers who invented, integrated and operated the worlds first Venture Client unit at the BMW Group: the BMW Startup Garage.

Today, 27pilots helps corporations from various industries to set up and operate an internal Venture Client unit. This model is enabling corporations to leverage cutting-edge solutions from external top startups to solve challenges at scale across all departments and business units.

name: Cluno
businessDescription: Cluno is a completely new mobility concept, with which you always drive "your" car - as long as you want, as flexible as you want and for a fixed, monthly package price, which includes everything except refueling. Really everything!

name: inveox
businessDescription: Pathology 4.0 -?inveox?digitizes & automates pathology labs. Enhancing the safety of cancer diagnoses, increasing the efficiency of labs - for reliable and fast diagnoses of cancer through a digitized, fully automated and connected histopathology from the arrival of samples to the specimen slides.

name: Zeuz
businessDescription: zeuz is a hybrid cloud tool with the goal to combine efficiency and scaling when it comes to multiplayer game hosting. It was founded 2017 by GPORTAL  the global leading game server provider. When we realized that game studios need a tool to manage the scaling of their multiplayer, with in cost-efficient environment and a individual service, to concentrate on making great multiplayer games.

name: HolodeckVR
businessDescription: HolodeckVR is a pioneer in the field of virtual reality developing technologies and products for various business verticals. HolodeckVR is using a tracking technology, which enables the user to experience a fully immersive virtual world. Not only is it possible to walk freely within the virtual world but also to interact with it in a fun, exciting and mind-blowing way. HolodeckVR reveals the possibility to present the users a completely unique form of entertainment. 100 persons can interact in areas as large as 40,000m2. HolodeckVR is teaming up with best-in-class partners for bringing its tech to market.

name: Heycar
businessDescription: heycar wants to change the way customers find and buy their next car. We are a fast-growing start-up in the center of Berlin that strives to break up the used-car market. We do this by explicitly focusing on vehicle, dealer and service quality. We are heavily user-centric and invest in applying cutting-edge technologies to become a leader in our space. We have established an independent, agile and deeply entrepreneurial culture whilst being backed by major automotive players. Our team of highly motivated digital experts is embracing the opportunity of challenging our markets status quo.

name: Mika
businessDescription:
We are a team of healthcare and digitization enthusiasts on a mission to improve the health and well-being of cancer patients. As cancer survivors or family and friends of cancer patients, we are highly committed to this purpose.

The Fosanis Companion is an app providing support for cancer patients when facing the greatest challenge of their life. It is clinically proven, user-centric and patient empowering.

name: Wandelbots
businessDescription: Wandelbots is a German startup that enables non-programmers to teach industrial robots faster and cheaper using smart clothing. Based on sensors attached to clothes, the Wandelbots software back end tracks human motion to live-control industrial robots. Operators can teach automation tasks by demonstration. The software back end builds a machine learning model based on several demonstrations and generates automation workflows. They can be refined and optimized with the software tool.

name: Meerflasche
businessDescription:
An innovative (2in1: cup and bottle, pending patent), sustainable, multifunctional and well-designed drinking bottle. Target group: Visitors of Events, Festivals, daily (office) use. B2B including ads on the bottle.
It is part of the solution to avoid single-use plastics and will support projects to clean the ocean.
Business model: Outsourcing and information on the website and social media how to change consumer behaviour (by drinking water).

name: WALKOLUTION
businessDescription:
Sit less. Walk more! We build the worlds first walking office treadmill for the standing desk. Walk on clouds, right at your desk. No noise, no motor, no distraction. 

We revolutionize office work for healthy people and companies. German engineering meets Scandinavian design.  www.walkolution.com

name: FRIDAY
businessDescription:
The digital car insurance FRIDAY was launched in 2017 in Berlin by an experienced team led by Dr. Christoph Samwer and with the support of the Swiss Bâloise Group.

FRIDAY is geared to the customers'? desire for informality, simplicity and joy of life. In just nine months, FRIDAY has insured over 15,000 cars in Germany. Every second customer has signed up via smartphone or tablet.

name: HQS Quantum Simulations
businessDescription: Quantum computing for quantum chemistry.

name: LoanLink
businessDescription: LoanLink is the Germanys independent mortgage broker dedicated to making mortgage experience efficient, transparent and hassle-free for international homebuyers.
longBusinessDescription:
Buying a new home and applying for a mortgage can be a complicated and even confusing process. Especially for non-German speakers who lack access to information on the mortgage market they need to make more informed and cost-effective decisions.
We started LoanLink because we believe that finding your dream home should be exciting, not stressful! So much of the fun part of starting a new home slips away because you end up worrying about not finding the best mortgage. LoanLink transforms and simplifies the traditional process and helps our clients save time and money.

name: StudySmarter
businessDescription: StudySmarter is an intelligent learning platform, that automatically turns text into interactive learning courses and supports learner individually. We currently offer StudySmarter predominantly to university students (>30.000 users) with a success guarantee for exams in our premium version and to first corporate clients for employee training. Our platform is completely content-agnostic and relies on Natural Language Processing algorithms to become the platform for lifelong learning.

name: LAMA
businessDescription:
LAMA helps businesses produce personalized video interviews in minutes, for a fraction of the cost of a professional video team. Users can conduct an interview directly through our app and seamlessly integrate the video on their websites, blogs etc.
We also have our own magazine, where we help entrepreneurs promote themselves and learn from each other!: https://lama-app.com/interviews

name: Smilemeup
businessDescription: We deliver affordable teeth straightening clear aligners through professionals to the masses. We use an almost full 3d tech integrated concept assisted with AI to make 3D animated treatment plans and conduct treatments through teledentistry.

name: Crashtest Security
businessDescription: Our SaaS tool automates security testing for web applications and APIs, supporting agile development teams to create continuously security software. Vulnerabilities are detected at the earliest possible time during the development phase, helping companies to achieve higher transparency of the current security state of the digital assets and complying to reforms such as GDPR. Being fully automated and integrated, our customers can test their software daily for a fixed monthly SaaS-fee, pricing is based on the number of targets to be scanned and requested SLA.

name: everlean
businessDescription:
SaaS tool to enable all employees to submit suggestions for process improvements. We are gathering relevant pain points and best practices from different industries that can be used e.g. for predictive maintenance.
everlean is a digital solution to support lean management activities. Employees can use apps to pass proposals and ideas on to managers and see the implementation status of their proposals on a digital CIP board (continuous improvement process). Administrative processes are greatly simplified and companies benefit from the creative potential of their employees.

name: Plan A
businessDescription: Plan A is the first data-driven crowdfunding platform in the fight against climate change. We use data to predict where and how climate change will hit the hardest and based on the insights, channel capital from individuals and businesses to environmental organisations and innovators who address these issues in the affected locations.

name: Stark Mobility
businessDescription:
Imagine Car2Go + Bird + Airbnb getting together and having a baby. That's what we are building at Stark.
 
Distributed ownership for shared electric vehicles (scooters & cars) that are "purchased" by hosts, yet fully serviced and operated by us. This model is very sustainable as it removes the quickly depreciating hardware/vehicle asset from our books and thus allows for rapid expansion without the continuous need for additional funding.
 
It has the potential to disrupt the current concept of individual vehicle ownership. At the same time, it solves the "charging" problem current EV's are facing in urban environments as the end-user does not have to worry about it.

name: GHOST â feel it.
businessDescription: GHOST  feel it. is a Berlin-based startup that aims to enable companies and individual product developers, to integrate a new channel of machine-human interaction into their products. By broadening the human perception and defeating sensory overload in a digitalised world., they get a chance to set themselves apart from their competitors. This technology can be used to make amputees feel their prosthesis, create new senses or enhance learning processes.

name: Raccoon.Recovery
businessDescription:
Raccoon.Recovery is a physical rehabilitation tool to treat patients after accidents and neurological diseases:
with Machine learning for creating mistake-proof treatment courses 
with gaming for motivation and increasing the number of repetitive movements.
Now we develop the tool for hand rehabilitation that will be scaled to a full-body solution.
Raccoon.Recovery helps to treat more patients at one time and increase the revenue for rehab centres by 40%.
 Rehab centres prescribe our device and application to the patient as a part of their rehab course. We receive a subscription fee from the centres per patient.

name: VISN
businessDescription: We offer fully automatic, and highly-accurate statistics on space-utilisation in office-buildings. By applying computer-vision algorithms to cutting-edge thermal imaging sensors, we are able to count the number of people in a room in real-time and determine their location all while the end-user remains completely anonymous. Over time, we can apply machine-learning algorithms on the extremely large data sets of quantity and location of people, generated in this way. We can then give automatic recommendations to building operators to save rental costs, optimize space layout for employee well-being and connect building-automation tools to automatically reduce utility costs and environmental impact of their buildings. We take a one-time installation fee and a subscription fee for ongoing supply of the data.

name: AllBlock
businessDescription:
AllBlock is a Distributed systems startup that makes Peer-to-Peer network-based software that supports automated document and data interchange for analytics and automation.
Our long-term project is to begin development of the components necessary to make seamlessly distributed computation a reality, merging cloud with edge and rendering local devices mere gateways to a unified global network of data storage and processing.

name: Codepan
businessDescription: We are an Enterprise Software Company. Our solution Streem.ai automatically analyses large volumes of data to detect anomalies in real-time. As IoT and Industry 4.0 results in exponential growth of generated data, Streem.ai is the ideal personal AI assistant for engineers or domain experts which aids in root cause analysis and in deriving business insights. With Streem.ai, up to 85%, less time will be spent on data analysis. Its unsupervised machine learning enables identification of new anomalies without the need for annotated data of what anomalies look like thus avoiding the occurrence of unidentified failures or error oversights. Our proprietary benchmarking algorithm gives us leverage over our competitors.

name: Letos
businessDescription: Letos is a startup working in the field of affective computing, with applications to predicting human behaviour within heterogeneous environments (e.g. home, office, car). Through the usage of an innovative biosensor solution, coupled together with state-of-the-art Machine Learning techniques, Letos allows for capturing of true spontaneous emotional reactions. This unique solution will support companies to discern user satisfaction, alertness and well-being (along with client-specific requests) while keeping total user anonymity.

name: Fakturia
businessDescription: As a subscription management system, Fakturia enables easy and fully automated billing of subscription commerce business models.
longBusinessDescription:
The system keeps track of recurring services and usage-based charges, and knows exactly when and what service needs to be charged. Fakturia will automatically send due invoices on their due date.
The integrated Whitelabel Customer Center gives your customers access to all contract and billing information. Business transactions such as address data changes or contract terminations can be processed digitized.
Due to the open REST interface, Fakturia offers a practical API for integration into the existing process landscape.
Fakturia was developed by the Luminea IT Services GmbH from Sauerlach near Munich, which has existed since 2007. The software was funded entirely from own funds and implemented using modern and robust Java EE technology.

name: STROMDAO
businessDescription: We aim to empower individuals to create value by consuming green energy.

name: HypnoBox
businessDescription: HypnoBox is the worlds most comprehensive self-hypnosis app in German, and since recently, also in English. It includes more than 500 suggestions about all sorts of topics such as confidence, weight-loss, success, anxiety, enthusiasm for life, health, etc.

name: NaturhÃ¤uschen.de
businessDescription:
Imagine waking up in your cottage and opening the window. Exposing yourself to the sound of singing birds. Waking up with a cup of coffee on the terrace, with a beautiful view of the sunrise. After breakfast, you get ready for a day out. The immediate surroundings of your nature house are perfectly suited for a good break. A walk through the forest, picnic by the lake or maybe a relaxing day staying around the house. The kids have all the room to play after all.

After a day outdoors, you can enjoy your evening with a hot meal and already run through tomorrow with a glass of wine or sparkling soda. Suddenly a deer appears, taking a peek before calmly walking on.

Does this sound like music to your ears? Then come and stay in a nature house! In a nature house, you can experience the beautiful surroundings and find more than just a holiday home. Away from the masses, not on a packed holiday park. You are the one that determines the direction of your holiday.

name: Vizua
businessDescription: Vizua® is an international portal for 3d artists and 3d agencies. Our network of 3d experts creates high-end 3d renderings in the areas of architecture, products, technology, retail automotive.
longBusinessDescription:
The 3d experts of our network are according to our criteria (experience, qualitative portfolio) hand-picked.
The platform Vizua® works like this:
DirectRequest
The client can choose a 3d specialist from our platform regarding his criteria. We will send an inquiry to the designer. If the client agrees to the budget, we will realize the project. A project manager of Vizua® consults the client an is always available for questions.
OpenRequest
Regarding budget and specifications, we search for 3d experts in our designer database. We suggest the 3 best designers, the client will choose his favorite designer. A project manager of Vizua® realizes the project together with the client and the designer.

name: AAZZUR
businessDescription: AAZZUR is building a banking hub that lets you stay in control of your finances, wherever you are in the world. You can integrate all your accounts in one place and customise your service with AAZZUR Experiences, creating a personalised banking service on your smartphone. We are also teaming up with fintechs to build a banking ecosystem, where access to customer accounts and toolboxes will be available through an open API.
longBusinessDescription:
AAZZUR is an innovative platform that connects users to a whole ecosystem of fintech products and banking services, so they can save, invest and take complete control of their finances. All through one ecosystem and one dashboard.
For users, AAZZUR simplifies banking. No more scattered banking apps with numerous login details. No more complex multi-currency conversions and cards. Money transfers, saving and investing is all done through one app and one interface.
For fintechs, AAZZUR is an extra acquisition channel tapping into a growing market of active users. Its also a great opportunity to integrate with other connected banks. The platform speeds up time to market and helps test products with real users for improved data analysis, iterations and conversions.
For banks: AAZZUR delivers third party fintech services as white label products. It only takes one AAZZUR integration, which reduces compliance complexity and time to market.

name: deskpad.de
businessDescription:
deskpad.de is the first supplier of customized desk mats with own size and design.
With the help of the Online Editor, visitors of deskpad.de can design their own desk pad. So the visitor can choose a measure and design his desk pad with a photo or Vector graphic. In addition, the desk pad can be personalized with a text.

name: M-TRIBES
businessDescription: M-TRIBES is a Venture Builder with a focus on transportation that helps grow sustainable companies and develops the SaaS platform M-TOOLS.
longBusinessDescription:
M-TRIBES helps corporates like BMW and Bosch to turn brilliant ideas into market-proven concepts and grow sustainable companies in the area of transportation. We are experienced startup entrepreneurs, tech-enthusiasts and creative makers. We like to move fast and build things.
TECHNOLOGY
Discover the M-TOOLS SaaS platform. With a growing range of services and technologies encompassing frontend, backend and beyond, M-TOOLS is the best way to kickstart your transportation venture.
TALENT
Do you want to maximize the impact of your time and work on something meaningful? Join M-TRIBES!
CORPORATES
Work with us to combine the speed of a startup with the professionalism of an agency.
INVESTORS
Invest into our portfolio companies and participate in ventures with an extremely high upside potential.

name: STARTUP EVENTS XYZ
businessDescription: We inform Founders, Investors and Corporates about upcoming Startup Events

name: VisionHealth
businessDescription:
We develop an App, which not only manages adherence to therapy of respiratory patients, but also gives feedback on their inhaler handling. 
Thus, we develop an inexpensive tool, to stabilize Asthma and COPD patients, reduce hospital visits and lower the therapy costs for this chronic disease.
longBusinessDescription:
Empower all patients with respiratory diseases to fully benefit from their inhaled medication. Develop and commercialize the first truly augmented inhalation training tool which allows:
1. Patients to learn efficiently inhaling their drugs, for them to lead more symptom-free lives,
2. Physicians to efficiently train patients and avoid lengthy or unnecessary appointments,
3. Healthcare insurers to reduce high treatment cost resulting from wrong inhaler use
4. Pharmaceutical companies to
-gain insights in the benefits of their products to justify cost,
-gain insights due to big data,
-gain patients/physicians loyalty to product

name: TechVantage
businessDescription: TechVantage is a leading Startup focussed on Analytics, Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence. Provide Big Data solutions for enterprises related to Retail, Media, Insurance, Banking or Telecom industry. Transform your business with Analytics, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.
longBusinessDescription: TechVantage Analytics headquartered in India has its operations in USA and Germany.

name: Idea Invest
businessDescription: STORITY, the logistics service, satisfies cities' demanding inhabitants with more space through on-demand-storage with an app-controlled high-quality delivery and therefor provides the required logistics software & platform solutions.
longBusinessDescription:
The increasing urbanization, decreasing square meters and irregularly needed items lead to lack of space. Stority addresses the need and stores temporarily unneeded items.
Customers can order the self-developed box in various sizes via the Sority app. Stority deliveres them to the customer, so that he can fill them with items. Stority then picks up, stores and returns them. The entire process happens app-controlled.
Stority guarantees the customer flexible storage with a combination of convenient pick-up and delivery service.

name: Crowdpouch
businessDescription: Crowdpouch is Germanys first global crowdfunding platform and is now launched. We bring dreams to life on our platform. Crowdpouch is also the only curated crowdfunding platform in the world. Artists, technology innovators, Go getters and many more use our platform to bring their dreams to reality. We are currently based in Schwaebisch Hall, Germany. We aim to be the comprehensive global crowdfunding ecosystem

name: PONF
businessDescription:
PONF are creating an innovative modular camera system that brings in one single, easy, straightforward workflow photography and IoT.
The camera, based on interchangeable backs, is fully programmable and can host modules for robotics, droning, mechatronics. additional sensors.
The modules are based on self learning AI and can me deployed in image processing / recognition, surveillance, deep learning, emergency / security services, health, agriculture, industrial environments.
tags: camera, AI, image processing, recognition, deep learning

name: TablePlus
businessDescription: TablePlus | Modern, Native Tool for Database Management
longBusinessDescription: A native tool with elegant UI that allows you to simultaneously manage multiple DB such as MySQL, Postgres, SQL Server, SQLite, Microsoft SQL Server and more.

name: ExpertLead
businessDescription: ExpertLead is a B2B matching platform for top tech freelancers: software developers, blockchain experts, data scientists, and designers. We identify the top 5% by using a thorough screening process - incl. coding tests, live coding -, and support our customers on complex, digital implementation projects.

name: ObjectBox
businessDescription: ObjectBox (Techstars 17) is a company that helps app / IoT developers develop faster apps faster by ensuring data is where it is needed when it is needed. At the core of this solution lies our mobile database, which is 10x faster than the industry leader SQLite and which only takes 1/10th of the code (LOC) to implement.
longBusinessDescription: ObjectBox is an on-device, NoSQL database for mobile and IoT devices. Our database and synchronization solution help app / IoT developers develop faster apps faster by ensuring data is where it is needed when it is needed. At the core of this solution lies our mobile database, which is 10x faster than the industry leader SQLite and which only takes 1/10th of the code (LOC) to implement. With data volumes growing rapidly, there is a need for fast and efficient connectivity solutions on mobile apps and IoT devices, especially in data heavy spaces like Artificial Intelligence, Games, Smart Devices and Virtual/Augmented Reality. We create cost-effective IoT and mobile apps solutions that provide a super smooth user experience and feel like always-on, even when there is no internet connection.

name: BERSÂ®
businessDescription: BERS® is a SAAS which empowers you to easily transform your contents into stunning digital experiences without any coding.
longBusinessDescription:
BERS® is not your regular website or app builder  Using our digital creation platform BERS® EDIT, you and your team can easily transform your contents into advanced rich digital experiences. Preview your progress right in your browser without any additional plugins and without any coding.
The big strength of BERS® lies in the versatility of publishing options and the powerful enterprise deployment solutions. Whether you are creating content for a broad audience or deploying sensitive internal communications, we offer all the tools right out of the box.
Any content created with BERS® can be exported as a standalone HTML page. The same content can also be exported as a native page for your own branded iOS App. No web wrapper, no compiling.
We also offer the option to deploy your own branded BERS® corporate bookstand which can be accessed by your audience via a web portal or using your own branded iPhone and iPad app. Additionally the iOS app allows your users to download and read content offline.
BERS® EDIT IN A NUTSHELL
- Easily create rich digital experiences right in your browser
- No additional plugins or coding required
- Use a variety of existing widgets and functionalities to display and enrich your content
- Live preview your progress in all possible ratios and screen sizes
- All combined in an intuitive and visually driven interface
THE BIGGEST STRENGTHS OF BERS®
- Versatility of publishing options
- Powerful enterprise functionalities: BERS® corporate bookstand solution with audience-, packages-management, content segmentation and seamless single sign-on integration via SAML.
WHAT YOU CAN USE BERS® FOR
- Digital Magazines, Brochures, Lookbooks
- Digital Guidelines, Handbooks and Manuals
- Employee communication
- Trainings and E-learnings
- Quick standalone Microsites, Onepages and much more
Want to take your content to the next level?

name: Tutorland
businessDescription:
Tutorland is the School of the Future. It is a modern e-learning platform connecting lecturers and learners, which through unique innovative technology makes education available for anyone-anywhere-anytime!
Tutorland consists of three main modules:
1. Virtual Classroom - enabling online interactive training with a tutor (private and group lessons)
2. content module - enabling online education based on video courses and materials 
3. simple learning management system - for schedules, messaging and exams

name: Talenter.io
businessDescription:
Our future is going to be quite different from our present.
Artificial intelligence and autonomous robots will do most of our tasks automatically.
Goods will be as favorable as never before. Abundance is normal for some people. Others, however, find no tasks, no opportunities to create prosperity through employment.
The gap between the rich and the poor blows the societies around the world.

Tomorrows working world is a world where we do something because we want to do it.
And yet it will also remain the world in which we look for recognition and earn income to fulfill our desires.
Self-realisation becomes more easily possible, but making a living remains important.
Talenter.io is the platform for this.

Much faster than everyone thinks, the artificial intelligence will do all the jobs. We really mean ALL(!) jobs.
Doctor, truck drivers, pilots, managers, Tax Consultants, Lawyers, Authorities-employees, Officials and even CEOs.
AI is always more efficient, faster and always makes the right decisions.

The AI replaces us in just a few years,takes away what constitutes "humanity": To be used.
This creates a unique need and a gigantic business.
This profound social change has been our concern for a long time. Our solution: Talenter.io
longBusinessDescription:
Talenter.io offers for the first time an solution that enables people to provide human services beyond the usual professional standards. Talenter.io is to offer the world a completely new and urgently needed labor market. A billion-dollar market!
Today, if only every unemployed person in the world offers an hour of talent for one dollar, the added value of 1.2 trillion dollars/year is generated. An added value that is currently withheld from all these people! That is the state of play today. Over the next five to fifteen years, up to 40% of today's jobs will fall victim to automation and artificial intelligence. Soon the Talenter market will not be a billion-dollar market, a one hundred billion-dollar market.
Population density is key for Talenters success:
The world did Talenter the favour to concentrate people in spots. More than 54% of worlds population lives in urban areas.
Talenter will focus on metropoles the first years. To this end, we have developed a sophisticated hub marketing strategy.
A small booking fee of 5% guaranteed steady income.
Talenter will gain steady income independend of momentarely TLT courses because a service is probably offered on Talenter.io in a TLT equivalent of 5 Dollar in average.
Our business plan is to grow successively. As described above, we will use the developed hub marketing strategy to develop one metropolis after another and build up local employees there as well. If we are successful, expansion will continue. We are therefore extremely cautious with liquid funds and will definitely lead talenter.io to great success. If in doubt, it only takes longer, but it will happen.
Internationalization:
A sophisticated plan has already been developed as to which metropolises we will tackle one after the other.
Competition:
Shared Economy Market is ripe for Blockchain Approach
Etsy, Fiverr, TaskRabbit, Uber are like Talenter in gig economy. And also when they arent direct competitors they are good indicators for Talenters market.
Etsy, fiverr and TaskRabbit are making approximately a 312 million Dollar turn-over.
The already existing gig market represents a great opportunity for a blockchain solution. Even more if one think about the near future.
Blockchain technology is going to make purchase processes manyfold easier. And so far convenience was always a strong argument for users.
Team experience:
Here some more informations to the Founder-Team, who have been working together for 15 years and have been working exclusively and intensively at Talenter.io for 1 year.
Roland Schwarz
has studied at the Academy of Arts in Berlin and finished as the best of the year, awarded with a magnific price.
He has built up Jung von Matt in Berlin and was many years their successful managing director.
He is responsible for the marketing of numerous international bestseller.
Roland has also established business in China. For a long time he act as Blockchain an Cryptocurrency Evangelist.
At Talenter he use his whole experience for whose great fame
https://www.linkedin.com/in/roland-a-schwarz
Alexander Hotz
has the master in business management. He had worked successfully for a long time at an international bank
and is a veteran of the web startup industry. As a pioneer he developed 1994 (as a reminder: Google was founded 1997)
the first international communities used by millions of users. Large international companies appreciate his expertise.
He has recognized very early the potential for blockchain and cryptocurrency applications.
His internet experience together with the famous expertise of Roland will make Talenter.io marvellous.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexander-hotz/
And now?
The only thing we need to scale the business is a lead investor. We have already found co-investors. With a lead investor we could give the starting signal for the rollout. Please support us. Please contact us. Every help helps.

name: refundrebel
businessDescription:
refundrebel makes it easier and faster to claim a refund after a delayed or cancelled train than booking the actual train ticket.
 
After a delayed or cancelled train you only need to fill in some information about the trip on your smartphone or laptop on www.refundrebel.com and refundrebel does the rest for you.
 
You will be kept updated about your claim and receive the money on your bank account after the refund is confirmed.

name: MedPayRx

We Do Smart Prescriptions! 

Our technology connects medical cannabis patients, doctors, insurers, and pharmacies in Germany with one simple to use app. Find prescribing doctors and friendly pharmacies. Manage prescriptions and insurance payments.

Stecnius then plan to extend our system to other sports, like dancing and boxing. Ultimately, they want to bring Solos into users’ homes to help them stay in shape and live healthier lives.

name: LiefergrÃ¼n
businessDescription:
Liefergrün has a vision to enable guilt-free online shopping by reducing the environmental impact of deliveries. As a result, it is committed to creating a fair, social, and emissions-free delivery experience with the mantra ‘we respect your shopping’. 

Liefergrün delivers in freely selectable time windows and with 24/7 real-time tracking. Return deliveries are also able to be scheduled and are fully sustainable. Already present in 30 cities across Germany, the startup uses a fleet of cargo bikes and electric vehicles based at scores of micro-distribution hubs to enable emission-free delivery of goods bought online to consumers.  

The young startup works with the likes of Adidas, Dyson and Every to provide a range of services including two hour and next day delivery which customers can track in real-time using an app.

name: Climedo
businessDescription:
Climedo offers a modular solution for electronic data capture (EDC) which enables pharmaceutical and medical device companies to efficiently validate their products and medical innovations in a patient-centric way. By digitally connecting everyone involved in a clinical trial (including sponsors, physicians and patients), communication and data capture are simplified significantly, and outcomes are improved. 

Launched in 2017, the healthtech is offering an important innovation in the sector, at a time when there is a push for new medical discoveries to be made. 

By capturing and processing real-time data in compliance with data protection regulations, Climedo not only enables faster and more cost-effective approvals of drugs and medical devices, but can also be applied for post-market surveillance, where the safety and performance of products on the market are documented throughout their lifecycle.
tags: drugs, medical devices, electronic data capture

name: Cansativa
businessDescription:
Cansativa is building the ‘Amazon’ of cannabis for Europe, offering its customers a B2B platform to manage every stage of the value chain. In addition to importing and distributing a wide variety of cannabis products, the Cansativa platform enables market access while providing a host of ancillary logistics services, making it one of the most holistic and sophisticated cannabis ecosystems in the world.

Cansativa is working to raise the profile of medical cannabis and to make it usable as an option for treatment – driving a new era of legal adult-use cannabis in Germany and across Europe. The German market for medical cannabis has several stakeholders – Cansativa brings them together into a strong network, offering standard products from many international manufacturers. In this way, they can ensure security, transparency and choice from one single source.

Given its exclusive relationship with German regulator, the Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices (BfArM), Cansativa is currently the only company permitted to distribute domestically-grown medical cannabis.

businessDescription:

name: elmira industrial supplies
businessDescription: We have a patented technology for the synthesis of bio chemical intermediates from agricultural waste. We replace petrol-counterparts for applications across the industry (aerospace, automotive, sports, textiles, oil and gas, household, construction, etc.).
longBusinessDescription:
Climate change, depletion of fossil fuels and the need to feed an increasing world population require a change in chemical manufacture from fossil fuel based to biobased without reducing the land area available for food.  One resource that meets these requirements is an aromatic-aliphatic molecule, derivative of the cashew-nut-shells, called cardanol, underexploited and with a worldwide availability of 700,000tn pa.
Today, in the industry cardanol is functionalised and polymerised to get to polymers applicable in coatings, adhesives, foams and surfactants. However, we have demonstrated that cardanol (as a base) can be improved for its performance in the above mentioned fields and made applicable to many others (pharma, fragrances, cosmetics,  insect-attractants and more) by taking a different approach.  In a very simple process, we break down its molecular structure into its aromatic and aliphatic parts and (from there) select high-value 100% bio monomeric bases, used as such or further modified into different high functional bio-products,
We have developed a bio-refinery , attracting the interest of important chemical groups and being expected to generate a potential turnover of about 10bn euro/annum, with an environmental impact measurable in 100 of tonnes of kg saved per annum.

"Access to EV charging infrastructure will soon be the sole remaining obstacle to e-full mobility's potential."
Inventive Gemini (2019).
To make e-mobility a mainstream occurrence - particularly in Europe's major cities, where up to 75% of car owners lack access to a private charging station - we must take the following steps: Europe presently has less than 200,000 public charging stations, but by 2025, it will require 1,300,000, and by 2030, 3,000,000. Do you want to help us construct the 'Tesla' of charging infrastructure?

longBusinessDescription:
ClearOps – ANTICIPATE DEMAND. ENSURE SUPPLY. ELIMINATE DOWNTIME. 
By connecting existing systems along the entire supply chain, from the manufacturer to the dealer and distribution network to the end customer using state-of-the-art IoT technology, existing data becomes usable in a way never before possible: planning, process automation, forecasting of future spare parts requirements, as well as the operational implementation of ordering processes within the entire ecosystem are made possible. 
ClearOps can be used to increase parts availability and thus significantly reduce machine downtime, reduce inventory levels and the capital tied up in them, shorten delivery times, and ultimately digitize and automate manual planning and service processes, resulting in significantly increased customer satisfaction. 
The cloud-based software-as-a-service solution was developed by the Munich-based startup led by CEO William Barkawi and has already been in use at major international companies such as Jungheinrich, Terex, and AGCO since 2016. Today, ClearOps is already used to plan 5 million parts per day and process 30,000 orders per week.

name: LenioBio
businessDescription:
At LenioBio, we believe every person should have the opportunity to live a healthy and productive life.
We develop efficient and sustainable technologies to produce medicines and food for those in need, wherever they are.
LenioBio enables proteins to be brought to market faster and at lower cost – across all industries.
longBusinessDescription:
LenioBio is a biotech company that develops and markets a novel, unique and proprietary protein production platform, ALiCE, which enables protein-based therapeutics to become more accessible and affordable. LenioBio was founded in 2016 in Germany to broadly commercialize the ALiCE platform, originally developed by DowDuPont and the Fraunhofer Institute.
Our business model is to provide a fully integrated protein production platform for pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies, with unique capabilities and the ability to scale along with our customers’ needs.
It takes a new protein drug 12 years on average to go through the drug development process.
From drug discovery - finding a protein that may work on a disease
to pre-clinical trials - testing it in animals
followed by clinical trials - testing it in humans
and commercial production & supply.
In all four phases, there are inefficiencies that together constitute the problem.
Our proprietary and unique platform will address these inefficiencies and speed up the whole process.

We are constantly striving to list new products and services from banks and insurance companies and thus provide you with a broader basis for your financial decision. If you are satisfied with our service, we look forward to recommending it to friends and acquaintances.

With over 250 partners connected to our RTB technology & in-house, demand-side platform, our media reach expands across social, display, native, video, rich media, search, and more. TAB´s services are unparalleled in bringing the best value and ROI for every media dollar spent.

name: counto
businessDescription:
TURN WAIT INTO GREAT.
Create cool countdowns, share them with friends and engage all in your anticipation.

THATS WHAT IT DOES:

With counto you can create individualized countdowns  lets call them »countos«  to your upcoming special moments and you can share these countos publicly or as private groups.

PRIVACY RULES

A private counto will only be visible to the people invited. As owner you will be able to invite new people or block attendees.

Note: The private counto invitation contains your profile name and picture, the event description, the event date and the running countdown.

A public counto will be fully visible to anyone on or off counto.

SHARE AND INVITE OPTIONS

Countos can be spread and shared publicly or private, on or off counto, by using third party apps like messengers or social networks, or by embedding them.

Its your choice!

Within each counto your friends can interact with you and become part of your anticipation by swopping comments around your very favorite upcoming moments.

For example your favorite sports events, your faraway holidays, your sizzling dates, your headbanging concerts, your eagerly awaited graduations, your glittering festivals, your wicked parties, your big family occasions, etc.

INTERACTION AND COMMENT BOARD

countos that are liked can be favored and will be added to a special favorite list.

In the counto comment board comments can be modified or fully revoked by the writer.

The counto owner will always have full control over the comment board.

Note: Once a countdown has expired, the counto will automatically be transferd into the counto archive of the owner where it will remain only visible for the owner.

name: SEO-Report.io
businessDescription: Every week we will analyse the past search traffic to your web page and generate a SEO report for you. This report contains all important SEO metrics and specific suggestions on what you can do to get more organic search traffic.

brainboost offers various services using computer assisted EEG analysis and neurofeedback treatment with the goal to prevent and treat mental stress and conditions and improve the quality of life.

Computer software and scientific databases allow a more thorough realtime EEG (=Elektroenzephalogramm; “brainactivity”) assessment of data acquired from patients or customers. Thus, this classic and experienced medical imaging technology with all its advantages can generate an exponentially higher amount of medical information about a persons brainactivity.

name: Right People Group Digital

Your contact at Right People is a professional consultant manager who can help you define requirements and who is also the one who is in charge of the entire process of finding, quality assuring and interviewing candidates before 1-2 selected candidates are presented to you. Fueling the international expansion is the digital presence where customer across sectors find Right People Group and get in touch to find the IT resources they need.

name: Kewazo
businessDescription: Kewazo develops smart robotic elevators for industrial and construction sites, with the first application focus being scaffolding assembly. Kewazo's robotic system enables flexible, cost-efficient and safe transportation of scaffolding parts during assembly. Two workers with the robot can get a job done faster than three or more with conventional methods. Alongside with a robotic system, Kewazo provides its customers with a data analytics platform. The robotic system records operational data by using sensor data and computer vision. By creating a digital twin of on-site logistics, customers are provided with better controlling, planning and suggestions for process optimisation.

name: GameInfluencer
businessDescription:
GameInfluencer helps game publishers and influencers to connect.
Founded by a team with deep experience in game publishing, marketing, online communities and promotion, we are passionate about great games and strongly believe that there's no better way to introduce new players to games than through player-generated content.
We bring together mobile and online games with the best fitting influencers on platforms such as YouTube, Twitch, etc. Among others we work for companies like Com2us, Nexon, Wargaming and Spilgames.

name: Arculus
businessDescription: Arculus provides hardware and software solutions for industrial automation. Arculus is the company behind the modular production revolution, headquartered in Ingolstadt, Germany. This company was founded with a mission to make a more efficient and flexible production system in multi-variant industries, implementing the most innovative solutions.

name: Smark
businessDescription: Smark offers a new kind of shopping experience with fully automated shopping stations. Co-founders Philipp Hoening and Max Ittermann created the concept to make grocery shopping easy, quick, convenient and possible at any time, for anyone. Items are ordered in advance via smartphone or onsite via a touch screen. Within a minute, the shopping basket is automatically assembled and dispensed by the station. The technology behind the process was created by the startup and is called the ‘smarkBox’ – a combination of hardware, automation technology and web technologies.

name: COMPREDICT
businessDescription: With its AI-based Virtual Sensors, COMPREDICT converts raw data into rich and monetizable vehicle insights through health & usage monitoring. The mobility industry benefits from additional revenue streams enabled by true predictive maintenance. Automakers also use COMPREDICT's technology to validate lightweight component design resulting in more efficient vehicles.
tags: virtual sensors, IoT, mobility, vehicle data
longBusinessDescription:
We are a German startup specialized in AI-based algorithms and analytics using existing in-vehicle data.
Our mission is to provide fleet operators and engineers with efficient, user-friendly data analytics tools, to get the most value out of extensive data volumes produced by connected vehicles. Our ultimate goal is to help all mobility stakeholders reduce CO2 emissions over the full product lifecycle.
Our deep vehicle knowledge distinguishes us, as we have been working on component load and fatigue determination, and subsequent lifetime prediction, since the very beginning in 2016. With our teams and our solution, we join vehicle expertise and efficient data science.
For fleet operators, we provide wear prediction and anomaly detection of critical vehicle components like brake pads and brake disks or tires, fault prediction of 12/24V batteries, continuous total mass in motion, and high voltage battery condition.
We alert about component failures before they occur, and predict component lifetime.
Our algorithms are hosted on an industrialized, scalable cloud-based hub, providing flexible and convenient REST/API interfaces to existing fleet management platforms, or alternatively our own visualization interface.
Currently, we are analyzing 50,000 vehicles connected to our platform, a majority of which are electrified passenger cars.

name: Presentando
businessDescription:
Presentando - Ihr Erklärfilm ist der einige deutsche Anbieter von Erklärfilmen mit einer BEST-PREIS-GARANTIE!

Genau, Sie haben richtig gelesen. Wir von Presentando garantieren Ihnen, dass Sie Ihr Erklärvideo mit der gleichen Länge und den gleichen Voraussetzungen nirgendwo günstiger finden als bei uns. 
Und falls doch, dann passen wir unser Angebot einfach an das Vergleichsangebot an.
Bei Presentando arbeiten wir mit professionellen und erfahrenen Freelancern aus der ganzen Welt zusammen. Wir verzichten bewusst auf ein luxuriöses Office und schicke Firmenautos. 
Das ermöglicht es uns, Kostenvorteile direkt an unsere Kunden weiterzureichen und diesen Service anzubieten.

Unsere Bestpreis-Garantie ist quasi ein Versprechen, dass Sie Ihr Erklärvideo nirgendwo günstiger produzieren lassen können als bei uns. 
Damit möchten wir Ihnen die maximale Sicherheit geben, dass Sie mit Ihrer Buchung bei Presentando immer den besten Preis bekommen. 
Und das Beste: Alles passiert für Sie einfach und unkompliziert. 
Die Bearbeitung Ihrer Anfrage ist selbstverständlich kostenlos.
longBusinessDescription:
Der Begriff "Presentando" stammt aus dem spanischen und bedeutet (wie Sie sicher schon vermutet haben) nichts anderes als präsentieren. Genau das ist es, wofür wir uns Tag für Tag in enger Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Kunden engagieren.
Wir machen Erklärfilme und damit auch komplizierte Themen leicht verständlich
Presentando – Ihr Erklärfilm ist eine mehrfach ausgezeichnete Digitalagentur, die sich der Erstellung von Erklärfilmen verschrieben hat. Wir sind aktuell nicht nur die günstigste Erklärfilm Agentur auf dem deutschen Markt (hier geht es zu unserem Anbietervergleich), unser tägliches Engagement spiegelt sich in erfolgreichen Projekten zum Festpreis und stets hoher Kundenzufriedenheit wieder:
Erfahrungen & Bewertungen zu Presentando - Ihr Erklärfilm anzeigen
Mit Ihrem Erklärfilm erzielen wir Empathie beim Zuschauer und einen viralen Charakter zur Vermarktung
Unser kreatives Team ist international aufgestellt, um Ihnen Erklärfilme in verschiedenen Sprachen anbieten zu können. Ein kleiner Einblick in unsere bunte Welt der Nationalitäten gefällig?
Kein Problem! Türkische, indische, holländische, philippinische und sogar brasilianische Kreativköpfe finden sich unter dem Dach von Presentando - Ihr Erklärfilm. Wir unterhalten zahlreiche internationale Partnerschaften, um unsere Leistungen konsequent multilingual anbieten zu können.
Erklärvideo Anbieter
Auch bei der Wahl des visuellen Stils sind uns praktisch keinen Grenzen gesetzt. Wir sind in der Lage nahezu jeden grafischen Stil adaptieren zu können. Senden Sie uns bei Bedarf einfach ein Beispiel zu. Erfahrene Zeichner und Animationskünstler sorgen für das passende Bild zum Ton.
Ob das funktioniert?
Na klar!

name: Presentando
businessDescription:
Wir machen Erklärfilme und damit auch komplizierte Themen leicht verständlich
Presentando – Ihr Erklärfilm ist eine mehrfach ausgezeichnete Digitalagentur, die sich der Erstellung von Erklärfilmen verschrieben hat. 
Wir sind aktuell nicht nur die günstigste Erklärfilm Agentur auf dem deutschen Markt, unser tägliches Engagement spiegelt sich in erfolgreichen Projekten zum Festpreis und stets hoher Kundenzufriedenheit wieder!
longBusinessDescription:
Presentando – Ihr Erklärfilm ist eine mehrfach ausgezeichnete Digitalagentur, die sich auf die Erstellung von Erklärfilmen spezialisiert hat. Unter dem Dach verbirgt sich ein großes Team an internationalen Freelancern, die es möglich machen, Erklärvideos in fast jeder beliebigen Sprache zu produzieren. Erfahrene Zeichner, Illustratoren und Animationskünstler sorgen für das passende Bild zum Ton. Momentan ist Presentando – Ihr Erklärfilm der günstigste Anbieter auf dem Markt der Erklärvideos.
Wir sind in der Lage, Ihnen unsere Erklärvideos nicht nur zu durchweg günstigen Konditionen anbieten zu können - sondern zum Bestpreis! Viele tausend Euro sind heute nicht mehr erforderlich, um sehr gute Resultate zu erzielen. Neben dem Einsatz modernster Technologien, ist die jahrelange Erfahrung unserer Kreativköpfe entscheidend für unsere kurzen Produktionslaufzeiten.
Büroräume im Münchner Stadtzentrum - 180 qm auf Etage 12 mit Sonnendeck - drei Geschäftsfahrzeuge der Oberklasse, teure Werbeagentur und monatliche Spesenabrechnungen, die einen ins Staunen versetzen? Nicht bei Presentando - Ihr Erklärfilm.
Unseren hauseigenen Bedarf decken wir über das Minimalprinzip und es ist erstaunlich, wie effektiv dies heutzutage mit Laptop und in Verbindung mit dem Internet möglich ist.
Dank unserer clever durchdachten Infrastruktur können selbst umfangreiche Erklärvideos oder ein größeres Volumen von Erklärfilmen zum fairen Preis angeboten werden. Bitte kommen Sie für Serienproduktionen direkt auf uns zu, um inidividuelle Konditionen mit Ihnen vereinbaren zu können.
Alle unsere Erklärvideos beinhalten sämtliche Leistungen von der Scripterstellung, Animation, Vertonung bis hin zum fertigen Marketing-Video auf Ihrer Website.

businessDescription:

name: Banfieldâs Professional Medical English
businessDescription: Online and Private tutor school for Medical English and Healthcare Communication Skills for Doctors, Nurses, Therapists and other healthcare professionals, for the Cambridge-Boxhill Occupational English Test so they can practise in English-speaking countries.
tags: medical english, occuaptional englishtest, english for doctors, english for nurses
longBusinessDescription:
Started by a medical doctor in 2015, BPME offers online courses in English for medicine and healthcare, for speakers starting from pre-intermediate (CEFR B1) to pre-advanced (B2+ and above). The curriculum includes both 100% online materials and private tutoring by certified TESOL teachers and with those healthcare backgrounds. A major product profile is the Occupational English Test, a Cambridge-Boxhill language assessment accepted by major English-speaking countries as proof of high professional English language competency for practising in English-speaking countries. Additionally, we prepare US foreign medical graduates not only to pass OET but with their documentation and interview prep for residency programme matching.
OET has to date directly trained and endorsed about 40 schools internationally to prepare students, and BPME is now one of the top 10 "All Stars" schools worldwide.

businessDescription: We envision a world running on carbon neutral energy. So we're developing XENON - the digital energy platform. XENON lets anyone connect distributed energy resources (DERs) on a single platform. gridX was founded in 2016 and operates offices in Aachen and Munich.

LEMONCAT -  FINDEN SIE DAS PASSENDE BUSINESS CATERING

With a team of experienced entrepreneurs and investors we will digitalize and revolutionize the German online catering market thereby making the life of our customers much easier.

businessDescription:

businessDescription:

The company combines the first-hand experience of a travel agency with the simplicity of an online product. Its apps bring travel consultancy to a state-of-the-art level of tech and design and thereby will shape the future of individual and adventure trips.

name: nxtbase technologies
businessDescription: Jörg Jonas-Kops has developed the assisted reality solution platform nxtBase. The platform allows production, logistics and service to be visually guided and completely voice-controlled. By using smart watches, data glasses and gloves, information and instructions are being fed directly into the production, logistics and service processes via augmented reality (AR) and will be directly connected to SAP, if required.
longBusinessDescription:
Nxtbase technologies GmbH has focused serving a global industrial segment with solutions for efficient field service, logistics and manufacturing. Founded in 2013 as a high-tech start-up, nxtbase is now Potsdam based and combines many years of IT and SCM experience. Nxtbase solution relies heavily on our deep competence in augmented and mixed reality, digital imaging and human-computer interaction. Nxtbase used this expertise to turn smart glasses into practical solutions. Nxtbase technologies provides some of Europes leading companies, such as MAN, SBB cargo international, Airbus / Premium Aerotec or HPA ( Hamburg Port Authority) with logistic and maintenance support via different Smart Devices like realwear HMT-1 or Vuzix M300 Smart Glasses. The Vuzix M300 is be connected to the Nxtbase Secure Mobile Device and Application Management platform and helps to deliver hands-free, voice activated digital support for Industry 4.O and IoT applications.
The goal is to create a user-friendly but efficient solution that can be used or expanded for all industries. It should be no matter which terminal equipment is used. After all, the customer should not be restricted by us, but rather enjoy all the possibilities of Industry 4.0.
Nxtbase relies on a platform build by our framework hosted on premise or in the Nxtbase cloud servers, wherefrom all devices can be administered and managed.
On the client side, our Univice application is working. It connects all Android-based devices to our platform  regardless of using smartphones, tablet computers or SmartGlasses. The range of functions can be individually adapted to the industry and wishes of the customer and can be extended at any time by our software solutions. This gives the customer a wide range of add-ons, which he can use to equip the respective devices. All devices can be configured individually or grouped.
Any questions? Simply write us or visit our website!

name: Sono Motors
businessDescription:
Sono Motors Vision is to become an established provider of sustainable mobility, by focusing on manufacturing electric vehicles with alternative power technologies and innovative sharing services.
Their first model will be an electric car called Sion with the inclusion of photovoltaics (viSono) in the chassis, a range of 250 km and a retail price of 16 000 . In short: an affordable mainstream electric car which provides an array of solutions for the future of e-mobility and urban transport.

name: German Autolabs
businessDescription: German Autolabs is a pioneer in automotive voice AI. Its Automotive Voice Assistance platform, AVA, offers a full stack conversational assistance solution for the mobility sector. With its retrofit hardware, Chris, the digital co-driver, German Autolabs bypasses automotive development cycles by leveraging deep domain knowledge of driver behavior through the biggest connected fleet on the road. The fully offline-capable AVA platform provides customize white label technology solutions for global verticals such as automotive, fleet management, insurance and aftermarket consumer electronics. Powered by AVA, businesses take disruptive voice products and solutions to market, fast.

name: VoltStorage
businessDescription: We develop and produce solar storage systems based on the ecological Redox Flow Technology to store surplus solar energy during the day to make it available at night. With our sustainable storage solutions, we strive to make renewables available 24/7 - and thus make the world cleaner and fairer for future generations.

name: Moonfare
businessDescription: Moonfare is on a mission to revolution the process of investing in private equity. We are a technology-enabled platform allowing individuals to invest in top-tier private equity funds at low minimums and fair fees. Our technology aggregates demand and creates a hassle-free investment experience with improved liquidity and the ability to cherry-pick investments.

name: Coya
businessDescription: Coya offers a new hope, by redesigning and extending the insurance value chain, working backward from the customers' real-life needs. With the goal to put clients at the center and leverage new technologies, we offer a transparent and affordable insurance that provides maximum comfort and functionality along every step of the customer journey. Founded in September 2016, Coya now has over 60 employees from more than 20 different nations who work in our Berlin-based office. We are a BaFin-licensed insurance company and with an investment of about $ 40 million after the Series-A investment round, we are currently one of the top-funded Insure Techs in Europe!

name: Liqid
